121.title: Single character - Male

choices: The Chikorita goes to Kris for help.
The Chikorita goes to a Nurse Joy for help.
1211.content:
Ethan and Kris had met in Professor Elm’s lab. They shared a short, introductory conversation as the two waited for the Professor to bring out their starters. Though, once Kris got her hasty pick of a Totodile, she ran off with a chipper, “Bye!”

In contrast, Ethan took his time as he chose his Chikorita. He also stayed behind to pack and say goodby to his mother.

However, Ethan's rush to the next step in his journey slowed as he found a relatively rare addition to his team.

Ethan gritted his teeth staring down a Muk. It was an anomaly for this region of Johto, so it was a prize Ethan would be more than happy to catch. "Chikorita! Use tackle!"

The pokemon complied, slamming directly into the Muk, lodging itself into its viscous body.

"Oh jeez," Ethan hummed, running over to the Muk. He grabbed at his starter's leg, attempting to free the Chikorita. It didn't budge.

"Hey Ethan!" Kris called.

Startled, Ethan stumbled and fell into the Muk. The gelatinous grime surrounded him, and he let out a surprised scream as he struggled for freedom.

And then the Muk used Minimize.

In a matter of seconds, the Muk's form began to dwindle down until it was an inch tall blob, releasing Ethan and the Chikorita from its grasp. The tiny pokemon then began to run away, leaving Ethan lying on the ground sputtering.

"Ugh, I think I got some of it in my mouth," Ethan whined as he spat on the ground. Groaning, he called back his pokemon.

"Oh," Kris hummed, tugging on a few loose strands of blue hair. "Sorry." She made her way over to her new aquaintance and helped him up.

"It's fine," he said, dusting off his shorts. "It probably would have ran away with my Chikorita if you hadn't come along."

"Yeah..." Kris chuckled. "So I guess you're heading for Violet City, too."

Ethan nodded. "I'm gonna try and take down the gym later today."

Kris whistled. "That's pretty ambitious. Plus, the gym'll probably close by the time we get to Violet City."

"We?"

Kris nodded. "Well, I figured we could be road buddies. Y'know, traveling together, training our pokemon, taking down gyms..."

"Sounds like fun," Ethan said, stuffing his hands in his pockets. "Wouldn't hurt to have a road buddy for a while."

"Yes!" Kris pumped her fist. She grabbed Ethan by the hand and ran down the route. "C'mon! The Violet City Poke-Center has really good food."


***


The two shared a booth in the back corner of the Violet City Center. Kris carefully picked at her salad, chewing on a crouton, idly watching other trainers around the cafeteria.

“You really spent the entire day chasing down a Phanpy?” Ethan asked, digging into his sandwich.

Kris nodded. “Duh. I had to.” She hugged the elephant-like pokemon, and it squeaked. “It’s so cute!”

Ethan chuckled. “I don’t really know how well it’ll do against Falkner and his flying types.”

“I’m sure we’ll be fine,” Kris said, still squeezing her Phanpy. “Although, it would be best if I turn in for the night.”

After dinner, the two went into their respective rooms. For a small fee, the Pokemon Centers offered registered Trainers dorms for one night only. Though, it was barebones with pretty much just a cot and a dresser. Regardless, the two trainers appreciated having a place to stay.

***


Ethan woke up surrounded by his sheets. He scrambled upwards and fought his way past the blankets and towards the light Upon escaping, he realized that something was off.

After two seconds of staring off the cliff that used to be the bed he slept on.

He had shrunk.

Ethan felt his breath shorten as he stumbled backwards. “What the…” He rubbed his eyes before scanning the room again. Nothing. He was still hopelessly small.

On the tiny bedside drawer next to him was his bag he brought with him for his journey. He ran over to the edge of the cot. The bag’s strap hung off the edge, just high enough for him to climb up. He scaled the bag, pried open one of the zippers. A Pokeball rolled out and on the floor, releasing his trusty starter.

“Chikori!” the pokemon screeched up at its master.

“Chikorita!” Ethan called, sliding down the bag’s straps and back onto the bed. “Go get help!”

“Chiki!!” Without another word, the pokemon bolted out the door.
1211.title: An Eventful Start

choices: Kris begins to sit down on the cot.
12111.content:
Kris’ eyes fluttered open. She rolled to her side and looked out the window. Rain, definitely not the kind of weather to take down her first gym. No, if she was going to get her first gym badge, it would be a bright, sunny day. She could afford to stay in. She pulled the blanket over herself.

“Chikori!”

Sitting up, Kris looked over and saw a Chikorita standing at the side of her bed.

“Huh?” Kris hummed. “You’re Ethan’s pokemon, right?”

The Chikorita jumped.

“You should probably go back to him,” she said, hugging her pillow. “He’s probably worried about you.”

“Chiki!”

“Hmm?” She ran her hand through her hair. “Is something up?”

“Chi!”

Kris sighed and swung her feet off the edges of the bed. “Okay then. Let’s see what’s got you riled up.” She dropped her feet into a pair of fuzzy slippers. Stretching out her arms, she followed he pokemon down the hall.

“Ethan’s room?” Kris asked. “I don’t know. I shouldn’t barge—“

The Chikorita ran behind her legs and pushed her into the room.

Ethan’s eyes widened as he watched a massive figure stumbled in. The giant girl’s blue hair was unmistakeable. “K-Kris? Oh, gosh… she’s huge.” He ran over back to the edge of the bed.
12111.title: Wake Up Call

choices: "It's raining, so the route to New Bark Town is closed. We're stuck here."
"We should probably prepare for the trip first."
121112.content:
"K-Kris! Down here!" Ethan stumbled backwards as the massive backside of his new friend loomed over him. He tried his best to scramble back on his feet but failed to cover any ground.

It felt as if the entire weight of the world fell on Ethan. He struggled under the firm cheek, blushing furiously.

Kris sat down on the side of the cot. She let out a sigh and looked down at the bouncing Chikorita. "He's not here." She played with her slippers. "He's probably getting breakfast or in the bathroom."

The Chikorita didn't take that as an answer. Instead, it hopped on the bed and began nudging Kris' hip.

"What?" Kris asked, a bit annoyed at the pokemon's shoving.

"Chiki!"

Kris rolled her eyes but otherwise stood up. She looked down at the bed.

Then her stomach dropped.

Laying in the center of a slight depression was a tiny figure. It twitched and writhed, and the pit in Kris' stomach only expanded.

"Ethan... is that you?" Kris knelt down to get a closer look. Sure enough, it was the same boy she had met just yesterday. And now, nearly twenty-four hours later, she almost smothered him to death. Carefully, she cupped the shrunken boy in her hands. "Please be alive. Please be alive. Please-be-alive. Pleasebealive."

The tiny figure coughed. "K...Kris?"

She let out a massive sigh before wiping her forehead. "Oh, thank goodness. You're okay."

"More or less," Ethan wheezed.

Standing back up, Kris made sure that her tiny friend was fine before lifting him closer to her face. "Ethan... I'm so sorry. I almost..."

"It's fine," Ethan said, waving an arm dismissively.

"What happened to you?"

"I don't know." Ethan sat up, his breathing still weak. "Maybe we can get to Professor Elm. He's in the next town over."

"Yeah," Kris hummed. "But..."

1241.content: Crystal and Lyra, the female player characters from the 2nd gen, both shrink together. But how?
1241.title: Crystal and Lyra

12411.content:
Kris(Crystal) and Kotone(Lyra) had journeyed far across the Johto region along with their pal, Hibiki(Gold), and had caught many Pokemon and defeated many Gym Leaders. But on their travels they came across a rogue group of former Team Rocket members, completely by accident, who had decided to restart the failed organization under new management. Since then they had almost single handedly taken down the struggling evil team once again.

However, the three heroes had discovered a plot by the newly formed Team Rocket to take over the Goldenrod City Radio Tower to signal a cry for help from their mysterious former leader, who had disappeared years ago when the original team disbanded. All radio communications had ceased and been replaced by this pleading call. So Kris, Kotone, and Hibiki teamed up to take down to rescue everyone in the Radio Tower, fix the communications, and take down the last remnants of Team Rocket once and for all.

"So far, so good." Kris thought. The young, blue-haired woman had split up from Kotone and Hibiki to explore the higher levels of the Radio Tower herself. Thanks to a keycard she'd found, getting there was a piece of cake. So far her Pokemon were doing well, thanks in great part to her experienced training of them and her expert use and stock of items she always kept handy. She just hoped that Kotone and Hibiki were alright.

There was only one room left that Kris hadn't already explored, and she was sure that the Team Rocket Executives were there, waiting for her. Kris braced herself and stepped through the door to the final room.

As she expected Archer, the defacto 'leader' of the new Team Rocket was inside, doing something with the radio tower controls. Kris wasn't sure what the blue-haired man was up to here by himself, but she sure wasn't going to let him get away with taking the tower and everyone inside captive.

"Hey! Stop right there!" Kris shouted.

She stormed into the room with a strong confidence, but before she could even get close to the madman, she felt herself get grabbed from behind. She narrowly had time to gasp before a hand covered her mouth. Instinctively, she struggled to free herself from whoever had her in a hold, but couldn't. She did however get a glimpse of the long, red hair of her captor and knew immediately that it was Ariana, another of the Team Rocket executives, and one that Kris had beaten before with the help of her friends.

"Hey, you..." Ariana began, turning the girl in her grip around so she could see her. "Remember me from Mahogany Town? Hee hee, looks like this time you're all alone..."

Ariana's creepily playful tone made Kris start to worry. She knew the Rocket higher ups were crazy, but she'd never been caught so helplessly by one before now, and she worried what they might do to her. If only she could use her Pokemon, she thought. But Ariana was holding her in such a way that throwing any of her Pokeballs was impossible.

"Hold it." Archer said in a commanding tone. Kris felt Ariana loosen up on her just a little. Archer then walked closer to the girls. "This is the one you told me about?"

"Yes, sir. She's the little brat who beat, er, prevented us from carrying out your orders before." Ariana said.

Archer held out his hand in front of Kris's face, making the young woman sweat. He then lightly brushed her cheeks.

"Oh...? You managed to get this far?" Archer said, he sounded amused by the girl's bravado and current state. But then, he looked worried all of a sudden, and Kris couldn't help but wonder why.

"Boss..?" Ariana asked.

The answer to their questions came when into the room in a flash, it was Kotone, quite literally jumping onto the scene and tackling Ariana to the floor, causing the redhead woman to let go of Kris. Kris and Kotone recovered quickly and were on their feet in seconds, facing opposite of the stunned Team Rocket executives.

"Thanks, Kotone!" Kris said, smiling at her friend.

"Don't mention it!" Kotone smiled back.

"That was pretty reckless, though." Kris commented.

"Hey, it worked, didn't it?" Kotone said.

Kris grinned, she couldn't deny that, she just wished the Kotone would be more careful in the future. The two girls then got ready to battle the Team Rocket executives.

"This isn't going as planned." Archer said as he returned to his previous composure. He noticed that Ariana was still shocked by turn of events and shook his head. He knew defeat was imminent if he let the girls release their Pokemon soon. He scoffed at the thought of losing to the girls, and went to the radio tower's control panel.

"Ariana, step back!" Archer shouted, and he flipped some switches and pressed a button. Suddenly, a strong waves of sounds burst into the room, knocking everyone to the floor.

"Oww...." Kotone cried, and covered her ears.

"What is he doing!?" Kris shouted, covering her ears as well.

"That fool! He can't be using that experiment! Not when I'm right here!" Ariana shouted. She covered a single ear and tried to get away from the girls.

Though their ears were aching from the sheer sound of the noise, the girls could still see. They saw as the sound waves seemed to concentrate in the middle of the room and form a pattern the radiated throughout the room directly into the them. The waves of noise seemed to take on a reddish color and the girls could almost feel the sound vibrating through their bodies. As if the pain alone wasn't enough, the new sensation added insult to injury, and Kris could almost swear that the room was getting bigger by the second.

Archer had long since recovered, not being effected by the debilitating waves any longer and stood there watching the scene unfold. He watched in amazed satisfaction as the Rocket engineering team's latest weapon had successfully turned the tables on the girls, shrinking them little by little while they were too caught off guard to do anything about it, much less realize it was happening to them.

"K-Kris! I-Is it just me, or is the r-room getting... b-bigger!?" Kotone cried over the noise.

Kris couldn't even reply if she wanted to, the pain and the shrinking taking its toll on the poor girl. She felt like Kotone was right, everything was getting bigger, or no, it was they who were getting smaller! Kris felt like she should be scared of it happening, and while in the middle of a battle with her biggest enemies, but more then anything she just felt like she was about to pass out from it all.

Then, it stopped. The noise, the shrinking, everything. Kris had had enough though, and collapsed on the floor. Kotone ran over to her side and tried to shake her friend awake.

"Kris, no!" Kotone cried. She herself was hurting from the strong soundwaves, but her worry for her friend came first.

"I-I'm okay, Kotone..." Kris replied, her voice tired sounding. She struggled, but got to her feet on her own.

Kris wiped her eyes and looked at the aftermath of the sound wave strike. Kotone and her own fears were confirmed as she stared up in awe at the now massive room around her. She and Kotone had indeed been shrunk by the weird waves after all!

"N-No way..." Kris gasped.

"Oh my goodness..!" Kotone joined Kris in shock. After worrying about nothing but Kris's safety for the whole time, Kotone had hardly enough time to register that they were in the same boat and had both been shrunk by the strange noise attack from before. She covered her mouth and gasped at how huge everything was to her now, and she now felt like she the one who was going to pass out.

"K-Kotone, no!" Kris caught her friend before she fell. Kotone recovered quickly and wiped her forehead, as if to relieve the stress of it all.

"I can't believe it! We've been shrunk, clothes and all!" Kotone cried.

"Well, you better get used to it fast, because we've still got company!" Kris warned. She pointed up to the massive figure of...
12411.title: Both Crystal and Lyra shrink

124113.content:
The giant figure that stood over the girls was none other than their beloved friend, Hibiki(Gold)! The dark-haired, jacket-wearing young man appeared to be a regular giant to the shrunken girls, standing at some 50 feet tall from their mouse-size perspective. He appeared to be looking around the room casually, as if he was looking for something.

"Hibiki!" Kotone cried in joy and rushed over to her now giant-sized friend and ally. The tiny brunette only reached up to Hibiki's shoe, but nevertheless, she hugged the boy's shoe tightly.

Kotone's warm reception was not unnoticed by Hibiki, who looked down and saw both Kotone and Kris standing down on the floor, reduced to only about 6 inches tall. Hibiki was shocked by this and unsure of how to respond.

"K-Kotone! H-How did this happen?" Hibiki dropped to one knee and took a gentle pose over the shrunken girls.

"Oh, I don't know how!" Kotone replied, teary-eyed. After all she'd been through, she felt like she could release some tension now that Hibiki had come to save her and Kris.

Hibiki looked down at her, feeling sad and sorry for both girls' current sizes. He was nervous around the shrunken girls, even though he'd been on many adventures with the both of them since the start, seeing them the size of dolls now made them look and feel fragile to him. He worried that they might break if he got too rough with them, and so just let Kotone cry her heart out and weep on his shoe.

Kris walked over to Hibiki, she was glad he was here, but didn't show it like Kotone by hugging his foot, instead she offered a big smile and, with her arms folded, an explanation as to what just happened to her and Kotone.

"It was Archer, the Team Rocket 'leader' who did this. He did something to the radio controls and made some kind of soundwave that somehow shrank us down to this size." Kris explained more coherently than Kotone.

"Archer, huh? Don't worry about him. I've already taken care of him." Hibiki said triumphantly. Kris let out a sigh of relief at this news.

"How long has it been? You've beaten him already?" Kris asked, somewhat shocked by Hibiki's quick action against Team Rocket.

"Not exactly. As soon as I showed up, he ran off and got away. I was going to chase after him, but then I wondered where you and Kotone were, since I hadn't seen you on the way up here." Hibiki explained.

"That's good. Thank you for your help." Kris said. Hibiki smiled at her and Kotone, but looked sad at the same time.

"I'm sorry, if only I'd come a minute sooner, I might've been able to help prevent this from happening to you two!" Hibiki said.

"No! Don't think like that, Hibiki! You saved us!" Kotone shouted.

"Yeah. If you were here a minute earlier, you might've just been shrunk along with us." Kris offered. Hibiki seemed reluctant, but nodded.

"Thanks, girls. I promise I'll help you two out anyway I can now!" Hibiki told them. Kotone smiled and nodded big time, happy that her friend was happy.

"Yeah, it's for the best. Besides, I can only imagine what Archer and Ariana might've done with us otherwise." Kris shivered at the thought.

"Ariana, huh? Well, you don't have to worry about her either..." Hibiki started to say.
124113.title: Hibiki to the rescue

1241131.content:
"Because she shrunk too." Hibiki said, and pointed across the room to the freshly shrunken figure of Ariana, now reduced to the same minuscule size as Kris and Kotone, and looking none too pleased about it.

"Oh no!" Kotone exclaimed. Even though they were enemies, Kotone couldn't help but feel bad for the Rocket executive.

"Serves her right." Kris huffed.

Hibiki stepped over his shrunken friends to go get Ariana, and hopefully some answers about how the girls all shrank. But Ariana's small size hadn't diminished her will, and she ran screaming when she saw the giant Hibiki coming towards her. However, Ariana's tiny stature made even her full sprint nothing that Hibiki couldn't cover in just a few casual steps, and the normal-sized boy caught up to her in no time.

"Stop, please. I'm not going to hurt you." Hibiki assured her. To show his sincerity, he made no attempt to reach out for the frightened little lady. But that didn't stop her from running anyway.

"Stay away!" Ariana squeaked from the floor, panting as she ran.

Hibiki crossed his arms and sighed. He knew Ariana was a proud woman, but he thought that even she would know when to quit. Reluctantly, and as gently as he could, Hibiki bent down and grabbed the shrunken redhead, literally sweeping her off of her feet. He held her in front of his face, similarly to how he might've held a small Pokemon.

"Let me go, you creep!" Ariana shouted at him as she tried in vain to free herself from the comparative giant's fingers.

Hibiki stared at the shrunken woman in amazement. He'd seen Kris and Kotone all tiny already, but only now, holding a shrunken person like this, did he realize how small and vulnerable they were at their sizes. He wasn't even trying to hold Ariana too tightly at all, but she still was unable to even slightly budge a single of his fingers. He was astonished by the difference in power as well as size, but in the back of his head, he thought it made the girls look cute at their doll-sizes.

Down on the floor, Kris and Kotone watched Hibiki handle Ariana's shrunken body. They could little else in their current states. Kotone was happy that Ariana at least seemed to be all right, aside from being shrunk. But Kris watched the scene with a different view, watching carefully as Hibiki easily and effortlessly manhandled the shrunken woman. She knew Hibiki well and was sure he'd be a kind giant to her, but it still frightened her as she thought of how helpless she'd become. She hoped he'd let Ariana down soon.

"Stop staring at me like that!" Ariana spat. "Heh heh, when I'm back to normal again, I'll have the boss shrink you down and then we'll see how you like it!"

"That's not going to happen." Hibiki shook his head. He became a little flushed as he realized he'd been staring for too long. Not wanting to take advantage of the poor shrunken woman, Hibiki set her down next to Kris and Kotone.

"Thank goodness you're okay!" Kotone said cheerfully, running up to the redhead to give her a hug. Ariana was caught off guard by the aggressive kindness, and nearly knocked to the floor by Kotone's hug.

"H-Hey! Let go of me!" Ariana protested, shoving the younger girl away. Kotone's smile didn't fade though, she was genuinely glad that her enemy was safe, despite the fact that they were about to do battle just minutes ago.

Before Ariana could recovered completely, she was then actually tackled to the floor by Kris, who held her down and looked angry enough to slap the poor redhead.

"Kris!" Kotone gasped, not expecting her friend to be so forceful.

"Kris, don't!" Hibiki yelled, but was hesitant to intervene. After handling the small Ariana before, he wasn't sure that he should even do anything. He just hoped that Kris didn't hurt Ariana.

"How did you do this to us!? Tell us!" Kris demanded, her fist raised, ready to strike Ariana. The latter laughed.

"Now that's more the reception I expected! Hee hee!" Ariana said with a devious smile. Kris got even angrier and was about to smack Ariana, but relented and instead put her hands down and shook the villain.

"Tell us how you shrank us! Or else!" Kris demanded again.

"Or else... what? You'll beat me?" Ariana scoffed. "You've already beaten me!" She broke into a maniacal laughter. "Look at how small we are!"

"Kris, please..." Kotone pleaded with Kris, she wanted to stop all the fighting, knowing now was not the time for it.

Kris was upset by Ariana's lack of cooparation, but understood that Ariana was really in the same position as herself and Kotone. Shrunken down to a pitifully helpless size, and even worse, abandoned by her boss. Kris wondered if Archer had actually shrunk his redheaded co-hort on purpose or by accident. She wasn't sure which was worse.

Kris got off of Ariana. She screamed out in frustration and paced around to cool down. Ariana on the other hand laid there on the floor, still chuckling to herself. Hibiki stayed still, afraid to intervene with the shrunken girls. Kotone didn't like it, and walked over to the mad woman. She stood over Ariana and folded her arms.

"Hey! You should at least tell us what happened!" Kotone shouted.

"What's the point?" Ariana settled down from her laughing fit and stared up at Kotone's angry pout. "Archer is long gone. Bastard left me behind, I wonder if he even noticed that he shrank me down with you two fools..."

"The point?" Kotone began. "The point is that we need to find a way to get back to normal!"

"Not possible." Ariana replied shortly. She stood up, now standing slightly taller than Kotone even though they both shrank it seemed to be in proportion. "That device was meant to shrink our enemies, not grow them."

"What do you mean? What device?" Kris asked, coming back to the others.

"It's a prototype weapon. We planned to use this radio tower's waves and turn them into a weapon that was capable of shrinking anyone who dared to stand in our way. We weren't supposed to use it yet, but you can see how that turned out." Ariana motioned Hibiki, who looked giant to the tiny girls.

"So it can only shrink things?" Hibiki asked.

"Yeah, didn't you hear me the first time? Or is my voice too small to carry?" Ariana asked.

"No, I heard you." Hibiki replied. He sat down on the floor to get closer to the shrunken women anyways. "But there must be a way to reverse this."

"Have you been listening? I told you it's impossible!" Ariana shouted. "We're all going to be stuck like this for the rest of our lives!" She turned to Kris and Kotone, and pointed at them. "So you two better get used to it!"

"Forever...?" Kris asked, her voice quiet as the realization set in. If that was true then all of dreams and hopes were now crushed, no more Pokemon battles, no more Pokedex filling, no more anything but living like a doll. Kris was near tears when Kotone suddenly spoke up.

"No way! I refuse to believe that!" Kotone shouted. "Besides, it isn't so bad, right, Kris?"

"You're right. There has to be something we can do." Kris said. She wanted to believe it, and she certainly didn't want to agree that being shrunken down "wasn't so bad" as Kotone had put it.

"Whatever. You can't deny facts, look at me, I've already accepted it!" Ariana pouted.

"No, Kotone's right. Even you or you're engineers don't think it's possible, there must be a way." Hibiki said.

"Yeah! You tell her, Hibiki!" Kotone yelled.

"I think we all just need to take a break and relax, and get our minds back. Let's rest up for now, and we'll think of what to do later." Hibiki said.

"That sounds good to me." Kris said.

"Yeah, and I bet you wouldn't even need to rent more than one room! You know, because we're all so tiny!" Kotone offered cheerfully.

"What!? Are you saying we should all share a room with Hibiki!?" Kris's face turned red at the thought.

"I'm not sharing a room with anyone. Let me go, I'll do better on my own, I bet." Ariana said.

"Seriously!?" Kotone asked, shocked by the redhead's attitude.

"Hmph. Maybe that's not such a bad idea." Kris said.

"C'mon, Kris, don't be like that. She's got it just as bad as the rest of us. And Ariana, please let us help you, it's way too dangerous for you to be on your own at your size." Hibiki said.

Ariana thought about it for all of 5 seconds before deciding...
1241131.title: Ariana shrunk too

15112.content: Will he shrink during the game's story or after the games story?
15112.title: Hero From Black 2 and White 2

choices: He shrunk out of his clothes
151121.content:
It is a good day for seventeen year old Nate. He just beat the second gym leader along with his two pokemon Servine and Riolu. He exit the gym as he saw his friend Hugh along with three Team Plasma Grunts. Nate notices that one of the grunts had a strange device on his back and holding a weird zapper.

"What going on?" Nate asks as he runs over to Hugh.

"Nate! These guy were stealing things from the city. Come on let's get them." Hugh says as the black hair lad pick a pokeball from his bag.

The doors of the gym open and Roxie comes out.

"What's going on? So, are you guys Team Plasma, then," Roxie says as she notices the people in black clothing.

"Yes. We will not fall here!" The grunt with the strange device on his back.

"There's no way we're letting you win," Nate says as he gets ready to fight.

"You go. The leader needs that device," One the grunts orders as he and other grunt charge at Hugh and Roxie. The grun with the strange device ran past the group.

"I'll go get him!" Nate says as he runs after the grunt while Hugh and Roxie battle.

"Be careful!" Hugh yells as he fights.

Nate smiles as he chases the grunt. The young man was confident at he was getting closer to the grunt.

"NO! I can't get caught. I have to use it!"

Nate wonders what the grunt was talking about as the grunt turns around pulls the trigger on the zapper he was holding. A beam comes out and it hits Nate. Nate fell on the ground as he watch the grunt ran away.

"No...." Nate thought as he tries to get up but blacks out.

The young man starts to get smaller and smaller. The young man kept on shrinking until he reached the five inch mark. When the young man stirs he notices.....
151121.title: A small day in Virbank City

choices: Nate dosen't have time to think as a Pidove attacks!
Nate hears a vocie call out for him.
1511212.content:
"What's going on!" Nate yells as he stares at the huge world. The young man takes notice of a giant Sewaddle that he could even ride.

After the shock Nate tries to figure out what happen until he feels a chill. The young man looks down to see that he was as naked as the day he was born standing on his giant clothes.

"Ahh!"

Nate looks around to see that his bag at lest shrunk with him. Nate runs over to it see that he still had his two pokemon along with some items with him. But sadly it looks like the extra clothes he had in his bag didn't shrink with him.

"Now what am I going to do?" Nate asks himself as the Sewaddle goes near him. Nate gasps as he sees the giant Pokemon go near him.

Nate didn't know what to do as the giant got closer and closer. Sewaddle then took some leaves off the ground and starts to chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth. Nate was surprise to see the Sewaddle had made him a make shift pants for him. The Sewaddle finishes and hand Nate the clothes made out leaves.

"Thank you," Nate says as he puts them on. The make shift pants fit him perfectly.

"You really did a good job. Thank you very much," Nate says as pats the Sewaddle. The Sewaddle makes happy noises from Nate's touch. Nate smiles as he felt a bond start to grow between him and the bug Pokemon.

"Now that I got some pants, my bag, a new friend and pokemon. Now what do I do?"
1511212.title: A small nude Nate at first but a new firend helps

choices: Hugh stops at about half his height when he was done shrinking.
When he woke, he was Nate's height.
15112122.content:
"I try to get to Professor Juniper or something," Nate realized.

"Nate! Nate! Where are you?" came a familiar voice. Both Nate and the Sewaddle looked up. From the direction of the sun a giant appeared. Nate felt Sewaddle shake with some fear. Petting it, calmed down.

"He's my friend. May I borrow your head?" The sewaddle nodded and lowered itself and Nate climbed up on the head, using the back leaf to steady himself as the head went up, moving him to closer to 18 inches off the ground.

Hugh's massive head scanned the area. "Use string shot on him," Nate said. Seweaddle made a noise as though to consider the request before shooting a blast.

"Gah! What the!" Hugh yelled as the string came from no where. He looked to the source and saw a sewaddle . . . with a tiny figure on top. And near it was Nate's clothes! Hugh moved closer and his eyes widened with shock. "No way!"

"Hey Hugh!" came a familiar voice from his friend. "I kind of went through an accident." Hugh knelt before him and sewaddle.

"I'll say. What happened? Was it that blasted Team Plasma Grunt?" Nate nodded. "One more reason to hate them."

"While my clothes didn't shrink my bag did," Nate said. Hugh picked up the tiny bag. It looked like something his sister would play with and her dolls.

"Well, I can at least take you into the Virbank City Pokemon Center," Hugh said. He reached down and Sewaddle hissed at him. The tiny pokemon backed away. "Guess you got a good friend out of this." Nate nodded and pet the big guy.

"Yeah. It's okay boy. I'll be fine. Stay for a moment?" It responded with an affirmative tone. "You hand Hugh?" Hugh presented it and Nate climbed on to it. His tiny feet felt how strange the human skin was. The bag was given and Nate pulled out a tiny pokeball.

"Should be an interesting experiment," Hugh said softly. Nate nodded and tossed the ball at the Sewaddle. The tiny ball worked and a ding happened. The ball flew back to his hand.

"Oh wow. If I can't grow back or shrink more balls, I'll be stuck with as many as I have at the moment," Nate realized as he heard his pokedex update. Hugh nodded absentmindedly. He was feeling a little off.

"Now let's get to the Pokemon Center," he said before standing up and turning down the road.

Why did his pants feel a little bit looser now? After a few more steps, he blacked out. He fell and Nate was able to stay inside the safety of the hand.
15112122.title: The Quilfish

choices: Hugh wakes up and the three go back to Virbank City
While Hugh is waking up, Roxie starts shirnking until she was Nate's size
151121221.content:
Nate got off Hugh's hand and watches in shock as his childhood start to shrink in size in front of him. Nate takes notice that Hugh stop shrinking. Nate figures that Hugh most be haft his size now!

"What's going on? Why did Hugh just shrink,"

Nate's deep thoughts ended as the ground starts to shake. Nate wonders who or what it could be until he saw a black boot with a light blue at the bottom of it.

"Where did that Qwilfish and Dofus go?" The voice says as Nate recognizes the voice belong to the gym leader of Virbank City, Roxie. Nate wonders if he should get Roxie's help but figures that Hugh and him need help.

Nate breaths in and shouts out.

"ROXIE! DOWN HERE!"

Roxie thought she heard something from the ground. The white hair bass guitar looks down to see a haft sized Hugh that was knocked out and doll sized Nate. Roxie starts to giggle at the sight.

"Nice leaf pants,"

Nate blushes at the comment but shakes it off.

"A team Plasma grunt shoot me with a zapper and it shrunk me. Hugh found me but I don't know how he shrunk,"

Roxie looks at the doll size trainer and the women smiles.

"Okay. I'll help you out. You showed me a crazy battle,"

Nate smiles and blushes a bit at the comment. Roxie goes near Nate and picks him up. Nate felt Roxie's hands as he lift up in the air. Roxie goes over to Hugh.

"Hey wake up. I can't carry you," Roxie says as she thought.

"Maybe if you were as tiny as Nate I could carry you,"

Nate had a thought at the moment. The reason why Hugh could have shrunk is because he gave a radiation. Nate notices that Roxie touches Hugh with her free hand and smacks Hugh to wake him up.
151121221.title: Half size Qwilfish and meeting a larger punk girl

choices: Does Joy shrink?  Or might there be some affect from the healing energies?
Roxie found her Xtransceiver and when calling Prof Juniper ran into the Grunt.
1511212211.content:
Hugh woke with a shock. "What? What happened?" he asked as he looked at the large Roxie.

"You shrank," Nate called. Hugh looked at him and then his loose clothes. He could wear his sister's clothes without issue.

"How? Did the guy come back?" Hugh asked.

"No clue. You guys got a Xtransceivers? I forgot mine in my rush out of the gym," Roxie replied. "Maybe Professor Juniper could know." Hugh looked at his watch and the screen was broken from the fall. Nate looked at his and saw it needed a charge. Roxie took in the damages. "We can get them fixed at the Pokemon Center." She sighed. "Mysterious shrinking. And I thought my father's poor acting career was going to be my biggest worry lately."

"I think . . . it was me," Nate said. The pair looked at him. "I think what shrank me rubbed off on Hugh, but not as strong."

"Like a current of electricity lessening in power overtime," Roxie said with a nod.

"So, anyone who touches you could shrink? Or me?" Hugh demanded.

"I don't know. I can't be sure," Nate replied..

"Now, keep calm. Do you know anything that won't shrink? I got a bike with a basket you could sit in," Roxie said.

"My Pokemon! The sewaddle I caught didn't shrink when I was on it," Nate said. Hugh reached and found his pokeballs and picked one out.

"Pignite!" he called and released the now larger boar Pokemon.

"So pokemon don't shrink," Roxie said. The pignite patted him on the head.

"I'll be fine pal," Hugh said before returning him. Nate picked one ball and tossed it. Servine popped out and looked around before seeing his shrunken friend.

"Hey, mind giving me a ride?" His Pokemon nodded and knelt down. Nate jumped on and he looked at his friends.

"Gotta say, wish I had a camera," Roxie said.

------

"No way," the grunt whispered as he watched. "It really did shrink him. And that Quilfish when he touched him. No wonder Master wants this." He looked at the zapper. How easy would it be to kidnap pokemon if the trainers were tiny?

He laughed and looked at the three. Perhaps following them to test this out some more would be wise.

------

Nurse Joy looked at the newcomers and nodded. "This is unexpected. What do you need?"

"A fixed Xtransceiver, A charge for another, and some normal healing. I gotta go get mine. Keep them safe?" Roxie asked. Joy nodded. Roxie walked out.

"I will. Are either of you hungry?" Joy asked.

"A little," Hugh said.

"I could eat as well," Nate said. Joy nodded.

"May I carry you? Your friend looks a bit tired," Joy said.

"Um, I don't know. You could shrink. That's what happened to my friend Hugh," Nate said.

"I will take my chances," Joy said. Nate nodded and hopped off. He returned his friend to the ball and watched Joy's hand come down. He hopped on.

15112122112.content:
Roxie was able to get her Xtransceiver. The bass guitar player told her band mates that she would be out for awhile. Roxie while walking over to the Pokemon Center is trying to call Prof Juniper.

"Come on! This is like the fifth time I called and your busy!"

Roxie's anger was growing until she hit something. The young women was about to complain until she saw that it was the grunt with strange device on his back.

Roxie drew out a pokeball and called out.

"'m going to give you a toxic shock! Smog!"

The Koffing then pump out black smoke and attacks the grunt with. It hit the grunt right in the eyes. Roxie took this chance to get away from the grunt. Roxie and her Koffing start to run towards the pokemon center.

"You little bitch! I'll get you!" The grunt shouts as he starts to shoot his zapper hoping that he would hit the posion gym leader.

Luckly for the grunt and unfortunately for Roxie one of the beams hit the gym leader. Roxie felt light headed as she tries her hardest to run. The Koffing saw that it's owner was having trouble and goes under Roxie and lifts her up.

"Thanks... Take me to the pokemon center,"

Roxing blacks out as she starts to shrink on top of her Koffing.

____________________________________________________________________________

Despite their size Nate and Hugh had a lovely meal and the two were sitting in the waiting area. Luckily there was no one there. The two of them were sitting on chairs.

"I really need to get new clothes. These things keep on falling off," Hugh says as he shakes his baggy clothes.

"Well you can always get new clothes from my Sewaddle," Nate says with a smile as he shows his leaf pants.

Hugh was about to say something until they saw a Koffing enter the Pokemon Center. The two young men were shock to see the purple pokemon with a worried look on it's face. Nate wastes no time as he slide down the legs of the chair and ran over to the Koffing. Hugh tries to get to the Koffing fast but his baggy clothes slowed him down.

"What's wrong?" Nate asks the Koffing as he got to the purple pokemon first. The Koffing lowered it self so Nate could climb it. Nate felt like he knew what was going but hope he was wrong. Nate climbs the Koffing and sees....
15112122112.title: Rocker Women in Big Trouble

choices: Follow the Heroes when they reached Castelia
Follow the Grunt as he reached Castelia
151121221121.content:
She laid there naked. She appeared to be the exact same size as him. "Blast it!" Nate yelled as he tried to look only at her head. Hugh came over.

"That guy got her?" he asked. Nate nodded.

"That's my guess," Nate said as Roxie groaned and opened her eyes. She looked around.

"Tell me you've grown back," she muttered. Nate shook his head. She moaned and looked at her lack of clothes. "I hope my clothes aren't damaged. They're brand new!"

"No. Clothing damage doesn't seem to be a problem," came a voice. The three shrunkies turned to see a much smaller Nuse Joy, who now stood equal in height to her Blissey. Her skirt seemed more like a full dress. She was pushing a cart with some their equipment and Pokeballs on it.

"This bastard got you?" Roxie yelled.

"No. I made you shrink too, didn't I?" Nate asked.

"No. I blacked out well after setting you two up to eat. I put your shrunken pokeballs into the machine and when I touched them afterward I shrunk. Using some equipment I have, I examined them and found the radiation you spoke of. It has a short half-life. It lasts maybe an hour," Joy said.

"So, we're contagious for an hour after shrinking? Hugh guessed. Joy nodded.

"Bliss, would you go grab that box?" Joy asked. Her Blissey nodded and left.

"What's she getting?" Roxie asked.

"Some clothes. I collect dolls and you are now about the right size. And for you Hugh, I found the emergency clothes for young children," Joy said. Hugh nodded as the doors opened suddenly.

"Nurse Joy!" screamed a man in a strange outfit. "Roxie went missing. She didn't come . . ." He looked at his daughter's Koffing and how on top was his tiny daughter and some strange boy. "Roxie?"

"Hey Pop!" Roxie said.

"What . . . What happened?"

"Team Plasma," Roxie said before her the only thing left on her, her Xtransceiver beeped. She answered it.

"Sorry Roxie, I was on a big conference call," came the voice of the younger Professor Jupiter. "What's the trouble?"

"Some Team Plasma grunt has a shrinking device. He got Hugh and Nate of Aspertia City, and Nurse Joy and me here in Virbank," Roxie said. Juniper's color drained from her face.

"So that's what happened," she whispered.

"What happened?" Roxie asked.

"Since Team Plasma was defeated, there were reports of some popping up all over the place, from Kanto and Johto, to Sinnoh and lastly Kalos. That's what the conference call was about. Small pieces of equipment were stolen and people in what seemed to be Team Plasma uniforms were all seen in the area before the thefts," she explained. "I need to see you right away. Can you meet me in Castelia City? My assistant Bianca is already there. I need to see all of you who shrunk right away." Roxie looked at Hugh and Nurse Joy.

"You hear that?" she asked.

"I can call over one of my cousins to watch things here," Nurse Joy said as Blissey returned. "I will bring my data on the energy of the shrinking as well."

"Thanks Nurse Joy. I need to contact Bianca and then call everyone back. Hopefully we'll be able to think up some way to fix this," Juniper said before signing off.

"And my acting career can wait until I help you out," Pop Roxie said.

"Thanks dad, but do me a favor first."

"Anything."

"Change to your old clothes," she said. He looked at his clothes and nodded.

Ten minutes passed and the now better dressed shrunkies were on their way to the dock. Pop Roxie was waiting. Nurse Joy walked with her Blissey, skipping as though this was completely normal. Nate continued to ride on Koffing

"I will make them pay for this," Hugh muttered as they boarded the ship.

The ship left port and was on the way.

------

A short distance away, the Team Plasma Grunt rode in a speed boat. He laughed darkly. He took down a gym leader without using any pokemon. It was so easy. He could shrink anyone and no one could stop him.

The gym leaders were trouble last time Team Plasma tried taking over the world. Best to remove them first. And then . . . maybe it would be time for him to get a promotion.
151121221121.title: Like Sizes and Leaving for Castelia

choices: The shrunkies run after Iris and end up at the entrence the Castelia Sewers
The group gets a call from Professor Jupiter
1511212211211.content:
Nate and Roxie talked during the trip talked about their new clothes. Nate is now wearing a light green shirt, tan shorts, white socks and brown shoes. Roxie is wearing a light blue shirt, purple skit and black boots. It was the best the tiny rocker could do with the doll clothes that Nurse Joy brought. The two tinier trainers did have a laugh at Hugh's clothes. Hugh now sport a dark blue shirt that has a Qwilfish in the middle, black shorts, white socks and red shoes. Nate and Roxie notice that Nurse Joy didn't mind wearing a sun dress again as she walks around the ship.

It didn't take long for the group to reach Castelia City. The group was getting off the ship and onto the dock.

"You really seem to enjoy the ride," Nate notes as he see's Nurse Joy's eyes sparkle.

"Yes. I don't really get to go anywhere since I work at the center."

Nate, Roxie and Hugh nod as it was fun to travel even though though they are a small size.

"I'll tie my ship to the dock. Did Professor Jupiter call you back?" Pop Roxie asks as he ties the ship to the dock.

"Not yet. I queses they're having having trouble find Bianca. By the way Nate are you going to continue fighting gym leaders and getting badges?" Roxie turns to young man next to her.

"Of course! Even in my state I can't stop. My team and I are going to the champions of Unova," Nate beams.

"My a what big thing to say," Roxie says as a smile. The rocker had to admit that Nate had guts to continue his journey despite his tiny size.

"We should check out the gym,"

The group looks at half size nurse.

"You really think we should?" Hugh asks as wanted to fix this problem and kick that grunt's ass.

"It will be fine. You have to protect you!" Pop Roxie says as the does a pose like a hero.

"Do I really need to worry about this right now....." Roxie says as she hangs her head down as Nate pats her back to cheer her up.

____________________

Pop Roxie carries the suit case that Nurse Joy brought as The group walks and makes it to the gym, but notice that someone was blocking the way. Nate sighs as he recognizes the person blocking the door. His name is Clyde, he would always be near a gym to help some trainer that was coming by to help them out.

"Hi Champ to be. You seem to have small problem but at least you have two lovely ladies around." Clyde says with a smile as the group sighs at the Gym Guide.

"Is the gym leader in?" Nurse Joy asks for the group.

"Nope. He's not here. Burgh is not here right now."

Before the group could speak they heard a voice.

"Huh? Burgh vanished again? Hmm... Isn't Burgh always vanishing, though? He always says he's got artist's block and just goes wandering out of the Gym. Hi um what happen to you?

The group turns around to see a women in pink and Nurse Joy recognized her insistently. The women standing before them was Iris the current champion.

"Those bastards from Plasma shrank us,' Hugh says as puts his hand into a fist.

"Only if we could find that grunt,"

" ... Looking for Team Plasma? But Team Plasma disbanded two years ago! I guess that doesn't matter! You're having problems, so I'll help you out! Hmm... Now where would suspicious people go to hide? ! That's it! That might be where they are!" Iris says as she starts to run.

"What weird women," Hugh says as Nate says.

"Should we follow her? I'm worried about her shrinking,"

"We could but we don't know when Professor Jupiter is going to call," Pop Roxie says as Roxie says.

"Yeah but I don't want her to shrunk,"

Roxie didn't want the Unova Champion to be shrunk. How would that look to other champs of world. Koffing made a noise that it agrees with it's trainer

"I agree. We need to help her. We can't let any more people shrink," Nurse Joy says as Blissey smiles.

Pop Roxie sighs as he held the suit case. The captain of the ship didn't know what to do.
1511212211211.title: Ariving at the Big city of Castelia City

choices: Up in the city, is someone coming after Bianca?
15112122112111.content:
The four shrunkies and Pop Roxie moved after Iris and found her at the entrance to the sewer. Nate on his Servine's back.

"You can go inside the sewers from here! Whaddaya think? Seems pretty suspicious, right?"

"Yeah, you could say that," Hugh said.

"You really think some Team Plasma grunts could be inside?" Nate asked.

"Yep! The sewers are a perfect place for hiding!" Iris blinked. "Oh wow. You guys are tiny. What happened?"

"A Team Plasma grunt has a device that can shrink people," Roxie said from her father's shoulder. Iris scowled briefly.

"I'm sorry I didn't realize this before," she said.

"Look just be careful, alright?" Roxie said, "The last thing we need happen is if you shrink as well." Iris nodded.

"Have you contacted Professor Juniper? Either of them?" Iris asked.

"Did and awaiting them here or a call anyway," Nate said. Iris nodded.

"Then I'll stay out here to keep an eye out for the grunt," Iris said.

"She has my number and I know what the guy looks like," Roxie said. She spoke with dissatisfaction. "So I'll stay out as well."

"I'll journey inside with you two boys," Nurse Joy said. Nate and Hugh looked at each other. "It will be useful to heal after any battles."

"Then let's go," Hugh said.

The three walked into the deep sewers.

Almost as soon as they entered, Roxie's Xtransceiver rang. "Hello?" Roxie said as she looked on the screen. Iris listened closely. The younger Professor Juniper appeared.

"Roxie, the Skynarrow Bridge is closed, so I can't come right now. My assistant Bianca is flying over on her Unfezant," she said. Roxie nodded.

"We'll keep an eye out for her," she said. Juniper nodded.

"Thanks," she said.

-----

"Oh my. My glasses broke," Bianca said as she landed in the middle of the park. She heard some cooing and pet her Unfezant. "There there. It's not your fault the offshore wind hit us hard. I just need to pull out my replacement pair of glasses." She turned her back and reached into her bag.

-------

In the sewers.

"To think there are this many Grimers," Hugh said as he looked at the horde of them.

"In Spring time, when the refuse washes down the streets from winter, it is their ideal breeding time," Nurse Joy said as a fifth Grimer turned and attacked them.

"Servine, hold in there," Nate said.

"Oh dear. Bliss, would you use Psychic on them?" Nurse Joy asked. Her partner cried out and a powerful psionic wave struck the advancing Grimers. They fled back when out from the water a giant Grimer appeared. "Oh, a cute Muk."

"Muk?" Nate asked.

"Grimer's next evolution. Bliss, Ice Beam please." Bliss fired and froze the sludge creature. "I so rarely get to do this," Nurse Joy chirped. She tossed a tiny Heal Ball and hit the Muk. The ball soon registered caught.

Seeing the strongest of them being bested, the Grimers cleared the path for the humans.

"Remind me not to end up her enemy," Nate said. Hugh nodded.
15112122112111.title: An Incredibly Spacious Sewer For Tiny People

151121221121111.content:
The three shrunkies continue their journey through the sewers. Nurse Joy continue to enjoy fighting and capturing pokemon.

"At least someone is enjoying them selves," Nate says as he rides Servine's back.

"I'm starting to think Iris was a bit off," Hugh says as he really wanted to find Team Plasma.

Hugh's wish come true as the shrunkies encountered two team plasma grunts.

"Looks like some one has been down sized," Grunt A says with a smile.

"This should be easy," Gurnt B says as both grunts through their pokemon out. The two pokemon are Sandile and Scraggy.
