"Let's go Pidove!" A Pidoves come out of Hugh's ball.

"Do you really think you can beat us?" Grunt A mokes.

"Air Cutter to Scraggy!" Hugh yells and points to the dark/fighting pokemon.

"Razor Leaf to Sandile!" Nate says and points to the Sandile.

Both grunts watches their pokemon get hit and both pokemon fainted.

"AH! Whatever! Let's just attack the people!" Grunt A say as he starts to sprint to attack Nate and Hugh. But a beam of Ice stops the Grunt in his track.

"I think you don't want to do that," Nuse Joy says kindly as Bliss was ready to fire another Ice Beam.

"Let's get out of here!" Grunt B yells as he starts to run away. Grunt A follows in suit.

"That was easy," Hugh says as he returns Pidove to it's poke'ball.

"Thanks Nurse Joy and Bliss," Nate says as he was grateful to the nurse.

"Your welcome. You can just call me Joy. I'm not on the job," Joy says with a smile as Bliss smiles as well.

"Yes, Thank you," Hugh says as he was paying more attention to the Team Plasma Grunts.

The group wonder if they should go back but saw a pokemon walking through the sewers. This pokemon is an Eevee.

"An Eevee!" Nate and Joy squeal at the sight.

"Why is an Eevee in the sewers?" Hugh asks as along their adventure in the sewers the group only saw Grimers, a Muk, and Zubats.

The Eevee saw the group and starts to run away.

"Hey wait up little guy! Let's go after it," Nate says to Servine and the grass pokemon nods.

"Yes. Let's go Bliss," Joy says as the nurse wants to capture an Eevee her self. Bliss smiles at having a new friend.

"Alright. But it's getting away," Hugh says as he wants to get an Eevee as well.

The group starts to follow the Eevee through out the sewer. The group saw the Eevee go up some stairs.

"I wonder where this leads?" Nate thought as the group goes up the stairs.

When the group gets up the stairs they see they are in a tiny park. It was amazing to see so many flowers and pokemon around.

"Wow," Nate and Hugh say as they look around.

Joy was happy to see that there was a nice place like this where pokemon could live. While Nate and Hugh keep looking, Joy noticing something in the flowers.

Joy saw......
151121221121111.title: The Sewer adventure.countines

choices: Follow the Sewer Crew.  Do they go into the cavern or exit?
1511212211211111.content:
A herd of Eevees. Her quick eyes spotted eight pups running about. "Wow. That's rare," Nate said.

"Indeed. Eevees usually hide. To see so many and so young," Joy said. She looked around. "Let's stay calm. Don't try catching them."

"Why not?" asked Hugh. Two deep resonating growls were heard. From a large tree two figures emerged. Using Quick Attack, the two moved in front of the young Eevees. The growls continued.

"That's why," Joy said. "The parents. These must be recently hatched."

"So, how would we catch one?" Nate asked.

"You need to be careful in approaching them," Joy said. Nate nodded and hopped of his Servine and walked towards the parents. The parents looked at him and growled once more.

"We mean no harm. I want to be friends with them and with you," Nate said. The Umbron leaned down and sniffed Nate. A glance underneath told Nate this was the mother. She looked at Servine and growled something to which Servine answered back. Espeon flicked its tail and both backed away. He barked at the Eevees and two looked over and jotted to Nate. They sniffed him and licked his tiny body, soaking his clothes with spit. Their barks of pleasure made him smile. He pulled out two pokeballs and tossed them at the pair and they were captured.

Hugh walked slowly to them as well. The parents glared but nodded. Hugh whistled and one Eevee left the pack and came over. It looked up at Hugh and jumped into his arms.

"Wow," Hugh said before petting the beast. "I like you too." Tears came to his eyes as he thought about the purrlion taken from his sister. The Eevee in his arms licked the face and Hugh touched it with a ball.

With three pups gone, the parents looked sad but when none of the others wanted to come over, they just looked at the humans.

"We'll go now," Joy said. Nate and Hugh nodded and Nate climbed back on Servine and they left.

Back at the entrance where the Plasma Grunts were, two men were talking. One was blond and the other had brown hair.

"Interesting. That is how you think it is best to draw out the potential in pokemon?" the blond asked.

"Yes. That is my view," Burgh the gym leader replied. He looked over. He saw the small people. "Were you the ones to take down those Plasma Grunts?"

"We were," Nate said, as Corless' eyes looked at them with a calm attitude.

"How are you so small?"

"Team Plasma. One of their members shrunk us," Nate said.

"And are you still pursuing your dreams?" Burgh asked.

"Of course. I could be an inch tall and still follow my dream!" Hugh said.

"Yes," Burgh said as his eyes went aflame. "Such passion. My block is broken. Come to my gym and I will accept your challenge!" Burgh left.

"I hope to see you again later. And hopefully returned to your old sizes," Corless said. He left as well. Hugh sighed and looked to the water trickling from the cavern into the sewers. A blue gem caught his eye and picked it up.

"Hey Joy, is this a Water Stone?"

"Yes. Yes it is," Joy said. Hugh smiled.
1511212211211111.title: A Family Affair

choices: A normal size Bianca is riding it.
A five inch tall naked Bianca is riding it.
15112122112111112.content:
"I really have to organize my bag some time. I can't beliive that it's taking me this long to find a pair glasses," Bianca says with a smile as her Unfezant coos.

In the shadows stood the grunt with the device on his back. He smiles as he looks at his next victim. She may not be a gym leader but she was Professor Juniper's assistant and the blonde could be holding a secret or two.

"Found them," Bianca beams as she puts them on. "Let's go over to the Pokemon Center now,"

"I'm afraid not."

Bianca and Unfezant turn around to see the grunt with the zapper in hand.

"We have to get out of here. He's the one who's been shrinking trainers!" Bianca says as Unfezant coos. Bianca gets on the Unfezant and the two try to fly away.

"Not so fast!" The grunt yells as he pulls the zapper's trigger. The zapper shoots as Unfezant takes off. The grunt was tick that he lost her but at least he could have shrunk her. The grunt took off to get to his next objective.

___________

Iris, Pop Roxie and Roxie stood by the sewer entrance and wait for Bianca or Nate, Hugh and Joy to come back.

"Jeeze this is boring," Iris thought as she want to take action.

"If wonder if they got any new pokemon," Pop Roxie says as he tries a conversation.

"They will. Nate got a pokemon when he first got shrunk," Roxie says as the poison gym leader was so far impress with the younger trainer.

"I see a Unfezant!" Iris shouts and points to a bird in the sky.

"That could be Professor Juniper's assistant," Pop Roxie says with a smile.

"I hope nothing happen to her," Roxie thought as the tiny rocker is worried about anybody else getting shrunk.

The group watch as the Unfezant lands and....
15112122112111112.title: Never leave your back wide open.

choices: Nate sees a pokemon and wants to catch it.
151121221121111122.content:
"Bianca?!" Iris yelled as she rushed to the shrunken girl's side. Unfezant didn't move as her trainer woke up. Her bag in one hand and glasses in another.

"Ohhh," Bianca groaned. She rose and went "Eeep!" as she looked at the giant Iris. "I got shrunk!"

"Where did you fly in from?" Roxie asked.

"Just the center of the city," Bianca said as she lowered herself, her face as red as a tomato.

"I'm going to look for this guy," Iris growled.

"No! You can't! If you get shrunk . . ." Roxie called out.

"I can't sit back and do nothing!" Iris said. She reached into her pocket and drew a ball. "Salamence!" she cried out, tossing the ball. It opened and the large dragon roared. It looked over at Unfezant and her trainer. The dragon growled as the bird cooed. Salamence roared once more.

"Please be careful," Bianca said as Iris climbed on. Her friend took off. She drew a binoculars and started scanning the area.

------

"So this is Relic Passage?" Nate asked as they entered the cave system.

"Yes. This was only recently discovered," Joy said. "Several Rock, Ground, and Fighting types live here. Along with-" A small ball of white flew past. "Woobats."

"I wonder what else we'll find," Hugh said when a dust cloud swirled up. Covering his face and mouth, he heard a mighty roar. An Onix appeared and looked at Hugh. "Pignite!" The boar came out. It smiled at the prospect of fighting Onix. Rocks were tossed by the mighty rock pokemon.

"Hugh!" Nate called up with fear.

"Use arm thrust!" Hugh ordered. Pignite dodged and got close. The successive smashes sent Onix down but continued to move.

"Its ability sturdy has prevented it from fainting from your attack," Joy explained. Hugh nodded and took out an empty ball and tossed it. It wobbled but stopped. Hugh picked up the ball as Joy came over.

"Softboil," she said to Bliss. Bliss held out her hands and an aura came over the pokeball.

"Thanks," Hugh said. Nate looked around from his place on Servine's back.
151121221121111122.title: Another One Joins The Club

choices: Iris on her Salemence was flying close.  Can he get a shot?
Corless was looking at him with cool eyes.  Does he approve or not?
1511212211211111221.content:
Nate saw, what was to him, a giant boulder moving across the open floor. He climbed off. "Servine, razor leaf!" His trusty friend threw the leaves and knocked the Pokemon down. He moved closer and saw it was a Roggenrola. Taking his pokeball, he tossed it at the creature. It wiggled and dinged.

"Nate, Hugh, I think it would be best to retreat now," Joy said.

"Why?" Hugh asked.

"Well, unless you wish to train down here, I wouldn't catch any more pokemon," Joy said. Nate came over and Bliss moved close to heal his newest friend.

"You mean because we each have six pokemon now?" Nate asked.

"Exactly. I know from my scans, the energy to shrink can remain on the balls. But we don't know what it could do to the Box System where they are stored. Imagine if the energy touched all pokemon using the Unova Box System," Joy said. Hugh took a step back as Nate held onto his Servine.

"No way," Hugh muttered.

"All trainers could be shrunk," Nate muttered. Joy nodded.

"Quite a dangerous idea, isn't it?" she asked.

"All right. Um, we can always come back to train," Nate said. Hugh nodded. They started back to the sewers.

"Joy, what will the water stone turn my Eevee into again?"

"A vaporeon. Quite a powerful water type when trained," Joy said.

As they walked, more Zubats, grimers, and rattattas attacked. With their new friends healed, Hugh and Nate used their recent catches to get them some experience.

--------

Roxie turned when she heard some footsteps. Her father walked her over to the edge and she watched the three come out. "Finally! I was worried when Burgh and that scientist came out half an hour ago!"

"Sorry, we got delayed with some battles," Nate said. "What's wrong?"

"Oh man," Hugh said when he saw the tiny Bianca on her Pokemon.

"Hey guys!" her tiny voice said. She was wearing doll clothes Pop Roxie brought with him in the suitcase.

"Where's Iris?" Joy asked seriously.

"She went looking for the guy who shrank us," Roxie said.

"I hope she comes back normal sized," Nate said. Roxie nodded.

"So, what now? Going to face Burgh?" Roxie asked.

"I suggest the Pokemon Center for some more readings and then Amanita's lab," Joy said. The two boys looked at her with confusion.

"Oh. Smart," Roxie said. "In case we catch more than six. Yeah. I can see why that would be good." Joy nodded. "So, what did you catch?"

"A muk and two Zubats," Joy said. Roxie smiled.

"I am liking you more and more Nurse Joy," Roxie said.

"Please, just Joy," Joy said. Roxie nodded.

--------

The grunt was looking around, both in fear and in a hunger to shrink more people. He heard a noise and turned sharply.
1511212211211111221.title: Catches and Boxes

15112122112111112211.content:
The grunt couldn't believe what he is seeing, the current champion flying on her Salemence. The grunt smiles as he watches.

This is a perfect chance to cut down the current champion down to size. But the problem is the shoot is so far way, could the beam could even reach her. In the end the grunt chose to shoot and run and hope that the beam hits and shrinks the champion.

The grunt takes his zapper and target Iris and Salemence. When the grunt felt like he had a clean shoot, he took it. After firing the grunt starts to walk away hoping that the shoot hits his next victim.
15112122112111112211.title: Will the grunt be able to hit the Unova Champion?

choices: The balls were the same size.
151121221121111122112.content:
The grunt watched at the beam shot forth. It struck the chest of the moving dragon pokemon. And nothing happened.

"Grrr, what do you smell boy?" came a voice. The grunt looked and saw a pair of patrolmen with two Arcanines. If the blasted ray didn't work on Pokemon, then he would have to deal with those two powerful fire types. He moved back into the park.

Perhaps it would be best to move north. Rumors were some traitors were congregating in Driftveil. They deserved a new outlook on life for walking away.

-----

Iris shuddered as Salemence felt tingly all of a sudden. Her friend groaned and started descending. She landed before the Pokemon Center. Iris hopped off.
.
"There you are!" came a male voice. Iris turned and saw Pop Roxie carrying Roxie, leading the group of shrunk people. She looked furious. Roxie said something Iris couldn't hear. "You have any idea how stupid it was to go out on your own when you could be shrunk?" Pop Roxie said. Iris nodded.

"Ah. I couldn't stand back and do nothing. Besides, we weren't harmed, were we girl?" Iris asked. She pet her Salemence. Pop Roxie got close.

"Actually, you were. You came to my shoulders before. Now you are at my chest," Pop Roxie said.

"What?" Iris asked sharply. Her pokemon groaned and looked at him. Joy's eyes lit up.

"Don't touch Salemence! Give me a moment," Joy said before rushing in.

"Welcome," came a familiar voice of her cousin. "Joy?"

"Virbank," Joy said to the other Nurse Joy. "I need a Geiger Counter." Her counterpart nodded and went in back. She came out and handed it to the smaller Joy.

"Do you want me to come with you?" she asked. The shrunken Joy nodded.

"We will need to send this update to all others," she said.

------

"Three inches," Iris muttered as Pop Roxie stood close but didn't touch Iris. The Joys came out and the shrunken one lifted a yellow box and pointed it at Iris. It crackled. When it got close to Salemence, it crackled a little louder.

"Okay, what's going on?" Nate asked.

"She's measuring radiation," Bianca said. Little Joy pulled out her shrunken balls and set them down..

After a few minutes and private conversation, Nurse Joy left and walked down the street.

"Come inside," Joy said before looking at Iris. "Bring Salemence inside in his pokeball but don't touch her ball once she's inside."

"Why?" Iris asked.

"Because you could still shrink from holding her ball," Joy said firmly. Iris nodded slowly.

"I think I'll just stay out here," Iris said.

"I'm sorry, but I need her in a ball for a test," Joy said. Iris pulled out the ball and brought her friend into the ball. She dropped a cloth around it and lifted the ball up. She walked in ahead of the others. Joy led her to the healing machine and took the cloth. She placed it on the machine and then a few of her empty balls. They were slightly larger than Iris.

Joy activated the machine.

"What are we doing?"

"Seeing if the pokeballs will shrink to your's size," Joy said. She looked back to Iris. The geiger counter in hand, monitoring the whole process.

"And the other Nurse?" Pop Roxie asked.

"To get Amanita to work on the box system," Joy said.
151121221121111122112.title: Measuring Up

choices: Follow the shrunkies as they go to the gym.
Stick with Bianca and the others at the center.
1511212211211111221122.content:
After a few seconds, the machine was done with it's job. Joy held up the geiger counter near the machine. The geiger counter reading was high. Joy using another cloth pulls out the tray that holds the pokeballs. When the tray fully comes out the group sees that the larger pokeballs were now an incredibly small size.

"Wow!" Hugh says as he stairs at the pokeballs.

Nate took out a pokeball from his bag and notice that the new shrunken pokeballs were now the same size as his pokeballs.

"At least your going to have pokeballs," Bianca says with a positive attitude.

"That's good and all but what about my friend?" Iris asks as the young champion was worried about her Salemence.

"She'll be fine but you have to wait an hour before picking up her ball. That's when the radiation stops," Little Joy says.

"Okay. I'll wait here in the Center," Iris says.

The doors open and the normal size Joy and Amanita come through. It shocked the Nate,Hugh, Roxie and Pop Roxie to see someone so young being the one to be working on the boxes.

"Wow! You guys are so small. Even the pokeballs are tiny. I have to think of new way for you to box your pokemon so that others balls will not affected. Now I need to think of a way to-" Amanita says and continues to talk about he box system.

"Okay. What should we do now? It looks like we have to wait awhile," Pop Roxie says as he sits down.

"I think I'll face Burgh," Nate says as he figures he could face the gym leader as the group waits.

"Okay. I'll join you. Might as well watch a gym match," Roxie says as she wanted to see the match.

"Yeah. I have to and face him to," Hugh says as was ready to fight.

The little Joy smiles at the group while Normal Joy says.

"Go with them. You seem to be having fun with them,"

The little Joy blushes a bit as she was enjoy traveling around with Nate, Hugh Roxie, and Pop Roxie.

"Yeah! Go with them. I'll help out here," Bianca says as the little Joy smiles.

"Okay. Thank you,"

The Little Joy walks over to Nate, Hugh, Roxie and Pop Roxie.

"I'll be going with you," Joy says with a smile as her Bliss walks over to be with her.

"You kids are tiring me out," Pop Roxie thought as he sits down on the chair.

"I think I'll ride with you Nate. Pops really looks out of it," Roxie says and Nate nods as the two get on Servine.

"I take care of them," The little Joy says with a smile as the group walks out.

Pop Roxie sighs as he sits down as he waits with Iris in the waiting room.
1511212211211111221122.title: Having extra smaller items isn't so bad.

choices: Follow Nate's battles or skip to the leader?
Back to the Pokemon Center or the Grunt.
15112122112111112211221.content:
"So Bug type. Strong against Dark, Psychic, and Grass. Weak to Flying, Fire, and Rock. And resist Fight, Ground, and Grass," Nate said. Servine humphed. "Nothing person buddy."

"Not saying anything," Roxie said. "This is for you to win on your own, in my view."

"You got it," Hugh said. "Feeling ready?"

"A little. Roggenrola should be helpful and Rilou can always counter the physical attacks," Nate said.

"But several Bug type are paired with Grass. Your Sewaddle for instance," Joy said. "And that would give Roggenrola a harder time." Nate hummed as he saw something in the gutter.

"Servine, hold up," he said. His friend stopped and he hopped off.

"What is it?" Hugh asked, following him over.

"That gem," Nate asked. Hugh knelt down and pulled up a red and orange gem.

"Oh, a Fire Stone, With that one of your Eevees could become a Flareon," Joy said. Nate smiled and grabbed his two balls. He brought out both Eevees.

They looked at each other and then Nate.

"Hey guys. I got this stone. It will turn one of you into a Fire type. I . . . I kind of would like your opinion. Does one of you want this?" Nate asked. Hugh and Roxie exchanged looks. Not many would be this open and ask their pokemon's opinion.

The Eevees spoke to each other and one moved forward and licked Nate.

"So, you do?" The Eevee nodded. "Hugh?" Hugh nodded and pressed the stone on the Eevee. He glowed a beautiful amber before the tan coat became red. He stood over twice as tall as his brother

"Flareon," he said. He opened his mouth and embers flew out. Servine tensed up a little and looked at the taller Fire type. Flareon knelt down and looked at Nate.

"Oh, you want me to ride you?" Flareon nodded. Servine growled in a jealous way. Flareon leered back.

"It's wonderful seeing two Pokemon love their owner so much," Joy said.

"You are kind of stuck between two hard spots," Hugh said.

"All right you two! Calm down," Nate ordered. Both looked at him. "I will need both of you to work together if we are going to continue our goal of fixing me and becoming the best team in all the land!" The two looked down in shame. "Servine, I care about you, but I don't want to see you hurt needlessly. Trust Flareon to help carry the burden as well. All right?" Servine slowly nodded. "And Flareon, Servine was my first. He helped me through some tough battles." Flareon nodded as well.

"It's going to be interesting if he gets a huge pokemon and see if that bows to him as well," Roxie noted. Joy nodded.
15112122112111112211221.title: Preparing to Best the Bug

choices: Pop Roxie and Bianca meet up with the shrunkies
The group ran into Team Plasma again
151121221121111122112211.content:
The shrunkies went to the Castelia Gym after Nate got talking to his Servine and Flareon. The group was surprised to see that the gym is cover with web. After a few battles with the trainers inside and going through the puzzles of the gym. The group made it to the top of the gym, where the gym Burgh was.

Nate and Roxie were riding Flareon as Burgh turns around rap in in a blanket.

"Good work back there in the sewers. My Bug-type Pokémon have been scurrying with excitement about getting to battle you. I'd say my Bug-type Pokémon are pretty great!" Burgh says.

"Did you really need them to cover your gym in web?" Roxie says as she tries to brush off some of the web on her clothes.

"C'mon, let me brag a little! Dwebble's round little eyes are cute! It's resilient and reliable! My ace is Leavanny! It's really the best! I think it's so sweet how it makes clothes for other Pokémon out of leaves."
Burgh says with a smile.

"You're really proud of your Pokemon," Joy says as she can't wait to see the battle. Hugh smiles as he can't wait to see his friend beat Burgh.

"Of course, I'm really proud of all of my Pokémon! Well now… Let's get right to it!" Burgh shouts as he throws his blanket off him self.

Nate and Roxie get off Flareon.

"Good Luck," Roxie says with a smile and thumps up at Nate. Nate smiles as Roxie goes over to where Joy and Hugher are.

"Let's go Flareon!" Nate says with a smile as the fire pokemon got into battle position.

"Swadloon, Let's show them true art!" Burgh yells as he throws his pokeball. A Swadloon pop out of the pokeball.

"Use String Shoot!" Burgh shouts as Swadloon shoots out string at Flareon.

"Flareon use Ember!" Nate says as the Flareon shoots out small fire balls. The fire melts the string shoot and hits Swadloon.

"Lights, please! Time to show you what Bug-type Pokémon are made of! Use Struggle Bug" Burgh says as lights turn on.

Swadloon breaths in and about to shoot it's attack.

"Quick Attack Flareon!" Nate shouts as didn't want Swadloon to shoot out it's attack.

Flareon wastes no time and at high speeds hit Swadloon with it's shoulder. Swadloon flies backwards and lands on the ground and faints.

"You did a good job." Burgh said as he return Swadloon back to it's ball. "Now time for Dwebble entrance!" Burgh continues and throws out his second pokemon. A small crab with a rock on it's back is what come out of Burgh's pokeball.

"Alright. Flareon come back." Nate says as the fire pokemon comes to it's owner. "It's time for Sewaddle to come out," Nate says as he throws out a pokeball. The Sewaddle came out of it's ball ready to fight.

"I must say you have excellent tastes in Pokemon. Use Rock Polish Dwebble!" Burgh says as the rock bug pokemon starts to shine.

"Sewaddle use Razor Leaf!" Nate says as Sewaddle uses it's leaves and shoots at the Dwebble. Dwebble dodges the leaves.

"Nice try. Use Smack Down!" Burgh says as the Dwebble picks up a rock and throws it at Sewaddle. The rock hits Sewaddle. The leaf bug falls down.

"Sewaddle," Nate says in concern voice as Sewaddle gets up again. Nate smiles at the leaf bug's determination.

"Alright. Use Razor Leaf!"

Sewaddle shoots out leaves again at Dwebble. This time Dwebble was unlucky and the leaves were able to hit the crab pokemon. Dwebble faints from the attack. Burgh starts to sweat as he returns Dwebble back it's ball.

"Good job Sewaddle. Come on over her. Let Flareon finish this," Nate says as Sewaddle makes a happy noise and returns to it's trainer. Flareon smiles as it goes back to battle position.

"Go Leavanny!" Burgh says as he throws out his pokemon. The grass bug pokemon comes out of the ball. "Mmm… I've got a bad feeling about this! Could I be in trouble?" Burgh says in a whisper.

"Let's finish this! Flareon use Fire Fang!" Nate shouts as the Flareon runs at the tall bug pokemon.

"Leavanny use Razor Leaf!" Burgh shouts as he hopes to slow down the fire pokemon. Leavanny shoots out leaves at Flareon. The leaves hit the fire pokemon but Flareon still went forward. Flareon gets near Leavanny and jumps at it. Flareon bites the bug pokemon as flames were on the fire pokemon's teeth.

Sewaddle made a scared noise at seeing the fire pokemon. Nate pets Sewaddle and the bug calms down.

Flareon jumps back after it finishes it's attack. Leavanny faints and falls on the ground. Burgh sighs as he returns Leavanny back to it's pokeball.

"Hmm… It's over! You're incredible!" Burgh shouts.

"Good job. Then again I wouldn't expect the person who beat me wouldn't lose that easily," Roxie says with a smile as she walks over to Nate. Hugh and Joy go over to join the smaller people, Joy takes notice that Sewaddle starts to shine.

"Your Sewaddle is evolving." Joy says with a smile as Nate is shock and turns around. There was a big flash of light. After rubbing their eyes the group sees that Sewaddle is now Swadloon.

"You got really strong," Nate says with a smile as Swadloon makes a happy noise and rubs against Nate.

"Oh hoo… You are very strong indeed! I guess it's no surprise I lost. Here! Take this Insect Badge! I think it'll suit you! And you know what, I'll also give you this." Burgh says with a smile as he hands Nate the badge and TM disk. Nate holds the giant badge while Joy held the TM disk.

"Struggle Bug also lowers the Sp. Atk of the target that was damaged. I'm the best guy to tell you this. It's the little things that count!" Burgh says with a smile.

"Thanks. And Thanks to you two" Nate says as with a smile. Flareon and Sewaddle make happy noises from the compliment from their trainer.

"Say if you don't mind, would you battle me?" Hugh asks as Burgh says.

"Sure. But I need to heal my pokemon,"

"Okay. I'll show my strength!" Hugh yells as loud as he could.

"Is he always like this?" Roxie asks as Nate replies.

"Yeah...."

"It's part of his charm," Joy says with a smile.

Nate and Roxie sigh as they both sit down near the wall waiting for Hugh's battle.

_________

Thankfuly it didn't take long for Hugh's battle and soon the group was out of the gym. Nate and Roxie were riding Flareon as Joy and Hugh walk through the city.

"That was easy, thanks to Pignite," Hugh says with a smile.

"Yeah, Yeah good job. Nate you did a good job," Roxie says as Joy says.

"Both of you did a good job,"

Nate and Hugh blush a bit from the women complements.
151121221121111122112211.title: Beating the bug gym leader!

choices: The battle with Corless is quick.
The battle with Corless is hard.
1511212211211111221122111.content:
The four returned to the Pokemon Center to heal their Pokemon. As they entered, the short Amanita turned from the box and smiled.

"Hey guys! I got the system reworked for ya," she said.

"We can transfer balls into a new special box," Bianca said from the side of the computer. "Oh, you have a Flareon now!"

Nate smiled. "He was crucial in helping me win." His mount was pleased with the compliment.

"So, how will this work?" Hugh asked.

"Well, enter your trainer ID then this special code," Amanita said as Nurse joy handed out the papers. "The system is now designed to monitor the energy of the pokeballs and slowly drain it to store elsewhere." Roxie looked up.

"What?" she asked. "You're storing it?"

"Of course. Energy can't be created nor destroyed. It's a principal fact of the world. This energy is sent to a specific location to slowly burn off in safety," Amanita said.

"We have also alerted the Pokemon League, all the Centers in the region," Nurse Joy said.

"Good," Joy said. Nurse Joy looked at the trainers.

"Now, I presume you need healing?" Hugh and Nate nodded. They handed over their balls, with Flareon going back in.

"So, going to head on north to Nimbasa?" Iris asked.

"That's the plan," Nate said.

"Elesa is in her fashion model faze right now, right?" Roxie asked. The Champion nodded. "If she tries to dress me up like a doll, I'll poison her."

"What are you going to do Bianca?" Hugh asked the young woman.

"Professor Juniper wants me to travel with you to keep monitoring any changes," Bianca said. Pop Roxie looked uneasy.

"What is it?" his daughter asked.

"I don't want to leave you behind but I'm worried about the ship," he said.

"The League can compensate you for hiring another person," Iris said. Pop Roxie looked at her.

"Really? Roxie did you know that?"

She nodded. "Yeah. It's how any damage done fighting Team Plasma two years ago was handled," she said.

"Then why couldn't it be used when I was trying to be an actor?" he asked.

"Because it's for emergencies only and your new career path wouldn't fall under it!" Roxie yelled. Her father sighed in defeat.

"All right," he said glumly. "Well I'll wait outside when you're ready." He left.

"You might want to be nicer," Nurse Joy noted. Roxie looked up at her. "We got word on how his movie debut fared and it was a total flop." Roxie nodded.

"I'll keep that in mind," she said.

"So, let's get shopping and then head out," Nate said. The balls were returned , they stocked up on potions, and they set out to the north. Pop Roxie carrying the bought goods as Roxie rode on Flareon with Nate and Bianca on her Stoutland. The shorter Flareon keeping up with the larger beast.

It was easy travels until they reached the park. hey saw the scientist from the sewers.

"Ah, I see another one was shrunk," Corless said. "If it's not an inconvenience, may I have a look at your Pokémon?"

"Um, no problem from me," Nate said as he nudged Flareon forward.

"I appreciate your cooperation!" Corless took a careful examination over the fire type. "Oh! How interesting! Your Flareon seems to display more self-confidence than others of the same species. And you're a Trainer with merely three Badges… Fantastic! I'm not sure how you're doing it, but you're bringing out the power of your Pokémon!"

"Thanks, but Hugh also has three badges too," Nate said.

"How marvelous. Oh, excuse me! I am a scientist. My name is Colress. The theme of my research is: 'Bringing out the power of Pokémon.' Bringing out the power of Pokémon! Is it possible to bring out their maximum power through the bond they share with their Trainers? Or is there some other, different method? I'd like to test my theory by battling with you. Do you find this acceptable?"

"Sure, I'm game," Nate said.

"Wonderful. I'll be waiting at Route 4," he said. Corless walked away.

"Corless. I feel I heard that name," Bianca said. She sighed. "It'll come to me eventually."

"Well, shall we keep going?" Joy asked. The group began moving on north.
1511212211211111221122111.title: Onward to the North

choices: The group stays in Route 4 for a little bit before going to Join Avenue
The group heads straight for Join Avenue
15112122112111112211221111.content:
It didn't take long for the group to find Corless. The scientist is standing in front several Crustle that block the road.

"I've been waiting for you! What's the matter? Interested in what's behind me? These are not mere rocks, but the Pokémon known as Crustle. Observe. With this device I created to energize Pokémon, I'll…" Colress says as he brings a out special device uses it to wake up and disperse the several Crustle that block the road.

"How did you do that?" Hugh asks and waits for an answer.

"Those Crustle… Were they just lying here, out of energy, with their boulders on their backs?"

Hugh and everyone else start to get annoyed by Corless actions.

"Team Plasma said we should recognize the potential in Pokémon and liberate them from humans. I disagree. Conversely, it should be humans who bring out the hidden potential in Pokémon!" Corless continues to talk.

"This guy is weird," Roxie says as she was getting tiered of Corless.

"I'm starting to think the same thing," Nate agrees with comment.

Pop Roxie was getting worried about Corless and wonder if they could trust him. Joy and Bianca on the other hand were thinking the same thing.

"I think I've heard this before.... But where?"

"Now that I think of it, I never asked your name," Corless says as Nate replies.

"I'm Nate,"

"… I'll remember that name. Well then, I will test you to see if you're a Trainer who can bring out the hidden potential of Pokémon!" Corless said as he takes out his electric board and a pokeball.

Nate and Roxie get off Flareon so Nate could get ready for the fight.

"Go and beat this guy," Roxie says and Nate nods.

"Okay. Let's go get them Roggenrola!" Nate shouts as he pulls out a pokeball from his bag and throws it. The rock pokemon comes out of the ball, ready to fight.

"Interesting," The blonde scientist says he throws his pokeball. The pokemon that come out of the pokeball is Magnemite.

"This could be bad," Joy whispers and Hugh asks quietly.

"Why is that?"

"Magnemite is part Steel. Rock is weak against Steel," Joy explains to Hugh. Hugh grew worried about his friend's match.

"Use Mud-Slap!" Nate says as the Rock pokemon fires dirt at the Magnemite. The Magnemite was hit by the mud. It did some damage but not enough to defeat it.

"Use Magnet Bomb!" Corless said as the Magnemite launches a steel bomb that sticks to Roggenrola. It hits Roggenrola really hard and the rock pokemon falls.

"Roggenrola..." Nate says as he was worried about the rock pokemon.

Roggenrola then stood up barely standing. The rock pokemon makes a noise to show that it still wants to fight it.

"It has the ability Sturdy! It can withstand a strong that can knock it out once," Joy explains.

Nate smiles as he sees that Roggenrola still wanted to fight.

"Okay. Let's do our best! Use Mud-Slap!" Nate yells as Roggenrola shoots out fires dirt at Magnemite. The hit was critical and Magnemite faints.

"Good job Roggenrola!" Nate says as he hugs his pokemon. Roggenrola makes a happy noise.

Corless just returns Magnemite to it's ball. With out saying anything Corless throws out another pokeball. Inside was the pokemon Klink.

"Okay, Roggenrola take a brake. Flareon will take care of the rest," Nate says as the rock pokemon understands.

The next battle went quick as Flareon took out Klink in one attack.

""Splendid! You are quite the Trainer!" Corless says he returns Klink back it's ball.

"I see! Just like the Gym Leaders in each area or the Elite Four and Champion in the Pokémon League, you bring out the power in Pokémon by being kind to them! That's the kind of person you are. I'm extremely grateful for your help. This is a token of my gratitude." Corless says as he sits down a Protein. Corless continues to talk.

""It's so frustrating! If only we could talk to Pokémon in order to bring out their power! But there's no way a person like that could ever exist! Well then, Nate, I hope to see you again sometime."

Corless says as he leaves the group.

"What a weird guy," Pop Roxie says as Joy and Bliss go over to Nate and heal his pokemon.

"Good job out there," Roxie says as Nate replies.

"Thanks.... Something feels off about that guy,"

"I have agree," Roxie says.

"Why do I still have this strange feeling?" Bianca though as she helps Joy healing Nate's Pokemon.
15112122112111112211221111.title: The Quick Battle and Roggenrola's growth

choices: They explore the area some more and come across some strange pokemon.
151121221121111122112211111.content:
The group continued heading north as they came to a road to the left. "Hmm. What's this way?" Nate asked.

"Going down this path leads to the Desert Resort," Bianca said as a cry came over head. The group looked up to see a black figure circling about.

Nate pulled out his pokedex. "A Mandibuzz," he said.

"Oh wow. That's rare," Roxie said. "Mind taking a short detour?" The general concensus was no.

They set off to the left and went looking for the elusive pokemon.

-------

Nimbasa City was a big fancy place. The grunt with the shrinker moved in the shadows. She was close. He knew this. She had spurned him one to many times. Now that girl would pay for snubbing him.

Yancy walked around the amusement park, unaware of the danger that was closing in on her.

It was true she knew the man who would go on to join Team Plasma. They met at her work and she was simply nice to him but showed no interest in dating him. She showed no interest in dating anyone.

But to this man, it was a serious rejection and punishment was required.

"Where did I drop that silly device," she muttered. "There it is!" She reached down when a wave of energy passed over her and she fell to the ground.

"Enjoy your new place in life," he muttered. He enjoyed that. He enjoyed that a lot. Now to find any of those traitors.

-----------

Servine and Roggenrola were enjoying the tough battles. Hugh's Onix was useful in traversing some of the seeper sands the tiny Shrunkies couldn't deal with.

Eventually something came low and landed not a hundred feet away.

"Yeah! Just look at that cool girl," Roxie said. She threw her ball and Koffing appeared. "Go! Use Smog!" The gas hit the dark flying type. The dark flying type screeched and flapped its wings. Koffing seemed happy but then began bouncing around aimlessly.

"What happened?" Nate asked.

"Mandibuzz used Flatter. It increases Koffing's special attack but confuses her as well," Joy explained. Roxie's eyes narrowed.

"Use Smog again!" Roxie said. Koffing turned to Mandibuzz and released another wave of gas.

Mandibuzz screeched and flew at Koffing when a tiny ball flew and struck it. The tiny pokeball shook and returned to Roxie.

"Got'cha!" Roxie said.
151121221121111122112211111.title: What's the Buzz?

choices: The group head to Join Avenue and Nimbasa City
The group gets trap in a sand pit
1511212211211111221122111111.content:
"Nice catch!" Nate shouts he goes over to the rocker girl.

"Thanks. She's going to be a great team mate," Roxie says with a smile.

Pop Roxie took notice that Nate and Roxie seem to get along well for the most part.Roxie seemed to be enjoy herself on this journey with the young man. Before he could think any more he saw a figure in the distance.

"Hey what Pokemon is that?" Pop Roxie asks as the captain tries to get a closer look. Hugh heard this and pulls out his pokedex.

"It's a Darmanitan," Hugh explains as he puts his pokedex away.

The fire pokemon walk forward and took notice of the humans. The Darmanitan walks over to the shrunkies and Pop Roxie.

"Be careful. It's still a wild Pokemon," Roxie says as the pokemon was nearing her father. Hugh was about to send Onix out to fight the fire pokemon.

"Wait! Don't attack. There's something different about that Darmanitan," Bianca says as she notice that there was a shine to the Darmanitan. Joy also took notice as the Darmanitan went up to the half size nurse. The fire Pokemon shows no anger in it's eyes seem to enjoy being around Joy.

'That's weird. Hey we better getting going," Pop Roxie says as the others agreed. When Joy began to Darmanitan grabs her arm. Bliss sees this and starts to use a attack but Joy stop her.

Joy took notice that the Daramanian was friendly but somthing int it's eyes told Joy that the fire type pokemon was very lonely.

"Okay. Come and join me," Joy says with a smile as she gets a pokeball. Daramanian smiles as the fire pokemon presses the ball. Soon the fire pokemon was in the ball.

"Looks like you have a new partner," Bianca says with a smile. Joy nods as she looks at the data for the Garamanian but notice some of the data was not showing.

"What's going?" Joy asks as she tries to figure out what happen.

"Do you think that Daramanian was with a trainer?" Bianca asks as she looks at the data.

"That might be it. They say that a pokemon that's been left but not released still carries it's trainer Id,: Joy says but the trainer id for Daramanian was nothing but an N.

"Wait could this be N's pokemon?" Bianca thought as she wants to talk more about it with Joy.

"Hey hurry up you two!" Pop Roxie shouts.

"Oh sorry," Bianca and Joy say at the same time. Joy and Bliss followed Bianca on her Stoutland to where the others are.
1511212211211111221122111111.title: Meeting a Strange Darmanitan

choices: Some double battle about to happen before the train station.
It was getting pretty late.  They best sleep in the Pokemon Center for the night
15112122112111112211221111111.content:
The six travelers got back to the main road and continued north. Eventually they came to a large building.

"Whoa. What's this place?" Nate asked.

"I actually don't know," Roxie said. "Joy?"

"No clue," she said.

"Let's go find out then," Hugh said.

The entered the building and saw a sharp dressed man talking with some women in suits. "So, we need to spread the word about our new venture. All right. We'll use the first trainer to enter this place!"

"Um, hello?" Nate called from Flareon. The man turned and saw the shrunken people. His eyes focused on Nate.

"You! You must help me," he announced.

"What?" Nate asked.

"I need a person who travels a lot to spread word about this place and invite people to join. Will you help me?" the man asked.

"I'm kind of . . . You do notice I'm only five inches tall?"

"So you are. Well, what does that matter? Please I need your help?" Nate bit his lip.

"What does it entail?" he asked. The man smiled.

He started with explaining about the place called Join Avenue. It is meant to be a location for trainers to visit and shop, where rare items and services will be provided. And as the manager, Nate would be in charge of bringing in vendors by inviting them to open a shop. As the owner, he would supply the goods to the shops.

"So, what sort of shops will be offered here?" Hugh asked.

"Cafes to eat and drink at, Salons to get pampered at, Dojos to train in, and so many more," the owner said. Roxie's eyes lit up at the mention of the Salon and Dojo as a young man was coming from Nimbasa. "Please try him." Nate blushed a little and rode Flareon before him. The young man looked down in shock.

"Wow," he said.

"Hi. Um, would you like to join this avenue? It would be a good job," Nate said. The young man closed his eyes.

"Sure. Why not? I think I've always wanted to work with old things, look at items that need to be appraised," the young man said.

"Excellent. We have just the equipment!" the owner said. One of his people ran off and a small horde arrived and set up a shop.

Soon a sign was up reading "Janus' Antiques". The young man looked happy behind his counter. He checked his inventory.

"Okay, I think I have enough inventory to sell to each of you if you want," he said. "Sorry, nothing free."

"You can't get everything," Roxie said as Nate directed Flareon over. He jumped onto the counter.

"I can have the money tranfered still, so I would like one from each box," Nate said. Janus nodded and from a super big box pulled a dirty thing. He cleaned it off carefully.

"Wow. It's a Metal Coat," Janus said before handing it over. Nate looked at the chunk of metal. Janus pulled something out of the chunk C rank pile. "And the other one is . . . a Big Nugget!"

"Wow. Lucky you," Roxie said.

"Thanks. What can I do with either?" Nate asked.

"If you give Metal Coat to an Onix and trade it, the Onix will evolve into a Steelix," Roxie said. Nate looked over at Hugh. "Now move aside. I want to try my luck."

The others soon came over as well.

Roxie got a Hard Stone and some Sacred Ash.

Joy got an Up-grade and Ultra Ball.

Bianca got a Big Pearl and Big Nugget too.

Hugh got a Metal Coat and Ultra Ball.

Pop Roxie got two Hard Stones.

"Now come again tomorrow," the owner said before departing with his entourage.

"Bye," Janus said.

"Well, I guess we better get going," Nate said as they continued through the Avenue.

"Joy, what pokemon evolve by trading?" Hugh asked as they walked.

"Lots. Roggenrola's next form Boldore becomes a Gigalith," Joy said. "Karrablast and Shelmet only evolve when traded for the other."

"I heard from a Gym Leader in Sinnoh this one girl traded a Haunter to a trainer with an Everstone on it to keep it from evolving," Roxie noted with some anger. "That's just not fair."

"Some people can be mean that way," her father said.

"So Hugh, when my Roggenrola evolves, would you consider trading?" Nate asked. Hugh looked at his pokeball.

"I don't know. Let me think on it," he said. Nate nodded as they exited the avenue. They looked about and saw . . .
15112122112111112211221111111.title: Join Avenue and Lucky Picks

choices: Stick with Nate and Roxie at the amusement park.
Switch to Rosa to see what she's doing.
151121221121111122112211111111.content:
"Wow!" Nate says as he looks at Nimbasa City. The others had to agree as they saw the amusement park on the right and the other attractions.

"Yes, Nimbasa really has a lot of attractions," Bianca explains with a smile.

Before Bianca could explain more there is a commotion up ahead.

"What going on over there?" Hugh says as walks up the stairs.

"Hey wait up," Pop Roxie said as he goes up the stairs.

"We better get going," Joy says as Nate and Roxie nod.

Nate and Roxie were rode Flareon up the stairs as Joy and Bliss walk up the stairs and Bianca rode on her Stoutland. The group saw Hugh and Pop Roxe staring a young women talking to two older men. One man is wearing black while the other man is wearing white.

The young women with two bun hair pig tails turn around looking nerves but saw the shrunkies.

"Wow! How did you get so small?" Young women asks as stares at Nate.

"We got shrunk by a team Plasma Grunt," Roxie answered.

"That sucks," Young Women said as she cross her arms.

"So what are doing here?" Hugh asks the Young women.

" I heard that in Gear Station you can have Pokémon battles in the subway! So I came here to test my skills, and, what do you know… the Subway Bosses were here! Isn't that amazing? The young woman asks. The group nods as the young woman explains more.

"I mean, they're the strongest Trainers in Gear Station! And they said they'd battle if it's two on two! This is an a-MAZ-ing opportunity! Would you PLEASE battle with me?" The Women asks Nate.

"Sure. If don't mind me being five inches," Nate replies.

"Thanks! Oh that's fine! The name's Rosa! Let's become the best partners ever and surpass the Subway Bosses! So I'll have you challenge the Subway Bosses with me, then!"

"Good luck," Roxie says as she gets off Flareon so Nate possibly use him.

"Thanks," Nate says as he looks at the subway bosses.

"Are you okay with me tag battling with Rosa?"

"It's okay. "I'm a Subway Boss. My name is Ingo! Usually, I'm having Pokémon battles in the subway that departs from Gear Station." The black clothed man said.

""I'm Emmet. I'm a Subway Boss. I love Double Battles! And I love the combination of two Pokémon!" The white clothes man says.

The tiny Nate and Rosa get ready to battle Ingo and Emmet.

""Having a battle in a place like this is a little irregular, but this must've happened for a reason. Battling in a different place will let me see different scenery, and I might learn something, too. Now, Emmet, if you have something to add, please!" Ingo says as he looks at Emmet.

""Follow the rules and drive safely! We're headed for victory! All aboard!" Emmet replies.

"Did he really just say that...." Hugh whispers as he watches the battle.

"Well they usually do this on the subway. So it must be a force of habit," Bianca whispers back.

"Let's go Servine!" Nate says as he pulls a pokeball out of his bag and throws it. And the grass pokemon comes out.

"Oh nice. Let's do our best Dewott!" Rosa shouts as she pulls out a pokeball and throws it. The water pokemon comes out readey to fight.

"Wow. How did she get a Dewott?" Hugh thought as he watches the battle.

"Go Gurdurr!" Ingo says as he gets a pokeball from inside his coat and throws it. The fighting pokemon was ready to fight.

"Let's go Boldore!" Emmet says as he did the same thing as Ingo. The rock pokemon come out of the ball.

"We'll let you go first," Ingo says with a smile.

"Okay. Do you mind if I go first?" Rosa asks her tag battle partner. Nate nods his head as Rosa turns to face the subway bosses.

"Okay! Dewott use Water Pulse on Boldore!"

The Dewott shouts water out of it's mouth and it hits the rock type hard. But in the end it was still standing.

"Looks like Boldore has Sturdy," Nate notes.

"Very nice try. Gurdurr use Low Kick on Servine!" Ingo say as the fighting pokemon jumps and kicks the grass pokemon. Servine stood tall after the attack.

"Good job buddy! Servine use Leach Seed on Gurdurr!" Nate yells as Servine did what it was told. The grass pokemon shoots out seeds and the seeds land near Gurdurr. The seeds grew fast and soon tangled the fighting pokemon.

"Impressive! Boldore use Power Gem on Dewott!" Emmet says the rock pokemon attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones. Luckily Dewott doges the attack.

"Nice try!" Rosa says as Dewott was ready to attack.

Gurdurr felt some of it's energy leave as it went to Servine.

"Dewott use Razor Shell on Boldore!" Rosa says as the water pokemon uses the shells on the sides of it's legs to attack the rock type. Boldore got hit by the attack and fainted.

"Very nice. Use low kick on Servine!" Ingo says. The fighting pokemon does it's attack but misses.

"Nice! Servine let's finish this! Use Leaf Blade to finish this," Nate says as the grass pokemon runs at Gurdurr as it forms a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks Gurdurr. The leaf sword hits Gurdurr and it was a critical hit. Gurdurr faints after the attack.

While Ingo and Emmet return their fainted pokemon back to their balls, after words the two had something to say to the tiny trainer and normal size trainer.

""Bravo! The combination of you and your Pokémon is truly fantastic!" Ingo says with a smile.

""I'm Emmet. While I may have lost to you… I had a good time! Let's play again sometime!" The white clothed man says.

""Yes! Definitely! Next time, please ride the subway and battle with us there! Well then, we're off! All aboard!"" Ingo finishes as the subway bosses go back into the building behind them.

Rosa returns Dewott back to it's ball and she turns her head to look at her tiny tag battle partner.

"They were so tough, even when they were holding back for us! That's the Subway Bosses for you! I want to get even stronger and battle the Subway Bosses when they're giving it their all! Thanks, Nate! This is a token of my appreciation! Please take it"

Rosa sits down a small device in front of Nate.

"When you have the Vs. Recorder, you can record your battles with your friends or battles on the Battle Subway! Nate! I had a really great time battling with you! I hope we can battle together again sometime! See you!" Rosa finishes as she leaves the group.

"Good job," Roxie says as Nate returns Servine back to it's ball.

"Thanks. What should we do now?" Nate asks.

"Well I want to get some sleep," Pop Roxie says as it was a long day for the group.

"Yeah. I need to get more supplies," Hugh says as he looks through his bag.

"I want to visit my cousin," Joy says as Bliss wants to with her trainer.

"I think I'll get a room at the center and look at my data," Bianca explains.

"I can't think of anything," Roxie says as she tries to think what she wants to do.

"I want to check out that amusement park. Do you want to come with me?" Nate asks the white hair women.

"Sure. I've got nothing better to do,"

Pop Roxie was about to say something but Joy stop him.

"Okay. Just be back around seven" Pop Roxie says as he goes to the Center.

"Okay, Pops," Roxie says as she gets on Flareon to join Nate.

Hugh, Joy, Bliss and Bianca nod and join Pop Roxie in walking to center.

"Let's have some fun," Nate says with a smile and Roxie agreed.

Flareon makes a happy noise as it starts to move. Roxie held Nate tight as they ran to the amusement park.
151121221121111122112211111111.title: Double Battle with the Subway bosses

choices: Back to Nate, Yancy, and Roxie.
1511212211211111221122111111112.content:
Rosa walked with a skip in her step. She came to Route 5 and saw a crowd down the way. A biker was there having what seemed to be a Triple battle. Could be a rotation but she wasn't to sure at the moment. The crowd was too thick to squeeze through. She looked at the grass to the north and walked towards it.

Then to the left she heard something. A soft moaning was coming from between some trees. She invesitgated and saw a small grotto between the trees.

"Awesome," she said, unaware there was a frustrated man close behind her. He too was blocked by Charles. Right now Charles was too covered to be hit, but he could take his frustration on this woman. As she entered the grotto, he fired and felt a lot better as she passed out.

------

"Wow," Nate whispered as he looked up at the giant Ferris Wheel. It was big before but now to him and Roxie surpassed all imagination. Flareon continued walking.

"Have you ever been on there?" Roxie asked.

"Never. You?"

"Once," Roxie said. "It was wa few years back." Nate nodded when Flaeon stopped. His ears tilted around and turned to flowers.

"What is it boy?" Nate asked. A small cat Pokemon looked out from the flowers and ducked back down. "Huh. What Pokemon is that?" He pulled out the Pokedex and aimed.

"No Data Available. Require update." the Pokedex announced.

"A foreign pokemon. Hmm. Light skin. Pointy ears. I think it's a Meowth," Roxie said.

"I have a bad feeling. Let's go check this out," Nate said. Flareon walked over and the Meowth popped up again and hissed.

"Hello?" Roxie called. She heard a startled yelp. "Hey! Look! We don't mean you any trouble!"

"Go away!" called the voice. Meowth hissed again. Flareon growled back.

"Were you shrunk?" Nate asked.

"What?" replied the voice. A female head popped up and revealed her pink hair. "Oh, you too?"

"No way. You're Yancy!" Roxie said. The girl named Yancy blushed.

"You know me. How did this happen?"

"Team Plasma," Nate said. He blushed a bit. "You lost your clothes, didn't you?" Yancy nodded.

"Guess we should call Pops to bring some clothes," Roxie said.

"I . . . I would be most appreciative," Yancy said. Roxie pulled out her Xtransceiver.

--------

Rosa slowly came too. She was on something soft. Was it a bed? Why was it vibrating? Why was her hair unbound? Her eyes opend and saw the trees far above her. Blinking, she saw she was in the arms of a giant pokemon.

After a moment, she realized it was a Minccino and another second until she realized it wasn't big. She was small. She was also getting cold because she was naked. Her clothes were a distance away while her bag was close by. Reaching in, she pulled out her tiny balls and unleashed her Dewwatt and pansear. They were giant to her, which meant they were normal size.

Thank goodness.

"Pansear, would you make a fire?" she asked. Her Pansear used ember and a small fire was started. The Minccino holding her liked the warmth. She looked at her Pokemon. Did she keep them close or send one to the Nimbasa Pokemon Center?
1511212211211111221122111111112.title: Hidden Away

choices: Pop Roxie coming with clothes for Yancy.
They see a Dewott loking for help.
15112122112111112211221111111122.content:
Roxie just got done talking to her father.

"He'll be here in thirty minutes," Roxie explains and Yancy nods. Yancy still blush as she felt the wind on her naked body. Nate took notice of pink hair girl shivering a bit.

"It might not be much but here," Nate says as he pulls of his shirt and holds it out for Yancy to take. Roxie and Yancy blush a bit from Nate taking of his shirt.

"Hey what are you doing! Your making her blush," Roxie says with a slight blush on her face. Yancy shakes her head.

"No it's fine. Thank you," Yancy says as she takes the shirt out of Nate's hands.

After a few seconds the pink hair girl come out the shirt on her. Meowth let out a happy meow from see it's master out of the flowers. Nate blush a bit from seeing Yancy wearing his shirt.

"Jeeze you can stop staring at her," Roxie says as Nate scratches his head.

"Sorry." Nate says as Yancy looks at the shirt. It was a bit baggy for her but she didn't mine.

"Thank you again," Yancy says as she looks at Nate.

"N-no problem," Nate replies with a smile and Yancy blush a bit from seeing Nate smile.

"Yeah, Yeah," Roxie says as she felt a bit weird seeing the two of them blushing at each other. Roxie still had little bit red when she thought about Nate seeing in the buff.

The three stood there in silence for a couple of seconds before Nate brakes the silence.

"You must travel a lot. I've never seen a Meowth before,"

"Yes. My job requires me to travel a lot. It's been fun traveling to different regions" Yancy replies as the pink hair girl felt the tension leave the air.

"That good to hear that you've been doing well," Roxie says as she looks at Yancy.

"You two know each other?" Nate asks as Roxie looks at Yancy. Yancy had the look "Please don't tell him about my job,"

"We happen meet each other years ago," Roxie lies for Yancy. Yancy sighs happily in that Roxie didn't tell Nate what her job was.

Nate felt like Roxie lied but figure that Yancy must want to keep her job a secret. So Nate went with the lie.

"That's neat. So where did you go?" Nate asks as Yancy blushes a bit but talks about her travels.

The three shrunkies were having fun talking about their journeys. Yancy was surprised that Nate and Roxie's travels were doing very well even they were shrunk. Yancy heard about about Nate and Roxie's friends and Roxie's father. In turn Yancy talk about her travels through out different regions. It also seem like Flareon and Meowth were getting along even after exchanging some growls.

The three shrunkies stop talking and two pokemon stop playing to see....
15112122112111112211221111111122.title: Meeting Yancy the traveling girl

choices: Hugh and Rosa come out to find Charles is now tiny!  Is the still Grunt around?
151121221121111122112211111111221.content:
"So you have an Ursaring?" Nate asked. He had seen a TV show once from another region with an Ursaring and Teddiursa stealing picnic baskets at some park.

"Yes. He is such a cutey.pie. When I was normal size, he was larger than me. Now . . ." She paused and just thought.at how big he'd be now.

"I know the feeling. I can ride on my koffing. I haven't seen my Scolipede," Roxie said. "Kind of insane really." Flareon turned and looked around.

A middle aged man with a bag in hand. He looked around and spotted Flareon. Walking over, he knelt down. When he saw Nate without a shirt, he glared for a brief moment.

"Um, here you go," he said. He handed the bag over and Roxie helped take it to Yancy. She looked at Nate.

"No peeping," she chided before walking with Yancy into the flowers.

------

Joy and her cousin Nimbasa Joy looked at her Muk. "Amazing. You just caught this guy today?" Nimbasa Joy asked. It was beyond friendly to the shorter Joy as she pet it with a special glove. The local Chansey was ready with some cleaner to the floor.

"Yes. From what Nate said his Sewaddle was the same. Right Hugh?" The pointy-haired teen nodded.

"Yeah. Wouldn't it be funny if being shrunk somehow cause Pokemon to become super friendly with us?" Hugh asked.

"That's an interesting theory. We would need to test it out on something else," Bianca said.

"Well, if Swadloon or Nate's Eevee or your Eevee Hugh evolves soon within a day, it could verify it," Little Joy said. Hughgot up and rolled his neck.

"I think I'll go train my Pokemon for a bit. See you in an hour or so," he said. Joy nodded.

"Be safe," she said. Hugh walked out of the Center.

-----

Yancy emerged wearing a pink dress and handed Nate his shirt back. Meowth gave an approving mew. "Thanks. Would you mind giving me a ride to the Pokemon Center?" He shook his head and dropped so she could get on.

"Let's go Flareon," Nate said as Roxie got back on.

------

Hugh looked up at the Big Stadium when he heard a noise. Turning, he saw a Dewott looking about and calling for help. "What's your trouble?" he asked. Dewott spotted in and waved him over before running towards Route 5.

Years ago when his sister's Purrlion was stolen, he had a bad feeling in his gut. Now it was back. He started running and readied his Xtranscevier.

Through the barrier whose sign warned of the chance of rain the next day, he came to Route 5. A crowd for something was still around despite it being night. Hugh focused on the Dewott and went to what looked like was a small grotto.

As he entered, he spotted the clothes on the ground. "No," he whispered. Then he looked closer. "Rosa?" he called out. He saw a fire burning with a Minccino and Dewott next to it. Hugh approached carefully.

"Oh, it's you!" came a voice. It was high above him. Looking up a Pansear was in the trees holding a small figure. "You're from the train station with Nate!" Hugh nodded.

"And you got hit by Team Plasma," he said darkly. "I can help you get back to the Pokemon Center. We should have some clothes for you there." She nodded.

"Let's go down now," she told her Pansear. "Dewott, water gun the camp fire." Dewott put the flames out. Hugh began to blush and walked to her clothes. The skirt was too long but just wrapped about, it would give her some decency. When he came back, he noticed just how long her hair was without it in buns,

"Wow. You have a lot of hair," Hugh said. Rosa smiled.

"I swore when I was ten to not cut it until I was League champion," Rosa said with pride. Hugh set the skirt down and turned around. After a minute and the sound of Pokemon returning, she said, "Turn around."

Now she was held by Dewott. Both Minccino and Pansear were gone.

"Let's go," Hugh said. Taking the rest of her clothes, they left the grotto.
151121221121111122112211111111221.title: Clothes and Saviors

choices: It's Morning now and group heads for the gym
There are some late talks that happens during the night
1511212211211111221122111111112211.content:
Lucky for Hugh, Rosa and Dewott they were able to make it back to the center. When they get in, Rosa notices at a table Hugh's friends were talk about something.

"Hey guys what's going on?" Hugh asks as he walks over to the table. Dewott followed carrying Rosa in his hands.

"Well...." Bianca begins as Hugh notices another tiny person. In return the group notice the shrunken Rosa. Yancy and Rosa look at each and both thought.

"Her to huh?"

__

After Rosa got new clothes for her self the group sat around the table. Rosa brought out her Minccino like Joy asked. Minccino continues to be friendly with Rosa.

"Looks like your theory might right Hugh," Joy thought as she continues to write down notes.

"Danm you Team Plasma causing all of this. I have to hit you extra hard next we meet," Hugh whispers to him.

"You seem to be taking this well," Roxie says to Rosa.

"Ya just have to keep moving forward." Rosa says with a bright smile.

"I wish I had that much confidence," Yancy whispered to herself. Nate and Roxie were able to hear what Yacny said and wonder if they could help a little bit.

"Were the two of you able to get a hold of anyone?" Pop Roxie asks the two shrunkies. It the father inside him asking them this question.

"No. They couldn't answer. They might have went to bed," Yancy replies as Rosa says.

"It's fine. I don't want my parents to worry about like this,"

"You really should call them," Pop Roxie thought as he wanted to say that but figure that Rosa would still say no.

"I think it might be time for bed," Joy says as the little nurse looks at the clock. It was 11 p.m now.

"Okay. We should go into our rooms then," Nate says as the others agreed.

The group went to their room for the night. Roxie, Joy, Rosa, Yancy and Bianca are staying in one room while Nate, Hugh Pop Roxie were a room for the night as well.

15112122112111112211221111111122111.content:
The group woke up early. Feeling a little gritty after the desert or standing in a garden the previous day, everyone the need to use the shower or bath. As it would be ill advised to use the proper showers, Nimbasa Joy made them baths by heating some water up in pots.

In clean clothes, the shrunkies and shorties met up in the main area. Some food was out for them.

"So, what are you doing today?" Rosa asked. Nimabsa Joy gave her a paperclip to use for her hair rolls.

"We're going to challenge the gym," Nate said. Rosa nodded.

"Elesa is a tricky fighter from what I heard," Rosa said.

"Do you know anything about her?" Yancy asked, looking at Roxie. Roxie coughed down some water.

"I might. But I don't like giving help when it comes to challenges. They're called that for a reason," Roxie said.

"Thanks Roxie. I appreciate it," Nate said sincerely. Hugh nodded.

"I agree," Hugh said. He noticed Rosa smile as well. "Something on your mind?"

"Well, I'm happy you won't be pressuring me to cheat," Rosa said. She pulled out of her badge box which revealed she had the Bolt Badge already.

"If you are going to challenge Elesa you should hurry," Nimbasa Joy injected. "A show is about to start. When she starts a fashion show, you'll have to wait outside until it's over."

"Oh thanks!" Nate said. He pulled out a pokeball and released Servine once more. "Um, Roxie, you want a ride?" The rocker smiled. Hugh helped them to Servine as Bianca reached and released Stoutland.

"Do you two need a ride?" Bianca asked. Rosa nodded. Joy helped them down.

"I think I'll use my own," Yancy said. She called out her Meowth and climbed on before he hopped down.

"We best hurry," Joy said as she hopped down with Hugh and Pop Roxie took up the rear.

-------

The nine rushed in front of the train station as a bell went off and into the amusement park they went.

Pop Roxie was breathing heavily as he tried to keep up with the lot.

But it was for not as the doors to the new gym closed up.

"Blast," Hugh said.

"So, what now?" Nate asked.

"You could try and see who is visiting Join Avenue," Joy noted.

"I heard there is a hidden grotto in Lostlorn Forest," Bianca said.

"Uh . . . we could just wait in here to catch the next one," Yancy said. "The Ferris Wheel shouldn't take too long."

"There's also the old gym which has some fun roller coasters in it," Rosa said with some excitement.

"You went in them before?" Hugh asked.

"Yeah! I wonder what they're like at my size," Rosa said. Hugh and Nate looked at each other.

"Staying in the park sounds best," Hugh said.

"Yeah. I agree," Nate said. He looked at the Ferris Wheel. "That looks like a fun idea." Yancy smiled.

"Mind if I join you?" Roxie said. "I know they usually only allow two people inside, but since we're so small . . ."

"We can always find out," Nate said. Yancy's smile seemed fixed.

"Yes. That should be nice," she said.

"Mr. Roxie, Bianca, would you like to join me in the Roller Coaster?" Joy asked. Pop Roxie looked at his baby girl.

The ride stops and the group heads to the gym to challange

Pop Roxie truly wanted to join the Ferris Wheel so he could keep on eye on his daughter. But he saw that his daughter smiling while talking about going on the Ferris Wheel. He sighs as he knew that his daughter wanted to ride the Ferris Wheel with Nate. Yancy would be there too, and Nate is a good kid, from he seen so far.

"I would be honored," Pop Roxie says with a smile.

"I-I'll join as well," Bianca says with a brave face.

"Thank you," Joy says with a smile.

"What about you Hugh?" Rosa asks the spike hair teen.

"I don't really know...." Hugh replies as he didn't know what to do.

"Let's ride on the Roller Coaster," Rosa says with a smile. Hugh blushes a bit from Rosa just saying that.

"Let's get going," Roxie says as the group agrees. Soon Pop Roxie, Joy, Hugh, Rosa and Bianca went into the building with the Roller Coaster.

Nate and Roxie rode on Servine while Yancy rode Meowth to where the Ferris Wheel was.

"We let's see if can get in," Roxie says as they enter the entrance.

The worker who ran the Ferris Wheel saw the shrunkies and their pokemon. The worker was shock to see such tiny people.

"Would you three like to ride the Ferris Wheel?"

"Yes. We also wondering, could all three of us could ride it together?" Yancy asks as the worker.

"I don't see a problem with that," Worker replies as he stops the Ferris Wheel so tiny customers can come in.

"Thank you," Nate says as the tiny people got on the Ferris Wheel. The worker smiles and nods. As soon as the shrunkies and their pokemon got in the worker closed the door and starts the Ferris Wheel.

"Wow," Nate says looks out the window.

"It's amazing isn't?" Roxie says with a smile as she looks out as well.

"Getting on this Ferris Wheel always calms me down," Yancy says as she looks at the window with the two.

Nate blush a bit as the women were shoulder and shoulder with him.

"You two don't usally get alot of time off huh?" Nate asks as the women both look at the young man.

"Yeah. I'm usually doing my gym leader duties. I'm even having a harder time getting practice time in for the band in me," Roxie explain her problems.

"I'm always traveling and listening to my bosses. I'm always tiered when ever I get down with work and we don't stay in one location so I don't really get to see any of the places I visit," Yancy explains her problems as well.

Nate didn't know what to say. It sounded like the two women were always very busy.

"Let's enjoy this adventure together," Nate says as the two women look at the young man.

"I mean I still want to return to normal size. But I've been having a lot of fun on this journey with everyone. I've had fun talking and traveling with you Roxie. Yancy we wouldn't mind if you join us in travels. I think your boss would understand. Plus it's been fun talking to you and learning about other regions," Nate says as he had a blush on his face.

The two women blush from Nate's compliments.

"Y-yeah it's been fun traveling with you too. I really like your determination to go for your dream and you are kind," Roxie says she turns her head.

"T-that's right. You very kind Nate. Giving me your shirt when I was in those flowers and inviting me to join you on your travels Thank you very much," Yancy says she turns her head as well.

Nate blush from what the girls said.

Servine and Meowth watch the scene and looked at each. Both of them just made quite happy noise as they enjoyed the ride.

1511212211211111221122111111112211112.content:
The Ferris Wheel came to a stop and the trio left. The lights for the show were still up in the distance, so they entered the roller coaster and waited for everyone to be done.

Joy, Bianca, and Pop Roxie were the first to come back. Bianca was in Joy's hands as she departed. Bianca was set down.

"I got to admit, that was fun," Pop Roxie said.

"Indeed. Changing all the tracks like that," Joy said.

"Brings back memories from two years ago when I talked with some friends on the journey," Bianca said. She turned and saw the trio. "Hey!"

"Hey back," Nate said as Stoutland made a return.

"So, Hugh and Rosa together?" Roxie asked. Joy smiled a little as the second car returned and Hugh and Rosa came out, the tiny girl in his hands.

"That was fun!" Rosa yelled. "Doing it small was better than being big!"

"I noticed. I could feel your heart race," Hugh said.

"I could feel your heart," Rosa said. She blushed just a little with her words but it went unnoticed.

With the group together, they departed and looked to the new gym. People were leaving.

"Man, those designs were awesome," one guy said. His friend nodded.

"I can't wait for them to be in stores," she said.

"Guess we can go now," Nate said as they walked over. Clyde was out front, once again.

"Hey Champs in the making, still small I see?" he asked.

"Yep," Nate said.

"Well, bad news, only one challenger at a time inside. People who want to watch can go through the side," Clyde said.

"Well, uh, good luck," Yancy said.

"He won't need it," Roxie said confidently.

"Thanks," Nate said. He blushed a little from the encouragement.

"Just use your noggin," Rosa said. Hugh nodded.

"Let's get some good seats," Joy said as she knelt down and looked at . "I can carry you three on my Bliss."

"Thanks Joy," Roxie said. She planned on riding her Koffing but he could release some gas and that might cause some trouble. "That would be nice." The other two agreed and Joy helped them up and onto Bliss.

The viewers left, leaving only the challengers.

"You first," Hugh said. Nate nodded and rose Servine inside.

At first it was dark and then the lights flashed on.

"What do you think? Surprised, right? This Gym is, speaking frankly, a glittering fashion show and a dazzling stage! Well, for now, I'll give you this! In this Pokémon Gym, we'll have you proceed by defeating the Trainers waiting on the catwalk! By the way, Electric-type Pokémon don't do well against Ground-type moves... Oh! But Ground-type moves don't work against a Pokémon called Emolga, so please be careful!"

"Thanks," Nate said as he started up the steps. He saw the crowd watching and wondered where his friends were.

As he got to where the light ended, a woman appeared under a spotlight.

"Welcome challenger! I am Nikola!" she announced

Nate smiled and got ready.

The battle was tough. Servine went against Elekid and won by using Leech Seed to continually drain the electric pokemon. Needing a rest, Nate returned him and sent out Roggenrola. The rock-type faced against Flaffy and despite the sheep's faster speed, using a combination of Mud-slap and Rock Blast.

Once the battle was over, he glow and became a Boldore. The giant, to Nate, boulder Pokemon jumped for joy.

"
Right on! Let's keep going!" Nate exclaimed.

Using potions to heal them, Nate pushed on against the next two challenges before coming before Elesa herself.

Nate rode Servine up the stairs where the gym leader Elesa was. Elesa turns around to see the tiny human riding on his pokemon. Elesa heard about people getting shrunk but didn't think that it could be true.The model did smile as she saw the determination in the trainers eyes and Servine.

""Welcome to the main stage! My beloved Pokémon and your Pokémon shall compete! We're going to see whose star shines brightest!" Elesa says with a smile as she holds her pokeball.

Nate smlies as he gets off Servine for it to battle.

It didn't take long for Nate to beat Elesa. Using Servine and Boldore for the battle made it go quick. Elesa was happy for Nate as she saw how hard he work with Servine and Boldore despite him being a smaller size.

"Well… Now you… you're an even more wonderful Trainer than I expected. Your sweet fighting style swept me off my feet! Take this," Elesa says as she sits the Bolt Badge down along with TM.

"Feel free to use it, um, if you want to. Volt Switch lets the Pokémon switch with a different Pokémon after attacking. Of course, if you don't have another Pokémon in your party, you can't switch." Elesa explains and Nate nods.

"Thank you for the battle," Nate says as he returns Boldorve back to its ball and gets on Servine. Nate could feel that Servine could evolve in the next battle they are in.

"Wait! Please walk with us." Elesa says as the Beauties come out and got in a line. Nate blush a bit as Elesa and the beauties walk him down the floor. Nate blush become redder as he heard Roxie's whistle and saw Yancy waving with a blush on her face. Even Pop Roxie and Rosa wave at him along side Bianca and Joy cheering for him. Nate saw Hugh as the near the entrance waving and chuckling at the sight.

"Just wait until you win. I'll give you my cheer," Nate thought as Servine got to the end the run way.

"A shining example of a Trainer… Since that's what you are, you should be able to collect all the Gym Badges and reach the Pokémon League! Then, you and your Pokémon will shine even brighter!" Elesa says as she goes back up to the stage.

"Please wait here while we heal our Pokemon," Beauty Nikola says as she leaves for a moment.

___

After some time Hugh went through the gym and won. Sadly Hugh did not avoid having the Beauteis and Elesa walk him down the walk way. After Nate made some jokes to Hugh about his debut as a model. The group got back to together when they got out side.

Nate blush a little bit as he heard the compliments from Roxie and Yancy.

"You did great to Hugh. You must have liked being next to those Beauties," Rosa says with a smile.

"I was just joking!" Rosa says between laughs Hugh could cross his arms and glare the tiny brunet girl.

"Kids these days..." Pop Roxie thought as couldn't belive what he was saying.

"Looks like they're having fun," Bianca says with a smile and giggles at the sight.

"It's nice to fun friends like them," Joy says as she notice that Bliss and Servine were having fun as well.

Joy wonder what they could do next. They could always....
