151121221121111122112211111111221111211.content:
"That sounds like a great idea," Nate said as they exited the amusement park. He glanced to the side. Some people were going into Join Avenue. He could always set things up later. The group walked north.

"Pokemon Musicals," Hugh said.

"Oh, they are fun to participate in," Yancy said.

"Hmm. Maybe I could try my hand there," Pop Roxie said. Roxie just rolled her eyes.

They walked through the gate and saw the huge forest and in the distance a grand bridge.

"Wow. Just wow," Nate said.

"Yeah. It's a really impressive sight," Roxie said. The guard nodded at them and they turned the corner when a cyclist stopped.

"Wow. You're tiny!" he said.

"Yeah. An accident," Nate said. The guy nodded.

"You want to battle?" Nate smiled and reached back. "Go Tranquill!"

"Go Rilou!" Nate said.

"Did your brain shrink too?" the cyclist asked. "Tranquill! Use Air Cutter!"

"Quick attack!" Nate said. Rilou dodged the blast of wind and struck close and hard. "Now! Force Palm!" Rilou's hand glowed and struck Tranquill. Tranquill flew back and froze up for a moment.

"You paralyzed it," Joy said. Nancy and Roxie smiled with glee.

"Tranquill! Quick Attack!" his trainer yelled.

"Rilou! Counter!" Nate called out. Rilou readied himself and felt the attack strike him when he grabbed Tranquill's wing and slammed it into the ground. It wasn't getting up.

Rilou got off the defeated pokemon and it was returned to the trainer. "Tiny but fierce!" the cyclist called out. Rilou started jumping in joy when the sun seemed to get brighter. Rilou became enveloped by bright light and evolved. When it was done, Lucario stood strong.

"I am happy you didn't have him when you faced me. Things would have been easier for you," Roxie said as Lucario came back over and knelt before his trainer.

"Great work buddy," Nate said before returning him to his ball.

"Hey, look at that big boulder," Hugh said.

"Oh that. You'll need the HM Strength learned by one of your pokemon to move it," Rosa said from Bianca's Stoutland. She reached into her bag. "I have it if you want to learn it." She pulled out the disc.

"Maybe later," Hugh said with a smile.

The group walked up through the path of grass. A Minccinco popped out and Nate sent out Eevee. The little pup was able to beat back the furry one and yipped in joy.

"So Nate, what will you evolve this Eevee into?" Yancy asked as they continued.

"I don't know," Nate said. "I don't have any stones left."

"Well, at the rate your Pokemon come to love you, it could become Espeon or Umbreon very quickly," Yancy said. Nate took that into consideration.

A Leipard appeard suddenly. "I got this," Hugh said before sending out Onix. The rock-type slammed down the dark and roared with joy.

"Nice work," Rosa said. Hugh nodded as they continued on. Pop Roxie taking a drink from the Fresh Water as he was panting.

The group came through an arch of trees to a large meadow. A Breeder was busy with a combee as they walked up and came to two paths.

"Which one do we take?" Pop Roxie asked as he was exhausted.

"Why don't we split up?" Nate asked.

"Great idea," Yancy said. "You, I, and Roxie can go one way." Joy bit her lip. She had seen the look on Rosa's face.

Fair is fair. "Mind if I join you?" Joy asked. The two girls looked at the older nurse.

"Sure," Roxie said.

"And me as well?" Bianca asked. Nate nodded. "Thanks."

"I think these meet up later and we then come back this way," Rosa said. "sir, if you need a rest, you can stay here." Pop Roxie nodded.

"I think I might," he said.

"So, do you want to go to the left or forward?" Hugh asked Nate.

"We'll take the north path," Nate said. Hugh nodded. Hugh and Rosa walked to the left.

"Later dad." Roxie said as she and Nate moved forward.

A short distance a head there was a rustling about in the edge of the trees. A tall, to the shrunkies, green Pokemon appeared. It held two flowers in its hands.

"Oh a Roselia!" Roxie yelled. "I got to have it!"

"Then let's get close," Nate said. Servine nodded and carried them over. The others stayed back. Roselia looked at them. Roxie pulled out a ball.
Whirlipede started spinning and slammed into Roselia. It yelled in pain and unleashed some dark leaves.

"Oh Magical Leaf!" Joy said. Roxie just smirked.

"Not going to help here," Roxie said. Her buddy struck once more and she tossed a tiny ball. It struck Roselia and the ball closed up. It shook before dinging and returning to Roxie. "Gotcha!"

"You sound really excited," Yancy said.

"Poisons are my specialty. I have a few but not this one," Roxie said. "It's a nice one to have against people who try using ground-type against me."

"I'm happy for you," Nate said.

Before Roxie could respond, Bianca spoke up. "Oh look! There's a gap in the trees. It's likely a hidden grotto!"

"Like where Rosa found that Minccino?" Joy asked. Bianca nodded.

"Let's go see what's hidden here," Nate said.

----

Hugh walked with Rosa on his shoulder. They took a turn and saw a backpacker examining a tree. He straightened up and turned.

"Ah. Hello," he said. Hugh came up to the taller guy.

"Hello," Hugh said. Rosa waved.

"What a strange dilemma has befallen you," the backpacker said. "You should be careful."

"What do you mean?" Hugh asked. The man smiled.

"Rumors say the dangerous Pokemon Zoroark lays in wait in these woods. You never know when it might come out," the backpacker said. He walked past them, nodded, and smiled once more.

Hugh and Rosa felt a shudder and he turned quickly to see the man shift into tall black Pokemon with a long bushy tail. It gave them a toothy grin before vanishing.

"Whoa. Did that just happen?" Nate asked.

"Yeah. Yeah it did," Nate said.

--------

Nate went into Grotto on Servine. His friends waited outside. Before him in the grotto was a Pokemon with two pincers on his head. "Pinsir" the Pokedex said.

"Looks like a bug-type. Come out Lucario!" Nate said. His new friend looked at him and then the Pinsir. "Quick attack." Lucario raced in and struck. Pinsir took the hit and caught it to throw Lucario. Lucario landed hard. Pinsir seemed to be smirking. It seemed different. What just happened?

"Force Palm!" Nate said. The attack landed and Pinsir shuddered. It seemed paralyzed before raising up and striking Lucario hard. "What's going on?" "Swadloon!" The grass-bug pokemon looked at the fallen Lucario. It let loose an angry noise. "String Shot!" Pinsir raced to grab Swadloon but stumbled. The string wrapped up and caused the Pokemon to fall hard.

Wasting no time, Nate threw a Net Ball and it struck. The ball dinged. The ball vanished, going to Nate's PC.

Nate returned Lucario and felt angry at getting his friend in a bad spot. "Let's see what Joy has."

----

Yancy walked around the entrance. Roxie was talking with her new Pokemon. Joy and Bianca were talking about some Pokemon they found in the dessert.

"What's this?" she whispered as she found a spot of something yellow. She touched it and tasted it. "Honey?" She heard a buzzing noise and looked up. An angry Combee was above her.

Mewoth starts to growl at the Combee. The Combee looks scared from Mewoth growls.

Yancy turns around to see Nate, Roxie, Joy and Bianca were watch the battle.

Nate and Joy watched as Yancy, Roxie and Bianca talk to each other.

"Well when I went into the Grotto and battled Pinsir with Lucario but Lucario lost to him," Nate explains to the taller Nurse.

"I would have to say that Pinsir must have known fight moves. Remember that just because you think you have the advantage you don't underestimate your opponent. Now that you've learn that lesson you can still grow. " Joy explains to the tiny young man.

"Your right. Thanks Joy," Nate says in sincerely way.

"Your welcome," Joy says with faint blush on face the compliment.

"Let's go join the others and celebrate Yancy good job," Nate says with a smile. Joy nods as Nate, Joy, Servine and Bliss went over to the others. The

__

It's been some time and the group made it back to where Pop Roxie is.

"How did it go you?" Hugh asks his friend.

"Good. We were able to catch some good pokemon," Nate explains as Roxie and Yancy hold up their new friends.

"What about you two?" Bianca asks Hugh and Rosa.

Haugh and Rosa both look at the ground and both said.

"We didn't really find anything,"

In truth the two were kind of scard of getting pokemon beacues of what happen to them early.

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
As the group walked into Nimbasa the group looked around.

"I think I need to just check out Join Avenue again before we leave tomorrow," Nate said.

"I don't think I've been here yet. May I come along?" Yancy asked.

"Of course," Nate said.

"Hugh, since we have time, would you do a double battle with me on the Subway?" Rosa asked. Hugh nodded.

"Sure," he said. He looked to the others. "See you in a bit." Joy nodded.

"Later. I think I will check in with my cousin and see how things going with the Professors," Joy said,

"I'll come with you," Bianca said. Pop Roxie looked down at his girl and just nodded.

--------

The trio walked down the lone corridor when they saw a man in a lab coat coming up the way. "Um, excuse me?" Nate called. The man looked shocked at seeing Nate.

"Um, hello. I am Julian," he said.

"I'm Nate, the manager of this place. Would you like to join us?" Julian thought about it and nodded.

"That would be nice. I always wanted to work on making Pokemon look beautiful," Julian said.

"Then come on in," Nate said. They walked to the office and filled out the paperwork. And now Barber Julian's was open.

"Great. Now this will be a fun shop," Roxie said happily. Yancy nodded.

"I'm currently offering five services," Julian said. "I can brush, shampoo, or give your pokemon a smile cut. I can also apply some make-up."

"Servine, you want a cut?" Nate asked. Servine made a happy noise, Nate and Roxie dismounted and jumped up. Julian went to work.

"Viola!" Julian said. Servine jumped up happily. "Do you have another?" Nate thought and brought out Swadloon and Eevee.

"A brushing and shampoo respectively," Nate said. Julian nodded and went to work.

Roxie pulled out her Scolipede and it looked down at tiny trainer. "Give my buddy all three," Roxie said.

Yancy brought out her combee, Meowth, and Ursaring.

"Wow. That's a big bear," Nate said. Ursaring looked at Combee while licking her lips.

"Keep calm," Yancy told the bear. "Thanks Nate."

--------

Bianca smiled as Nimbasa Joy came over and presented the tiny Bianca with a package. It was a flat square. "It did come," she said.

"What did?" Joy asked as she helped her open the package. A circular disc was inside a square container.

"HM02: Fly," Bianca said. "I was going to give it to Nate. Roxie could use it on her Mandibuzz too."

"Most interesting," Joy said. She looked over to Pop Roxie. "What's the matter?"

"I'm just thinking my baby is all grown up," he said. "I didn't want it to happen so soon."

"All parents go through this. Just make sure this time you have with her now is used wisely," Nimbasa Joy said. Pop Roxie nodded.

--------

Hugh was smiling as he carried Rosa out of the Subway. They had won the to car sixteen and won six BP each.

"Do you want to go to one of the courts?" Rosa asked. Hugh looked down as he walked with Rosa.

"I don't know. I don't want to forget . . ."

Hugh flashed back to that horrible day. When his sister lost that joyful Pokemon that meant so much to her; That broken look she wore. How he could do nothing to change it.

And now he caused a friend to look the exact same way. He did. Not that damn Team Plasma.

"Ros-" Hugh said before a torrent of water struck him in the gut. He gasped in pain. "sa" he gasped. Rosa looked up and glared at him.

"What?" Rosa asked. Her voice was hard and angry. Tears were still coming from her eyes.

"I'm-I'm sorry," Hugh said. Rosa blinked. "I . . . I shouldn't have said those things."

"I'll say," Rosa said as she pressed her face with a torn napkin. "What are you going to do now?"

"I . . . I don't know," Hugh said before sitting on the floor. "I just . . . I want Team Plasma to pay for all they've done! Taking people's pokemon. Even little children's." Rosa said nothing for a moment.

"Oh Hugh, you're Pokemon . . ." Hugh shook his head.

"My little sister. My grandfather gave her a Purrloin and she was out playing with it . . . two years ago," Hugh said. Rosa walked up to him. Dewott followed and continued to glare.

"I . . . I didn't know," Rosa said.

"If I had been stronger. If I had been better . . . I could have stopped them. I know it," Hugh said.

"Hugh, it wasn't your fault," Rosa said.

"I told her to leave me alone because I was focused on watching a match on TV. I put her outside!" Hugh replied softly.

"And now you want revenge," Rosa said.

"I want to rescue my sister's Pokemon," Hugh replied. Rosa nodded.

"But you shouldn't go out this alone. Especially with this shrinker running about," Rosa said.

"Good idea," the shrinker said, before pulling out the device. He fired a blast at the three.

"I just want to squish them right now. Have you done that yet?" the male grunt asked.

"No. Not yet," the shrinker said. The male grunt smiled and lifted his boot.

"Ice Beam!" came a voice in the darkness. A silver-white beam blasted into the male grunt, sending him back and landing on the ground. The standing pair turned. A man with a large hat came out of the shadows with the large brown pokemon with huge tusks.

"Who dares attack us?!" the female grunt yelled.

"Heard to keep a lookout. Didn't think I would find you so quickly," the man said in a deep voice.

"Let's see how bad you are when you're inches tall!" the woman said. She looked at the shrinker. He lifted his hand. He stared Gym Leader Clay in the face and noticed the man's smirk. The shrinker felt unease. He pressed the button.

"Palpitoad! Mud Shot!" From the river, a stream of mud blasted and struck the Shrinker's arm. He held firm to the shrinking device as the beam shot out. Clay ducked and watched the woman shrink to inches tall as she fell over. "Mamo! Ice Beam that guy!" Mamoswine roared and fired.

The Shrinker ducked to the side and fired once more. Mamoswine pushed Clay back and took the hit.

"Thanks buddy," Clay said. He heard a splash and went around and saw no one there. "Palpitoad! Find him!" Clay yelled. His buddy nodded and dove back underwater. "Let's get to the banks," Clay said to Mamoswine. The giant pokemon grunted and walked next to Clay.

Hanging on the edge of the bridge, out of sight of all, the Shrinker held on. Once everyone was gone, he pulled himself back up.

"Mister Clay," Bianca said as she looked at the screen. "Tell me you got a bigger hat." Clay shook his head.

"I was shrunk by a foot. My Mamoswine was hit and touched me later," Clay said. "My height isn't why I called though,"

"Nearly had him," Clay said. "I was able to injure one grunt, and got another in the beam's path but the shrinker escaped."

"That's where I come in," Driftveil Joy said, "My Chatot's cage is a nice detainment place."

"Well, thankfully only one big victim and you minor decrease," Little Joy said.

"Oh no," Little Joy said.

"Yeah. So are you heading here then?" Clay asked.

"Most guys don't," Roxie snarked as the wheel stopped and they could get out.

-------

Clay walked over to the shrunken victims. Rood was taking it the best of them. He sipped the tiny cup of tea as the two ex-members were frustrated and angry. The young women shrunken looked uncomfortable as they seemed shocked by this development.

"So, what can you tell me about the one who did this?" Clay asked softly. Rood looked at him.

"I believe his name is Grant," Rood said. "Ghetsis often looked for people who had no real family. Grant was lonelier than most. He was seeking prove himself and elevate his position in the our old group."

"I don't think he had much skill with using Pokemon," one ex-member said. "He was the sort who couldn't use a a sewaddle with a Magmar, if you catch my drift." Clay nodded.

"So, this could be the one thing he is successful at," Clay said. Rood nodded. "Now, who could have built this device? Even knowing what to get, Ghetsis didn't strike me as the scientist. A manipulator and planner, yes. But to build this . . ."

"I am afraid, I don't know who the newest scientists in that branch are. And your assessment of that man is apt," Rood said. Clay looked over at the cage on the Center's desk.

"Then I best ask her," Clay said. He walked over, very happy his belt could tighten up enough to keep his pants up.

-------

Dewott returned to his ball as Hugh carried Rosa through the city. Nate and Servine walked next to Yancy and Roxie on Meowth.

They reached Route 5 as Little Joy, Bianca, and Pop Roxie waited.

"Hey guys. Anything new?" Nate asked.

"Yeah. Trouble in Driftveil," Joy said. "The Shrinker was seen there and was nearly caught." Rosa felt Hugh tense up but then relax.

"I wish we had a bike we could ride," Roxie said.

"Wait, we do. Can the drawbridge handle a lot of weight?" Hugh asked as he reached for one ball.

"It can handle a swarm of starved Snorlax striding over it," Bianca noted.

"Then my Onix could give us a quick run over it," Hugh said.

"Oh! And my Ursaring could easily keep up too," Yancy said.

"That would certainly be a way to travel," Nate said.

"Got to agree with you there," Pop Roxie said.

-----

Clay looked at the shrunken woman. She glared at Clay. "I won't betray my Master!" she growled.

"May I at least know your name?" Clay asked. The female grunt just glared.

"You will fail to stop the glory of Team Plasma," she said.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Admissions and Prisons

choices: Follow Rood with the shrunken persons.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Grant helped his friend into the vacant area of the Pokemon World Tournament. A frigate was docked as they passed the empty building. They moved to the plank when three figures appeared from the shadows.

"You finally arrived. Why did you not deliver this to us in Castelia Port?" one asked.

"I didn't want to be noticed by those who were pursuing me from Virabank," Grant said. The three exchanged looks. One held out his hand.

"Very well. Now return the device," the Shadow said.

"I was told to deliver it to one person. Is he on board?" The Triad seemed angry by this statement.

"No," another said.

"Come on board to wait," the first one said. Grant nodded and walked on.

Soon he would relinquish the device that gave him so much power. Did he want that? Did he want to get back to being a nobody?

-------

Hugh held Rosa close to the chest as Joy's one hand was wrapped around his waist and Bianca in the other. Onix slithered over the bridge with incredible speeds.

Trailing just behind a large bear with three shrunken people and Pop Roxie on top.

"This is really fun!" Nate said.

"You know, I think I'll want to try flying on my Mandibuzz when I get the chance. She could easily hold two people Nate," Roxie said.

"I could also call on my Togekiss to give us a ride," Yancy said.

"Um, both sound like wonderful ideas," Nate said. Both girls just smiled, though unhappy with his lack of conviction.

Pop Roxie just looked on with silence as he was unsure what to do. His baby girl was all grown up, if now 5 inches tall, and seemed to genuinely care about this kid.

-------

The group reached Driftveil City and went to the Center. Upon entering, the group saw Clay sitting a distance away talking to some birdcage and a group of people looking down from a table top. Nate was on Servine and Roxie rode with Yancy on Meowth.

"It seems others were attacked as well," Anthea said.

"Servine, would you help me up there?" Nate asked as Hugh sat before the new shrunken people. Bianca rode over to see Clay and the woman in the cage. Servine helped Nate up as Hugh set Rosa down.

The elderly gentleman bowed. "Hello," he said.

"So you were shrunk by some crazy Team Plasma guy too," Hugh said.

"Yes. Do you have an interest in Team Plasma besides recovering your size?" Rood asked.

"I don't want to see them take other people's pokemon," Hugh said coldly.

"The same for me," Nate said. It became quickly clear this was shared with the others.

"Well if I was my old size, I would ask you come with me to my house in the city," Rood said. "There are some things I would like to say there."

Clay walked away from the woman in the cage and looked at the new group. "Hello," he said. "Bianca tells me you want to challenge my gym. I'm sorry, but would you mind waiting? I wish to try and speak with the captive Team Plasma member." Hugh stiffened up.

"You caught one?" he asked. Clay looked at the young man. He sensed the emotion in his voice.

"Yes, but I won't allow you to interview her. It needs to be a cool head," Clay said.

"Then, perhaps we can see your house sir," Nate said. Rood nodded.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Grant and the Bridge

choices: Stick with Nate and the others
Switch over to Clay with the tiny woman
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
The group goes over to Team Plasma's safe house even though Hugh wanted to stay and interview. The group enters the house and sees some normal size ex Plasma taking care of pokemon. One the normal size ex Plasma in a Hicker outfit stops and looks to see his shrunken comrades.

"Lord Rood! Anthea and Concordia! Everyone what happen to you?" The ex Plasma asks.

"We had misfortune incident when we meet old comrades of ours," Rood explains as he is sat on a table. Nate, Roxie, Yancy, Rosa, Bianca and the two ex plasma members join him on the table.

"Let me introduce myself, I am Rood," Rood says as Bianca went into shock and spoke.

"Wait a minute. Rood!?! You were one of the seven sages!"

"What! You use to be part of Team Plasma! Why should we listen to you!" Hugh yells and is about to shout more until Rosa gave him glare. Hugh stops and keeps quite.

"My Rosa you are training him well," Joy thought and giggle at the sight of the tiny girl keep her half size boyfriend in check.

"More accurately, we're former members of Team Plasma. Because of the incident two years ago, we started taking care of the Pokémon that were separated from their Trainers as a way to atone for our misdeeds," Rood explains and the group nods.

"Since you were part of Team Plasma could you help us find a certain pokemon? Like a Purrloin?" Rosa asks as Hugh grew a bit happy that Rosa asks about the Purrloin.

"The Pokémon you speak of is not in this place. I imagine it is still being used by Team Plasma now. Just as you say, our apologizing doesn't solve anything. But you can't move forward unless you admit you were wrong and apologize… Team Plasma made Trainers suffer… I feel terrible about it… How foolish we were," Rood explains as sad expression is on his face. The group felt sorry for the old man, even Hugh is having trouble staying mad at him.

"I bet that if you keep on trying you can fix this mess," Rosa says and Rood looks at the young brown hair women.

"Thank you for your kind words... Actually, I have a favor to ask of you. Could you please look after this Pokémon, Zorua?" Rood asks a Zorua jumps on the table as soon as it was called.

"A Zorua. Those are very rare," Joy says as she looks at the dark type Pokemon. Rosa without any hesitation says.

"Of course!"

"Oh! Thank you! That Zorua is one of the Pokémon that my lord N relied on as a friend during his journey," Rood explains as the others were surprise to hear this.

"This is one of N's pokemon," Yancy says as she look at the Zorua. The Zorua looks very friendly and seems to taken a liking to Rosa.

"Yes. This is without a doubt a pokemon took care of," Anthea explains as Roxie looks at Anthea and Concordia.

"Hey what's your deal? And why are you here?" Roxie asks as the two women look at each other and back

"I suppose we should explain who we are," Concordia says and Anthea nods and starts to explain.

"We should start with a person named Ghetsis,"

Bianca starts to shiver from hearing that name. Ghetsis is a person she would remember for the rest of her life, the person that almost destroyed Unova and hurt her friends.

"Team Plasma is an organization created by a man named Ghetsis to help him take over the Unova region. The one he groomed to help him further his nefarious aims was N. N was a strange boy who was called the child of the Pokémon." Anthea finishes and Concordia starts to talk.

"N was an orphan. I heard that right after he was born, he upset people with behavior that suggested he could talk to Pokémon. When he was living in the woods with Darmanitan and Zorua, Ghetsis took him in. We are also orphans Ghetsis took in. Our task was to take care of N." Concordia finishes up their explanation.

The group is surprise to hear about Anthea, Concordia, and N's past. Pop Roxie grew angry from hearing how Ghetsis would even use kids for his plans.

"My lord N is a wonderful person who has the power to understand the hearts of Pokémon. But still, he has much to learn about understanding the hearts of people... I hope he will develop this skill while he travels with the legendary Pokémon to atone for the trouble he caused in Unova as the king of Team Plasma," Rood explains as the group nods.

"This Plasma is different..." Nate thought as he wants to continue to talk with Rood and the others.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Learning about ExPlasma and N

choices: Stick with Clay and find out what plans Plasma has up their sleeves
Go back to Nate and the others at the ExPlasma Safe house
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Clay grew a big irritated with the tiny woman in the cage. The tiny women in the cage refused to talk or answer any questions. Clay is about stop until he heard the sound a door sliding open, the gym leader turns around to a person wearing a black top hat with red ribbed silk, white domino mask covers the top of his face, a crimson scarf that covers bottom half of his face, wearing scarlet cape and under that a black suit with a black tie, and black loafers. The person in the strange outfit is surprise to a smaller Clay and a tiny women in a cage. Clay was about a bad day and now it became worst.

"Hey you weren't suppose to come out until the PWT! What are you doing here Crimson?" Clay asks with anger clear in voice.

It took a moment for Crimson but soon he replies.

"I'm sorry. I started to get a cramp and figure I could use a walk. Though I had my doubts about what you said three days ago, it looks what you said is true,"

The tiny woman notice that Crimson's voice sounded deeply ragged and heroic at the same time. Crimson then turns his attention from Clay to the tiny woman in the cage.

"Oh. You're wonder about her? She's part of that Team Plasma. Trying to get information out of her right now. But so far she's being stubborn," Clay explains as the tiny woman starts to shout.

"That's right! I will not betray my Master! We will soon take over Unova!"

Clay grew angry from hearing this woman say the same thing over and over again.

"You keep on saying that! Do you understand what you are doing?" Clay asks the tiny woman.

"Of course I do. I will do anything for my master," The tiny woman replies with pride in her voice. Clay couldn't believe what he was hearing. Crimson look at the tiny woman and asks.

"So you would do anything?"

"Yes," The tiny woman replies with a smile on her face. Crimson nods and then pulls out a pokeball from his belt.

"Sakata come on out. I need you for a test," Crimson says as he throws the ball and a Samurott comes out of the ball.

"Hey what are you planing?" Clay asks as Crimson goes over to a chair, picks it up and turns it around to face the tiny woman in the cage and sits down in the chair. The tiny women starts to silently to panic and wonders what Crimson is doing.

"If you pass this test, Clay will let you go. But if you fail it you must tell him everything you know," Crimson says as Clay says.

"What are doing!?!"

"That's all. Fine by me, what do you want me to do?" The tiny woman asks as she is ready to earn her freedom and return to Team Plasma.

Crimson looks over to Sakata and stares at him. Sakata looks at his trainer and nods, understanding what Crimson wants him to do even without saying anything. Crimson then turns to the tiny woman.

"I want you to order my partner Sakata to take out his razor shell blade and tell him to stab me in the heart," Crimson says in dead serious manner.

Clay, Driftveil Joy and even the tiny woman went into shock after hearing what the test is.

"P-Please change the test. If your pokemon does that, you will die," Driftveil Joy says as she didn't want to see someone to die in front of her.

Crimson waits silently for the tiny woman to make her move. The tiny woman didn't know what to do, back when her team mate was about to step on their tiny ex teammates it made her feel sick but she figured she would get use to it. But still the thought of killing someone bothered her, even hurting a pokemon bothered her as well. These thoughts went through her head until she heard Crimson's voice.

"If you follow your master's orders, this is what he'll make you do. Can you really take a life away? Be it a human or pokemon?"

The tiny woman starts to sweat from Crimson's words and wonders what she can do. Clay and Driftveil Joy watch as the tiny women opens her mouth.

"I... I can't do this,"

Clay and Driftveil Joy both happily sigh at the conclusion of this test. Crimson gets up and goes near the tiny women.

"You got me. I'm not that strong enough to follow through with my pledge with Team Plasma," The tiny woman says as starts to tear up.

"You're wrong," Crimson replies as the tiny woman is shock and looks up at the giant. Crimson continues to talk.

"You've become stronger from this very decision. You were able to make your own choice in this matter and manage to keep your bonds from breaking,"

"What are you talking about?" The tiny woman asks as she didn't understand what Crimson is saying.

"You must have had Family, friends and your trusty partners,"Crimson says as he looks over to Sakata. Crimson then continues. "You've had them even before joining Team Plasma," The tiny woman understands and remembers her family, friends and her trusty pokemon.

"But my bonds with them were broken as soon as I join Team Plasma," The tiny woman says she down at the cage's floor.

"That may be true. But they can still be repaired, if you had followed the path of your masters then those bonds would truly broken forever," Crimson replies as the tiny women nods and Crimson continues.

"No matter what happens in this life, you mustn't lose sight of those who truly care about you,"

Crimson finishes and turns to look at Driftveil Joy and Clay.

"I'm sorry that I cause you worry, Miss Joy and Clay I'll go back to my room until you give out your signal,"

"It's alright. As long as everyone is alright," Drifveil Joy says with a blush on her face from how calm Crimson is.

"Just get back," Clay says as he forgives Crimson. Crimson nods and looks at Sakata.

"Time to go partner," Crimson says, Sakata nods and Crimson returns Salata to his ball. Crimson starts to leave until he heard a voice.

"My name is Sayuri! I'll try my best to help out and try to repair my bonds, " The tiny orange hair woman says.

"Nice to meet you Sayuri. I hope we can become good friends," Crimson says as he leaves. Crimson went back to his hiding place and waits for the PWT to begin.

Clay is glad that Crimson helped to get Sayuri to talk but Clay was surprise to see that Crimson talked more then he usually would. But Clay shakes that and goes back to talking to Sayuri.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Test and Bonds

choices: Does the group stay or go to find Clay?
Where do Clay and Sayuri go?
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
"So, Ghetsis' plot?" Clay asked.

"To conquer Unova, he plans on harnessing the power of the legendary dragons," Sayuri said. Clay nodded.

"How?" he asked. Sayuri shook her head.

"I . . . I don't really know. I'm low-level. They only gave me one Pokemon, a Watchdog. I would tell you . . Honestly I would," Sayuri said. Clay sighed. She seemed honest.

"Do you know why they built the shrinking device?" Clay asked. Sayuri looked at him with some disbelief.

"You. You gym leaders and the Elite Four and Champion. If they could remove you from play, the defenses of Unova would crumble," Sayuri said. Clay nodded. He recalled fighting with the others against the Sages two years ago.

"That makes sense. It would also make stealing easier from a five inch person," Clay said. Sayuri nodded. "Speaking of stolen, that Watchdog." Sayuri looked up and then down. She nodded slowly.

Clay opened the door and held out a giant hand. Sayuri placed a ball in it and Clay left, leaving the door open. Clay looked at Driftveil Joy and she took the ball.

"What am I to do now?" she asked.

"If your honest about making amends, how do you plan on doing it?" Clay asked. "You could wait with your fellow ex-Plasmas." Sayuri nodded.

"What is Crimson here for?" Sayuri asked.

"The Pokemon World Tournament," Clay said. He looked at her. "He also fought against Ghetsis two years ago."

"He did? How did he survive?"

"By the bonds with his friends. He didn't waiver from his convictions. Could be a stubborn guy but has a good heart," Clay said.

"Not so different from you," Driftveil Joy said from the counter. She picked up the phone and dialed a number. Sayuri laughed and nodded.

"Would you help me with something?" Sayuri asked Clay.

"Depends on the request," Clay said.

"Would you help me catch a Pokemon? I want to do more than sit around," Sayuri said. Maybe. Maybe if she could build her own bonds with her own Pokemon, she would become who she wanted to be those years ago.

"I think I can do that," Clay said. "Driftweil drawbridge has Duckletts on it. Route 6 has a larger selection. But Clay Tunnel is not stable at the moment." Sayuri nodded.

--------

Zoura laid his large body next to Rosa and fell asleep. "So, where is N?" Bianca asked.

"I don't know. I know he was looking for his friends from two years ago, the ones who helped him see the error of his way," Rood said.

"You wouldn't know anything about Ghetsis' plans, would you?" Little Joy asked.

"Not at the moment," Rood said. He looked up at Pop Roxie and then back down. "I told Clay all I know."

"Mr. Rood, I caught a Pokemon with N's ID number. Has released a great many of his old Pokemon?" Joy asked.

"Yes. The ones he keeps with him now are those that refused to leave him. They love him too much to leave," Rood said.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: The Shrinking Plot

choices: Switch over to Nate and the others as they leave to go to the gym
Switch over to Driftveil Joy as she finds anouther side effect from being shrunk
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Clay carries Sayui over to Driftveil Drawbridge, the tiny orange hair women is amazed to see the bridge that she once traveled on, now even larger then before. Clay sets Sayui down as she looks down the bridge.

"Okay, I brought you where you wanted," Clay says as Sayui looks up at him.

"Thank you for this," Sayui says with a smile and looks on the bridge to see a Ducklett not so far from the two.

"Alright. Here you go," Clay says as he hands Sayui some tiny pokeballs. Sayui wonders how Clay could have gotten such a small pokeballs.

"Some how they were able to shrink some items to help the other trainers that were shrunk. Clay explains to Sayui about the ball, Sayui nods and Clay continues to talk.

"Since you don't have a pokemon on you, you can borrow Palpitoad for a little bit,"

Sayui nods as Clay throws a pokeball and Palpitoad comes out of the ball. The water ground pokemon looks up to his trainer waiting for his order.

"Palpitoad, will you help Sayui battle with that Ducklett over there?" Clay asks his pokemon. Palpitoad nods and gets ready to fight.

"Now show me what you can do," Clay says to Sayui, the tiny women nods and turns to face the Ducklett. Clay quickly explains what moves that Palpitoad knows before Ducklett took notice the group and then went into a battle position.

"Okay. Palpitoad use Supersonic," Sayui says as the Palpitoad listens and generates odd sound waves from its body towards Ducklett. The Ducklett gets confuse and tries to attack Palpitoad. But sadly Ducklett hits herself.

"Okay. Use Round," Sayui says as Palpitoad closes it's eyes and starts to sing. The song is able to hurt Ducklett. Ducklett tries to attack again but hurts herself.

"I better catch her before she hurts herself any more," Sayui thought as takes one of the pokeballs that Clay gave her and throws it at Ducklett. The ball hits Ducklett and sucks her in into the ball. Clay and Sayui watch the ball move around until there is a ding.

"Good job. Now go meet your new partner," Clay says to Sayui.

Sayui nods and goes over to where the pokeball is and picks it up. Sayui lets Ducklett out of her ball, Sayui is a bit scared seeing the giant duck and wonders what the duck will do. Ducklett looks down to see it's trainer, the blue duck then coos happily and starts to it's head on her tiny body. Sayui is surprise at first but then starts to pet Ducklett.

"I like you too girl," Sayui says with a smile on her face. Clay grins a bit at the sight and turns to Palpitoad and back to Sayui.

"You two did a good job," Clay says as he turns a happy Palpitoad back to its ball. Sayui turns to face Clay.

"Thank you. But your Palpitoad did most of the work," Sayui explains as Ducklett looks at Clay as well.

"Now give your self some credit. You took your first step on become a better person," Clay explains as Sayui nods as she looks at Ducklett.

"Ducklett.... I hope we can become good friends," Sayui says with a smile. Ducklett let's out a happy coo.

"I think it's time for me to return to the gym. Come along Sayui," Clay says as he turns around.

"Okay... I'll go back to Center," Sayui says as she gets on Ducklett. The Ducklett then walks next to Clay.

"No. You'll come with me. I think seeing a gym match will give you some experience," Clay explains to Sayui. Sayui nods happily as the two go to the gym.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Baby Steps on the Bridge

choices: Skip Rosa's battle and Sayuri remeets the group.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Hugh walked out of the Ex-Plasma base and looked at Rosa. "You said Clay focuses on Ground-type?" Rosa nodded.

"That's what I heard. He's smart and powerful too," Rosa said. "Why?"

"Because I don't think I have a Pokemon that has an advantage," Hugh said.

"You did find a Water Stone in the sewers Hugh," Joy said. "You could make your Eevee a Vaporeon." Hugn nodded and called out his Eevee. It looked up at him happily. He pulled out a stone.

"Ready to become a bit stronger?" Eevee nodded and let the stone touch him. He glowed and became larger. Vaporeon cried out in joy. They started walking again.

"You know, maybe when we're done, we can trade your Onix with a metal coat on it for my Bouldore and then trade back," Nate said from Servines back. Hugh nodded.

"Good idea. Why don't you battle first?" Hugh said as they approached the gym.

Those who were just observing stayed above to watch on a screen, Nate, Hugh, and Rosa walked down the path and through the challenges of the trainers.

"Come on Nate. I know you can win," Roxie said.

"I wonder if I should have traded him another Pokemon. Wobbles would have been a great help," Yancy said. Roxie looked at her.

"Wobbles?" she asked.

"My Wobbeffut," Yancy said. Roxie nodded.

"You really did travel a lot," Roxie noted.

-------

The two tinies and one half-sized teen made it to the final platform. Sitting on a table was the plasma grunt from before with a ducklett next to her. "You!" Hugh called out. Sayuri looked back at him.

"Hello," she said.

"Miss Sayuri has left Team Plasma. I hope some good battles against you can show her the true bonds that can develop with one's Pokemon," Clay said.

"Where did you steal that Ducklett from?" Hugh demanded.

"No where. I caught it with Clay's help," Sayuri said.

"Let's get started," Clay injected. "Who is first?" Nate stepped forward. He got off Servine and smiled eagerly.

The battles were intense. Against Krokodile, Servine won easily waited for the next fight. Against Sandslash, Servine suffered from Sanslash's Fury Cutter and Nate brought him back. Pinsir came out and looked at the enemy. He used Focus energy while enduring a Bulldoze attack and struck quick with Brick Break, knocking Sandslash back hard. Pinsir celebrated and seemed tobuff up.

"Gonna get intense," Clay said with a smirk as Excadrill came out.

"What happened?" Sayuri wondered. Pinsir rushed in once more.

"Revenge, Pinsir!" Nate called out. Pinsir glanced back but waited as Excadrill used Slash. The second he was hit, Pinsir delivered a powerful response and knocked Excadrill out. Pinsir celebrated happily. Clay returned and pulled out a badge.

"Good work," he said. Nate accepted the badge and Clay went to a healing Machine. "Next."

Hugh took a breath and stepped forward.

Once again, Clay led with Krokodile. Pignite went out first and struck hard with Arm Thrust. The sand crocodile summoned Sand Tomb but Pignite was affected but hit Krokodile and won with several strikes.

With Sandslash about to come out, Hugh brought Pignite back and set forth Onix. Onix used Curse to gain defensive and offensive strength at the cost of some speed and endured the Bulldoze attack. Using it once more, Onix was sluggish but easily handled the second attack. Tossing a Super Potion on it, Onix was revitalized and used tackle on Sandslash.

"That's it!" Hugh called out happily. Sandslash unleased another Bulldoze and Onix endured it. With another Super Potion to help it, Onix struck Sandslash and won. He roared with pleasure and glowed a little. Hugh checked his Pokedex and smiled.

Excadrill came out once more. "Dragonbreath!" Hugh called out. A stream of blue-white flame flew out and hit Excadrill as it came at Onix with a Bulldoze. Onix fell back. "Thanks buddy. You did a lot."

"A dragon move against a part steel type wasn't very smart," Clay said as Hugh retrieved his Onix. BeforExcadrill froze up and Hugh smiled.

"Got what I wanted. Now Vaporeon!" The blue pokemon came out and glared at Excadrill. "Let's continue Onix work!" His water pokemon cried out in agreement. "Water Pulse!" The paralyzed Excadrill took it and began to wobble around.

"Use bulldoze!" Clay yelled. But his strongest Pokemon hit itself with a claw. "You confused him." Clay smiled.

"Water Pulse again!" Hugh said. another torrent of water let loose and struck Excadrill. Once again, it injured itself. Wobbling on both feet, a third Water Pulse took it down.

"Very good. You used what you had well," Clay said with a smile. "Come here." Vaproeon and Hugh walked forward and accepted the badge.

"Thanks," Hugh said as he knelt to hug Vaproeon. Rosa smiled.

"My turn," she said.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Hugh's Trouble

choices: Does Joy find shrinking radiation on the balls once more?
Back to Grant or others in the Center
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Rosa smiled as Dewott jumped up and down with Excadrill on the ground. "Very good," Clay said. "You've earned the Quake Badge as well.

"Do you want me to carry it until we can shrink it?" Hugh asked. Rosa nodded. Clay handed him Nate's badge as well.

"Thanks," Rosa said before looking at the shrunken Sayuri. "Learn anything?"

"Your Dewott is very strong. You trust it a lot," Sayuri said softly.

"Let's go meet up with your group," Clay said, as he walked to one elevator. Dewott picked up Rosa and Nate climbed onto Servine and they followed. Sayuri climbed onto her Ducklett. It cooed happily and flew over to Clay's side. Hugh glared at Sayuri.

The elevator went up and in the reception area, Roxie and Yancy rushed to Nate. "Great work!" Roxie said happily. "You were amazing."

"It was a really beautiful job," Yancy said. Joy looked past the trainers to Sayuri.

"You were right Bianca, it was her," Joy said.

Yancy and Roxie looked past Nate and saw the newest shrunken woman. "Before anyone asks, it is her Ducklett she caught on her own. She's quit her former team," Clay said.

"Well, if you say so My. Clay, I believe you," Bianca said. Her Stoutland walked forward and to Ducklett.

"Um, hello," Sayuri said.

"May I pet your ducklett?"

"Uh, sure," Sayuri said. Bianca reached out and pet the blue duck.

"You just caught her?" Bianca asked. Sayuri nodded. "I have a good read on how close Pokemon become with their trainers. And her friendship level is high. Really high."

"What do you mean?" Sayuri asked.

"She trusts and is incredibly protective of you," Bianca said. "That shouldn't happen for a while in most captures."

"That seems to be happening a lot," Nate said. "My Swadloon really liked me when I was first shrunk even before being caught."

"Perhaps it is something to do with us being shrunk," Joy said. "Let's go to the Center to note this."

"And we can get our business done too," Nate said. Hugh looked away from Sayuri and nodded.

"And once that's done, I got a big surprise for all of you," Clay said with a smile. Roxie's eyes glittered.

"It's all ready?" she asked.

"Yes it is," Clay said with a laugh before they set out.

-------

Grant sat on a bed and looked at the device in his hand. With this, Team Plasma would rule. But it wasn't in Team Plasma's hands. It was in his. Could he defeat the Shadow Triad with this? Could he beat Lord Ghetsis? He heard the laughs and snickers behind his back. He knew he didn't have the skill to train Pokemon well.

But now things were different. Now he had power.

Did he want to surrender it so easily?

----------

Hugh looked down to the first floor of the Center where Sayuri and her Ducklett were being looked at by the Joys and Bianca. He and Nate were before the trade machine and set the balls in the machine. The names Onix and Boldore were on the screen.

"Here's hoping you don't end up shrunk from this," Nate said. Hugh nodded.

"Agreed," he said before hitting the button. The balls glowed and rolled into the machine.

------

"Yes. There's no question she is very high on the Friendship scale," Driftveil Joy said.

"What about this guy?" Rosa asked, pulling out minccino. It looked at Rosa and licked her.

"Your Minccino certainly loves you," Bianca said. Rosa shook her head.

"Come on boy," Rosa said. Minccino tilted its head and became blurred. Zoura appeared.

"A zoura. That's rare," Sayuri said.

"It belonged to N," Bianca said. Sayuri bit her lip at the mention of her old leader.

--

The balls came out, with Nate looking at the inch high ball. Hugh looked at the fraction of an inch ball. Both glowed and shook. The register names changed to Gigalath and Steelix.

"Let's trade back now," Hugh said. Nate nodded and Hugh pressed the button. Seconds past and they received their old balls. Both were hesitant to touch. "Let's call Joy up here."
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: The Duck With A Big Heart

choices: Pop Roxie is able to get to the Center in time to tell his story
Pop Roxie isn't able to get to the Center in time to tell his story
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Grant is still in thought as he sat in his bed. He was ordered to stay in his room while everyone else gets ready for their plan for the PWT.

__

Clay is on his Xtransceiver talking to someone. From what Roxie could hear it sounds like Clay says.

"Okay, you leave your post now but make sure to get there in time,"

Roxie wonders who Clay is talking to but her Father's voice stops that thought.

"How are you able to face the camera so well and not get nervous?" Pop Roxie asks the tiny pink hair girl as he holds a pencil and note book to take notes.

"Well I usually have help from everyone but I..." Yancy explains as Pop Roxie takes notes. Roxie is watching this scene and is starting to get annoyed by it.

"Dad stop bugging her,"

Pop Roxie and Yancy look over to the irritated Roxie. Just a couple of minutes ago Pop Roxie was able to figure out that Yancy is Nancy and now her father is bothering her.

"It's fine Roxie. I don't mind giving out advice," Yancy says to help clam Roxie down.

"See it's fine." Pop Roxie says with a smile. "Now could you explai-" Pop Roxie tries to continue but Roxie interrupts him.

"No it's not! You're just wasting your life on trying to become an actor,"

Pop Roxie could only look at his tiny daughter after she said those words. The middle age man then puts the pencil and note book on a table and starts to leave.

"I think I need some fresh air. I'll be right back," Pop Roxie says as he exits the center.

Yancy turns around about to say something to Roxie but notice the Rocker girl had a regretful look on her face.

"It might be better they get some time alone before meeting up again," Yancy thought as she starts to think of her own family.

__

Pop Roxie wonders through the city market trying to find a drink to help him calm down, luckily he finds a place selling Moo Moo Milk. When he gets closer he sees a person in a black top hat with red ribbed silk, white domino mask covers the top of his face, a crimson scarf that covers bottom half of his face, wearing scarlet cape and under that a black suit with a black tie, and black loafers.

Pop Roxie is shock at seeing the person in that costume. The costume person gets a bottle of milk and starts to leave. Before the costume person can leave Pop Roxie calls.

"H-Hey wait up Crimson!"

The person stops and turns to face Pop Roxie. After a few minutes Pop Roxie speaks up again.

"If it's not much trouble could I hang out with you?" Pop Roxie hoping that he could have a chat with Crimson. Crimson nods and Pop Roxie smiles.

"Ah Thank you. Um could you wait a minute? I need to get a drink first," Crimson nods again and Pop Roxie gets his drink.

The two get out of the market and find a bench where they can sit together. The two start to drink their bottles of Moo Moo Milk. After a few sips Pop Roxie starts the conservation

"Thanks for coming. I know this kind of random, a person asking a strange to hang out,"

Crimson shakes his head and replies.

"It's no problem,"

"He He Thanks," Pop Roxie says and Crimson notices that Pop Roxie as a big smile on his face. Pop Roxie then continues to talk.

"You see, the reason I wanted to talk to you is because that costume brings back a lot of memories back in my younger days," Pop Roxie explains with a sad look on his face. Pop Roxie continues to talk.

"Even back then I've always had dreams of becoming a movie star. I even got in frights with my own Pa about it since he wanted me to become a sailor just like him. It reminds me that a couple of minutes ago I had a similar fight with my daughter. I didn't have anything against my father or daughter but you know when a person has a dream they stubborn about making it come true." Pop Roxie says and takes another sip of his milk. Crimson takes a sip of his own milk and continues to listen to Pop Roxie's story.

"One day my best friend told me that he wanted to become a directer and he I told him I wanted to become an actor. Both of us were pretty naive back then when it came down to making movies, we got everyone we knew to help us start a movie. First we came up with an idea about a super hero and then from there we just made it up as we went," Pop Roxie says a warm smile on his face and takes another drink.

"And during that time I meet some who became very important to me," Pop Roxie says with a huge smile on his face.

"Did you meet your future wife there?" Crimson takes a guess at who Pop Roxie meet during the making of that movie. Pop Roxie looks at Crimson with a surprise look on his face but then it turn into a blushing smile.

"Yep. You hit the make," Pop Roxie takes one more sip of his milk and continues to talk.

"During the filming it was love at first sight for me. I would get so nervous around her and I usually would screw up my lines when we were filming. When ever that happen she would always laugh at me, at first I thought that she must think of me as a joke. But then she would come up to me and help me remember my lines. Soon we started to hang out off set and it become more intimate," Pop Roxie says with a slight blush on his face but the middle age man continues.

"And then we finish the movie and some how we got the big city to show in their theater. But in the end people made fun of it, critics hated it and it became a flop. I got really depress from seeing all of our hard going the drain but my future wife told me that I was wonderful and that good came out of it. When she told me that and when people came to us asking for autograph, I knew without a doubt I wanted to marry her. So I asked her to marry me right then and there and she said yes. I started to work with my father so we could get money for the wedding, soon we got married and had a child soon afterwards. So I figured since I have a family that I want to support and protect I deiced to quite acting all together and work with my father. Three years later my father passes away and I fully take over the business. My wife supported me any way she could and took are our daughter and told her stories about a hero from long ago. But some years later my wife passed away because of a sickness that was going around. You know what she told when she was on deathbed? She told to follow my dream of becoming an actor and take care of our daughter. Can you believe that? She still thought of others even if she was in pain," Pop Roxie says and he turns his head to face Crimson. "It must be boring, listening to this old guy's story....:

"It's actually interesting," Crimson replies in kind voice. Pop Roxie is a little surprise and says.

"Well, you're just special boy, aren't you?" Pop Roxie smiles cheerfully and returns back to telling his story.

"After that I took care of my daughter, and then years later my daughter finally got a job. So I figured that I could go back to being an actor. But then my daughter and I started to get into fights about it. My daughter says I'm troubling everyone with this "Hobby". I don't know what to do any more," Pop Roxie looks down at the ground.

"You should tell her how you feel," Crimson says as Pop Roxie looks at Crimson.

"D-Do you think she'll listen?" Pop Roxie asks as Crimson nods.

Pop Roxie then gets up and throws his empty milk bottle into the trash can. He looks over to Crimson and says.

"Thank you. You're too kind,"

Pop Roxie then starts walking over to the Center. Crimson watches Pop Roxie leaves and looks up at a clock. Crimson gets a little nervous and throws away his empty milk bottle and puts his right hand into his pocket and walks over to where the PWT building is.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: A Story About Long Ago

choices: Follow Pop Roxie and the others watching the first match
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Pop Roxie felt his heart race as he runs into the center. Luckily for him everyone is still at the center. Roxie notice that her father is sweating.

“Dad!? What’s wrong?” Roxie asks showing a worried look on his face from how hard her father is breathing.

“N-nothing… is … wrong….. I just figure that…. I need to tell you something,” Pop Roxie says though his deep breaths.

“What’s that?” Roxie says as the tiny white hair woman is glad and a little annoyed at her father running in the Center so fast.

“Can we talk in private?” Pop Roxie asks feel little embarrass if the others heard. It took a lot of courage to tell that person who wore a costume that he wore many years ago.

“Okay. I’ll be right back everyone,” Roxie says as her father picks her up.

“I wonder what they’re going to talk about?” Nate asks as Yancy answers.

“It must be something important. I hope it brings them closer together,”

Nate smiles at the idea and says.

“Yeah. I hope so too,”

____

Pop Roxie and his tiny daughter were in a room together. It took a few moments but Pop Roxie is able to tell his story. Roxie is silent for a couple of minutes and says.

“So that’s why you wanted to become a movie star,”

Pop Roxie nods in agreement.

“Why didn’t you ever tell me this?” Roxie asks with a serious tone.

Pop Roxie stares at his tiny daughter and replies.

“At first I didn’t want tell since you were so young at the time. But when ever I tried we got into a big fight about it and got harder since you were so talented in music and pokemon battles,”

Roxie knew that he was right, they would always get into fights and she was very young when her talent in pokemon and music started.

“Okay. I understand. I’ll try to help you out with you and mom’s dream but you have to keep ship still going so people can still travel,” Roxie says with a smile on her face.

“Thank you,” Pop Roxie says with a smile. Roxie smiles back her father and then realize something.

“Oh crud we’re going to be late!” Roxie shouts.

“What for?” Pop Roxie asks.

“Clay is holding a pokemon tournament. I want to be part of it,” Roxie replies and Pop Roxie nods.

“Alright. Let’s get going,” Pop Roxie says with a smile as he gets up and carries his five inch tall daughter to the PWT building.


Pop Roxie made in time as soon as he saw the others at the door entrance at the PWT Building.

“Hey guys! You just made it. We’re about to enter,” Nate says with a smile.

“I can’t wait to see people strong bonds with their pokemon,” Bianca says with a smile. Sayuri perked up at hearing the word bonds. Clay had let her come so she could see some real battles.

“Okay. You better get in there. There’s not many spots left,” Clay says and everyone soon went inside.

The group went over to the registration table to sign up. The man in charge is shock to see the some many shunkies in the group.

“Hello. Would you like to enter the Tournament?” The man asks.

“Of course that’s why we came here,” Rosa says with a smile. The man behind the registration table could feel Rosa’s sprit and smiles.

“Okay. But know that only four spots are opened. So who is going to battle?” The man asks.

“I think I’ll stay out. I’m going to watch the battles,” Joy says with a smile as Bianca adds.

“I’ll join you. Sayuri why don’t you join us?”

The newly shrunken smiles and says.

“Okay I’ll join you if that’s alright with Clay,”

“It’s fine with me. I’m entering since I want to check something out,” Clay replies, he wanted to help the guard the building.

“I think I’ll join Joy, Bianca, Sayuri and Pop Roxie,” Yancy says with a smile.

“I guess that works out well. So it will be Nate, Rosa, Roxie and me joining in the tournament, Hugh says with a smile.

“Alright. I’ll sign you four up,” The man says as he works on his computer, after a few seconds the man is done.

“Alright. I got your names in. Please go into stands to enjoy the first match. The group who join please go into your assigned rooms and wait for your turn. There is a TV in your room so you can watch the matches. I hope you have a good day,” The man says with a smile.

“Thank you very much. Also Nate and Roxie good luck in your matches,” Yancy says with a slight blush on her face.

“Thank you,” Nate says with a smile as Roxie adds.

“I hope we give you a good show,”

The group went their separate ways.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Making it in time and Understandings

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
The crowds cheer as they wait for the tournament to begin. Pop Roxie, Joy, Yancy, Bianca, and Sayuri find some open seats.

“Man this crowd is loud. But I can’t blame them. I feel the same,” Pop Roxie says with a smile and throws some punches in the air.

“Yeah. But I hope everything goes okay,” Yancy says as she worried about Team Plasma coming in and ruining this event.

“You have nothing to fear, there seems to a lot of guards around. Plus Clay really wants this to go through, he must figure that people need something to take their minds off the shrinking and Freezing of Unova,” Joy explains and the others nod before they hear the announcer start to talk.

“WELCOME LADIES AND GENTS TO THE POKEMON WORLD TOURNAMENT! I HOPE YOU ARE READY! IT’S TIME FOR OUR FRIST MATCH! ON THE LEFT IS SOMEONE WHO IS SEARCHING FOR ANSWER! COLRESS!”

The crowd cheers the blonde hair scientist comes from the left and enters the arena.

“He’s here!?,” Sayuri thought at seeing Colress.

“AND ON THE RIGHT IS A CHALLENGER THAT OUR VERY OWN CLAY PICKED OUT! HE DOESN”T SAY MUCH AND GOES BY THE NAME CRIMSON HERO!” The announcer shouts and the crowd cheers.

Pop Roxie and Sayuri both start to smile at hearing the name.

”Do you two know him?” Joy asks as Pop Roxie replies.

“Of course. He’s a true hero.” Sayuri nods in agreement with Pop Roxie.

The challenger known as Crimson Hero comes out and everyone sees what he was wearing. Crimson wore a black top hat with red ribbed silk, white domino mask covers the top of his face, a crimson scarf that covers bottom half of his face, wearing scarlet cape and under that a black suit with a black tie, and black loafers.

The crowd cheers from seeing Crimson and Pop Roxie and Sayuri join in cheering.

“My… what interesting style choice,” Yancy says as she watches the match.

Bianca notice that Crimson’s top hat is now covering his eyes as final gets on stage.

“As a researcher, it is the truth and the ideal way things should be that I seek. The latent power of Pokémon…” Corless begins but Crimson raises his right arm and bends it and puts his hand near the top hat. He puts his index finger on the top of the brim and his thumb under the brim to bring it up so he could see.

“No more words! Let’s have an Honest Battle!” Crimson says in a deep ragged heroic voice.

Corless wonders if he should be happy or annoyed by this.

“ALRIGHT! IT”S TIME FOR THE BATTLE TO BEGIN!”

Crimson and Corless both threw their pokeballs. A Stoutland comes out of Crimson’s pokeball, while a Magneton comes out of Corless’s ball. Stoutland gives out a glare that makes Magneton scared and lowers the attack of the electric steel type pokemon.

“So Stoutland has the ability Intimidate,” Corless says as the blonde takes this in consideration.

“Connery use Work Up!” Crimson yells as the normal type pokemon starts to get rouse and his attack and special attack start to increase.

“Megneton use Thunder Wave.” Corless says as Megneton launches a weak jolt of electricity at Connery. Connery tires to dodge but the electiricity hits the Stoutland’s legs! Connery soon is having trouble moving.

“Poor Connery,” Yancy says as she sees what is happening to the Stoutland.

“Connery return!” Crimson yells as he returns the paralyzed pokemon back to its ball. Corless wonders what pokemon is going to take the next attack.

“Now use Thunder Shock!” Corless shouts as Megneton starts to charge its attack as Crimson throws out his next pokemon. It is a Cinccino.

“Be careful Celia,” Crimson says and the Cinccion nods and gets ready for Megneton’s attack. Megneton shoots out a jolt of electricity into the sky and then the jolt is heading down towards Celia. Celia tries to doge but Thunder Shock is able to hit the normal pokemon. After getting shock Celia gets up and is barely standing.

“This is bad. It doesn’t look like Celia is going to survive the next attack,” Joy says as she watches the match.

The Crowd grows worried and stays in silence waiting for what will happen next. Corless wonders too as Crimson gives out his next order.

“Celia use Bullet Seed. Crimson says as Celia breathes in and then starts to shoot out multiple seeds at Megneton. The first wave hit Megneton and electric steel pokemon screech in pain. The second wave came and hit Megneton again, Corless was surprise to see the Cinccion know Bullet Seed but shakes his head as he remembers that Bullet Seed should probably stop right about now. A third wave went and hit Megneton then a fourth wave hit Megneton and it is a critical hit. Corless became worry as he saw that Megneton is very weak after so many hits from Bullet Seed. Then the final wave of seeds went out and hit Megneton! Megneton slowly went to the ground faints.

The crowd starts to cheer for Crimson’s victory as Corless returns the fainted Megneton back to its ball.

“You put a lot of trust in that Cinccion? Did you really believe that Cinccion would be Megneton?” Corless asks he gets his next pokemon readey.

“Of course! I trust my partners with my life and they trust me their lives. With these bonds gives us true strength!” Crimson shouts in a heroic manner. The crowd to cheers after hearing what Crimson said.

“What a cheesy line,” Joy thought but smiles at Crimson’s bond with his pokemon.

Corless nods after listening to Crimson answerer and throws out his next pokemon. It is Elgyem.

“Celia use sing!” Crimson says and the Cinccion starts to sing a soothing lullaby to Elgyem.

“Elgyem use Psybeam!” Corless says as Elgyem ignores the singing and lets out a peculiar ray at Celia. The beam hits Celia, after trying to stay up Celia but ends up falling and faints.

The crowd on Corles starts to cheer as Crimson returns Celia back to her ball. Crimson under his breath, without any one realizing it whispers to the ball.

“Thank you,”

Afterwards Crimson puts Celia’s ball back onto his belt and pulls out his third pokeball. Crimson then throws the ball to revel his final team member, a Watchog.

“Gaze use Confuse Ray,” Crimson says at the Watchog exposes a sinister ray from its eyes towards Elgyem. Elgyem starts to feel confuse and tries to stay focus.

“Elgyem use Psybeam once more!” Corless says as he hopes that Elgyem can get in an attack. Luckily for Corless Elgyem is able to shoot out another Psybeam and it hits the Watchog. Gaze is still able to stand after the attack.

“Gaze use Bite,” Crimson says and the Watchog runs up to the Psychic and attacks it by biting it and running back to its battle position.

“Usy Psybeam again,” Corless says as Elgyem tries to attack but hurt itself instead. In the next turn Gaze bites again and finishes off Elgyem.

The crowd cheers as Corless reaches for his final pokemon. Corless throws the pokeball and it’s a Klink.

“Gaze use Confuse Ray again,” Crimson says as the Watchog exposes another Sinister ray from its eyes to Klink. Klink gets hit and is now Confuse.

“Klink use Thunder Shock!” Corless says as the Gear Pokemon starts to charge electricity. A jolt of electricity shoots from Kink into the sky. The jolt then quickly falls to the earth and hits Gaze. Gaze falls over after the attack is finish. The Crowd cheers again, as Crimson put Gaze back to his ball.

“Thank you for your hard work,” Crimson whispers to Gaze’s ball with out any hearing him. Crimson then puts Gaze’s ball back and pull out his final pokeball. Crimson throws the ball and Connery comes out of the ball. Connery is still paralyze from what happen eailer.

The crowd cheer again as this is the final battle.

“Connery use Work up!” Crimson says as Connery to rise his Atttack and Speacial Attack.

“Klink use Thunder Shock!” Corless says as the gear pokemon is able to pull through the confusion and attacks with a jolt of electricity. The attack hits Connery but the normal pokemon is still able to stand tall.

“Connery use Bite,” Crimson says and despite being paralyzed the Stoutland goes up to Klink and bites the gear pokemon. Klink a bit of Damage from the attack as Connery went back to it’s corner.

“Klink use Thunder Shock! Corless yells as Klink tries to attack. But in the end Klink hurts itself in confusion.

The crowd starts to cheer loudly as it seems the next attack will finish this battle Crimon and Corless both look at each and understood that the next attack will finish this.

“Connery use Bite!” Crimson says as the Stoutlands charges at Klink.

“Klink use Thunder shock!” Corless says as Klink starts to charge for its attack. Klink shoots out the jolt of electricity up in the air. Just as Connery bites into Klink, the jolt of electricity lands on Connery. The entire arena is now covered in smoke.

The Winner is...
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: 1st match Hero vs Mad Researcher

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Everyone watching the battle wonder who won, Crimson had a smile under his mask as he spoke.

“Looks like you won,”

The crowd is shock to hear Crimson say that, even Colress is surprise to hear his opponent say this. After the smoke clears, Klink is still floating in the air as Connery lies on the ground.

“WOW! What a match! Looks like Colress is moving on to the next round as Crimson is knocked out of the tournament!” The announcer shouts as the crowd cheers for Colress.

Crimson and Colress go up to where their pokemon are. Crimson returns Connery back to his ball.

“Thank you for the good fight,” Crimson whispers to Connery as the costume man puts Connery’s ball back on his belt.

“Before you leave, can you answerer this question for me? Do you think bonds bring out a pokemon’s strength?” Colress asks Crimson, the costume man answers the question.

”I think you answerer that question with that last attack,”

Colress is a bit shock to hear that answerer but then starts to chuckle. Sayuri is shock to hear Colress chuckle in a good manner.

“I suppose I did put my trust in Klink during that final move,” Colress says as he looks over to Klink with a small grin on his face. Klink sees this and smiles and goes over to his trainer and starts to make happy sounds. Colress nods as he returns Klink back to its ball.

Crimson and Colress turn around walk off the arena, Colress took a quick look at Crimson before his sight on the exit of the arena.

“Crimson….. I hope we are able to fight again,” Colress thought as he walks through the exit. Crimson also went the exit at the same time.

“Okay. We’ll take a little break to clean up the arena! The next match will begin in thirty minutes!” The announcer yells. Pop Roxie and Sayuri were sad that Crismon lost but were happy that Crimson is a good sport.

Bianca was in deep thought through out the match. Bianca then pulls out a pokeball and gets her Stoutland out.

“Bianica where are you going?” Joy asks as the tiny blonde gets on the normal type pokemon.

“I just need to check up on something. I’ll be right back,” Bianica replies and whispers into Stoutland’s ear. The Stoutland nods and starts to move.

“I wonder what is that Bianica wants to check up on?” Joy thought.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Mad Researcher wins and gains new data

choices: Go to the second match. Rosa vs Roxie!
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Bianca rode on Stoutland through the hallways of the PWT building. The tiny blonde hopes to find the person she is looking for. Luckily for Bianca she finds the resting room for Crimson. With Stoutland’s help, the tiny woman is able to reach the nod of the door and opens it a little. Carefuly Bianca and Stoutland look through the opening of the door. Bianca is surprise to see that Cheren is in the room and also that Crimson did not have his top hat, the white domino mask is on a desk in front and the crimson scarf is under his chin. Bianca also notices that the pokemon that Crimson used during the fight are out of their balls and they are fully healed.

“I’m sorry that you lost. These guys are still getting use battling,” Cheren says to the unmask Crimson. Crimson shakes his head and bends over to the three pokemon infront of him.

“They did great with a trainer they barely knew,” The unmask Crimson says in a calm sounding voice instead of his deep ragged heroic voice.

“That’s just like you. It feels like three years ago,” Cheren says with a warm smile.

Many thoughts went though Bianca’s mind as she watch the scene. Memories of first journey come into head. Bianca slowly realizes who Crimson is. Bianca slowly opens her mouth and asks.

“Touya?”

The unmask Crimson and Cheren heard Bianca and both turn around to see the tiny Bianca on her Stoutland. Bianca smiles as she sees that Crimson is in fact her friend Touya.

Touya is an old friend. Touya had come to Nuvema Town to stay for the year since his parent’s were always traveling around because of their jobs. Touko’s parents took him in since Touya’s family and Touko’s family are close friends. Touko parents decided that Touya would go on a pokemon journey along with Touko, Cheren and I. During that year Touya went on a journey and during it Touko and he became the hero’s of ideals. But sadly Touya had to leave when his year in Unova end. Though Touya always sent letters to her and his other friends it’s nice to see him person.

Bianca get a good look of Touya notice that his eyes still peeked out of the fringe of his hair, his normal facial expression make him look like he is set in half-glare. Touya even still retained his look of a wild guy with a bad attitude.

She saw the shock expression on Touya and Cheren’s faces. Touya is able return back to his normal look as Cheren says.

“Bianca! Quick get inside before any one finds out who Crimson is,”

Bianca nods as Touya opens the door a little bit while still standing behind it. Bianca and Stoutland quickly come in and Touya shouts the door.

When Bianca and Stoutland got comfy in the room, the tiny lady felt strange as she has to look up at Touya.

“So you got shrunk as well. Was it the same guy who shrunk Virbank’s gym leader?” Cheren asks and stops Bianca’s thought of looking at the giant Touya.

“Yes. I managed to get away though he still got me,” Bianca says with a sad expression on her face.

“I’m glad that you’re safe,” Touya says as he looks at the tiny women with a warm smile. Bianca smiles at the brown hair giant. Bianca thought that Touya always knew what to say to cheer someone up.

“Thanks Touya. But if I could ask, why did you wear those clothes?” Bianca asks her old friend.

“I can explain that one,” Cheren replies for Touya.

”It all started when…..

__

It was two days ago and Cheren is in Driftveil City because Clay had just call him for something. It is in the middle of the night and Cheren is starting to irritated from waiting for Clay.

“What does he want to talk about even though he could have just said it during our call,” Cheren though as he tries to stay calm while he stands around Clay’s mansion door. Cheren then hears a bird up in the sky, Cheren looks up to see a Braviary flying in the sky and someone is riding it. Cheren is surprise to see someone flying in the middle of the night and watches the Braviary on the ground. Cheren goes where the person and Braviary are to see who they are.

“This could be a Team Plasma grunt. I better be careful,” Cheren though as he holds on a pokeball. When the normal type gym leader gets a better look of the pair he knows the person who rode Braviary.

“Touya!” Cheren says after getting a better look of the person who rode Braviay. It is indeed Touya. Touya did not have his hat on, he still had his blue hood from two years ago on and wore a shirt under the jacket, black pants and the same boots that he wore two years ago along with the same bag.

“It’s been awhile since I last saw you,” Cheren says as he was happy to see his friend again after so long. Touya nods as the two heard a door open, the two young men turn to see Clay standing near his door steps. Clay has a surprise look on his face to see Touya and Cheren standing there.

“Why are just standing here for you. Come on in,” Clay says as Touya and Cheren nod and the two go inside Clay’s mansion. Touya and Cheren both sit down on a couch. Clay let Touya to take out his pokemon. Touya has a Samurott named Sakata, a Braviay named Brave, a Eelektross named Eelek, a Lilligant named Lily, a Scrafty named Scraf, and a Reuniclus named Reu. Touya’s team took a rest along side Clay’s team.

“I’m surprise to see you back here. What brought you back?” Clay asks Touya.

“I heard rumors about Plasma. And that Unova is starting to freeze,” Touya explains in serious manner.

“So you haven’t heard about the shrinking device?” Cheren asks as Touya

Touya just looks at Cheren with a confuse look on his face. From this Cheren concludes that Touya didn’t of it.

“We’ll talk about that later. The reason I called you here Cheren is for you to take part in the Pokemon World Tournament,” Clay says as Cheren looks at Clay.

“I’m not doing it Clay. Besides we should be thinking of a way to beat Team Plasma,” Cheren says.

“I know that. But the people of Unova need some cheering up. I think this Tourment will take their minds off the shrinking and the freezing of Unova,” Clay replies to Cheren.

Clay and Cheren start to picker until Touya says nonchalantly.

“I’ll sign up for the tournament and Cheren can go around and look for Team Plasma”

Clay and Cheren look Touya and then both agreed.

”That sounds good but we don’t want you out in the open. It would be too dangerous. Plus we don’t want anyone to get in your way,” Cheren says his worries about the plan. Even if the majority people believed that there is just one hero ideals, most would pick Touko. But there seem be some to think that Touya is the only hero and some think that both of them are heroes of ideals or some think neither of them are.

“That could be problem… I think I have a solution,” Clay says as he gets up and goes into a different room. Touya and Cheren wait for Clay to come back with a box.

“I bought out some old movie studio. Luckly they had some costumes and I think this will fit ya real well,” Clay says as he pulls out the costume and shows it them.

“Hey wait isn’t that from that old movie Crimson Hero?” Cheren asks as Clay nods.

”Yep. I got lucky and found this beauty in storage. I’m surprise that no one tried to take and make a quick buck off it,” Clay says as he thought the Crimson Hero was quite good despite the hamness of it.

“Do you think that Touya can really fool people?” Cheren asks as Touya gets up. Clay gives Touya the top hat, white domino mask and crimson scarf. Touya puts them on and says in a deep ragged heroic voice.

“Beware evil doers the Crimson Hero will bring justice to all those hurt others!”

Clay and Cheren stare at Touya and were surprise at how much he sound liked the man who played Crimson in the movie. They knew they could go with this plan.

__

“That’s how it went. Then Touya and I switch pokemon before he went against that Corless person. But it looks like Touya didn’t last long,” Cheren explains as Bianca nods.

“So you have your team back then?” Bianca asks Touya and Touya nods.

”Since you lost, why not join me in guarding and look for Plasma the rest of the Tournament? Keep your costume on as well not to attract any attention,” Cheren says as Touya nods with the plan.

“What do you plan to do Bianca?” Cheren asks the tiny women.

”I would like to join you two on this job,” Bianca says with determine eyes. Cheren is about to inject but Touya says.

“Alright. The more the merrier as they say,”

Cheren looks at Touya and back to Bianca.

”Okay. So Bianca who are going with?” Cheren asks ready for either answerer.

“I’ll go with Touya,” Bianca replies as Cheren nods.

“Okay. I’ll get going now. Be careful out there you two,” Cheren says as he leaves.
