Soon it was just Touya and Bianica in the room. Bianica felt nervous about alone with Touya and tries to think of something to say.

”So do you know where Touko is?” Bianica asks and Touya shakes his head. In truth Touya hasn’t heard from Touko for about two months.

“Okay. By the way how did you change your voice back then?”

Touya takes a breath and opens his mouth.

”You would be amazed what you can learn when you travel the world,”

Bianica is shock to hear her voice to come out of Touya’s mouth. She wonders what else Touya learned during the last two years.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Meeting an Old friend under the Crimson mask

choices: Back to Touya and Bianca or others.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
"NOW FOR THE SECOND MATCH-UP! THE TOXIC LADY HERSELF! ROXIE!!" cried the announcer. People cheered, none louder than Pop Roxie, as she was about to come out. Some gasps and cries of shock when she was carried out on a plate. She was set down as the camera zoomed in closely.

"Yeah! Time for a good show!" she yelled.

"AND NOW FOR HER CHALLENGER, A YOUNG WOMAN WHO JUST STARTED OUT NOT TO LONG AGO! THE AMAZING ROSA!!!!" cried the announcer. Cheers from her friends were among the loudest as she too was carried out.

-----

Corless watched both with interest. Just how would these tiny trainers handle themselves? It would be most stimulating data.

-----

Roxie smiled at Rosa. "Get ready! I'm gonna knock some sense outta ya!" Roxie said with a smile.

"Don't think this will be easy," Rosa said as she tossed out a tiny ball. Dewott glared at his opponent. Koffing was sent out by Roxie.

"BEGIN" called the announcer.

"Koffing! Smog!" Roxie called out.

"Dodge and use Scary face!" Rosa replied. Dewott jumped to the side and glared fiercly. Koffing shuddered. "Now Faint Attack!"

"Smokescreen Koff!" Roxie called out but it was too late. Dewott rushed in and seemed to vanish. Roxie blinked in confusion when her Koffing was hit. His smokescreen missed completely. How did happen? Unless . . .

Roxie lifted her arm up. "Return Koffing! Go Whirlipede!" Roxie called as the cylindrical bug sat there. It was struck by another Faint Attack. The bug growled in pain but Dewott clenched his arm as he didn't look good.

"No," Rosa whispered. Not only was he poisoned but if Roxie saw through the disguise . . . "Return! Go Pansear!"

"Bug bite!" Roxie yelled before the switch happened. But Whirlipede missed the water type and hit the fire monkey. The damage was negligible.

"Flame Burst!" Rosa said. The powerful fire blast got a critical hit.

"Rollout!" Roxie called, as she hoped this would work. Her pokemon spun and raced at Pansear but the monkey jumped out of the way.

"Flame burst!" Rosa said. The blast hit and Whirlipede fainted. Roxie glared.

"Go! Mandibuzz!" Roxie yelled. The buzzard came out and glared at her opponent. "Use Pluck!" The bird soared and swooped down.

"Yawn!" Rosa yelled. Mandibuzz got drowsy but got a critical hit too. Pansear cried out in pain and flew back.

"Use it again!" Roxie called. Before Pansear was ready, it got hit and fainted. Mandibuzz landed and put her head under her wings. She was snoring.

Rosa returned Pansear and sent out Dewott once more. Rosa returned Mandibuzz and sent out Koffing.

"This seems familiar," Rosa said. Roxie looked over Dewott but couldn't tell if it was poisoned now or not.

"Let's go," Roxie said. "Use sludge!"

"Dodge and use Razor Shell!" Rosa said. The shell flew hard and fast, knocking out Koffing. Roxie growled and sent Mandibuzz back out. She continued to sleep. "Roxie! Do you concede?"

"What? You think I can't win?" Roxie asked in a confident tone. In truth she was worried.

"I don't want to hurt your Pokémon more than needed," Rosa said. Roxie looked at her sleeping friend. Who knew if she could wake up in time?

-----

Corless watched with interest. "Interesting dilemma," he muttered.

-----

"Tell me Sayuri, what would you do?" Joy asked. Sayuri looked over at the large Joy.

"I don't know. I think . . . I think since this is just for fun right now, I would retire," Sayuri said. "I wouldn't want my Ducklett to be injured in this situation," Joy nodded.

---

Roxie clenched her hands.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Rosa Vs. Roxie

choices: Follow Touya and Bianca or others talking.
Skip to Hugh's match.  Who will he face?
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
"Sorry guys," Roxie said softly. She drew in a deep breath and as loud as she could yelled, "I retire!" There were awes and applause from around her as she returned Mandibuzz to her ball. Rosa took back Dewott.

"IN A STUNNING DEVELOPMENT! ROXIE WITHDRAWS!" the announcer said. "ROSA ADVANCES TO THE SEMIFINALS!" Both tiny women went to their carriers and were picked up.

--------

"Blast," Pop Roxie said.

"She did her best. Luck sometimes has a role to play in battles," Joy said.

"I know. I just was hoping she would win," Pop Roxie said.

"It would have been a tough battle next time too. That first victor Corless uses steel and psychic types. Roxie's team wouldn't do well against them." Joy said. Sayuri looked down at Corless' name.

"That's true. If she were to use her other Pokémon, she might have had a chance," Pop said.

"Hugh should be up next and then Nate," Joy said as she looked at the quiet Sayuri. "Is something wrong?"

"Oh, I'm just thinking about the one who lost to Corless." Sayuri said.

"They kind of remind me of Gli-team, a father-daughter pair in Johto who dress up like Gligars and fight crime," Yancy said.

----

Nate was waiting for the pair of ladies on his Servine. "It was a good match. Nice work," he said. Both smiled.

"Where's Hugh?" Rosa asked.

"He's getting his head in the game," Nate said. "Should make an interesting match." Both nodded as they got on and were carried to the healing station.

"You used your new buddy well," Roxie said. "It was Zoura in that first battle, wasn't it?" Rosa smiled.

"That would be telling," Rosa said with a laugh.

"How did it feel using Mandibuzz?" Nate asked.

"Good. She's pretty strong. If it wasn't for being put to sleep, I would have won," Roxie said with her confidence.

"I'm not so sure about that," Rosa replied in the same tone.

----

"So, where were you before this?" Bianca asked.

"In Hoenn. Touko wanted to go to Johto and I wanted to head elsewhere, so we split up," Touya said.

"You two travelled a lot together?" Bianca asked.

"Yeah, but we never got close," Touya said.

"What? What do you mean?" Bianca asked.

"We found we were better as friends or siblings. She's like a sister I never had," Touya said.. Bianca smiled.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Know When To Fold Em

choices: Skip to the second of round of the tourments. Rosa vs Corless!
Switch over Joy and the others.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Bianca continues to follow Touya on her Stoutland. The tiny women kept on taking glances at her giant friend.

“It’s great that Touya is back, it’s been so long since we’ve talked in person.” The tiny blonde thought with a smile but soon the smile turn into a frown.

“But I wish he could visit when there no trouble in Unova. He always gets drag into conflict. I wish he would have a nice relaxing trip when he visits Unova,”

Touya turns his head to see that the tiny blonde has some troubling thoughts on her mind.

“If you need to talk, I’m here,”

Bianca snaps out of her thoughts when she heard those words and looks up at the giant. Even with his face cover up, she could still sense Touya’s concern for her.

“No that’s alright. But thank you anyway Touya, you really know how to cheer me up,” Bianca says with a bright smile on her face.

Touya nods and smiles under his disguised and could feel Bianca’s appreciation.

“You are always nice to be Touya. It brings back memories of when we first started our journey.” Bianca thought as she continues to talk with Touya.

____________________________

Three years ago

Bianca runs out of her house as fast as she could. Today was the day she would start her Poke’mon journey It a nice sunny day in spring as she ran to her best friend Touko’s house. The blond greets Touko’s mother as she runs up the stairs. She then gets to Touko’s door and opens it.

“Sorry that I’m a little late Touko. Sorry Cheren. Sorry……” Bianca stops and sees there is another person in the room. The extra person is a young man with brown hair that wears a red/white hat that has a black poke’ball in the center of it, a light blue with some dark blue near the top and near the hands and it has a hoodie, a black shirt under the jacket, black pants, and shoes that were mostly red with some black and white sole. But what really got Bianca’s attention is how the young man’s brown eyes look like they were giving her glare.

“About time you showed up,” Cheren says as he cleans his glasses.

“Cut her some slack. Morning Bianca,” Touko beams with a smile on her face.

“Morning Touko. Um who is this?” The blonde asks as she glances at the extra person in the room.

“Oh him. That’s Touya he’s the son of my parents best friends. He’s staying here in Unova for a year since his parents are to busy working. So parents deiced that he should go on Pokemon journey with us, Also he doesn’t really talk much,” Touko explains as the blond looks at Touya.

Bianca wonders what to say until she saw Touya raise his arm wanting a hand shake and says.

“Nice to meet you,”

Bianca smiles at and shakes Touya’s hand with her own hand. Touya’s face remains neutral though out the process.

“He seems nice. But his expression didn’t really change much,” Bianca thought as the stop their hand shake

“With introductions done let’s pick our Pokemon. Why don’t you go first,” Cheren says as he looks at Touko.

“Yeah. Since it was delved here you should get first pick,” Bianca adds with a smile.

“Alright, Thanks,” Touko says with a smile as she opens the box. There are four balls in the box.

“One for each of us,” Touko smiles as she picks her starter she then turn around to face Touya.

“Hey why don’t you go next? Is everyone fine with that?”

“I’m fine with it,” Cheren says as he waits to get his pokemon.

“That’s alright. Go ahead Touya,” Bianca says with a smile.

Touya nods and goes over to the box. Touya looks at the pokemon for a couple of seconds and picks his starter. The starter that Touya picks is the pokemon Oshawott.

Cheren and Bianca then pick their pokemon, after getting hers Bianca then says.

“Everyone has chosen a Pokemon! ...So that's that! Hey, I know! Let's have a Pokemon battle!"

“Alright,” Cheren says as he gets readey to battle.

The group then had their Pokemon battle. Bianca took notice that Touya spoke clearly as he gave out his orders and notice a little spark in his eyes.

After their battles Touko’s room became a mess. Luckily Touko’s mother wasn’t mad as she said she would clean up the mess.

“Well, um... We can clean up..." Bianca starts and then remembers something.
"Oh! Wait! I've gotta go home first. Thanks for having us over!" Bianca says as she left Touko’s house.

Bianca then went to her home to tell her parents the good news. The blond enter her home and told her parents the news.

“You can’t be a Pokemon trainer! You don’t know how dangerous the world is,” Her father says as he looks at his daughter.

“But, I'm... I'm a good Trainer who got a Pokémon and everything! I can totally go on an adventure!” Bianca yells as she runs out the door with some tears going down her cheeks.

Bianca stops in tracks when she sees that Touya is waiting for her outside her house. Touya notice that Bianca is crying a bit. Bianca sees that Touya notice and wipes her face.

“Oh... It's OK. ...It's fine! I'll be waiting for you in front of the lab, OK?” Bianca says as to avoid talking about what happen in her home. Bianca starts to leave but hers a voice.

“If you need to talk, I’m here,”
Bianca turns her head to see that those words came from Touya. Bianca smiles and can feel Touya’s concern for her.

“Thank you. I think I’ll take you up on that offer one day,” Bianca says with a smile as Touya nods.

“Oh we better get going,” Bianca adds and soon the two left Bianca’s home.

_______________________

“That was the start of our friendship together. You helped me out a lot during that one year. And I guess that’s why I started to fall for you,” Bianca thought as the two continue their look out duty.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Small talk and Memory of first meetings

choices: Rosa and Corless continue their battle.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Rosa stepped onto the plate once more. Her carrier smiled. "I know you can win this," he said. "Good luck." Rosa nodded.

"Thanks," she said with a smile. She felt the plate shift and raise up. She was taken on the path when the wave of cries for the tiny trainer hit her hard. People generally liked underdogs and there were few things more like an underdog than a shrunken human against the world.

Her opponent walked out with a cool air about himself. His eyes focused and intense. Rosa was set down.

"I have been looking forward to this. Your determination under these circumstances is amazing," Colress said. Rosa nodded.

"Thank you," Rosa said. She drew a ball and tossed it. Dewott appeared as a magneton came from Colress.

"Dewott, use Taunt," Rosa called out. Dewott pulled down an eye and stuck his tongue out,

"Thunder wave!" Colress called but Magneton made an angry noise and refused. "Clever."

"Thanks. Faint attack!" Rosa said. Dewott raced close and vanished.

"Thundershock!" Corless said. Magneton was hit but didn't seem too bothered by it. It beeped again and blasted Dewott with a bolt of electricity. Dewott screamed and shimmered before revealing Zoura.

The dark type glared at steel-electric type.

"Jig is up. Return!" Rosa said. She grabbed another ball and tossed it.

"Mirror shot!" Corless called out. Pansear appeared and took the hit. He rubbed his eyes and refocused them.

"Flame burst!" Rosa yelled. Pansear roared and fired.

"Thundershock!" Colress called back. The blast of fire flew at the opponent but missed by inches.

"What?" Rosa called out.

"Mirror Shot can decrease a Pokemon's accuracy," Colress said. "Now Thundershock again!"

"Flame burst!" Rosa replied.

-----

Nate watched the screen. "Come on Rosa. You can win this," he whispered.

------

Sayuri sat near Yancy. She wanted to tell her friends about that man but she was scared. "Come on Rosa. don't lose to him," she said.

"Go Rosa!" Yancy called out. Rosa's friends and fans cheered as the blast hit Magneton. "Yes!"
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: A Heroine against the Mysterious Scientist

choices: Back to how Grant is doing
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
“Go Rosa! You can do it!” Roxie shouts as the tiny rock girl jumps up and down. Nate smiles at seeing Roxie cheering for Rosa and turns around to see if Hugh is doing the same thing. Hugh is watching the battle but something is trouble the young man.

Nate deices to go over to Hugh, Nate told his Serine to go over to Hugh as two went over to their haft size friend.

“Hey what’s wrong Hugh? I thought you would be cheering for Rosa,” Nate says as the Servine that Nate is riding went next to him.

“Of course I want to her to win but I am thinking about something else,” Hugh replies as Nate notices that Hugh’s face is a bit red. Nate figures out what Hugh is thinking about and soon a teasing smile is on the five inch trainer.

“You like Rosa don’t you,”

Hugh blush at Nate’s statement, Nate starts to chuckle at his friend embarrassment. Hugh soon became annoyed at his friends chuckling.

“Yes I do. And she confess she liked me on the Ferris Wheel,”

Nate stop chuckling and wasn’t really surprise since Rosa seems to be the type to confess first.

“So what did you say?”

“Um… I said Oh like that. Then we didn’t really talk about it afterwards,”

There is silence between the two as Nate puts his hand on his face.

“That’s what you did. You didn’t even say how you felt,” Nate says as he pulls his hand from his head.

“She just sprung it up. I didn’t know what to say, besides it’s not like you have anything to talk about. You have Roxie and Yancy who want to be with you.

It was Nate’s turn to blush as Hugh had a smile on his face from being correct.

“How did you know?”

“Come on everyone can see those two really like you. Even me,”

Nate sighs as he couldn’t even believe that even Hugh even knew about Yancy and Roxie’s feelings for him.


“Well I do I have a confession too. Roxie and Yancy told me that they both like me,”

“Wow what did you say?”

Nate remains silent as Hugh just sighs.

“Do you know who you like?” Hugh asks to break the silence.

“I like them both the same. I don’t really know if I could choose just one of them. But that’s not fair to their feelings,” Nate replies.

“Well we just need to figure out how we feel then we can do we want. You know some guys would kill to have to be your position,” Hugh says with a smile.
“Same to you,” Nate says with a smile.

“Hey what are you two talking about?”

Nate and Hugh turn their heads to see that Roxie is looking at them.

“It’s just guy talk,” Hugh says with a smile and Nate adds.

“Yep,”

Roxie just stairs at the two and just sighs and looks back at the battle.

“I wonder what they were talking about?” Roxie thought as she watches the battle.

____________________________________________________________________________ __________________


“I’ll be right back. I need to use the rest room,” Pop Roxie says as he gets up and leaves for the rest rooms.

“Don’t get lost,” Joy says as she looks back at the battle. The haft size nuse smiles as she watches the battle but notice that Sayuri is trouble.

“GO! Rosa!” Yancy yells with all her might

“YEAH! GO ROSA!” Sayrui yells as well.

Joy watch and figure she will ask Sayuri after the battle.

____________________________________________________________________________ __________________

Touya and Bianca while riding Stoutland continues to walk together, Bianca continue to talk to Touya about her work and what she’s been doing recently.

“Say Touya dose that Scientist seem familiar to you?” Bianca asks as she knew that Touya seem to be a bigger reader.

Touya thought for a moment and replies.

“I think he I read an article about his research once,”

“Yeah. I think it was about the bonds between Humans and Pokemon. That must be the reason why he’s in Unova right now. But something doesn’t seem right. I get a weird feeling from him,” Bianca explains her feelings on the matter.

Touya nods as he felt that there was more to Colress but felt in the end he only wanted to test bonds. But Bianca’s hunch feels right.

“Okay, we have to keep an eye on him from now on,” Bianca says with a smile as the tiny woman is happy that Touya is on her side.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Talks about feelings and an Hunch

choices: Stay with Pop Roxie or Touya and Bianca.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Rosa groaned in frustration as her Pansear's attack missed once more. The fire monkey screamed and collapsed as thundershock struck him.

"Return," Rosa said softly. The red beam hit and returned the pokemon. "Sorry buddy. I hoped you could have one." She reached back and gripped her remaining balls. Which to pick?

Zoura was a little injured but still strong. Dewott would not do well against this electric/steep Pokemon. She would need to trust her Zorua.

Grabbing that ball, she launched her comrade and saw Dewott appear. Corless glared and considered his options.

"Hmm. Is it the real thing?" he asked.

"You won't find out!" Rosa yelled, "Now fury swipes!" Dewott charged forward and struck magneton a few times.

"Mirror Shot!" Corless countered. Magneton glowed and fired but missed.

"Fury Swipes again!" Rosa said. If she could get enough little hits in, she might have a chance.

---------

Grant pocketed the device, He walked out of his room and went toward the galley. as he came to a corner, he stopped. A man in white clothes was talking with the commander.

"Sir, we are prepared for the attack. A quick strike to steal some and then back here," the commander said. The Shadow Triad member nodded.

"Good. Now, in regards to the device. We can't let it stay with that man once the attack is done," the Triad member said.

"Agreed. I don't think much of Grant in general. I don't want him having this level of power. Only Lord Ghetsis should have it," commander said.

"If he doesn't relinquish the device, injure him. I don't care how badly," the Triad said. The commander nodded.

"It will be done," he said.

Grant backed up and quietly moved back to his room.

They would hurt him? That man, he was his friend! Or so Grant thought. If . . . If he wasn't wanted here, he should get out. He could take a pokemon they stole for transport. Maybe one that could use Fly or Surf . . . but they were guarded now. And with things so focused this raid . . maybe when that went down he could make his move. Yes. Then would be best.

Now to gather some things for the trip.

------

Pop Roxie looked about as he wet to the rest room. The place sure was popular but something seemed off. Pople had snacks but weren't eating. They had drinks they weren't drinking. They laughed and looked happy but their smiles were fake.

His gut had a bad feeling. It was like this before he found his tiny Roxie.

Could these guys be Plasma?
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Back to the battle

choices: Switch back to Nate and the others.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Pop Roxie didn’t have much time to think as his stomach starts to trouble him. Pop Roxie then starts to run for the bath room.

The crowd watches the older man running off with hatred in their eyes. The crowd then turns their heads back to battle and began to fake cheer. The crowd waits for the signal to commence their plan.

____________________________________________________________

Touya and Bianca while riding Stoutland continue to walk around in the same hallway. Luckily the two didn’t find anything suspicious for the last hour. Right now they were next to the rest rooms.

“I’m glad that everthing is still peaceful,” Bianca thought as she saw one of the rest room doors open. The two notice it is Pop Roxie.

“Phew. I fell great. Time to get back to-“ Pop Roxie begins as he turns around but sees the costume hero and the tiny assistant of the professor on her Stoutland.

“Oh Crimsons how are you doing buddy? I saw your match early today, I’m sorry you lost but you really show how heroic you are,” Pop Roxie starts to chuckle as he puts his arm around Touya and pats him on the back.

“Touya meet Pop Roxie already? Pop Roxie seems quite attach to him to. People always seem to gravitate towards Touya,” Bianca thought as she watches Rop Roxie to continue to pat Touya’s back.

“Oh Bianca so is where you went, wanted to get his autograph didn’t you,” Pop Roxie says with a smile.

“Y-yes. That’s what I did,” Bianca replies with a smile. There wasn’t really a need to tell Pop Roxie everything just yet.

“Say Crimson this might seem strange but do you mind if I could try out your costume?” Pop Roxie says as he claps his hands together waiting for answer.

“I don’t think it’s a good time to ask that question Pop Roxie,” Bianca says as the tiny woman is afraid for Touya’s safety.


“Come on. Pretty please?” Pop Roxie once more.

Touya stood in thought for a minute and found his answer.


“Okay. Let’s go back to room so you can try it on,”

Pop Roxie shakes hands.

“Thank you very much. I knew you were a good spirt when I first meet you,”

“If it’s okay with Crimson, then it’s okay with me,” Bianca says with a smile. She worried that something might go wrong but shook that feeling off and the three went back to Crimson’s room.

_________________________________________

Joy is surprise at how well Rosa is doing against Colress and notice that Sayuri’s mood has improve. Joy figures that Sayuri and Colress must have known each other. But why do they know each other and why would Sayuri be afraid of him.

“GO ROSA!” Yancy and Sayuri yell as loud as they could.

_______________________________________________

Touya, Bianca and Pop Roxie made it back to Touya’s room.

“Um Bianca do you mind if you stay out here?” Pop Roxie asks with a faint blush on his face.

“Okay. But you have to not look at Crimson while he’s changing. Crimson is a shy person,” Bianca explains.

“Okay. I wouldn’t look at him,” Pop Roxie says as the men enter the room. Bianca kept watch outside.

Inside the room the two go to the side to take off their clothes. Touya made sure to get his pokemon out first and put their balls on a near table. While Changing Pop Roxie saw from the corner of his eye that Crimson has a scar on the right of his stomach. Pop Roxie didn’t say anything but thought.

“What did you do to get something like that?”

Touya still wearing the head parts of the costume as well as blue boxers walks over to Pop Roxie and hands him the rest of the Clothes.

“Oh thank you. Here you can try on my clothes; they might look good on you,” Pop Roxie says with a smile He switches clothes.

Touya nodes as he starts to put on Pop Roxie’s Sailor Uniform. The Finish changing as Pop Roxie looks into a mirror.

“I don’t have the whole costume on. But still good with this on,” Pop Roxie says as does heroic poses.
Touya smiles at seeing Pop Roxie enjoying being the costume figure he might as give him the rest of it. While Pop Roixe continue to pose, Touya took off the head parts of the costume and put Pop Roxie’s sailor hat on and made sure the hat is covering his face.


“I think it would better with the complete collection.” Touya says as he hands the rest of the costume to Pop Roxie. Pop Roxie is stun but smiles.

“Thank you very much. This means a lot to me, “

Touya nods as Pop Roxie finishes the costume. Pop Roxie takes a breath and says in most heroic voice.

“No more words! Let’s have an Honest Battle!”

Pop Roxie then did a pose and Touya claps for him.

“You’re too kind,” Pop Roxie says as he blushes under the mask.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Qustions and Reliving a Old Dream

choices: The battle is interupted by multiple smoke bombs and panic!
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Nate watched with wide eyes but despite "Dewott"'s attack, he was struck by a thunder shock and Zorua appeared. The black fox growled but froze up. "Crud. He's paralyzed," Hugh said. "I don't think Rosa will win."

"Neither do I," Nate said softly. Corless's magneton fired another thunder shock and Zorua struck again with Fury Swipes. Magneton held firm and blasted once more.

Zorua fell to the ground, whining softly. "No! Zorua!" Rosa said. She grimaced as she returned him. She considered her remaining Pokemon, the real Dewott, wouldn't last long against that Magneton.

"Well, what will you choose now?" Corless asked in a neutral tone.

"I give up," Rosa called out.

"Wisest choice," Corless said.

"AND THERE WE HAVE IT. OUR FIRST SEMI-FINAL MATCH DECIDED BY ROSA WITHDRAWING!" thee announcer called.

Hugh looked to the tiny Nate. "Our time now." he said.

"Yeah. Best of luck," Nate said.

----------

Touya put on Gliscor mask from his pack. "You certainly have a lot of those," Bianca said.

"I don't want to be recognized," he replied.

"So, where did you get this one?" Bianca asked.

"A nice girl in Johto. She said her father was done using it for the time being," Touya said.

"A girl?" Bianca asked with some pouting.

"She is just a friend, not like how you and I are friends," Touya said. Bianca smiled.

"Good," she said.

---------

Grant filled his pack with food and a fresh pair of clothes. He moved to the armory of the ship where the stolen pokemon lay. They were divided up by type and he considered his options. "Surfing on the open seas is hard. I don't know how long I could be out there," he muttered before looking at the Flying types.

He found a Tranquil someone caught a few years ago and was beaten into submitting to their new master. It would be perfect for him. He slipped the ball into his pocket and went back to his room.

Now to wait until the attack.

---------

Nate was carried out to face Hugh. His friend smiled with some eagerness at this chance to face him. They had seen the other fight often and could guess at the other's strategy.

It would make for a good match-up.

"Come on Nate!" Yancy called out.

"You can win!" Roxie called out.

"Go Hugh!" Rosa said. Joy smiled.

"It sure is nice to see such a good fight," she said, looking at Sayuri. "are you feeling well?"

"Fine. Just fine," Sayuri said as she felt conflicted. What should she do? The thought plagued her mind.

choices: Stick with Nate and the others on the Plasma Frigate
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Pop Roxie stop posing as he notices the clock in the room.

“Oh shoot I have to get going!” Pop Roxie says as he starts to head out the door.

“W-wait Pop-“ Bianca starts but it is too late as Pop Roxie went out the door, leaving just Bianca and Touya in the room.

“This is bad, we need to get that costume back from Pop Roxie,”

Touya nods as picks up his poke’balls from the table and the two go out the door and chase after Pop Roxie

-----------

Before Nate and Hugh could even begin their battle, some people in the crowd drew out small metal balls from their pockets. They then threw the metal balls on the ground and soon large amount of smoke comes out of the balls and soon covers the room.

“What’s going on?” An innocent asks as they try to clear the area in front of them.

The same people who threw the smoke bombs remove their disguise to reveal those who threw the smoke bombs were Team Plasma. The grunts then begin their work as they went around stealing Poke’mon from the daze crowd. Colress stays calm as he watches this happen.

“Hey what’s going on!” Hugh shouts as he tries to regain his abilty to see again.

“I have no idea!” Nate shouts back as he takes out a poke’ball and throws it to let out his Servine.

“Stay alert, I have a bad feeling about this,” Nate adds as Servine nods as the grass type poke’mon keeps alert.

“This is bad, could this be the plan they were talking about?” Sayuri asks as she waves her arms to clear her vision.

“So this is a plan by Team Plasma?” Rosa asks as she tries to do the same thing as Sayuri.

“Yeah. But I didn’t know they were planning the attack on this building with smoke bombs,” Sayuri replies as Roxie smiles.

“Well if just smoke, I think I know who can help,” Roxie then pulls out a poke’ball and lets out Koffing.

“Okay, Koffing inhale all of the smoke!” Roxie says as Koffing nods and starts to suck up the smoke. Koffing sucks so hard the smoke filled room soon became visible again in a matter of seconds. The crowd of innocents saw some Team Plasma near exits of the room and saw they had poke’balls in their hands and bags.

“Hey they took my poke’mon!” A little girl shouts as she tries to find her poke’ball that held her pokemon. Sayuri saw the little girl is on the verge of crying, The exmember of Plasma felt shame at see the sight, as she once did the same to others as well.

“Alright men it’s time to get out of here!” A grunt yells and the others agree. The Team Plasma grunts all ran out the four exits of the room.

“PLASMA! GET BACK HERE!” Hugh yells with fury in his voice as he starts to chase a group of grunts that went through the east Exit.

“Hugh! Wait up, Servine we have to follow Hugh,” Nate says and Serine nods. Nate then gets on Servine and the two follow the half size young man.

“I have to admit, I can’t just stand around either. I’m going after a couple of grunts myself,” Rosa says as she sends out her Minccino out.

“I think I’ll join you. I can’t let them take any more Poke’mon,” Roxie says as she gets on her Koffing.

“Alright. Let’s go Minccino and Roxie!” Rosa says as she gets on Minccino.

“Be careful you two!” Yancy says as Roxie and Rosa nod and the two shrunkies both run after the group of grunts that went through the North exit.

“We have to try to get everyone to calm done,” Joy says as she starts to get up. But stops when she sees that Some Team Plasma grunts coming from the west exit. It seem like the grunts were running from something, that something is someone who is wearing the Crimson Hero Costume.

“It’s Crimson!” Sayuri shouts happily as she sees the Costume Hero. Joy and Yancy notice that Pop Roxie wearing a Gliscor mask and Bianca riding her Stoutland.

“I’m glad to see you two safe,” Yancy says as with a smile. Joy notice that something is a bit off with Pop Roxie.

“Pop Roxie what are you doing?” Joy asks the strange looking to her Pop Roxie. Touya turns his head to see the haft size nurse.

“I’m just gonna help Crimson here,” Touya replies in Pop Roxie voice. Pop Roxie and Bianca were surprise that Touya is able to mimic Pop Roxie’s so well after just meeting him.

One the grunts in Plasma group saw his chance. He threw a poke’ball that lets out a Liepard and both charge at Touya. Touya saw the attack coming from the corner of his eye, he then pulls out a poke’ball and sends out a Scrafty.

“Scraf use Focus Punch,” Touya says as the Scrafty closes his eyes and takes a fighting stance with one hand taking a form of a fist.

“Way to slow! Liepard use Hone Claws!” The grunt yells as the Liepard attacks Scraf while The grunt attacks Touya.

The Grunt throws a punch with his right arm, but Touya is able to doge that attack and grabs the grunt’s right hand and then elbows the grunt with his free arm. The grunt falls down after being hit. The Leipard attack gets doge by Scarf and the dark fighting type pokemon hits the Leipard with its fist and the normal type gets knock out. Sayuri and Yance were surprise to see that Pop Roxie able to do and have a Poke’mon, Joy knew something is going on but figures she would be able to talk about it later.

Team Plasma became worry after see what the sailor did their comrade.

“You’re not going to get away with that!” A male grunt says as he starts to pull out a poke’ball but Pop Roxie stops him by punching the grunt in the gut with this right hand and then grabing the grunt and throwing him across the room.

“There’s no way we’re letting you get away with this evil act criminals!” Pop Roxie yells in heroic manner, he thought he should be out of breath but his adrenaline rush kept ready to fight.

“That’s right. I’m not sitting by either,” Bianca says as pulls out a poke’ball and let’s out her Unfezant, ready to battle. Yancy, Joy and Sayuri agree and they secretly let a poke’mon out that they own to guard the remain the exits.

“We have to get out of here!” A Plasma grunt says as the others agree, the group look around to find an exit put saw that the remaining exits were being guarded by a Ursaring, Muk, Ducklett and Darmanitan.

“This is not looking good….” A grunt thought as he looks at their situation.

-------

Grant figure that a flying poke’mon would do better than a surfing poke’mon. So Grants picks a poke’mon called a Tranquil, now he just needs to find right time to run away.

--------

Cheren while on patrol in the south part of the building, saw that Team Plasma grunts were running around. Cheren then chases after them until they come out of the building. Cheren notices that the grunts are getting on a boat.

“So that’s what they’re using as a base,” Cheren thought as he looks at the boat, Cherne didn’t have any more time to think as he hears voices behind him. The young gym leader turns around to see Hugh, Nate, Rosa and Roxie coming out of different exits.

“Where did they go? Oh, Rosa and Roxie followed us,” Hugh says as he sees the two shrunken women.

“We were chasing some grunts,” Rosa explains as Roxie notice Cheren.

“So what brings you around here Cheren?” Roxie asks as the shrunken humans turn around to see the young gym leader.

“I was on portal duty for the tournament, I saw some Plasma grunts and followed them and saw they were getting on the boat over there” Cheren explains as he points to the boat.

“Let’s fight them head on!” Hugh says as he ran towards the boat.

“Jeeze we better follow him,” Nate says as the others agree. Nate, Cheren, Roxie and Rosa then chase after Hugh to join him on getting on the boat.

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
"Roxie, Rosa, can you two watch our backs?" Nate asked. "I don't want to see any of these Plasma Grunts in the tournament attack us from behind."

"Don't worry. We'll stop them," Roxie said with a smile. Cheren led the group on to the frigate.

Soon aftter boarding several Team PLasma grunts surrounded them. "You think you can come into our home and stop us?" one asked, laughing darkly.

"Give back the Pokemon you just stole!" Hugh yelled. He called out Vaporeon. Cheren called out Stoutland and Nate hopped off Servine.

A horde of stolen and beaten Pokemon was summoned to fight them.

"Try and take them," one grunt said before they attacked.

------

Grant felt the frigate shudder as the battle happened overhead. Now was his chance. He raced out of his room and went to the stairs. Racing up them, he came to a terrifying sight. Sage Zinzolin and a Shadow Triad were above him. But they hadn't noticed him. Not yet anyway.

"This was a possible error. This raid may have cost us more than it was worth," Zinzolin muttered.

"Our orders came from Ghetsis himself. We are to cause chaos and destruction. We need it to draw him out," the triad said.

"You make a fair point. I guess I just don't like the chilliness of this boat. I know why it is needed . . ." the Sage stopped talking and moved forward. "What is going on outside on deck?"

He and the Triad moved out onto the deck. Now was his chance.

-------

The three heroes smiled at the bested grunts. Then a large man in a deep purple cloak and outfit appeared. He glared at them with piercing eyes. "What is going on?"

"We're here to stop you Plasma poachers," Cheren said. His eyes met the Sage's.

The Sage recognized Cheren. "YOU! Once again, we will use the legendary Dragon-type Pokémon and we will rule the Unova region! Curious Trainers, we shall not let you run around as you please!"

"Like you can stop us!" Hugh yelled. Vaporeon growled in affirmation.

----

With the Sage and Triad member distracted, Grant made it outside. Off the bow would be the best choice.

He moved quickly.

--------

"Shadow Triad! Get them out of here!" Sage Zinzolin said. A man in white appeared from no where.

"We don't answer t your orders. Only our Lord's," the Triad noted.

The Sage growled in frustration. "I know! But kick them out of here now!" He stopped when he heard a panicked cry behind him. Zinzolin looked at Grant scampering up the stairs and in his hands. "Oh no! The device! Stop him!"

Cheren saw the device and guessed it could be the shrinking device. Even if it wasn't, it was something Plasma wanted badly and that was reason enough to get it. He shoved through the wall of grunts as a Triad member was moving close to him.

"No! I won't become some nobody again!" Grant yelled. He drew the device and fired.

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Pop Roxie then took out the last grunt, the grunt then fell on the floor. Joy couldn’t believe that they were able to beat a group eight grunts. Scraf, Unfezent, Ursaring, Muk, Ducklett and Darmanitan were able to take out any Poke’mon that the grunts used and Touya and Pop Roxie to care of the grunts.

“Now that’s taken care of let’s get everyone to safe place and return any Poke’mon they have to their owners here,” Joy says and the others agree with the plan.

Pop Roxie Keep an eye on the grunts as Joy and Secirity return the fresh stolen Poke’mon back to their owners.

Sayuri is happy she is happy to help as she sees the little girl from earlier gets her Poke’mon back goes over to the sailor.

“Thank you for getting out Poke’mon back Mister,” The little girl says with a smile. Touya looks at the little girl and stays quite for a bit and answers.

“You really should thank Crimson, he’s the reason we were able to stop them,”

The little girl nods and yells at the mask hero in red.

“Thank you for saving my Poke’mon and everyone else!”

Pop Roxie blush a bit under his mask and replies back without turning around.

“It’s nothing. That’s what a hero does,”

The girl smiles and returns back to her parents. Colress who remain silent for quite some time finally spoke.

“I think it would be better you tie those grunts then keeping Crimson watching them.”

“Yes. I think we should tie them up first,” Yancy agreeing with Colress even though it felt strange to agree with him.

“I’ll get some rope,” A security person says as they ran out to get some rope.

Touya went over to a grunt and kneels down near the grunt. Touya then went through his bag, everyone thought he was getting rope out of his bag but what he brought out is a first aid kit. Touya then open the kit and starts to bandage up the grunt that he hurt earlier.

“What are you doing that? They tried to steal our Poke’mon and now your fixing them up. Why are you helping theme?” A woman in the crowd asks the sailor.

The same grunt that Touya wonder about the same thing as the sailor patches him up. Touya after finishing the bandages on the grunt in front of him, and moves to the grunt and answers the women question.

“Do you need a reason to help someone?”

The woman is caught off guard from Touya’s answer and Pop Roxie stairs the young man help the injured grunts.

“That guy is too kind. He would even help the people who tried to attack him and steal others Poke’mon,” Pop Roxie thought as watches the young man help patch up the injured grunts.

“That just like Touya, always trying to help someone,” Bianca thought with a smile as she watch Touya patch up more grunts.

“There’s no doubt about it. That’s not Pop Roxie, whoever it is able to bandage up the grunts really,” Joy though as she saw how of a job that the sailor did.

Touya goes over to last grunt who is still injured. The grunt looks at the sailor disgust.

“You bastard, you’re just doing this out of pity for us. Well I’m not having it!” The grunt says as he punches Touya in the face. Touya is unable to doge the attack but take it on. The mask and hat that Touya wore feel off him, luckily Touya is about to catch both of them.

“I-it’s you! One of the bastards that ruin out plans years ago!” The grunt shouts as everyone around looks at sceen.

“It’s one of the Heroes of ideals,” A man says as he gets a clear look at Touya’s face.

Sayuri froze in shock at seeing Touya. This is the same man who helped destroy Team Plasma plan two years ago. The tiny hair orange hair women knew she would have to get over hatred over the two heroes of ideals but figure she would have time to accept her peace with them. But she didn’t count on one of them being here right now!

“That plan didn’t last long,” Bianca says with a sigh and starts to worry for Touya.

“You knew that he was here Miss Bianca?” Yancy asks and the other tiny women nods.

“That explains why Pop Roxie would know first aid,” Joy says as she watches the scene in front here.

Colress watches as he figures that Touya must have been Crimson earlier when they fought.

“Interesting. So you were the person I fought earlier. You must have switch clothes with that Sailor that is with shrunken humans.” Colress thought as he watches what Touya would do now.

Touya says nothing as he puts the mask and hat down some where safe and opens the first aid kit once more.

“What the hell are you doing? I don’t want your help! Get out of my face!” The grunt yells as he throws another punch. Touya catches the fist this time and looks to see that there are cuts and starts to bandage it up.

The other grunts are surprise that the man they hated for so long would still help them.

“God Danm it! Leave me alone!” The Grunt yells as he tries to use his free hand to hit Touya again. But what surprise everyone is that the Red Costume Crimson is the one who stops the fist from hitting Touya again. Touya is surprise to see Pop Roxie standing right next him. Everyone is surprise as well and even Colress seems a bit surprise from the actions of the old sailor.

“What are you doing!?” Pop Roxie yells as he holds the Grunt’s fist firm.

“What does it look to you! I’m trying to hit this good for nothing again!” The Grunt replies with a smug look.

Pop Roxie then took of his mask with his free hand and looks the grunt right in eyes. Sayuri is shock to see that Pop Roxie is wearing the Crimson costume and that meant that Touya is one who was wearing it earlier.

“This good for nothing is helping you out. He’s still helping even after you suck him one. This guy shows kindness to even his enemies! Do you think your Team Plasma buddies would come back for you! Would they come back help you out like this Good for nothing is doing?” Pop Roxie asks as the Grunt and the rest of the grunts were shock to hear something like that.

“You’re right. I don’t think any of them would come back for me…..” The grunt says to Pop Roxie and looks at Touya.

“Y-you know we’re not going to forget your kindness. Even if it takes some time I hope all of you can forgive us one day,”

Touya nods and finishes bandaging the last grunt. The Secirity person came back with the rope and ties the grunts up and waits for the police to come to pick them up.

“Thank you very much mister hero,” Touya says to Pop Roxie.

“I-It’s no problem. I’m glad I was able to help you out. You would have done the same for me,” Pop Roxie replies as he looks at the young man.

Corless is very surprise at how Pop Roxie acted and became interested in Touya.

Yancy is very surprise that everyone didn’t go up Touya the moment that his mask fell off. The crowd didn’t want to bother Touya and figure they shouldn’t be bugging him.

Sayuri stay silent as she looks at Touya. Bianca goes over notice that Sayuri is trouble, the tiny blonde figures that Sayuri must still not trust Touya after figuring it out that Touya is Crimson.

“Sayuri about Touya….” Bianca says as she tries to get close the other tiny women. Sayuri shakes her head not wanting to talk to Bianca about Touya. Touya saw this and says.

“It’s okay Bianca. She has the right to not trust me,”

“Are you sure? Well if it’s fine with you….” Bianca says as Sayuri looks at Touya.

“How can he be so calm and kind? He really is too kind for his own good. But I that’s what I like about him…” Sayuri thought with a bit of a blush on her face.

Touya and the shrunken maidens notice that Colress is walking over to them with Pop Roxie behind him.

“Hey leave him alone would you,” Pop Roxie says as he doesn’t trust Colress at all. The scientist ignores Pop Roxie and starts to talk to Touya.

“You are become interesting Half Hero of ideals. Not only were you able to bring out potential of those Poke’mon you used to fight me before. You were able to bring out this old sailor potential as well,”

Touya and Bianca take notice that Sayuri seem scared of Colress, figuring that they must know each other from somewhere.

“I’m sorry to intrude. But I must ask to leave,” Joy says as goes over to Colress as the half size nurse notice Sayuri scared expresstion. Colress really wanted to talk more to Touya but figures he should go. But before he went he asks.

“Touya why do you think I’m here?”

Bianca, Pop Roxie, Joy and Sayuri wonder what Touya’s answer would be. Touya looks at Colress and says.

“It’s for science right?”

Colress looks at Touya and smiles.

“Correct. Thank you for answering my question. Good day,”

Colress starts to walk away and thought.

“No wonder why he wants you dead Touya along with the other one. You’re very sharp about people and Poke’mon,”
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Heroes and Masks taken off along with an answer.

choices: Back to the others coming from the docks.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Cheren and the Triad jumped to stop Grant but the blast struck them. Sensing what was happening, the Triad tried to pull Cheren before himself to take the brunt of the blast. It worked, for the most part because as Cheren did shrink faster, the lack of his height shielding him only gave the Triad a few inches leeway on Cheren.

By the time Grant was airborne with his Tranquil flying him away, Cheren was no taller than Nate and the Triad member about twice his height.

"No!" Nate yelled but sensed a force grabbing him. He blacked out and found himself on the docks with Servine protectively wrapped around him Hugh was kneeling over the tiny and nude Cheren. Hugh's shirt was over him.

"Blast it, they got away," Hugh grumbled.

"Yes, but the one who shrunk you, he was running too," Roxie said. "Why?"

"Maybe he didn't want to give up the shrinking device," Rosa said. They looked at her. "Would you?"

"No, I guess not," Hugh conceded. "Let's get back on the land." The others nodded and they put Cheren on his Stoutland.

-------

"How interesting. Their trust in their pokemon. Especially with their circumstance. Could that be the way to draw out their power?"Corless muttered.

He turned and walked away back to the city.

---------

The Plasma grunts were rounded up and taken outside. An Onix was laying around them. Clay smiled at the Masked Pop Roxie. "You did some fine work in there for a guy not using any Pokemon," Clay said.

"It's nothing any other good person wouldn't have done," Pop said with a smile.

"Non-sense. You have a courage about you," Clay said.

"Well, thanks," Pop Roxie said.

"You know, I saw the movie you made recently," Clay said. Pop Roxie froze up. "I think you might be better off if you wear a costume of a different sort."

"You mean this one?" Pop Roxie asked.

"Sure. Especially for this situation. The Masked hero defends the PWT," Clay said.

"I . . . I guess so," Pop Roxie said as Touya came to him.

"Um, sir, can we trade back yet?" he asked gently. Pop Roxie nodded.

"Follow me," Clay said.

choices: Stick with Clay finding out that Cheren has been shrunk?
