1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
As the three walk through the hallway, they saw a crowd of reports near the changing room.

“This could be bad. We have to get pass them.” Clay thought as he tries to think of a plan. But luck is not on Clay’s side as the reports spot them and ran at the three. Right Lights, cameras and video recorders were now on them.

“Mister Clay can we get a live interview with you along with the two behind you?” A news woman asks as she puts a mike in front of Clay. Clay huff pushes the mike away.

“I’m sorry but we’re in hurry so if you could please move,” Clays politely asks the news crew.

A video camera man moves in closer to get better look on Clay’s face, as he moves in the video camera man trips on the cord and starts to fall. Touya seeing this, on instinct he catches the video camera man before he falls.

“Um thank you,” The camera man says as Touya nods and stands the cameraman back up. The Gliscor mask he is wearing starts to fall off again. It seems the grunt who punched him earlier made the strap weaker in the processes.

Pop Roxie and Clay see this happening but can’t do anything to stop it. Luckily before the mask fell on the floor the Camera man who Touya save just a second ago catches the mask.

“Oh boy your mask almost broke. Here you-“The cameraman starts but looks to see who is under the mask. The Cameraman is shock to see that It is one of the heroes of ideas.

“Thank you for saving that. It’s a gift from a friend,” Touya says in a thankful manner as he takes the mask back.

“The mask is the only thing that concerns you right now!?” Pop Roxie thought as Clay become angry as the news crew start to take pictures and record Touya.

“STOP THAT! DESPOSE OF THOSE PICTURES AND VIDEO’S RIGHT NOW!” Clay shouts as the news crew looks at the cowboy.

“Um…. We’re live right. We can’t really dispose of them. They on air and on the net….” A Newsman replies. The news crew turns off their equipment as they see Clay’s anger.

“I SHOULD TAN YOUR HIDES AND GET YOU FIRED FROM YOUR JOBS! YOU JUST PUT HIS LIFE IN DANGER!” Clay shouts as the news crew start to get frighten from Clay’s threats.

“Things aren’t looking good,” Pop Roxie thought as he watches Clay chew out the news reporters.

“It was an accident, they were just doing their jobs,” Touya says as he remains calm as ever.

Clay and Pop Roxie couldn’t believe how calm can be right now. Clay snorted as he looks at the news crew.

“Be lucky that this guy is very understanding,” Clay says with anger as he steps and starts to call the news station with his Xtransceiver. Clay looks at Touya and thought.

“How can you be so calm all the time? I’m glad that you’re on our side,”

The news crew is surprise at how Touya is able to forgive them for revealing that he’s in Unova. The news crew start to whisper among themselves and all came to an agreement. A news woman went over to Touya to say.

“Hello I’m representing the news crew. We are dreadful for what happen here and we want to make it up to you, so we’re going to call our partners’ in the news and tell them not bother you from now on. I hope this makes up for what happen earlier,”
Touya nods back with a smile on his face, the newswomen smiles back and goes back to tell the crew the news.

Touya then goes into the changing room afterwards. Pop Roxie is amaze at how well Touya handle the situation.

----

Grant barely hangs onto the Tranquil as he flies away from Driftveil City. He happily sighs about his escape being successful. He wonders what he would do now as he flies on ward.

----

Touya comes out of the change room, now wearing a his blue jacket that he wore two years ago, white shirt under the jack, black pants, and the same running shoes that he wore two years ago. Touya is also carrying Pop Roxie’s sailor suit. Clay and Pop Roxie were outside the room waiting for Touya to come out.

“So you went back to your normal clothes? Well there’s no point in hiding any more since people already got ahold of those videos and pictures. I’m going outside now, I need to check on those five who went near the ships,” Clay says as he leaves the two alone.

Touya gives Pop Roxie back his sailor suit back and starts to follow Clay but Pop Roxie stops him.

“Um thank you for your help earlier. I don’t think I would have done those things if wasn’t for you giving me back this costume or the courage. So thank you again,” Pop Roxie says as with a warm smile.

Touya could feel Pop Roxie’s apparition for him. Touya then replies.

“That was your own strength.”

Pop Roxie starts to laugh happily at Touya’s words.

“Kid, I think you’re giving me too much credit.” Pop Roxie says with a smile on his face. Pop Roxie then with hand takes of the red scarf that he had on and presents it to Touya.

“I know this isn’t much. But I want you to have this scarf; they say that when you wear a scarf you can become a hero. And you know that the hero never dies,”

Touya looks at the scarf and smiles.

“Thank you. I’ll cherish it,” Touya says as he takes the red scarf. Pop Roxie smiles as he was glad that Touya accepted his gift and his friendship. Touya felt that he made another life time long on the course of his journey.

Touya puts the scarf in his bag and the two set out to follow Clay outside.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: News intrudes,Thoughts and A red scarf

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Clay walked back to the front of the World Tournament. He led Pop Roxie and Touya as they found the group around a shrunken Cheren. Stories were exchanged about what the other group did.

Nate, Hugh, and Rosa look to see one of the heroes of ideals. The young man didn’t look heroic and seem to glare at them.

Touya shook his head at his tiny friend as he came around. Luckly it’s been an hour since Cheren shrunk, so he wouldn’t be able to shrink anybody else. Cheren then got into some doll clothes.

"So, what will we do now? If this shrinker has escaped, is he not helping Plasma?" Bianca asked.

"Maybe. But that doesn't mean we can just trust him," Hugh said.

"Which way did he go off to?" Pop Roxie asked.

"He went north," Cheren said. Bianca gasped.

"Professor Juniper is north! She's going to the Celestial Tower," Bianca said. "We have to go that way right away."

"I can carry you on my Brave," Touya suggests, the Brave that Touya spoke of is his Pokemon Bravairy.

"Good idea," Cheren said, "But not everyone here has Pokemon who can fly and he might stop and take other paths."

"What if we follow you on the ground then?" Nate suggested. "We can come on ground and through Chargestone cave."

"That sounds like a fair idea. The men should be close to finishing the repairs on the bridge," Clay said.

"Um, I have a thought," Joy said. "They want to use the power of a legendary dragon right? What if we had other legendaries to help us?"

"That could work," Touya says and starts to think. They could possible wait until the other hero of ideals, Touko to come back with Zekrom, N could even come back here with Reshiram. They could possible go to the other Legendaries that Touko and him captured and release before he left. If they are not able to do those two options Touya figures he would fight what ever Ghetsis is planning.

"Only problem is legendary Pokemon are hard to find," Bianca said.

"Not quite. There's a rumor in the cavern under here lies one," Clay said, nodding to one direction. "Could be worth a look."

Touya notice where Clay is pointing and knew what the cowboy is talking about the Relic Castle. Touya knew what the rumor legendary Poke’mon about to talk until Cheren says.

"Right. Okay, so you guys get that legendary. We'll fly ahead to warn others,"

Touya looks around to see that everyone agree with the plan, the one hero of ideals then figures they might as well get more Poke’mon on their side. The tiny orange hair woman is silent for a few minutes and she and her Ducklett go over to Touya.

"May I go with you?" Sayuri asks as she looks at the giant. Touya bends his knees to look straight into Sayrui’s eyes. Sayuri blushes but still keeps her eyes straight on Touya. Touya notices that Sayuri’s eyes have a spark in them, wanting to change.

"Alright, welcome aboard," Touya says with nod, Sayuri smiles at Touya agreeing to take her with them. Bianca held in a frown and moves closer too Touya. Clay nods as he would tell the police that someone is watching over Sayrui.

Hugh couldn’t believe what he is seeing. How in the world could someone who fight Team Plasma two years ago could so easily accept them. Hugh didn’t know how to feel at the moent but his gut still told him not to trust the tiny ex-plasma.

"Okay, so some of us can get supplies for the next leg of the journey. Who wants to go into the cave?" Roxie asked.

"I'll go," Joy said.

"Me too," Hugh said as he wants to go somewhere to think. Rosa nodded.

"Then I'll get the supplies," Nate said. Yancy stayed near him.

"Um, Roxie, would you mind staying here? I have something I want to walk with you about," her father said.

"Okay. Well, best of luck you guys," Roxie said with a smile. Touya nods and releases Brave and Bianca, Sayuri and Cheren put their pokemon back into balls. Touya gets on his large bird friend as Bianca and the others wonder where they will sit. Touya picks up Bianca, Sayuri and Cheren and sits them on his lap. Bianca and Sayuri both blush as they sit on Touya legs while Cheren sits Indian style. Touya looks down at the tiny humans before they left and saw that the women were both red. Bianca and Sayuri notce Touya’s staring.

“We’re alright Touya. Don’t worry about us,” Bianca says as Sayrui adds.

“Yeah! Let’s get going!”

Touya nods and looks at Brave and nods. The bird pokemon understood what his friend wanted and soon the large bird and its mighty wings took them to the sky.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Legends and Power

choices: Switch over to Hugh, Rosa and Joy
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
As Brave flies through clouds, the people who are riding him are quite. Touya remains silent; Cheren is thinking about what he will do about his gym, while Bianca and Sayuri both are quite and taking a few glances at each other. Bianca normally would not mind if someone joins them but something didn’t quite feel right. Sayuri felt very embarrass as she sits on the giant’s lap and felt weird being Bianca as well, the orange hair women couldn’t put her finger on why.

Touya notice that Bianca and Sayuri were not talking and wonder what is wrong. Touya starts to think what to say so the two tiny women could start talking. Touya then figure what could bring them together.

“Say Sayuri what are planning on doing after this? Touya asks in a nonchalant way. The tiny orange stop being in her own thoughts and looks at the giant to answer his question.

“Well I don’t really know what I’m going to after this,” Sayuri explains as she looks down. The tiny orange hair women also believes that no one would hire a ex-criminal

Touya notice Sayuri’s sad mood until Bianca spoke.

“It might be hard, but I believe you can find something you like,”

“You really think that?” Sayuri asks as she is surprise to hear Bianca say that.

“I really do. It might not be the same as you, but I understand not know what you want to do in your life,” Bianca explains with a smile.

“So you didn’t start out at become a professor at first?” Sayuri asks wanting to know more.

“Yep. When I left on my journey along with my friends I didn’t really know what I wanted to do. But along the way I began to figure out what I wanted to do with my life with the help of my travels and the help with my friends,” Bianca explains with a smile. Bianca also adds in her own thoughts.

“Touya really help me as well,” The small blonde blush a bit at the thought.

“That’s really incredible. I hope I can have that energy when this is all over,” Sayuri says as she admire at Bianca’s strength.

“You don’t have to do it alone, I’ll help you out. I bet Touya would help you out as well,” Bianca says as she looks at Sayuri as Touya nods in agreement.

“Thank you two,” Sayuri says with a smile.

“It’s no problem,” Bianca replies with a smile of her own.

Bianca and Sayuri start to talk to each other more; Cheren came out of his thoughts and saw the two women were more comfortable with each other. Cheren figures that Touya must have done something.

“You always seem to help someone with a just a few words, just like always,” Cheren thought as they flew in the sky.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: A few words can help anyone

choices: She bowed and let Joy capture her without a fight.
Attacked Joy.  She must prove herself in battle before Volcarona will help.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Hugh carried Rosa as Joy walked next to him. The dark cavern was illuminated by crystals on the walls and ceilings that gave off a white glow.

"Alright. So we continue downward and then go right until we reach a path to the south," Hugh said as he remembered the words of the man at the entrance.

"This is going to be fun," Rosa said as she looked about.

"Agreed," Joy said . She spotted a few trainers in their walk but they chose not to battle them, not yet anyway. They weren't here for that type of training and would need to conserve their strength.

However, just because their human comrades refused, Boldores and Woobats came at them frequently. Joy used her Zubat and Rosa sent out Dewott as to fight them.

When dust clouds formed in their paths, Hugh sent out Steelix and scared away any Onix or drilbur who tried fighting him.

Joy kissed her Zubat after one battle and applied a basic potion. "At this rate, we won't have many potions left," Joy said.

"Don't worry, I don't think it will be too much longer," Hugh said. A dust cloud formed again but no pokemon emerged. They did find another Red Shard and pocketed it.

"Number six," Rosa said with a smile.

They exited into a south-going chamber where a pristine pool of water lay. Many basculin watched from below the water's surface. The tell-tale bobbing tails of the Marill family were visible in the center of the pool.

"I wish I had a Pokemon who could surf," Joy said softly. "I wouldn't mind trying to catching one of them."

"Either would be a good one to have," Rosa said. They turned and walked away from the pool and continued onward into darkness.

"Where are we?" High mused as they walked. "I mean on the map. If we went up right now . . ."

"Likely in the ocean," Joy said. "If this goes to Relic Castle as Clay said, then we would have to bypass a lot of routes."

After one tough battle for Joy against a Raticate, her Zubat began to glow and enlarged. Golbat looked at his trainer and hugged her once more.

"I like you too," Joy said, before petting the larger bat. They came to a fork in the road. Someone had carved into the wall Relic Castle was to the north and so they walked that way.

Sand was noticable on the hard, dry ground as they approached a hole. It was dark with little light but they entered anyway.

After about five minutes of darkness, they emerged into a stone room. It was perfectly square and obviously very old. Yanmask and sandiles came at them now, frustrated at these humans coming into their ancient home.

Hugh's Vaporeon made quick work of them. They trio continued onward until they came to a north-facing door. They entered into that chamber and there she stood. Taller than any of the shrunkies, the red wings with black spots flapped gently as it kept itself aloft. "I think it's female," Joy said. "The colors aren't as vibrant as they are in the Pokedex system."

"That's a pretty good eye," Rosa said. Hugh nodded and pet Vaporeon.

"Okay, time to battle her," Hugh said. Joy held out her hand.

"Wait," Joy said. "Let me try talking to it first. It seems since we've been shrunk, we can reach closer to our Pokemon a lot quicker than we would at normal size." Hugh thought about this and nodded.

"You're right. Nate's Sewaddle was really friendly before he even captured him. But do you think it will work on a legendary?" High asked.

"We won't know until we try," Joy said as she began to walk forward.

"Hello," Joy said. Volcarona's head shifted and looked at the tiny Joy. "I am Joy. My friends and I have been changed by some malevolent men. They want to hurt many Pokemon and we would like your help facing them. Would you join us?" The great bug Pokemon remained still, save for the minor bobbing it did to stay afloat.

"Even if you don't want to help us, I would like to be your friend," Joy continued as she stopped about six feet from her. She drew an empty ball and looked at her.

The ancient Pokemon did nothing for a time. Then . . .
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Through the Passage

choices: Stick with Hugh, Rosa and Joy as they try to get out the ruins
Switch over to Grant has he shrunk anyone while he is flying?
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Volcarona let out small cry as the bug Pokemon slowly goes to the ground. Nate and Rosa watch as Volcarona bows to half size Joy.

“Thank you very much for become our friend,” Joy says with smile as the half size nurse puts the pokeball on Volcarona and the bug Pokemon went into the ball.

“Wow! Even a Legendary Pokemon became friendly towards us. Rosa says as Joy comes back to Hugh and Rosa.

“I’m surprised as well,” Hugh adds and in a thought thinks.

”So far being shrunk hasn’t been bad that so far….”

“We got another team member. So it’s time to go back,” Joy says as she looks at her new friend.

“Um about that, I was wondering does anyone know where to go?” Rosa asks and Hugh and Joy look at the tiny women. The three humans were silent for a couple of seconds.

“This might take awhile,” Hugh thought as Vaporeon sense Hugh’s trouble and nuzzles his chest. Hugh smiles and pets Vaporeon.

“I guess we’ll just to explore,” Joy says as Rosa smiles at the plan.

“Okay. That sounds like a plan. I’ve always wanted to have an adventure in a ruin,” Rosa esthetical says with a smile.

Hugh and Joy look at the tiny women and both thought.

“I wish I had some of that energy like her,”
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Elgent bow and the start to find an exit.

choices: Stay with Hugh, or those in Driftveil
Back to Grant or those heading after him.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Grant smiled as he saw mountains pass below him. But a glance up told him his Tranquil was getting tired. "Descend," he commanded. The bird Pokemon answered and began to fly lower. Trees grew in size and to the south Grant saw a town just past the mountains. He wouldn't go there just yet. Instead, they landed not far from a great tower he had only read about. Tranquil was panting softly and he looked at it with cold eyes.

"I better get out of this uniform," he decided. He pulled down his mask and set the clothes aside. He wore a plain whit shirt and blue jeans beneath his uniform. He carefully set his hat down. "I can't wear this anymore. Not until I become the ruler of Plasma." He covered them in the bushes and went back to the trail. Tranquil followed and still panting.

"Oh my," came a soft voice. Grant turned quickly and saw a woman holding some groceries. "Do you or your Pokemon need a rest sir?"

"What? Well, I guess I could," he said. He didn't want the bird to drop him on the way to the next town. He followed her to a cottage closeby.

------

Professor Juniper and Elite Four member Marshal looked at the red-haired gym leader who jumped off her Skarmory before them at Twist Mountain "Professor, I just got a call from Clay," she said.

"Oh? How is the tournament going?" Juniper asked. "I hope it can draw in the elusive champion from Kanto. He is so quiet and rarely gives interviews."

"No. Team Plasma attacked but were stopped. A majority escaped on their frigate, but the shrinker . . ."

"I still can't conceive of such a person being able to shrink people," Marshal said.

"Believe it. My father was in contact with the owners of the missiing compoents," Juniper said. "So, was anyone else shrunk?"

"Yes. Cheren. But there is good news. Touya is back and helping them out," Skyla said. "He, Bianca, Cheren, and a former Plasma member should be arriving in the city within the hour."

"That young lad?" Marshal asked as he recalled their battles. "Good. Is the Heroine here too?"

"And a former Plasma member? The one Clay said he caught?" Juniper asked.

"She might be worth talking to," Marshal said. He pulled out two Pokeballs and opened them. Sawk and Throh appeared. "I need you boys to do me a favor. Watch this entrance and don't allow anyone to enter." They nodded. "I'll be back shortly."

Sawk said something and Marshal nodded. "You may spar against each other," he said. Both seemed happy and turned to face the other. Skyla brought Skarmory back into her ball and they started walking towards the city.

----------

Grant watched as a simple nap recovered his stolen Pokemon. "Thanks," he said, happy he didn't have to shrink them to avoid notice.

"Be safe and come again if you are tired" the girl said. Grant nodded and walked out of the house. he turned towards Twist Mountain.

"Should I continue on foot?" he wondered. If some of the people after him had flying types, or worse he was spotted by the frigate, he would be in trouble. Going on foot would be the best option. He started on the path to Twist Mountain.

----------

"I can see the city," Touya said to his companions as he stroked the back of Brave's neck.

"It's so pretty from up here," Sayuri said.

"Yeah. And if we have time, I think someone has a TM your Ducklett could learn," Cheren said.

"That would be really nice" Sayuri said with a smile.

----------

Nate and Yancy rode on Servine back to the Pokemon Center and started collecting the provisions they would need to have for going through Chargestone cave.

"Okay. Anything else?" Nate asked. Yancy blushed. With Roxie talking with her father, it could mean she could get Nate alone.

"Um . . . well . . ." Yancy said.

----------

Rosa and Joy followed Hugh as he walked ahead. They were in a familiar place as they walked on one ledge. She wasn't sure how it looked familiar but it did. In their wanderings, they did find more shards, Pokemon, and a few items someone dropped. Both ladies held in a chuckle at Vaporeon wearing the Rocky Helmet.

"So, should we climb down this ledge?" Hugh asked.

"I don't know. I don't think we'll be able to climb back up," Rosa said.

"But it could be an interesting find. Perhaps another legendary is down here," Joy said.

"Clay said no
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: The Wise, The Elite, and the Leader

choices: The plan dose not work. Is Grant notice?
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Touya and the others soon land in Mistralton City, the shrunken people get of first and then Touya gets off pets Brave and puts him back into this ball.

“Okay. We’re here, let’s get going,” Cheren says as he lets out Watchog and gets on the normal type.

“Okay,” Bianca and Sayuri both say as they both let out their Pokemon. Bianca gets on her Stoutland while Sayuri gets on Ducklett. Touya nods as the group starts to move Touya hears the local towns’ people talk.

“Did you watch the news this morning? I heard that there’s going to a blizzard going on near Twisted Mountain.” An older man says as he talks to older gentleman.

“Yes. It seems like what is causing Unova to Freeze is also causing all of these blizzards that happen,”

Touya took in the information and starts to think. If the shirker were to use that Tranquil and fly into the Blizzard, would they be able to follow them. The tiny forms of Bianca, Sayrui and Cheren would last long in the cold weather and Touya along with his team is not prepared to go sub zero Temperature.

“Touya come on or we’ll leave you behind,” Cheren yells from the front.

Touya moves forward and wonders if they would be able to catch the shirker.

___

Grant moves forward to Twist Mountain, Grants looks down to see that he forgot to put Tranquil back into it’s ball is following him close.

“Crap I forgot to put you back in your ball,” Grant thought as he is about to pull out the ball, but notice the Tranquil kept close to him. Grant didn’t’ really know what to do, since most Pokemon he would use would just ignore him and walk on ahead but it seems like this bird Pokemon is sticking with him.

“Alright. You can stay out. Since you’re staying close to me,” Grant says as he puts the ball in his bag.

The Tranguil chirps as it starts to rub Grant’s leg, Grant is surprise to see that the Tranquil is showing him affection.

“Jeeze you’re a simple one to make happy. Come on let’s just move on,”

The Tranguil nods as the two start to move. Grant wonders why this Tranquil is affection but shakes it off as he needs to think more about his plans.

Tranquil stares at Grant and remembers two years ago. Two years ago the Tranquil use to belong to Trainer that the bird could no longer remember his original owners name. Tranquil remember being happy with his original owner as they train and played but one day his old owner released him. Tranquil didn’t quite understand why his own left him, His original owner told the bird Pokemon that they were just using them and hurting and that green hair man was right. The original owner left Tranquil as the bird made strong cries and tries to convince his owner that they did nothing wrong but it was no use, Tranquil was left alone, as the bird Pokemon cried from being left, Strangers then found the crying bird Pokemon. They attack the heart broken Pokemon and catch it.

For the next two years Tranquil was with Team Plasma and the bird Pokemon is treated terribly. The Tranguil would be hit for doing nothing wrong and even push beyond its limits with out rest. The Tranguil began to think that it deserved to be beaten for not being good enough to be with it original owner. But now He was with this man, this man used him to fly into the sky for some reason. At first he thought this new man would be like the others, at first it seems like that, but this man let him rest after flying so hard. That is the first time that anyone showed the bird kindness in two years. The man even let Tranquil be out of his ball for a lot longer and didn’t do anything to him. Trainquil figures this must his second chance at getting a trainer and he would help this man no matter what.

“Oh crap!”

Tranquil is snap out of its thoughts and sees that the man seems scared. The man gets in the bushes and drags Tranquil with him. Tranquil wonders why and turns to see that two fighting Pokemon are guarding the entrance to a cave.

“Danm it. What am I going to do about those two?” Grant whispers but notice that people were coming out of the cave. He is shock to see gym leader Skyla, Professor Juniper and Elite Four member Marshal were the ones coming out of the Twist Mountain.

“Danm it. Why did they have to be here? What am I going to do?” Grant whispers as he starts to get scared. There was no way he could shrink all them, one of them would be able to doge and take him on.

Tranquil notice that Grant look trouble and starts to rub his head on Grant’s leg to make the human better. Grant felt something rubbing his leg and notice that the bird Pokemon is rubbing leg.

“What a strange bird… Wait! That’s it!” Grant thought as he looks at the bird.

“Say Bird, do you want to help me out?”

The Tranquil nods and Grant smiles.

“Alright can you go distract those guys over there? I’ll hit them with this zapper, while two fighting Pokemon are concentrated on the new tiny people, I’ll get on you and we’ll fly over this mountain. What do you say? I’ll give a berry or poke’block or something if do this,” Grant explains to the bird Pokemon.

The Tranquil nods, willing to help to show that the bird would be a good partner. Grant smiles and says.

“Alright. Time to put this plan into motion,”
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Talk of a Blizzard and not wanting to be alone,

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Tranquil flew before the three humans as they walked on the trail. It stopped a few feet in front of the humans. "Oh look. A cute Tranquil," Skyla said with a smile.

"You don't usually see them when the temperature decreases, do you?" Juniper asked.

"No," Skyla said before the Tranquil began to screech and jumped into the air. It flapped its wings, spraying up dust. The humans covered their eyes.

"Gah! What's wrong?" Marshal asked.

"I don't know. Maybe we disturbed its nest," Skyla said.

"If it has a nest and children nearby, we can't just attack it," Juniper said.

---------

Grant smiled at the sight of the distracted humans. His new buddy was working out well. He aimed the shrink ray and fired.

With the dust and debris blinding them, the three humans didn't notice the strange light hitting them dead on.

Tranquil stopped when it heard a whistle and took off to the bushes, leaving the ever shrinking people. Tranquil landed before Grant and smiled at him. "Good Bird," Grant said. "Now, let's go." When he glanced back at his latest victims, he saw the two Pokemon guards rushing to their sides.

Tranquil flew up and grabbed Grant by the arm and took off, carrying the man into the air.

Skyla opened her eyes a little and looked to see a figure heading over Twist Mountain. By the time her vision came into focus, she couldn't see their exact location.

"What happened?" came a voice near her. Skyla looked down when a cool breeze hit her.

"It seems we were shrunk," came Juniper's calm voice. Skyla looked at the two piles of clothes.

"How? Did that Plasma person sneak up on us?" Skyla asked.

"Must have," Marshal said. "That Tranquil probably was his." He came out nude as his Pokemon arrived.

"I'd say we are about at the smallest we could be," Juniper said. "Let's head back to the city and find some clothes."

"That would be good. I don't want to be out here naked if the blizzard comes down from the mountain," Skyla said.

--------

Hugh, Rosa, and Joy walked down the ledge and it took Hugh only about ten feet to groan in frustration.

"What is it?" Rosa asked.

"This is the path that leads to the Castelia sewers," Hugh said. "And we just jumped down a path we can't climb back up."

"Dang it. And I forgot some escape ropes," Joy said.

"well, we do have the Fly HM so we could get one of our Pokemon to carry the three of us back to Driftveil," Rosa said.

"Maybe my new friend will," Joy said with a smile.

"True. Well, no use crying over things now. Let's head on out," Hugh said. He pet Vaporeon. "We're going to be close to your home, boy." Vaporeon gave a happy cry.

-------

Roxie listened silently as her father explained his desires and dreams. He told her about the offer and she nodded in the end. "So, you want to try being an actor again?" she asked. Her father nodded at that summary.

-----------

Nate and Yancy rode out of the Pokemon Center. Not too far was the warehouse market. They walked into it and looked about at the various people selling things from their stands.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Three More Shrunk

choices: They go to the old women's house
They decline and go back to the city
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Grant could believe his luck! He was able to get pass a gym leader and an elite four member! Also the famous Professor Juniper, but did think much about that. While Grant is praising him self and his new little friend, Tranquill flies though the sky with all of its might! The blizzard is getting stronger and the bird poke’mon is having trouble keeping its flight straight. Grant starts to feel Tranquill’s movement starting to shake and gets worry.

“Hey! Are you alright!?” Grant asks trying to get a better grip. Tranquill chirps happily, trying to make its new partner feel calmer.

Tranquill is able to fly over the mountain through the blizzard and the two see a city in distant.

“We almost to Icirrus city, when we get there we can rest for a bit,” Grant thinks out loud and Tranquill chirps once more from Grant being kindness to let it rest. A strong wind comes from behind the two that carries snow from Twisted Mountain! Tranquill gets hit hard by the snow and starts to fall to ground.

“You have to be kidding me!” Grant yells as the bird poke’mon and him self start to fall to the ground. Grant with out any hesitation uses his other hand and pulls Tranquill to him and holds him close and turns around so he would take the impact of the fall. “What the hell am I doing!?” Grant thought as he tries to understand why he is doing this.

Luckily for the two the ground is pack with soft snow, Grant is able to hit the ground with no problems. Unfortunately Grant passes out from falling from a high distance. Tranquill is able to regain consciousness and sees that Grant is holding him. . Tranquill is yet surprise again by its new partner’s kindness! This person would even protect their live to protect the bird poke’mon. Tranquill saw they were near a house, the bird poke’mon knew what it must do. Tranguill is able lift Grant on its back and heads for the house.

_____

Touya and others continue to walk Route 7 until they saw something moving the grass.

“Be careful it could be a wild Pokemon,” Cheren explains as Watchog waits to see what is in the tall grass.

Touya, Bianca, Sayuri and Cheren are surprise to see what comes out of the tall grass. It is a Skarmory and a Sawk, but the steel type poke’mon is carrying the shrunken Skyla and Professor Juniper while the fighting type is a carrying the shrunken Marshal.

”Professor!” Bianca shouts as she sees her teach the same size but naked.

“Bianca!” Juniper yells as she sees her pupil again and sees she is not alone.

Cheren turns his head to give the new shrunken people of modesty. Sayuri is surprise to see that Grant was able to get pass and shrink them.

Touya goes through his bag gets out three color cloths. A light blue, white, and an orange one and goes over to over the new shrunken people and puts the cloths near them. Touya blushes a bit as he gets a better view of Skyla and Juniper naked forms and turns around steps forward a bit to give them some room to put on the cloth.

“Thank you very much Touya!” Skyla shouts with a blush on her face from Touya seeing her naked. Skarmory picks up the light blue and white cloths and gives them to the shrunken women.

“You have my gratitude as well Touya,” Juniper calls with a slight blush from being naked in front of the others. The two quickly make some clothes from the cloth.

“I have to agree. We were lucky to run into here,” Marshal says as Sawka gives him the orange cloth.

“Yes. But I wish were able to meet before you ended up this way,” Cheren sighs wishing they were able to get to Mashal and others a bit earlier.

“Well at lest we got here so we could give something to wear,” Sayuri tries to lighten the mood.

“I have to agree. It’s nice to having something to bring some warmth instead of being naked in the freezing cold,” Skya replies with a smile.

“You know some warriors train naked in these type conditions. I have to try it out some time,” Marshal thought as he puts on the orange cloth.

The group is about to talk about what they should do until a older women comes over to them. The friendly old woman goes gets near Touya and says.

“Oh! Touya you came back for a visit. There’s going to a snow storm coming through so why don’t you and your friends come over to the house?” The old woman asks with a smile on her face.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Taking the fall and Invitation.

choices: Switch over to Nate and the others.
Switch over to Hugh and the others.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Before the group could even talk about what they should do, Touya answers for everyone.

“Of course we will Grams,”

“He he. It’s nice to have your company again. Hurry let’s go to the house,” The old woman starts to walk towards her house, Touya starts to follower the older women the others soon follow.

“Do think we should be doing this?” Sayuri asks the others wanting to know their option on subject.

“Well we can’t really follow the shrinker any time soon, the blizzard is going to be harsh and I doubt our poke’mon friends would have trouble flying through it,” Skyla explains her two cents on the matter.

“I have to agree. Going through that blizzard would be problem mantic. Let’s discuss a plan when we get to the house,” Juniper adds and the others agree.

It didn’t take long for the group get to the house in Route 7. The older women let’s them in and they see three other people inside the house.

“Granny you’re back. We were starting to get wor-“The young man sarts and see that she brought guest and recognizes two of them. “Oh! You brought Skyla and Touya over,”

“Nice to meet you again Touya and you’re friends too,” An older man says as he sees the rest.

“Welcome back Touya!!” The young woman that is in front of the TV says.

“Hello everyone,” Touya replies with a warm smile.

“Since you’re why don’t you all rest and I’ll make my special soup,” The old women says with a smile and goes over to the kitchen area.

“Vegetables again…” The young man of the house sighs as he sits at the counter.

“Say Grams, do mind if I use your sewing machine?” Touya asks as he goes over to the older women.

”Of course you can use it. It’s in the cabinet over there,” The older woman says with a smile and points over the cabinet.

“Thank you,” Touya says with a smile and goes over to cabinet and gets the sewing machine out and starts to fettle with it.

“What is he doing?” Sayuri asks the others trying to figure out why Touya would want to mess with a sewing machine.

“I have no idea. But it’s fine, we have to discuss what we are going to do about this Grant person,” Cheren says as his Watchog lets him off.

“Did you say Grant?” The olderman asks when he hears Grant’s name.

“Yes. He’s the reason why we’re like this,” Juniper explains about their smaller stature. Luckily Juniper, Skyla and Marshal were able to keep their distant with the normal size people so they wouldn’t shrink. “Why do you know of him?”

“We let him in earlier and let him and his poke’mon rest,” The young man of the house explains to Juniper.

“And he didn’t just shrink you?” Marshal asks as he is surprise that shrinker didn’t shrink this family.

“He must have not wanted to leave trail leading to him,” Cheren suggests as the older woman of the house replies.

“No. He is a very kind boy, he’s just lonely and confuse,”

The older woman remembers at how Grant had a lonely aura around him.

“Really? I don’t think he minded leaving innocent people behind after shrinking them,” Marshal retorts after experiencing running into Grant.

“I think he needs a bit of guidance,” The older woman says and then looks at Touya. “Touya, my dear why don’t you become friends with this Grant person? I think you would be able to help him get his act straighten up,”

The tiny humans are surprise to hear the older women request that Touya would become friends the shrinker.

“Okay, Grams I help him out since you asked,” Touya replies while working on something with the sewing machine.

“Thank you very much dear,” The old woman says with a smile and goes back to cook.

“That’s just like him, always willing to help someone,” Cheren says with a sigh but is kind of envois at Touya’s kindness.

“Yeah, but he if continues to do this, one day it’s going to bite him on the butt,” Sayuri says her concern about Touya actions.

“Yeah… But that’s what I like about him,” Bianca says with a smile as the blonde watches Touya.

“I have to agree. It’s hard to find that kind of person,” Skyla adds with a smile on her own.

“And if does he does get hurt, we’ll help him out some how,” Juniper adds as well with a smile of her own.

“I have to admit kid; you have something that pulls people to you,” Marshal thought as listen to the others.

“Yeah. It’s just like that time with Tornadus and Thundurus,” The young women in front the TV says.

“Really? How so?” Sayuri asks wonder what the connection between Touya and those two legendary poke’mon.

“Well Touya along with women named Touka, both came in this house when lighting storms and tornadoes were near this area. Granny told the two of them at how Tornadus and Thundurus would cause trouble for us. They said they would do something about it since Granny feed some of her vegetable soup. At first we thought they were trying to be kind, but later they came back with both Tornadus and Thundurus at their sides. They made the two legendary poke’mon apologize for causing us trouble,” The old man says and starts to chuckle at remembering that memory.

“Wow! They fought and capture them just to make them apologize to a old women?” Sayuri thought wonders how strong Touya and Touka are now.

“Yep. I remember that Touka caught Tornadus and Touya caught Thundurus,” Juniper thought as she was surprise to get data on those two legendary poke’mon back then.

Touya smiles as he finishes what he is working on doll clothes for the new shrunken people. Pilot clothes for Skyla, Sentience clothes for Juniper and a Gi for Marshal. Touya would give them the clothes after their radiation wore off.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Going for a visit and A request.

choices: "We found nothing like that on you," Alice said.
"Our roommate is checking it out in his lab to make sure it works still."
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Roxie smiled at her father. "I know you're going to be great dad," she said. Her father smiled and leaned down to hug his daughter into his chest.

"You know, part of me likes you this small. It reminds me of when you were a baby," Pop said. "But now you are so grown up. Good luck."

"Thanks dad. Don't worry, the next time you see me, I'll be back to my old size, promise," Roxie said.

------

Nate and Yancy received stares as they entered the warehouse. Of course, it could have been them riding a rhyhorn into it as they sat on her nose. On the side were baskets to carry the goods back to the others. They picked up several bottles of milk, some Rose Incense for his Leavanny and one man jumped at the sight of how strong Rhyhorn was and gave her a black belt.

"I hope the others are having as much fun as us," Nate said softly as they exited to the south.

As they moved, they heard familiar voices. "We make a really good team. I'm glad we became double battlers," said one voice. Looking around, Nate and Yancy saw Jenn and Charles. They were on a smaller bike than the one Charles had before, with the young man in the front basket.

"Well, it just felt right," Jenn said with a smile.

------------

Grant shuddered against the cold. He felt warmth slowly come to him. "How's she doing?" asked a male voice.

"Good. She was badly frozen. She needs a nice rest now," came a female voice. Grant opened his eyes to see a wooden roof over his head. Slowly, he looked and saw a heater near him and not to far away the Tranquill was resting in a bed as well. Her breathing was labored but steady. A young woman a few years older than him was near the bird.

"What . . . What happened?" Grant asked. A young man near the woman turned.

"Oh, you're awake," he said. "I'm Mark. This is Alice. We heard something screeching outside and scratching our door. When we opened the door, we saw you on the ground."

"There were drag marks through the snow. Your Tranquill must have pulled you here in the blizzard," Alice said.

"The bird . . . saved me?" Grant asked.

"What's the last thing you remember?" Alice asked. Grant closed his eyes.

"We . . . we were trying to come to the city when the blizzard hit. Tranquill couldn't keep up in the sudden blizzard and we slowly fell. I . . . grabbed the bird and took the impact," Grant replied.

"You're lucky we have so much snow or you'd be dead," Mark said.

"And you have such a loyal friend too," Alice said as she massaged Tranquill a bit more.

"I . . . do?" Grant whispered. He looked at the bird who saved his life. Why? Was it repaying the kindness he showed it? Her? Or was it more? She was cery happy to help him before. She isn't like what Ghetsis said Pokemon were. They aren't just tools. His eyes widened.

"Um, I was traveling with a toy for . . . a cousin. did I lose it in the fall?" Grant asked.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Hugs and Warmth

choices: With Grant, he notices one of his rescuers has a strange tattoo they keep hidden
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
"We found nothing like that on you," Alice said.

"Perhaps it fell when you were being dragged," Mark said.

"Hopefully," Grant said. He didn't want to lose his only means of power now. He shuddered but whether from the fear of being powerless or the cold, he didn't know. "I have to find it." He tried to rise.

"Not now, you aren't," Alice said. Mark walked over and tossed another heavy blanket on him, dropping Grant to the ground.

"You shouldn't be moving for at least a few hours. Especially with this blizzard hitting us," Mark said. "We can look once the storm passes."

"Even under all the snow?" Grant asked. Alice smiled and drew her pokeball. Out came a tall black-fured dog-beast. Mightyena looked at him before walking over to sniff Grant.

"Pooch is an excellent tracking Pokemon. Once the storm passes, he can look through the snow for your toy," Alice said. Grant looked at the unfamiliar Pokemon. They were a rare find here in Unova. Pooch licked Grant and laid down next to the man.

"Thank you," Grant said. "Will the Bird be okay?"

"Is that her nickname?" Mark asked.

"What?" Grant asked.

"You called your Tranquil 'Bird.' Is it her nickname?" Alice asked.

"Um I guess so," Grant said, not having thought about it really.

----------

The cold winds and snow started coming down on the cabin Touya and the others were inside.

"Well, no flying over the mountain now," Cheren said. "Through the mountain it is."

"You can't. The mountain is a bit unstable at the moment. Once the crews examine the work done and tunnels, then you can pass through," Marshal said.

"How long will that take?" Bianca asked.

"A week, maybe two," Marshal said.

"Blast," Cheren said.

"We should probably get back to the city then, before things get worse," Touya said.

---------

"Oh, look Jenn, it's them," Charles said with a smile. Jenn turned and looked at the fellow shrunken people.

"Oh you two. Thank you again for everything," Jenn said.

"It was nothing," Nate said.

"I know, how about a double battle?" Charles asked. "Could be fun." Yancy smiled.

"Let's go for it," she said. "You want to battle Rhyhorn?" The pokemon growled in the affirmative. Nate nodded and hopped off Rhyhorn and considered who to draw himself.

---------

Hugh held Rosa close to his chest as he was on the back of the large Volcarona. After escaping the sewers, Joy borrowed the Fly HM and taught her newest Pokemon the move. Now they were on their way to Drifveil City once more.

"The typical flying speed of most Pokemon will mean we can get there in just an hour or two, compared to the long hike," Joy said as she sat on her Pokemon.

"We'll make better speed than that with this favorable wind behind us," Rosa said.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Waiting

choices: Nate and the others meet up with Hugh's group
Switch over to Touya's group getting to the city
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
“Thanks, letting us rest her grams,” Touya says for the group as they are about to leave.

“You’re Welcome dear. I hope you all get back to normal,” The older woman says with a smile. “I must say you’re going to make a good husband one day,” The older woman comment on how well made he made the doll clothes for the new shrunken people. It’s been about an hour since the group went into the cabin.

“I have to say this way better then wearing that cloth,” Skyla says as she enjoys being in her pilot doll clothes. “These feel nice and warm,”

“I have to agree. I’m amazed you were able to make these,” Juniper comments on her lab coat and the rest of her clothes.

“These feel just as good as my regular clothes,” Marshal says as he does some punches in the air.

“Oh my you people are just embarrassing me,” Touya says in a newlywed wife type of voice as he turns his head imitating as if he is blushing at the comments.

This got some giggles and laugh from the others.

“I have say I missed your charismatic weirdo moments,” Cheren thought as normal type gym leader is impress at how Touya could make someone and calm them down.

“We’ll see you later,” Bianca says as the group goes out the door.

“Thank you again!” Sayuri yells as they close the door.

___

Nate and Yancy are able to beat the new couple after some good attics with each other.

“Even though we lost… It was fun doing this with you,” Charles says to Jenn.

Jenn blushes at the comment and replies.

“Yes it was fun being on the same team as you,”

Nate and Yancy watch as Charles and Jenn complement about each other in a lovely manner.

“At least those two are happy together,” Nate says with a smile.

“You know I had fun too,” Yancy says with a warm smile towards Touya. “In fact I’ve been having a lot of fun on this adventure with everyone. Especially with Roxie and you,”

“I-I;m glad that you’re enjoying this. It’s been for me as well, It’s hard to imagine what this journey would have been like if I was just traveling by myself,” Nate says with a faint blush on his face.

“I’m glad,” Yancy says with a smile.

“Hey guys!” A voice behind Nate and Yancy yells.

Nate and Yacny look to see that the voice belong to Roxie.

“Looks like you guys were having fun,” Roxie notes as she figures the two had a double battle.

“Yeah. How did things with your father go?” Nate asks the rock start.

“Things went great. Pop is going to stay here and make some movies. He’s still planning on working as a sailor in free time. I’m happy for him,” Roxie replies as she is happy that her father’s dream became true.

“That’s great! I’m glad for you two,” Yancy says with a smile as Roxie blushes a bit.

“Yeah. Thanks,” Roxie says with a smile of her own. “So when do you two want to leave for Mistralton City?”

“I wouldn’t go anywhere for a little bit,” A voice behind them says.

Nate, Yancy and Roxie turn around to see the voice belong to Jenn.

“I heard on the radio there’s going to be blizzard going through that area,” Jenn continues from what she was saying earlier.

“That’s bad. Would we be able to get to Mistraltion city if we go now?’ Nate asks the bigger woman.

“I’m afraid not. They say the blizzard is coming in fast,” Charles answers as he was with Jenn when the radio played that report.

“If that’s the case we better find a place to sleep,” Yancy says and Nate and Roxie nod their heads in agreement.

“Thanks for everything,” Nate says to Charles and Jenn.

“It’s no problem,” Charles says with a smirk.

“I’m glad we were able to help,” Jenn replies with a smile.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Some go back to a city while others stay in a town

choices: Switch over to Grant as he finds something out about his saviors
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Nate, Yancy and Roxie said their good byes to the newly found couple and went back to the Poke’mon center. The trio ride on Yancy’s Rhyhorn and they talk about what they should do.

The trio stops talking when they see large Poke’mon lands in front of the center. The trio is surprise to see that their comrades were getting the large bug type Poke’mon.

“That was a fund ride!” Rosa shouts with a smile as she enjoys flying through the sky.


”Of course you would say that,” Hugh says with a sigh, but he had to admit he did enjoy the flying part.

“At least we made it back. Thank you very much Volcarona,” Joy says with a smile and the bug type makes a happy sound.

“Hey guys!” Roxie shouts at the others.

Hugh, Rosa and Joy turn their heads to see their friends on a Rhyhorn go towards them.

“Hi guys! I thought you would be leaving right away,” Rosa says as the Rhyhorn got close enough.

“Well Yancy and me took some time to get supplies and a tag team battle,” Nate answers as he scratches his head. It was true they could have gone earlier but he felt unprepared.

“It’s not like we can go anyway. There’s a blizzard happening in that area,” Roxie says as she crosses her arms.

“Really. Did the others get there?” Joy asks wondering if the other made it to Mistralton City.

“We have no idea. We can call them once we get inside,” Yancy suggests to the others.

“Okay. Let’s get inside. I’m sort of hungry,” Nate admits as he hasn’t really had anything today.

“Alright. Let’s go everyone,” Joy says with a smile.

The group then enters the poke’ center.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Meeting up with Hugh's group and chose to rest

choices: Stay here as they prepare to leave or leave.
Back to Grant or those in Mistralton.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Time past slowly for Grant. Not having much to do, he thought about the fall, his protecting the pokemon and she protecting him back. It wasn't what his former lord said Pokemon would be like. They were tools. Nothing more.

But why did he feel an interest in making sure Bird was alright? Could it be . . . Pokemon were more than what Ghetsis said? Could N be the one walking the true path?

Alice came over with some tea when he glanced up her right sleeve. A white "A"-like image was inside her clothing, but with a circle at the top. Huh," he said.

"Hm? Something the matter?" Alice asked.

"Your tattoo, it is interesting," Grant said. Alice's face went pale and she stepped back, the tea tray dropped to the floor. Mark was over to her quickly.

"Alice, what's the matter?" Mark asked. He glared at Grant. "What did you say to her?" His voice was hard now. He looked like a contained volcano close to erruption.

Alice took a breath and calmed herself like a sea after a storm. "Nothing. It's nothing," she said softly. She bit her lip and looked down. She didn't want him to catch her lie.

"I'm sorry for asking about the tattoo," Grant said.

"Tattoo?" Mark asked. He touched his left arm.

"It's nothing," Alice said in a pained voice. "Please, leave it be Mark."

"I know we come from the same country. I need to know," he whispered back, "Is . . . Is it the shape of an 'A' or 'M'?"

"A . . . for Aqua," she said as she looked him in the eyes. The pain she tried to keep inside poured out with her tears.

"Aqua?" Grant asked. "Are they like Plasma?"

"No. We wanted to work together with our Pokemon, to make their lives better. We focused on expanding the seas to help water pokemon primarily," Alice explained, not looking from Mark.

"While Team Magma focused on expanding the lands and reducing the surface area of water," Mark said. He rolled his left sleeve up, revealing a red and black M-like shape. Alice gasped when she saw it. Silence fell as Pooch opened an eye to watch the conflict.

"You . . . . Your . . . ." Alice whispered. She stepped back. Mark took her by the wrist, grasping as gently as he would a grape. He pulled her gently towards her.

"Still your boyfriend. I . . . I care about you Alice, regardless of your past. Remember what that hero taught us?" Mark asked.

"Hero?" Grant whispered, but his saviors didn't seem to notice him any longer.

"Neither land nor sea could win completely against the other, or many would suffer. They need each other," she said as she remembered seeing that hero stand before the mighty Groudon and Kyogre when the incredible green dragon came from the sky. She left her team not long after, taking a ferry to Sinnoh, but left soon after when the team there was causing trouble. She made her way here and found Mark.

"And I've come to realize, I need you . . . I love you," he replied. Tears, now of joy, came from her eyes. She went to him and hugged.

Grant watched in awed silence. He thought to his own actions, to the team he was part of. Would they be as accepting of his choices?

------

"Oh no. You Skyla was shrunk?" Castelion Joy asked as she talked with Mistralton Joy.

"Yes. As was Lady Professor Juniper and Marshal," her cousin said. Driftveil Joy gasped at the thought of one of the Elite Four was shrunk now.

"What's the weather there like?" the tinier Joy asked.

"Pretty bad, but I think the Chargestone Mountains will block the brunt of it from going any further," the Joy on the phone said. "Look, I'm sorry but I need to go. Some people came in with some injured Pokemon."

"Go. By all means," the shrunken Joy said. The call ended. She turned to where her friends were eating and packing up the goods between those who could carry things and those whose Pokemon would act as mules.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Redemption, Acceptance, and Stalled

choices: The group gets to Chargestone Mountains quickly.
The group thakes their time to get Chargestone Mountains.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
"So we can travel and not have to worry about the blizzard for most of the time?" Nate asks Joy as they finish their meal.

"Yes. We just need to worry about it when we exit Chargestone Mountains on the other side," Joy replies back as the small nurse gets near Volcarona.

"We'll just run for the Poke'Center when we exit," Rosa chimes in.

"I would be doing the running for you," Hugh adds as the Tiny Rosa is sitting on his Shoulder.

"That's fine," Rosa replies to Hugh and the young man sighs but with a smile.

"Alright. Since we're done here let's get going," Roxie says with a smile as Yancy nods in agreement.

"Okay, let's go," Nate says with a smile.

Joy and Hugh chose to walk for their travels. Rose chose to stay on Hugh's shoulder enjoying being with the young man. Nate, Roxie and Yancy rode on Yancy's Rhyhorn.

"Looks like those three are getting close," Joy thought as the small nurse looks at the group on the Rhyhorn. "I wonder what they are going to do after this is all over? I suppose I would go back to Virbank....." Joy starts to wonder what she wanted to do.

"What's wrong Joy?" Hugh asks the Nurse net to him.

"It's nothing Hugh. Thanks for asking," Joy replies with a smile.

"Okay," Hugh replied back as turns his head to look forward.

Rosa on the other hand notice that Joy is still thinking about something.

"I need to ask what's wrong," Rosa thought as the group walks out of Driftveil City.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Leaving for the Chargestone Mountains.

choices: They come across a mysterious Pokemon.  It seemed to have been owned before.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
The trip to the river was quick. The six found the HM Surf at the Season's lab and continued on. As they came to the river, they stopped for a short rest to relieve themselves before entering the cave. In a place like Chargestone cave, one didn't discharge fluids near those rocks. Nate walked towards the bridge and river. As he approached, he saw a giant, to him, Pokemon.. His fur was a steely blue. He looked intently at Nate. Nate gulped and in a flash, the Pokemon ran off.

"Nate?" came a voice. Nate turned and saw Hugh coming towards him. "What's the matter?"

"I saw . . . I saw this large Pokemon. I don't know what it was, but it was amazing," Nate said.

"Well, let's tell the others," Hugh said.

Nate nodded and allowed his friend to carry him.

----

"So you both let go of them?" Bianca asked as they rested in the Pokemon Center.

"Touko and I didn't feel right holding the Four Swords of Justice," Touya said.

"Well, I wonder where they could be now," Cheren said.

"The Swords of Justice?" Sayuri asked.

"Four Pokemon who defend others from evil actions. They came to me and Touko when we faced Plasma before," he explained. Sayuri nodded.

-----

Nate explained to the others what transpired as a new person approached them. They turned to see Rood standing there. "Forgive me for coming like this. I was wondering if Miss Sayuri is here, but . . . I don't believe just what I saw."

"Was it a big blue Pokemon?" Nate asked.

"Yes. Cobalion is a truly majestic Pokemon," he said.

"I've heard Cobalion and the others appear when Pokemon are in danger," Joy said.

"Indeed Miss Joy. I must wonder did Cobalion appear in front of you merely by accident? Or to plead with you to solve a problem? Unlike Lord N, I don't have the ability to understand the minds of Pokémon. Therefore, I don't know what that Pokémon is thinking. But if you can befriend Cobalion, it will be a great asset to you on your journey."

"I'm sure it isn't some coincidence," Roxie said as she put her hand on Nate's shoulder. Rood nodded.

"Well, Sayuri is off with one of the heroes who helped stop you before, going after the one who shrank us," Rosa said. Rood nodded again.

"I understand. Best of luck:" Rood said. They nodded and continued on their way. Nate was silent as he thought about the Pokemon they saw.

They entered the deep cave, their hairs raising up from all the electricity in the air.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Steel and and Stares

choices: It was one of N's Pokemon.  Either Klink or Joltik.
Back to Grant or those in Chargestone Cave
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Rosa road on Zorua as they moved through the cave. They traversed the electricity-filled cavern's traps and tricks. Ferroseeds, Klinks, and Joltiks were common foes. "We're getting a lot of experience here," Hugh said. His Pignite grunted in approval as he led the group.

"A great many Pokemon here are weak to fire," Joy said as her Darmanitan carried her.

"Which makes those Boldores a real pain," Roxie said.

They went to the lower region when a noise caught Hugh's attention. A strange cooing sound, like one of sadness. "Hey, hold up," he said to the others. "I want to check this out." The others nodded. He moved to an outcropping of rocks as quietly as he could move. His Pignite surprised him with the level of stealth the sumo pig could use.

Only Rosa followed behind on her deathly silent Zorua.

A ferroseed was under the cropping, crying it seemed. There was a strangeness about it. Hugh couldn't put his finger on. "Hey there," he said. The Pokemon turned and looked at Hugh. It hopped forward and stared at the shrunken human. It made a happy sound and looked past Hugh to Rosa and her mount.

Zorua made a happy noise and moved forward on his own volition. He carefully rubbed against the iron barbed pokemon so as not to get hurt. "They . . . know each other," Hugh realized.

"Could this be one of N's Pokemon?" Rosa asked.

"Probably. Like Darmanitan," Hugh said. "Hey Ferroseed, do you want to come with us?" The grass-steel looked at him and nodded. Hugh brought out a Pokeball and tossed it at him. He captured the Pokemon easily.

-----------

Sayuri looked out at the now calm snowfall. "This is bad. From what they're saying we're going to be here for three more days," Cheren sighs deeply at being stuck at the center.

"Then we'll use this time to rest," Juniper says as the tiny professor needs to check up on things while they're staying at the center.

"May . . . May I ride on my Ducklett?" Sayuri asked, looking up at the giant hero.

"Do we trust her?" Marshall asked.

"Of course we should," Touya said. "You treat someone like a criminal and they will soon believe the worst of themselves." Sayuri smiled and nodded.

"Then, mind if I go out and practice riding her?" Sayuri asked.

"I'll come too," Bianca said with a smile. Sayuri nodded and they went out into the snow-covered lands.

"It's good to those two are getting along," Skyla says with a smile. The flying gym leader then looks at Touya. "Touya there's something I want to talk to you about. So can some where a little more private?"

Touya nods his head in agreement and Touya picks up the tiny flying gym leader and goes to more private area.

"Mmmm. I wonder what they are going to talk about," Cheren thought. Cheren didn't think about as Marshall and him have a talk as well.

-----------

Ducklett came out and shivered.

"Sorry girl," Sayuri said. "Would you mind giving me a lift?" Her Pokemon squeeled in joy and lowered herself. Sayuri climbed on top and was soon in the air. They didn't go very far from the ground, just enough practice to stay on board. But as they flew by the trees, a gust of wind came at them and unsettled the flying Ducklett, and threw Sayuri off her.

Bianca yelled and raced after her, calling out her Stoutland to carry her through the snow. Ducklett shot into the woods after her.

-----------

Sayuri groaned and shivered in the deep cold. Her body ached as snow covered up her tiny exit. Her breathing became quick as she feared for her own life. She was going to die. She was certain of that. But then something was pushing the snow away. A hoof of some Pokemon. Once cleared, a pale yellow muzzle reached in and pulled her gently out. Her Ducklett made a happy nose and she was put on Ducklett's back. Her eyes couldn't focus properly on the one who saved her as it ran off quickly, but there watching her was another Pokemon. Her eyes focused a bit and she recognized the creature.
1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.title: Old Friends and Practice

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
It felt weird to see a Joltik big enough to ride on but the tiny woman is glad to see one of her old leader's Poke'mon. Ducklett at first is surprise at the other Poke'mon but when the duck sees that her master knows the electric type, the blue duck relaxes. Sayuri pets the electric bug and the Joltik makes happy sounds from Sayuri's touch.

"Sayuri! I'm glad to see you okay!"

Sayuri looks to see where the yell come from and sees that the shout come from Bianca while riding the Stoutland. The Stoutland stops where Sayuri is and the other tiny woman gets off the dog Poke'mon to check on Sayuri. At first Bianca starts to shake from stepping into snow since the blond's doll shoes were not the best in the snow. Bianca shakes it off as she goes over to Sayuri.

"You look okay," Bianca says as she gets next to Sayuri. "But are you feeling okay?" Bianca then touches Sayuri's head. Bianca felt even colder from touching Sayuri's head. "You're freezing now. We need to get back to the center,"

"A-Alright," Sayuri replies and then looks at the Joltik and asks. "Do you want to come with me? It must lonely with him gone,"

Joltik makes happy noises from Sayuri inviting him to join her. Bianca wonders for a moment how Sayuri knew this Joltik but is happy that Sayuri is able to make another Poke'mon friend. Bianca helps Sayuri gets on Ducklett as Joltik gets on as well. After making sure Sayuri would stay on Ducklett the tiny blond went back to Stroutland and gets on the dog Poke'mon. The group goes back to the Center.

_____

"And that's what I want you to do," Skyla says to the giant hero and waits for his response. Touya nods in agreement and would do the request that the tiny flying type gym leader asked.

"So what is it that you two talking about?" A voice asks as from behind the two.

Touya turns his head while Sklya moves to see who ask the question. The person who ask the question is no other then Juniper.

"Oh Professor. I was just asking Touya to do us a favor," Skyla answers for the older woman.

"What's the favor?" Juniper asks as the Professor is getting a bit curious about what the favor could be.

"Well... It's about how you wanted to fly to Opelucid City," Skyla starts to explain and then continues on when Juniper nods. "I with the weather the way it is I don't think the plane nor Pokemon would be able to get there. So I figure we can go to Lentimas Town since its the closest place where we can land. But since I've reduce to five inches I asked Touya here to fly the plane,"

"Really. Touya can fly a plane," Juniper impress that the young man also had another life skill. "When did you learn to fly a plane,"

"Well...." Skyla starts and then answers the question. " He got some lessons from me. I owed him one since my old gym puzzle almost hurt him badly."

Juniper remembers that Skyla's old gym puzzle involved people being shot of cannons. So it was Touya who put a stop to that puzzle.

"I felt like a bird," Touya comments on the gym's old puzzle.

"I'm glad you understood what I was trying to do. Must people didn't understand what I meant with the cannons," Skyla says with a smile on her face, happy Touya understood what the old gym puzzle meant.

Juniper sighs with a smile. The young man would say some weird things from time to time but it seem to make people happy.

The three of couldn't talk for long when they heard the door to center open. Since Cheren and Marshal were closer to the door they saw Bianca riding her Stroutland with Ducklett carrying a freezing Sayuri and Joltik.

"What happen?" Cheren asks as the Stroutland gets closer to the table.

"Sayuri fell on off Ducklett. She's fine but I think she need to warm up a bit," Bianca explains what happen to the others.

"Let's get her room then," Marshal says, he didn't really trust the ex-plasma member but didn't want her to freeze.

"I can do that. But I think someone should be with her," Mistralton Joy says as picks up the Ducklett with no problem.

"Okay. Touya and I can be with until she warms up," Bianca volunteers her self and one the hero of ideals.

"I'll join you as well. I want to make sure she's okay," Skyla adds as the red head would trust Sayuri since Touya put trust in the ex-plasma.

"I'll come with you as well. There are some things I want to ask her," Juniper adds as well wanting to know as much as possible what Plasma is doing.

"T-Thanks everyone," Sayuri says through some shivers.

"I'll take you to the room now," Mistralton Joy says and then adds. "Also I had a talk with my sisters from Driftveil. Your friends are on their way,"

"Oh good. Soon we'll be back together then," Bianca says with a smile.

Mistralton Joy while carrying the Ducklett that had Sayuri and Joltik to a room. Touya picks up Skyla and Juniper to help them to get to the room and follows the Mistalton Joy. Bianca joins as well and Chereen and Marshal watch them leave.

"I guess we'll stay here to explain the situation to them then," Cheren says as he waits for new friends to come though the door.

"It's going to be nice the fresh new faces," Marshal says with a smile. "Some of them are your students right?"

"Yep. I'm proud of them as well," Cheren complements Nate and Hugh.

Marshal nods with a smile, glad that Cheren was able to find his path.

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
While the weather was not the nicest on the southern side of the great western mountain range of Unova, the northern side was coming to a better light. The blizzard came to an end and Grant was strong enough to move around. Mark took Bird to the local Pokemon Center, which worried Grant that she might trigger some theft if they look into her ID. But because, unknown to Grant, Bird being released willingly by her former trainer made any checks like that be past with flying colors. She was clearly happy being back near him as he walked outside as Pooch sniffed through over three feet of snow for his device.

"Is this much snow typical?" Grant asked.

"No. We might get a few feet, but nothing like the blizzard from the past few days," Mark said. Alice walked out of the home. She carried a tray as she trudged through the snow.

"Anyone want some hot cocoa?" Alice asked. Mark smiled and went to her. He killed her on the cheek.

"I'd love some," Mark said.

"Grant?" Alice asked.

"Yes. Please," he said. He went to her and took the hot mug. It was well made.

Sudden barking made Grant jump, spilling his drink onto the snowy ground, and he turned to see Pooch the Mightyena was digging through the snow. He lifted his head and the shrinking device

"That's it," Grant said with a smile. Pooch walked over to him and Bird made some happy noises. Grant took the device and took a deep breath.

"Wonderful. You did great Pooch," Alice said. The dark pokemon barked joyfully.

"Well, I must be going," Grant said. He didn't want to stay. Didn't want to find some need to shrink these nice people.

"You can't," Mark said. "You're still not fully well."

"I have some obligations that need to be met," Grant said. "Come on Bird." She nodded and flew above him as he began walking away.

"Grant, wait. At least let me pack you some food and other gear," Alice said. Grant stopped and nodded.

"That would probably be wise to have," he said. "Thank you for your kindness." His friends nodded.

"Let's get inside. I have more cocoa on the stove," Alice said.

-----------

Sayuri laid under the covers of the towel that served as bedding and blanket for her cold body. She looked at the tiny women close by. Bianca and Juniper were slowly quizzing her on all she knew about her group and their plans.

As she spoke and realized how little, she knew, she began to feel a little better. Not in her ignorance, but in how departing from them might have been for the best.

Ducklett was sleeping close to her i her own bed with n's Joltick inside the fowl's feathers.

And watching all with a nice smile was Touya. If not for him, her life would be so much different.

"Do you have anything else you want to know?" Sayuri asked with a yawn.

“It’s called the Plasma Frigate. I don’t know. They never told anything to the grunts’ about it,” Sayuri replies as she looks down at the sheets. “Though when I was onit was really cold for some reason,”

“Cold…. It’s true that when you go further up in air the temperature does lower when you are exiting the earth’s atmosphere. But there’s no way that Frigate thing go up that high,” Skyla says as the flying expect saw some video of the Plasma Frigate. It’s true that the Frigate could fly high in the air but there’s no way it can go that high up.

“Maybe the reason for it being cold is because of an ice type Poke’mon,” Bianca suggest as the science assistant is throwing out ideas.

“I think Bianca is right,” Touya agrees with the tiny blonde’s hypothesis.

“I think Bianca is right as well. But could there be Poke’mon that could help freeze over Unova?” Juniper asks out loud and then starts to think.

Touya starts to join in with Juniper thinking as well. The half hero of ideals tries to think what Poke’mon it could be. He had a feeling what Poke’mon it was but it kept on escaping him. The same could be said about Juniper as the tiny professor had a feeling as well but it was escaping her as well.

“Well I’m glad you guys are here,” Skyla says with giggle. “My head hurts if I think too much about this sort of thing,”

“Don’t sell yourself out,” Bianca reassures the flying type gym leader. “You are an expert flyer,”

“I know Bianca. I’m just saying I’m not good at thinking about stuff like the Professor,” Skyal responds to Bianca. “But thanks for the complement,”

Sayuri is quite surprise at how everyone is acting but is happy to see that the explasma is with good people. The tiny orange hair woman would find out what she wanted to do as long she is with these people.

“This place is quite beautiful,” Yancy says the start watches the electricity that goes through the cave.

“Yeah. I bet it would be nice place to take someone a date,” Roxie says as the rocker nudges Nate.

“Um… Yeah,” Nate stumbles with his words. The young man couldn’t still believe that the two girls next to him liked him more than a friend. But Nate is having a good time being with the both of them during their travels. He hope they could still be together after all of this is over.

Unknown to the three tiny humans they were being watch by their comrades. Joy, Hugh and Rose are behind a large rock as they watch.

“So do you think they’ll do anything if stay still for a little bit?” Rosa asks the larger two humans.

“I don’t know. Nate’s been very shy about it,” Hugh answers back in a soft voice.

Joy…..

"Let's wait," Joy said with a small nod. "I just don't like eavesdropping on something so personal." Hugh smiled.

"Hey, what did Yancy just do?" Rosa asked.

"What happened?" Joy asked, looking back.

-----

Nate blushed deeply as Yancy held his arm. It wasn't the normal way, with her hand and his entwined. His hand was pulled and pressed against her chest. He had never touched a woman there before (not to say he hadn't dreamed about it).

"Just being here, you and your girlfriend," Yancy said as she seemed oblivious to her actions.

"With all the electric charging about, you could have a real nice picnic," Roxie added as she took the other arm. "You get a free light show. All you need is some repel to keep away unwanted guests." She glanced at Yancy.

Nate walked the fine balancing act with both women at his side and holding his arms. "Especially since everything seems more beautiful when we are this small." Both young women looked at him and smiled.

----------

Grant finished his preparations when he looked out the window on the clear day. The great tower rose up high into the sky. He thought back to several years ago when Lord N ascended it and found one of the legendary Pokemon waiting for him. Tranquil rubbed against him as he looked and he absentmindedly scratched her.

"Alright," Alice said with a smile. "I have everything packed up for you." Grant turned to her and smiled.

"Thank you," Grant said.

"Look, traveling in this cold is dangerous, especially alone," Mark said. "I''d ask you to at least travel with another person."

"Don't worry, I got Bird," Grant said. "Thank you for everything." He accepted the pack and noticed unused Pokeballs in the side pocket.

"Be well Grant. I hope your journey is a wonderful one," Alice said. Pooch barked happily. Grant walked out of the building with Bird at his side. He looked at the snow-covered town and considered his options. He could see this mysterious tower or head on.

Since he shrunk those three south of the mountains, who knew when the next trouble would find him. He should be moving. But at the same time, he knew not all his foes could be beaten by just Bird and he might not get lucky the next time with her distracting them.

Maybe he could make a new friend in the tower.
