Grant looked through his bag as he remembered one key fact: He didn't bring any Pokeballs with him from the frigate! But oddly enough, in one pouch, some Pokeballs could be found. A note was in that pocket.

Grant, when I was putting together this sack, I noticed you didn't have any Poke Balls. I don't know how many you hadm but it is always wise to travel with a few in case you want more friends. I hope they help you out.

Your friend,
Alice.

Grant smiled and grabbed a blue one with yellow stripes on it. He recognized it as a quick ball. He looked at the dragon sharpening his claws on some stone and the other one just standing very still. Throwing now wold increase his chances of getting them. Getting ready, he threw the ball hard at the taller statue-like Pokemon. However, his aim was poor and the ball struck the dragon instead. The statue pokemon turned and looked at him.

"Golurk" it rumbled before the ground began to shake. Grant steadied himself and Bird took to the air. The Quick Ball returned to Grant's hand, signalling a good capture.

"Bird, Wing attack," Grant said. Bird trilled and flew. It struck the Golurk but the Pokemon wasn't affected much. "Maybe they are stronger than I've faced before?" Grant realized.

Golurk then began to glow yellow. It moved surprising speed and slammed hard into Bird. Bird screamed in pain and fell to the ground. Bird was barely awake and badly injured Grant recalled Bird and had an angry look in his eyes.

"You don't hurt my friend," he muttered before calling out his freshly caught Druddigon. "Dragon, slash him up!" His Pokemon glared at him and then to the Golurk. He scratched his muzzle instead. "Please!

The dragon-type walked towards the Golurk and made a growl. Golurk's fist became hard and it struck Druddigon. Grant's new Pokemon growled in pain as it looked at the ghost-ground type. Golurk seemed to be moving slower now. A sneer formed on Druddigon's face and now slashed at Golurk with darkened claws.

Golurk fell back in pain. It made a cry of pain. Grant picked out a black and green ball. He threw it hard and this time struck Golurk. The tall Pokemon rumbled against the ball but fell to the ball's power. Druddigon smiled and went to sleep. Grant brought back Druddigon.

"What a pain you are, you Dragon," Grant muttered. His thoughts turned to the injured Bird. He looked at the Pokeball. Before he would continuue on, it would be best to go back to that city and give her a rest at the Pokemon Center.

Maybe the Joy there could explain what happened with Dragon too.

-------

Along the way, Roxie and Yancy would make sly comments about things while glaring at the other one.

1511212211211111221122111111112211112111.content:
Pop Roxie raced down the way and reached the center. He stumbled through the doors and looked around. "Roxie?" he called out.

"Sorry, you just missed them," a store clerk said. "Mister Clay took them to the south." Pop Roxie sighed and nodded before turning around.

------

Cheren landed before a grand building with lights He got off his Unfezant and put him back in his ball. Glancing around, he saw the great ship at port. He moved to the vending machines were a man dressed strangely was waiting. Cheren stared at the man before they gave each other a hug.

"Good to see you man," Cheren said. Crimson smiled.

"Likewise. Shoot. It's been, what? Eighteen months?" Crimson asked. Crimson took his mask off and Cheren looked at his childhood friend's cousin. One of the heroes of Unova who helped change N's mind. He could have claimed one of the great dragons, Kyurem, but chose not to.

"Think so. So, I'm a gym leader now. Bianca's a research assistant for Prof. Juipers. What's up with you?"

"Been around to new lands. Met other champions. One guy was a real silent type, you know? Though he was a wicked battler. Oh Touko sends her love," Touya said. Cheren nodded and thought about the one who did take the fame to let her cousin sit in the background.

"So, you are okay with this?" Touya asked. Cheren nodded.

"Yea. Clay knows about it too. Oh, do you know Plasma's latest action?" Cheren asked. Touya's eyes darkened a little.

"Yeah I saw Clay," Touya said. He saw the shock on Cheren's face.

"Clay was shrunk too?" Cheren asked.

"Only about a foot. His Mamoswine took a hit and touched him a little time after," Touya said. Cheren sighed.

"This is really strange. Why? What's the point?" Cheren asked.

"I know why. I was able to convince one shrunken grunt named Sayuri to turn away from Plasma and told Clay. I overheard," Touya said. Cheren listened.

"Alright. Well, here are my friends," Cheren said before bringing out Stoutland, Cinccino, and Watchdog. "Follow him for a short time, okay?" His Pokemon nodded and returned to their balls. The Crimson Mask went on and he accepted his Pokemon.

"Thanks," Crimson said before walking off.

-------

Clay led the group of shrunken persons to the great building. "Here we are! Whaddya think? Great buildin', huh? Here's where the Pokémon World Tournament takes place! Ain't she purty? Follow me!"

"Really amazing sight," Bianca said. "This is so exciting."

"I know. To meet so many people," Joy said.

As they entered the building's reception a man dressed in strange clothes was up near the front. He walked into the hall down the way.

"Now, the first tournament is the Driftveil tournament," Clay said. "Eight challengers and only one can become champion. I'm going to join."

"A chance to rock people off their seats? Count me in," Roxie said.

"Sounds like a great idea," Hugh said.

"Yeah it does," Nate said. "Will you join Yancy?"

"Um, are foreign Pokemon allowed?" Yancy asked. Clay shook his head.

"Not for their tournament," Clay said.

"I think I'll do it," Bianca said. "Been a while since I've done something like this."

"Then walk up there and get registered," Clay said.

The group nodded and registered. The participants waited in separate rooms for their turn. Joy and Yancy walked to a private viewing box and found Cheren there. "Oh. I'm sorry," Cheren said.

"Thank you Cheren," Joy said as she sat down and they waited.

"First up in this premiere battle! The calculating scientist Corless! And his opponent the mysterious Crimson!" A tall man with a confident walk moved forward and a masked man came from the other side.

"Here we go," Cheren said softly.

-----

Crimson looked at Corless. "Nice mask," Corless said.

"Thank you. The same to you," Crimson said. He pulled out a ball and tossed out Stoutland.

Corless pulled out magneton. "Begin!" came the announcer.

"Wild charge," Crimson said. Stoutland barked and rushed in.

"Thunderwave.' Corless said coolly. The electrical blast struck Stoutland but he still hit.

"Strength," Crimson said.

"Mirror shot!" Corless said. Stoutland tried to move but couldn't. The blast hit him.

------

Cheren bit his lip in frustration. He knew the plan. He knew why Crimson was here, but he didn't like this one bit.

15121.content:
"Ungh! Get back here, you!" Hilda shouted as she ran through the woods, chasing down her prey, a rather quick Zebstrika.

The teenaged girl trainer, Hilda, had been scouting Pokemon in the woods to add to her ever growing collection so she could fill out her Pokedex. Unfortunately for her, her luck had not been up to snuff so far, with many of her attempts ending in failure. And as luck would have it, this newest attempt was looking to end the same way, as Hilda soon lost sight of her much needed Zebstrika through the woods.

"Dang it!" Hilda said as she slow to a stand still. She hit the air in frustration, and promptly sat down on a nearby tree stump to think.

So far her luck wasn't so good, but she had something new on her side today. Hilda reached into her purse and pulled out a small gun-shaped peripheral. It was an invention by the famous Pokemon Professor Juniper, who had given the latest device to the young brunette for all her hard work on filling up the Pokedex. But Juniper hadn't just given the device away, she'd warned Hilda to be very careful with it and not to overuse it.

"I know you said it was still in experimental phases, but I think you'll get why I have to use it after I catch a whole bunch of Pokemon!" Hilda justified use of the device to herself.

Hilda looked over the device, eyeing its gun-like shape and deceptively simple controls. Two buttons, a red one labeled "Shrink", and a blue one labeled "Grow". Hilda smiled to herself, this size changing ray gun was just what she needed to capture some Pokemon. In her mind it made sense that if she could shrink a Pokemon down to pocket size before attempting to catch it in a Pokeball, then its capture would be easy simply because it was made smaller and weaker by the device.

Hilda got up off the stump and turned the device over, pointing it at herself. She recalled the demonstration that Juniper had given her at the Pokemon lab...

---

Earlier in the morning, Juniper had used the size gun to shrink and grow various objects around the room. She told Hilda that she'd been working on the ray for weeks, and after many revisions, was almost ready to reveal it to the world.

Excited by the prospect of size changing, Hilda begged for a turn with the gun, and after a few more tests, Juniper allowed her to try it out for herself. Hilda practically beamed as she zapped things up and down in size around the room, getting a feel for handling the size ray. But then, in her excitement, Hilda tried something a bit crazy and zapped Prof. Juniper on "Shrink" mode, quickly reducing the genius woman down to the size of a doll.

Hilda's eyes went wide as she watched her beloved Professor shrink down in size, bewildered and amazed by the whole process. Juniper on the other hand was not as pleased with the results.

Things got a bit heated after that, but Juniper tried to remain calm and explain how to reverse her shrinking to Hilda. Embarrassed, but a little amused nonetheless, Hilda listened to the Professor and quickly restored her to full size. After that, Juniper snatched the size gun away from Hilda and explained to her that it was not a toy to be used like that. Hilda hung her head low in shame and listened to the lecture.

Later, Hilda and Juniper said their goodbyes on good terms after that, and the topic of the size ray had been replaced with discussion about Hilda's progress on her Pokedex. Hilda smiled as she left the lab to continue her journey. All the while, Juniper never knew that Hilda had secretly taken the size ray with her, having smuggled it into her purse when Juniper had left the room for just a moment.

Hilda grinned as she imagined the uses she could get out of this gun, and merrily rode her bike out of town...

--

After all that the truth was that Juniper had not technically given Hilda the right to use her latest creation, but she had actually given her warnings, plenty of them. Now that Hilda was out here in the woods, and desperate from her lack of success so far, she felt she'd earned the right to use it at least once to see if it would help her any.

"Thanks, Professor!" Hilda said happily, if not a little smugly as well, as she hugged the device to her chest. She then set it down on the same tree stump she was just sitting on and played with the settings. She knew that it was as simple as pressing one of the two buttons to get it into either mode, and then simply pulling the trigger to activate it. Hilda smiled and set the device to "Shrink" mode.

"Now, to wait for a Pokemon!" Hilda exclaimed. Time passed, with no Pokemon coming by. Hilda was starting to get restless and bored. She set the size ray down on the tree stump to go look for some Pokemon to lure back, but just as she did a Pansage popped out from the bushes!

"Yes!" Hilda exclaimed with a fist pump. Pansage wasn't exactly a rare to get Pokemon, but she'd take any win she could get at this point. She looked down and grabbed at her Pokeballs instinctively, but before she threw one, she remembered the size ray she left on the tree stump. She put the Pokeballs back in her purse and turned to grab the size ray, but when she looked up she saw that the Pansage had already grabbed it!

"Hey! You let that go! That's mine, and it's how I'm going to catch you!" Hilda yelled, pointing at the Pokemon and stomping over to it. The Pansage cried and looked worried, as if it understood what Hilda was saying to it. It looked around frantically in a panic, before its eyes locked onto the size ray. It aimed the size ray at Hilda.

"Whoa!" Hilda gasped as the tables had turned on her and stopped in her tracks, holding her arms up high as if she were being robbed. She started to worry that this Pansage was smarter than she thought, but realized that there was no way a Pokemon would really be able to figure out how to use such a complicated device.

Hilda chuckled lightly as she realized how foolish she was being, and decided to quickly run over and get the device back from the Pansage. But just as she did, there was a bright flash that shot out from the ray, blinding Hilda momentarily and once again stopping her in her tracks.

Hilda covered her eyes. Though she couldn't see, she could still hear the Pansage cry out as the ray activated. Hilda cried too, but this was from knowing that when she opened her eyes again she was going to see the world from a much different perspective. The moment passed and Hilda could see again, she winced before slowly opening her eyes to see that...
15121.title: Hilda's story

choices: The Pansage was still there holding the size ray
The Pansage had left with the size ray
The Pansage had left, but the size ray was still there
151213.content:
"No way..." Hilda said in soft awe. As she expected, the Pansage had indeed managed to turn the tables and shrink her. But to her surprise, she'd shrunken way smaller than she ever expected!

The tiny girl stood still from the newfound fear of her expanded surroundings, trees that towered over her before were now like skyscrapers in Castlelia City, flowers and bushes now took on the same towering stature that the trees had when she was normal-sized, and even the grass she was in now threatened to swallow her up it was so big, blades of grass were nearly as big as she was!

Hilda couldn't be more than 3 inches tall!

The recently reduced girl took in her new, much bigger world, with awe. She was equal parts afraid and amazed by how small she had become. She wondered if this is what Juniper had felt like when she had shrunk her. But that was in a more controlled setting, Hilda thought, out here in the wild, only 3 inches tall, was a completely different story.

"Pan! Pan! Pansage!" The petty Pokemon cried from above.

Hilda looked up and saw the culprit of her shrinking dancing high above her on a tree stump. Pansage's were normally not so big, but at her new scale Hilda likened the creature's comparative size to that of an Onix, or even bigger! And the stump that it was on was even bigger than her house!

"Hey, you... you thief!" Hilda hesitated to say the words a little, knowing full well that she had stolen the size ray in the first place to shrink some Pokemon. She thought it ironic now that she was the one being shrunken by Pokemon instead!

"Give that back!" Hilda stomped her tiny foot and pointed up, way up, at the towering Pokemon. Hilda's curiosity at the her and the world's new scales was gone, replaced by an angry 3-inch tall girl's determination to catch this menace of a Pokemon, not to mention get herself back to normal size.

Always athletic and somewhat hot-headed, Hilda wasn't going to let being shrunken to smaller than a Joltik stop her from getting her revenge. So she ran over to the stump, not caring about what she would, or even could, do to the much larger and much stronger Pokemon to get the size ray back. All she cared about was getting the size ray back, growing herself back to normal, then shrinking the Pokepunk and catching it!

However, Hilda soon ran into her first roadblock, the very stump she needed to climb to even get face-to-toe with the mean Pansage. As she noted before, it was even bigger than her whole house. But luckily for Hilda, her new size allowed her to see some new tiny details on the dark bark, namely small little indents that she could use as handholds to climb up the worn-down former tree.

Hilda wasted no time in starting her ascent, climbing up the stump with a renewed vigor courtesy of her will to restore her size. On the way up, Hilda took some time to appreciate that being small allowed her to climb that stump, but at the same time she knew that if she hadn't shrunk in the first place, she'd never need to worry about such things. It was interesting to the shrunken girl that her small size seemed to make climbing the rough stump a little easier. Hard surfaces like the stump might've been a pain to deal with at normal size, but in her reduced state, Hilda was having no trouble lifting herself towards her goal at the top.

After several minutes of climbing, Hilda finally pulled herself up over the top of the stump. She stood up triumphantly, smiling brightly and feeling confident, amazed at how much energy she still had after that. She wondered if her reduced weight had anything to do with it. After celebrating her small victory, Hilda looked ahead and saw that...
151213.title: Shrunk by her own folly

1512133.content:
Hilda gasped when she saw the Pansage was nowhere to be seen. She worried for a brief moment that it had taken off with the much needed size ray. But when she looked down she saw that the size ray was still there, much to her relief.

"I swear I'll get that Pansage back for this!" Hilda promised to herself as she walked over to the size ray. The tree stump was not so large, so it wasn't a long walk. What amazed Hilda though, was the fact that she actually had trouble fitting on it before when she sat on it at her normal size, but now it was big enough that she could walk across it at all. This reinforced her thoughts that she was way too small and needed to get herself back to normal pronto!

Hilda walked up the size gun, noticing how big it was to her now. It towering over her like a small building, even though she holding it comfortably in one hand just minutes ago. Hilda shook her head, she hated how she kept comparing herself to everything, it was an instinctive reaction, and one that did interest her a little to see how small she now was, but one that made her feel all the smaller nonetheless.

"So this is the shrink ray, it's pretty big now..." Hilda noted, putting her hand on it's side. The device didn't appear to be damaged at all, Hilda noticed with relief. The only thing that she needed now was to figure out how to operate it at her size, and in a way that she could restore herself. But being stuck only 3-inches tall has a huge hindrance to that plan, as she was far too small to both pull the trigger and receive the ensuing blast of energy.

"What to do... If only there was a delay function..." Hilda murmured to herself, hand on her chin as she thought about how to approach this situation.

"Well, first things first, I better make sure I can still even push the trigger in..." Hilda surmised, hoping that she wasn't too small and weak to do at least that.

Hilda moved, hopping over the trigger's handle like a large fence and moving closer to the trigger itself. Hilda stretched her arms out and prepared herself to push hard. Much to her surprise, the trigger went in. Hilda grunted and pushed harder, pushing the trigger all the way back. The gun activated and fired a blast out into the woods. Hilda quickly turned and looked to see what got hit, but the blast fired deeper into the woods than she could see.

Hilda shrugged, she was happy that she could at least pull the trigger, but wondered how to do it in a way that she'd be able to activate it on "Grow" on herself.

Suddenly, a thought came to her. Her clothes, purse, and everything else had shrunken along with her, and that included her Pokeballs! She could just use her Pokemon to push the trigger for her! She slapped her forehead at her oversight and laughed. Hilda then thought for a second before remembering that she'd only brought one Pokemon with her for her trip. She slapped her head again, this time for her lack of foresight. She'd thought it would be okay to only bring one Pokemon since she hunting in a pretty low level area, and so opted to bring only her Emboar with her while she took some eggs out of Daycare to hatch them in while hunting for other Pokemon.

"Oh well, Emboar, come on out, big guy!" Hilda shouted as she threw her only Pokeball on the stump, it opened and out came...
1512133.title: A ray of hope

choices: Hilda grows back to normal size
Hilda forget to change the settings and she shrinks even smaller
15121332.content:
"Emboar!" Hilda's Emboar let out a mighty cry, or, it would have been a mighty cry if not for the fact that the Pokemon just only a few inches tall! "Emboar?" It whimpered when it saw the huge world.

Hilda gasped as she saw her precious Emboar, her starter Pokemon, shrunken down to her scale. The normally 5'3" Pokemon had reduced in scale along with its trainer perfectly, leaving it just a little shorter than Hilda, much like normal.

"Oh, Emboar, I'm so sorry!" Hilda ran over to and hugged her beloved Pokemon. It snuggled up against her in response.

"Emboooaarr...." Emboar cried softly, and with a bit of confusion.

"D-Don't worry, boy. I'll get this sorted out soon!" Hilda assured her Pokemon. She stood up and pointed at the trigger of the size ray. Emboar watched her.

"See that?" She asked. Emboar nodded. Hilda smiled, proud of her Pokemon for being so strong even with all this weirdness. "Good. I need you to push it back as far as you can, please."

Emboar nodded and flexed its muscles. It waddled over to the trigger and placed its hands on the trigger.

"You can do it!" Hilda cheered, fists clenched in anticipation.

"Emboar!" It roared, fire flaring up from its pores as it pushed with all its might. The trigger gave way and soon the pig Pokemon had activated the size gun much like its shrunken trainer had a minute ago. A blast fired out from the gun, once again shooting away into the woods.

"Yay!" Hilda cheered, hugging Emboar from behind.

"Emboar..." Emboar said, sounding a little tired from the exercise. Hilda noticed her Pokemon's exhaustion and petted its head.

"Thank you for your hard work." She started. "But I need you to do it one more time for me, think you can make it?"

"Emboar!" Emboar cried loudly, showing its confidence. Hilda smiled at it, but she knew that doing this was quite a lot for the shrunken Pokemon, even if it refused to show it.

"Good boy! That's what I want to hear!" Hilda exclaimed, patting Emboar's back. She then hopped back over the trigger's handle. "Okay, I need you wait here and only push the trigger when I tell you to, okay?" Emboar nodded with a grunt. Hilda gave it the thumbs up. "Great! Once I'm back to normal, I'll take the gun and grow you back too! Let's do this!"

Emboar proudly cried its name one more time. Hilda nodded, and then ran off to the front of the size ray. When she made it to the front, she noticed that she was still just tall enough to easily take the blast from the gun, the one that would finally get her back to normal size once and for all. As interesting as being tiny was, Hilda knew it was just better to be a normal-sized girl rather than a tiny one.

Hilda smiled as she thought about what she would do once she returned to normal. First, she'd grow her beloved Emboar back to size, and then she'd find that evil little Pansage and shrink it down for good to add it to her collection.

With her plans set, Hilda shouted the go ahead for her Emboar to push the trigger in again. It cried out loudly and did as its trainer commanded. Hilda waited, and braced herself for the ensuing blast of energy, happy to get back to being big again...
15121332.title: Hilda's not the only shrunken one

151213322.content:
Soon, the gun fired up and then fired out its blast, striking Hilda's whole body. The tiny girl squeaked as the blast hit her, the bright light of it forcing her to close her eyes again. But the sensation passed shortly, only to soon be replaced with a more familiar feeling of changing size. Hilda thought it felt the same as before, but then thought that it might feel the same no matter which way you changed size.

She could feel herself moving, like if she were in an elevator in a department store. A feeling of falling down washed over her, like before, even though she wasn't moving at all. The light died down shortly, as did the weird feeling of the blast. Hilda thought it was now safe to open her eyes again, so she rubbed her eyes and slowly opened them.

"Thanks, Emboar! I hope I didn't crush you when I grew..!" Hilda said as she rubbed her eyes. She looked down and didn't see her Emboar anywhere, or even the size ray for that matter. In fact, instead of seeing the tree stump as being smaller, it instead looked like it was even bigger then before!

Hilda gasped as she realized her mistake. Slowly, she looked up, and when she did, she nearly fainted. The biggest thing she had ever seen before was now towering over her, the size ray was ominously monolithic before her. The device was bigger then ever but there was no mistaking what it was, and what had happened to her.

Hilda had forgotten to check on what mode the size ray was on before, and as luck would have it, the size was still on "Shrink" mode. Hilda had made the horrible mistake of shrinking herself to an even tinier size!

"No... way..." Hilda cried. She felt weak all of a sudden and fell to her knees, eyes wide with fear as she stared up at the skyscraper sized ray gun above her. She scampered away from it, moving backwards. She got up and started to run from the imposing structure, but it was useless, she ran for almost a minute, barely making any progress. The stump was now so huge that could run for 10 minutes and not reach the edge of it, or rather she was now so small that she'd never make any sort of distance at her new especially puny height.

"How could I be so stupid!?" Hilda fell to her knees again and hit the wooden surface of the tree stump that was now practically her whole world. She began to cry.

When she shrank the first time, it was scary to be sure, but it was kind of fun too, like going on a big adventure. But now that she'd been shrunken twice in a row, any semblance of fun to be had was now replaced by a very real semblance of danger. Hilda was so small now that she could almost fit in between the rings of the tree stump, she couldn't be more than a millimeter tall now!

"Emboar? Emboar?" The familiar, although now magnified cry of her Emboar came from the distance.

"Emboar?!" Hilda gasped, looking up for her Pokemon. She saw it, even shrunken her Emboar was like a giant to her and she had to remind herself that it wasn't Emboar that had grown, but rather she that had shrank a second time. It was a little smaller than her before, but now it was so much bigger than her that she worried it might not be able to find her.

Hilda ran over to her precious Pokemon, needing it now more then ever. She just hoped that she could get its attention...
151213322.title: Always check the settings

choices: Emboar is too small to push it
1512133221.content:
Hilda huffed as she made the jog towards her Emboar. She could hardly believe that the stump that she easily sitting on before at her normal, then expanded to the size of a large building when she shrank to 3 inches tall, had now blown up in size compared to her that it was like running miles across a wooden platform. She positive that Emboar was only a few inches away, but at her size a few inches was quite far for her to run, and it was starting to exhaust her minuscule body.

"E-Emboar!" Hilda yelled out when she got close to her Pokemon. She ran a few more steps before slowing to a halt, hands on her knees and panting a little from all the physical activity she'd done today.

Hilda panted, and then looked up at her Emboar, it was close enough now that Hilda could compare herself to it at her new size, noting disappointingly that she didn't reach halfway up its little leg stumps, if she were closer, she'd be eye-to-toe with the big little Pokemon. Hilda rolled her eyes, annoyed by just how small she'd become. Luckily Emboar still had some height, and Hilda knew that she needed to get its help more then ever now. "Emboar!" She shouted again.

"Emboar?" Emboar cried out in confusion, seemingly hearing her tiny calls. The shrunken Pokemon looked left and right for its trainer, but didn't see anything. Hilda saw Emboar's reaction and shouted at it again, this time as loudly as she could. Emboar's ears perked up and it then looked down.

"Emboar!?" The pig Pokemon cried, staring down at Hilda with a shocked expression on its face.

"Hi..." Hilda said to it, waving up at it. She smiled weakly, happy to not be too small to be found by her Pokemon, though at the same time she felt a little embarrassed that she'd messed up and shrank herself again. In a way, she'd felt like she'd let not only herself down, but Emboar as well.

"Emboar!" Emboar cried happily and got down closer to Hilda, quickly scooping the tiny trainer into its hands before she could react.

"Whoa!" Hilda yelled as she was lifted up. Emboar brought her in front of her face, and it smiled wide at her, repeating its own name in joy. Hilda couldn't help but smile back, it seemed that Emboar could understand what had happened after all, either that, or Emboar could feel her emotions and wanted to try cheering her up. Hilda preferred to think it was a mix of both, her Emboar was pretty smart after all. "Thank you for all your help, Emboar! I'm sorry, it looks like we're going to be stuck like this for a little while, I made a little mistake..."

"Emboar!" Emboar cried again, this time shaking its head. It snuggled up to the tiny trainer and purred. Hilda laughed, being tickled a bit by Emboar's fur. The shrunken girl returned the hug by wrapping her tiny arms around Emboar's head as much as she could reach, to her it was like hugging a big, soft ball, it felt so warm to touch.

"Alright, boy. You've done a lot for me so far, but I need you to help me out just a little more, okay?" Hilda asked, to which Emboar enthusiastically nodded. Hilda grinned and pointed over to the back of the size ray. "Good! We need to go over there so we can press the button to change the settings of the ray back to grow. Think you can do it?"

"Emboar!" The fire Pokemon cried proudly. It placed Hilda on top of its head, where she layed down comfortably, holding onto its fur for support. Emboar then took off, dashing around the size ray to the other side.

The warm texture of Emboar's fur made the ride comfy, and Hilda could relax. She started to think that things were going to work out after all. All she needed was for Emboar to press the "Grow" button on the size gun, then place her in the barrel of the device and push the trigger in again to get her back to 3 inches tall, after that one more push of the trigger would get her back to her normal height, for real this time!

When they get to the back of the size ray, they see both the "Shrink" and "Grow" buttons close enough to the ground that Emboar could easily reach them. Right now, the "Shrink" button was still pressed in, confirming the device was still on its "Shrink" mode. Emboar grunted and went over to the "Grow" button. The fire-type Pokemon flexed its muscles a bit and then pressed hard into the button, Hilda cheered it on all the while...
1512133221.title: Tiny Pokemon, meet tinier trainer

choices: They make it down with no problems
Emboar has some trouble climbing down
Emboar's body is not suited for climbing, they wind up stuck on the stump!
15121332212.content:
"E-EMBOAR!" Emboar roared, pushing into the button label "Grow" with all its mini might. It tried its best, but had to take a break after a moment.

"C'mon, Emboar! I believe in you!" Hilda cheered from atop its head.

"Emboar!" Emboar cried out strongly. It tried again to push the large button in, struggling to get a good grip on it to really press it in with all its strength. It struggled against the oversized button for a minute before reaching its limit and slumping down against the size ray's side. "E-Emboar..." It cried out weakly. Hilda gasped.

"Are you okay, Emboar?" Hilda asked, worried for her Pokemon. Emboar nodded, slowly as to not throw Hilda off of its head. Hilda smiled weakly and pet the top of its head. "It's okay, boy. I know you're doing your best..."

Hilda looked up at the button, the big red button seemed to be taunting them with its very existence. It was right there, and all they needed to do was push it in! Even though Hilda was trying to keep Emboar's spirits up, she was feeling sad. If Emboar couldn't press the growth button, then they'd both be stuck like this, forever!

"Dang it..." She whispered under her breath. She glared at the growth button, then looked down softly at Emboar, who was tired from all its exertion. She sighed and pet it again. "It's okay, it's okay..." She repeated to it softly. She wished she could let it back into its Pokeball to take a well-deserved break, but she was afraid that if she did that it would shrink down to her scale, as its Pokeball had shrunk along with her the second time.

Emboar sat still and tried to recuperate some energy to try again, not wanting to disappoint its trainer, no matter how tiny she was. After some time passed, and Hilda kept trying to relax it, Emboar got up and went to try again, only to be stopped by its trainer.

"Emboar, wait!" Hilda cried. "It's no use, we need to try something else..."

Emboar grunted and ignored her, putting its hands on the button again and getting ready to push.

"No, wait!" Hilda shouted, her voice loud and commanding, despite her size. Emboar immediately stopped what it was doing and perked its ears up to listen to her. "Save your energy, Emboar. You'll need it if we want to get off of this tree stump."

"Emboar?" Emboar was confused.

"That's right, boy. We're going to try climbing down." Hilda told her Pokemon her plan. "There's no way we'll be able to reverse this on our own, so we need some help! Now we can wait around for somebody to come, but I think that we're too deep into the woods for that to happen. So! It's better to just try and find some help on our own!"

Hilda explained her plan with confidence, but in truth, even she wasn't sure if this was such a good idea. She was tiny at her new size, smaller than most things, but still big enough that Emboar and her could interact easily enough, but she'd be like a speck to a normal-sized person. Even though Emboar still had some size on him, even if they found somebody that could help them, they'd never hear her cries for help, much less even see the minute girl! And there was the issue of just leaving the size ray in the middle of the woods, someone or some Pokemon might come by and take it while they were gone...

Even with all these problems though, Hilda knew that sitting around and waiting wasn't an option. She wanted to take a plan of action, and she wasn't about to let being only about a millimeter tall stop her!

"So come on, Emboar! Let's leave this thing alone for now, and climb down this stump, and find ourselves a savior!" Hilda finished with enthusiasm. She patted Emboar's head to get it going.

"Emboar!" Emboar shouted its approval of her plan. It kicked the button in frustration before turning around and running to the edge of the tree stump...
15121332212.title: Too small to grow

151213322121.content:
Hilda sat on Emboar's head as her Pokemon made the climb downwards. She felt bad for making Emboar do everything for her, especially because she knew that it had shrunken too, it was just that she was far smaller than it, so she had no choice but to rely on it for pretty much everything now. Emboar didn't seem to mind too much though, and that made Hilda glad that she had such an amazing Pokemon with her, she just wished she'd brought her whole team with her.

Hilda's comfy ride then turned into a more bumpy one as Emboar started its descent down the barky side of the tree stump. Each time Emboar would climb down, or move its arms and legs to a lower foothold, it knocked her up into the air. She yelped out the first few times it happened, but after a while she got used to it and made it a habit of holding on tightly to Emboar's head fur so it didn't happen again.

On the way down, Hilda noticed that the same foot and handholds that she'd used to climb up the stump when she was 3 inches tall had now become like huge cliffs on their own at her smaller size. It really looked like she was climbing down a huge mountain, instead of just a small stump only a few feet high. She was thankful she had Emboar here to help her, otherwise she'd never make it down the barky edge of the stump on her own.

Several minutes passed as the climb down continued smoothly, with Emboar deftly maneuvering down the stump. Soon, Hilda and Emboar got close to the ground. As they did, HIlda noticed that the grass was threatening to swallow them up, or rather just her, as even the blades of grass, minuscule even at her previous shrunken height, were now comparable to trees in their relative size to her. Emboar climbed down into the grass, at its size it was just a little smaller than the grass, but to Hilda it was like being inside a forest inside a forest. She could hardly believe how small she was now, and this only just solidified the fact that she was the smallest living being in existence right now. Even a Joltik, the world's smallest Pokemon, would be like the size of a Wailord to her!

"I'm so sorry I took your device, Professor! I'll never do anything like that again!" Hilda quickly whispered to herself the promise, hands clasped.

Hilda gulped, worried for what would happen to her if she were to get separated from Emboar here. Even now, sitting on top of Emboar's head, she could only just barely see over the grass forest, and that was only if she was standing up. If she were to fall off or something now, she'd have no way of traversing the forest-like blades of grass herself.

Emboar on the other hand, was having little trouble navigating through the grass. Even though the shrunken pig Pokemon was a little smaller than most of the blades, it was able to use its other senses to make it trough. Eventually, it broke through the grass and came out into a more open area.

"Alright, Emboar, so far so good." Hilda said, perking up a little from being out of the grass. But even being free from the grass forest did little to help her nerves, as she could still look up and see humongous trees looming high above her, telling her that her journey was far from over.

In this new area, Hilda could at least see a bit far ahead and plot a course for her and Emboar to go. A large lake was in front of them, and to their sides more woods lay out for them to explore. Hilda wracked her brain for any sort of mental compass she might have as she tried to recall a way out of the woods.

As she tried to concentrate on that, she couldn't help shake the feeling that being near a clear lake like this was a bad idea. If there was a lake, there was bound to be Pokemon coming and going all the time. The last thing she needed now was to get stepped on by a Pokemon, what a horrible way to die, she thought grimly. Even though she had Emboar to help her, she doubted it could take on any wild Pokemon in a fight, she just hoped that if it came to it, Emboar could still outrun them.

Suddenly...
151213322121.title: Into the woods they go

choices: Hilda and Emboar sneak away successfully
Hilda and Emboar are caught by Pansage
Hilda and Emboar run into another Pokemon
1512133221212.content:
Hilda heard the rustling of bushes behind her. She quickly turned around to look, just in time to see a Pansage jump out from them! The giant monkey Pokemon cried out its name and scanned the ground intently, as if looking for something to eat.

"No way!" Hilda gasped. She wasn't able to tell for sure, but something in her gut made her think that this Pansage was the same one from before, in other words, the reason for her shrinking in the first place and the cause of all of her problems! To make matters worse, this Pansage now looked like a giant that was hundreds of feet tall at her ultra tiny size! As much as she'd like to get her revenge on that Pansage, there was little hope of doing so at her current pitiful height.

"Emboar, watch out..." She whispered to her Pokemon, whose ears perked up at her suddenly serious tone. "That Pansage is the one responsible for shrinking me in the first place, I'm sure of it! Look at how it's looking at the ground, like it's looking for a 3-inch version of me!" Hilda gasped.

The super shrunken girl wondered if wild Pokemon were even capable of such thoughts, but something about this Pansage made her feel queasy and uneasy. Regardless of whether or not this Pansage was the same one as before, Hilda knew that staying around the monolithic monkey was not a smart thing to do, at either her or Emboar's sizes.

"Let's try and sneak away from it, boy..." Hilda commanded softly. Emboar nodded slowly and swiftly tried to sneak out of there.
1512133221212.title: Pansage's revenge

choices: Pansage left, allowing Hilda to swim to shore
Hilda got knocked into the water by a big wave!
Hilda got swallowed up by an aquatic Pokemon!
15121332212122.content:
"Pan! Pansage!" The Pansage suddenly cried out, jumping up and down and all frantically all of a sudden. Hilda looked over at the Pokemon making the commotion, only to see that it had spotted her, or rather, it spotted little Emboar, and was now running over to them!

"Emboar!" Emboar cried and picked up its pace, running as fast as its reduced legs could carry it. Hilda cried out too, both worried that Pansage would catch up to them, and afraid that she was going to fall off of Emboar's head from all its running!

Hilda looked quickly took a look behind at their pursuer, and saw that Pansage's height had given it an immeasurable advantage over Emboar's inches tall height, and the Pansage was quickly gaining on them.

"Hurry, Emboar! We can make it!" Hilda shouted.

The tiny trainer looked ahead and tried to focus on where they should go for safety, but the grass from before was now long gone, and Pansage was chasing them away from the rest of the forest, and right towards the lake. Hilda gasped as she realized that they'd fallen for Pansage's trick, it had lured them right into a trap, a trap that ended in a watery grave or a hungry Pansage's mouth!

"Oh no..." Hilda said softly, she closed her eyes to think about a plan.

Emboar was keeping a good pace away from the Pansage, despite the massive size difference between the Pokemon. But it and Hilda were about to be stuck between a rock and a hard place. A hungry monkey behind them, and a huge lake ahead of them, and that was if they were even able to make it that far! Hilda was sure going into the lake would be the end of both her and her Emboar, but at the same time there was no other way to escape winding up as lunch for the Pansage.

"Make a break for the lake, Emboar!" Hilda ordered.

"Emboar!" Emboar cried it agreement with her plan, knowing full well that wasn't capable of swimming, but sure that Hilda had an idea in mind.

However, Hilda had no grand ideas of what to do when they got to the lake. She knew Emboar couldn't swim, and she wasn't sure if she'd be able to swim across the lake at her size, as even the smallest of ripples in the water would be like tidal waves to her. But if she could hide out in the lake long enough for the Pansage to lose interest in her and Emboar, then they might just have a chance of making it out of here alive!

"That's it!" Hilda said as a sudden idea came to her. "Emboar, come on! To the lake!" She shouted.

Emboar hurried up as much as it could. They'd made it to the bank of the water, and Emboar was about to jump in when suddenly the pursuing Pansage swiped at Emboar with its hands, knocking the shrunken fire Pokemon into the air a few inches and launching it over the lake.

"Aahhhh!" Hilda screamed as both her and Emboar went flying over the lake. It seemed like a long distance to travel to her, but in reality, it was only about a foot or so. Nevertheless, Hilda and Emboar both soared through the air for a few seconds, miraculously, Hilda managed to hold on tightly enough so as to not fall off. The diminished duo then landed into the lake with a splash.

Hilda held on tight as Emboar cried out and tried to stay afloat. Hilda felt bad for her shrunken Pokemon, she could see how much effort it was putting in to keep both itself and her above water. Now, Hilda thought, was the time to implement her plan.

"Come back, Emboar!" Hilda yelled as she grabbed its Pokeball and touched it to Emboar's head.

"Emboar!?" Emboar cried out, understanding now what Hilda's idea was all along.

The Pokeball opened before Emboar could do anything, and bright red light shined out and "zapped" Emboar, encasing its whole body in the light before making Emboar disappear into its Pokeball.

With Emboar now back in its Pokeball, this left Hilda alone all of a sudden, and the mega mini girl fell down from where Emboar was and into the water below. She plunged quite a ways into the water, but managed with some effort to pull herself back up to the water's surface. But, as she anticipated, the ripples in the water, unnoticeable to any normal-sized by-standers, had become huge waves at her size, and she struggled to stay afloat.

Thank you, Emboar. Let me take it from here, I just need to stay here long enough to make that Pansage go away, it won't notice me at least... Hilda thought, even as she fought to keep herself from being swallowed up by the water.

In between being bobbed up and down in the water, Hilda managed to watch the shore all the while, noticing the Pansage's confused reaction to Emboar's sudden "disappearance". She smiled, thinking her plan was going to work after all, when...
15121332212122.title: Escape attempt: Failed

choices: Hilda is still alive, but trapped
Hilda is saved by another, bigger Pokemon attacking Basculin
151213322121223.content:
Hilda suddenly felt the waves of the lake start to get even stronger, knocking her every which way. The tiny girl had no control over where she was going now, and could only gasp for what little air she was allowed by the vigorous waves' motions.

What's going on? The only reason a lake's waves would pick up so much is if something was moving in it... Hilda thought, stopping herself just short of completing the thought. She screamed as she realized that she wasn't alone in the lake, something was swimming under her, she could feel it through the vibrations of the water. Something was under her, and that something was swimming its way up to her, and fast!

Suddenly, she felt the water below her start to get sucked into something. The shrunken girl looked down and saw the gaping mouth of a wild Basculin below her! Hilda cried as she was sucked into the gaping mouth of the fish Pokemon. She tried to swim away, but it was no use, she was just way too small to do anything. It all happened so fast that Hilda barely had any time to react at all.

Hilda tried to claw her way out of the now tunnel of water that Basculin was was sucking in, but she couldn't, and soon she was swallowed into the Pokemon's mouth before the wild fish Pokemon closed its mouth, sealing her in the darkness of its insides, where she passed out...
151213322121223.title: Basculin's micro-sized meal

choices: Up at a still inches tall Emboar
Down at a further reduced Emboar
At a Pokeball that wasn't opening for some reason
1512133221212232.content:
Hilda landed in the Basculin's insides relatively unharmed. The micro-sized girl had been neither chewed nor digested, yet. Leaving her bite-sized body curled up into a ball in the Basculin's stomach, unconscious, but unharmed.

Minutes passed, with the Basculin swimming freely through the lake of the woods, leaving the shore where the Pansage waited far behind. But inadvertently trapping Hilda even deeper into the lake. It hadn't even noticed the speck-size teen when it swallowed her, it was actually just going for another snack in the water, and had only swallowed her along with it by accident. Even now as it swam, the Basculin was unaware of its hyper shrunken passenger, and had turned off its need to digest anything inside it for the time being, keeping Hilda safe.

Eventually, Hilda started to wake up. She rubbed her head as it, along with the rest of her twice-reduced body ached a little.

"Wh-What happened...?" Hilda murmured as she tried to recall the last few minutes. "I remember getting shrunk... twice... and then running away from that evil Pansage, and then..?"

Hilda took a look around her, noting how hot, damp, and dark her surroundings were. She gasped as she suddenly remembered being eaten alive by a wild Basculin.

"Oh no, no, no! This can't be real!" Hilda cried. She shot up and started running through the insides of her devourer, trying to find a way out. When became clear that there was no real way to get out aside from being digested or thrown up, Hilda stopped and stood still for a moment before breaking into tears.

"Dang it, why is this happening! I never should have stolen that stupid size ray from the Professor!" Hilda whimpered, curling down into a small ball in the darkness of the Pokemon's stomach.

All of her plans had seemed to end in failure so far, from something as simple as trying to catch Pokemon, to just trying to keep herself alive. Worst of all, her plans that didn't end in complete failure always seemed to backfire on her in the worst possible ways, from accidentally shrinking herself again when she was trying to grow, and now trying to save herself and Emboar from getting eaten by a Pansage, only to wind up getting eaten by a Basculin!

Hilda's thoughts wavered as she got more and more depressed. It seemed like all the shrunken girl could do now was wait for her inevitable demise. She just wished she could have saved Emboar at least, but here it was, trapped along with her in its Pokemon, at least it wouldn't have to see its own end.

"Wait a minute..." Hilda said, getting another bright idea. She grabbed the Pokeball containing Emboar and looked at it. "I really hope you didn't shrink from being put in there, buddy... Come on out, Emboar!"

Hilda threw the shrunken Pokeball and it hit the floor of Basculin's stomach, in a moment Hilda was looking...
1512133221212232.title: A whale of a time

choices: They were being shot out onto the shore
They were being shot out into the lake(still underwater)
They were being shot out into a dark cave
15121332212122321.content:
"Emboar!" Emboar cried out loudly as it appeared from inside its Pokeball. The reduced Emboar still stood at just under 3 inches tall, putting it in its Pokeball hadn't reduced the pig Pokemon's size at all.

"Oh, Emboar! I'm so glad you're so big!" Hilda exclaimed and ran up to and hugged her little(but big to her) Pokemon. She rubbed its fur. "And so fluffy too!"

"Emboaar?" Emboar sounded confused when it saw its new surroundings. It was dark and damp, not to mention cramped, the poor little Emboar had to crouch to stay fitted inside the insides of the Basculin. It looked down and saw its tinier trainer hugging its foot.

Hilda stepped back from Emboar and raised her arms. "Pick me up!" She insisted happily. Emboar did as she told it. It was going to try and put her on its head again, but in the cramped space of Basculin's stomach, it couldn't possibly fit her up there without squishing the shrunken girl.

"Right here's fine." Hilda said, noticing how Emboar was getting confused trying to figure out how to put her in her usual riding spot. Emboar nodded and held Hilda just a little bit away from its face. "We don't have much time, boy. We're trapped inside a Basculin's stomach right now!"

"Emboar!?" Emboar was shocked, the mini Pokemon was surprised to learn that it and its trainer had been swallowed up by another, bigger Pokemon. It looked around frantically, freaking out.

"Calm down, calm down!" Hilda shushed Emboar. It relaxed after a minute and focused its attention on her. "Good, boy! Now, we can get out of this mess, but I need to your help!"

Emboar nodded its approval of Hilda's latest plan.

"Okay, so all I need you to do is scorch the inside of this Basculin for me, alright?" Hilda asked, to which Emboar nodded again. It stated to flare up its flames. Hilda gasped and quickly motioned her hands for it to stop.

"Wait!" She cried. Emboar stopped and looked down at her. "Okay, okay, we're stuck in a Basculin, Emboar. That means that most likely we're way underwater, even though this lake didn't look too deep, at our sizes we can't take any risks! So follow me..."

Hilda pointed over to the back of the stomach. She told Emboar to move over there. Emboar scrunched itself up some more and waddled over to the back of Basculin's stomach. In the back, Hilda and Emboar found the Basculin's uvula hanging just a bit above the small tunnel of its throat.

"That's what we need to hit, buddy." Hilda pointed up at the target. "I'm thinking if we can get Basculin here to throw us up, chances are that we'll be spat out of its mouth, hopefully from the top of the lake."

Emboar grunted and nodded, it prepared its flamethrower move and fire shot out from its mouth, all the way up to Basculin's uvula. Hilda winced as she waited with anticipation as to whether or not her latest plan would work as she hoped.

Basculin's whole body seemed to shake, and its sudden and wild movements shook Emboar and Hilda around the insides of its stomach. The two shrunken victims screamed and cried out as they were knocked around wildly. Soon though, they felt a putrid liquid build up from the bottom of the creature's stomach. Hilda screamed as she realized that it was most likely the remains of Basculin's last meal, now being regurgitated, along with her and Emboar!

Hilda and Emboar were then both quickly shot up through Basculin's throat, getting soaked in its nasty waste in the process. It took only a second or two before they were blasted up to Basculin's mouth, where the fish Pokemon was forced to open its mouth to throw up whatever was hurting its stomach. Basculin's mouth opened, and Hilda saw that...
15121332212122321.title: Emboar's escape escapades

choices: Hilda makes it out of the cave
151213322121223213.content:
"Oh, super gross!" Hilda cried as she wiped the mess from herself. The micro-sized girl moved about in a frantic panic, trying to get the awful smelling waste off of her. But she was trapped in a huge pile of it, Hilda screamed in disgust and clumsily fumbled her way out of the foul pile. She then spotted the lake water and immediately ran towards it, not caring about her safety in the moment and just wanting to be clean.

"Emboar!" Her Emboar shouted, and ran off after her. It caught up to the millimeter tall girl in a few seconds, and swooped her up into its arms once more.

"Th-thank you..." Hilda said, happy that Emboar was still able to help her, but she couldn't help but groan from how nasty her day had become. It was doubled by the fact the Emboar itself was covered in Basculin's vomit, and the amount on Hilda had mixed with the stuff on Emboar, creating an awful concoction that made Hilda double over and nearly throw up herself!

However, Emboar seemed to understand where Hilda was going when it picked her up, as it went over to the shore of the cave and placed its hand that had Hilda on it down for her to get off. Hilda smiled up at her intelligent Emboar and gladly hopped off. She went over to the water of the lake and quickly jumped inside.

"Aahhh... That's sooo much better!" Hilda exclaimed in relaxation. She might have been afraid to jump in the water before at her terribly tiny height, but here in the cave the waves seemed to not be as strong, so Hilda could float and even swim in it, provided she didn't stray too far from the bank. So Hilda did just that and let the water naturally wash off both her body and her clothes, she was still soaked, but at least she was clean.

"Emboar, I wish you could enjoy this..." Hilda sighed. She looked over at her pig Pokemon to see that it was just watching and waiting by the bank of the water. Hilda shook her head, she knew that as a fire-type Pokemon Emboar would never set foot into water, but at the same time it would never get clean if it didn't wash off.

"Alright, Emboar, let me help you get cleaned up, okay?" Hilda said as she swam back to dry land. When she got out of the water, she grabbed Emboar's Pokeball and looked at her Pokemon.

"Emboar!" Emboar nodded enthusiastically, seemingly ready and wanting to be cleaned off.

"This should work! Come back, Emboar!" Hilda commanded as she tossed her Pokeball at Emboar. The Pokeball opened and sucked Emboar inside once again. Hilda went over and picked up the Emboar-filled Pokeball. She smiled at it. "Take a rest, Emboar. You deserve it."

Hilda then tucked the Pokeball back into her purse and took a look at the cave she had been shot into. It was very dark inside, and her eyes hadn't adjusted well enough to see further into the depths of the cave. However, it wasn't too large from what she could tell. On the other side, the exit was painfully obvious from the way the light shined in from the outside. Hilda nodded to herself and began walking towards the light.

Hilda was confident that she could make it out of the cave by herself. It would take her a while at her size, but she could make it. She felt Emboar deserved a break, and not only that he was still quite big and visible, but if she went off on her own then there would be very few Pokemon or people that would even be able to see her at her current size. So even though she hated being stuck the size of a speck, Hilda was able to use that unfortunate fact to her advantage and sneak around unseen, at least, she hoped she could...
151213322121223213.title: Out of the fire...

choices: The Joltik start feasting on Hilda right then
Hilda tries to make a break for it
1512133221212232131.content:
Hilda's walk out of the cave seemed to drag on for a long time. She knew she was pitifully puny, but she never knew that walking just a few feet at her size would take almost an hour! She had half a mind to let Emboar back out and simply ride him to freedom, but she knew that if she did so she'd lose her stealth approach. So she walked on, trying to think of what to do once she made it out on the way.

"Find help. Grow back. Shrink Pansage." Hilda repeated to herself, mumbling what had become a mantra in the past few minutes of her travels. She was completely focused on getting her revenge on the petty Pansage that she hardly noticed the creepy-crawly sounds coming from behind her.

"Tik. Tik. Tik." A wild Pokemon's cry was heard. Hilda gasped, now hearing the approaching Pokemon. She quickly turned around and looked, but only in time to see that it was a family of Joltik that had been stalking her!

"Oh, crap!" Hilda cried out, and tried to run. But it was too late for her, as one of the pursuing Joltik jumped her, knocking her out in the process.

With their prey out cold, the Joltik gang gathered around Hilda's unconscious body. They cried out their names as they seemed to be cheering. One of the Joltik went forward and, using its mouth and mandibles, deftly wrapped Hilda's body up in its web, encasing the poor girl almost completely, only her head was still visible after the job was done.

The Joltik cried their names out again, and followed their leader as it carried Hilda deeper into the cave.

Time passed as Hilda lay unconscious in her new captivity. Time enough that Hilda was able to recover and wake up. The captured girl yawned as she opened her eyes and woke up.

"Wh-what... happened...?" Was the first thing Hilda could say. She tried to wipe her eyes to wake herself up better, but for some reason she found that she could only move her head. She looked down and saw the rest of her body was encased in a sticky, thick, white substance, almost like a spider's webs. She tried to move, tried to break free, but quickly learned that the web was far too strong for her to break on her own. Her mind raced as she tried to piece together how she ended up like this, but then she remembered the Joltik chasing her and then... She gulped as she realized what was going on.

She had been captured by Joltik!

"Oh no, not again!" Hilda cried. Not only had she been taken by a wild Pokemon again, but this time she couldn't even get Emboar out to help her. She was strung up near the top of the little cave, being suspended in the air by a string. Hilda felt bad as she realized now that she hadn't been in a cave at all, but instead it was merely a little nest of Joltik and Galvantula. She guess that if she were normal-sized, the "cave" would only come up to about her waist. But before she could feel too sorry for herself, the Joltik returned.

The monstrous-looking Joltik crawled along the cave's walls to her. Hilda gulped as she now got a good look at her predators. At only 4 inches tall, Joltik were the world's smallest Pokemon, but to her, the little guys looked like the size of Wailords! If she didn't already feel insignificantly small before, she was certainly feeling tinier than ever now!

"H-Hey, what do you want with me?!" Hilda shouted. She knew that normally Pokemon wouldn't attack humans, but she figured by now that most Pokemon didn't even see her as being human anymore, instead she was more like a tasty little crumb-sized morsel for them. One that Hilda wasn't sure what they were going to do with...
1512133221212232131.title: Into the fire

15121332212122321313.content:
Hilda wasn't about to wait around and discover what these Joltik had in store for her. So the micro-sized girl started to rock her body back and forth, suspended as she was by a single string of web, this allowed her to swing herself around in her bindings. Hilda even knocked into the approaching Joltik, startling it.

"Ha! Take that, you little pests!" Hilda shouted triumphantly, being shrunken so small was still a scary thing to her, but by now she'd have been in far too much trouble at her reduced size to let herself get stopped here.

Hilda got some strong momentum from swinging, and the speed at which she swung meant that none of the Joltik could catch her. So she swang on, back and forth, hoping to weaken the single string of web that kept her held up to the top of the cave. It seemed to be working too, as Hilda could feel it slowly start to break. Hilda was getting a little dizzy from all the swinging though, she had started with some control over her path, but now that she was going so fast she had spun out of control and was now just trying to match her movements with the motions.

"Tik! Tik! Tik!" The Joltik cried. The spider Pokemon shot out more webs at Hilda. One of them hit her and sent her flying in a different direction, totally knocking her off her path, but keeping her encased in her web bondage.

"Agh!" Hilda grunted from being knocked all over the place, she was about to throw up if this continued much longer. Hilda tried to get back in control of her swings, but it wasn't easy, as she now had multiple Joltik trying to spit webs at her too!

They're trying to get me! I have to get out of this! Hilda thought. She was close to breaking free, she knew it. Just a few more minutes and she was sure the web would wear down and she'd be safe on the ground...
15121332212122321313.title: The tiniest girl vs. the tiniest Pokemon

choices: Knocked them both into the lake again
151213322121223213132.content:
*snap*

The strong string made a noise that sounded like music to Hilda's ears, and the web holding her prisoner broke down, sending the micro-mini girl on a freefall to the ground. Luckily the ground wasn't too far down after all and Hilda landed without injury, although it stung quite a bit.

"Finally!" Hilda shouted in frustration. She wasted no time and shaking off the last of the weakened webbing around her and breaking free of her strung-up bondage.

With herself finally freed, Hilda got up and took off running. She knew the Joltik would be on her like a pack of Houndoom's on a group of defenseless Deerlings.

"Tik! Tik! Tik!" The cries of the angry Joltik confirmed for Hilda that they were going to be giving her chase.

"Come on, come on!" Hilda repeated to herself as she ran from the approaching horde. She fumbled through her purse for the single Pokeball she had that contained a Pokemon, that being her beloved and much needed right now Emboar. Hilda felt around for a few more heartbeat boosting moments before grabbing her desired Pokeball.

"Yes! Emboar, I choose you!" Hilda yelled as she tossed the Pokeball in front of herself.

A light flashed from the Pokeball and out popped Emboar, just as big as it was before. It was looking rather relaxed from its nap, but at the same it was rather confused as it saw the large group of Joltiks swarming around.

"Buddy! Down here!" Hilda cried as she caught up to her comparatively giant Emboar. Her Pokemon looked down and grunted in shock as it saw its trainer running for her life with its Pokeball in her hand.

Emboar swooped up Hilda in its hands and quickly placed her on the top of its head. It waited just a moment for Hilda to get situated before taking off in the fastest run it had ever made.

Hilda sighed in relief as she held onto her spot on Emboar's head for dear life. She looked behind and saw that Emboar was actually managing to lose the Joltik pursuers, despite its size. She smiled weakly and thanked her lucky stars that she still had Emboar around to help her. If she were by herself, then she'd have never been able to outrun the Joltik at her pitiful height.

As Hilda counted her blessings, a sudden shadow crept over the tiny trainer and her Pokemon. Hilda looked up and saw something crawling above on the walls of the cave, but it was too dark and the creature was moving too fast for her to make out. Then suddenly, Emboar backed up into a stop. A huge creature jumped down from the walls to in front of Hilda and Emboar, startling both of them.

"Pan! Sage!" The giant Pokemon, now seen by Hilda to be a Pansage, cried.

"Oh... No..." Hilda said softly, looking up at her nemesis in horror. The Pansage had returned again, only this time it was aware of her presence, or at least Emboar's. To make matter worse the green monkey Pokemon had effectively blocked the exit, trapping both Hilda and Emboar inside.

The wild Pansage swiped at the stunned Emboar and, by extension, the millimeter-tall Hilda, and...
151213322121223213132.title: From bad to worse (again)

151231.content: Alright, so witch game do you want to shrink from Bianca from?
151231.title: Which Bianca should it be?

choices: Near the begining of the game.
1512311.content: Alright. Now what time frame should the blonde be shrunk?
1512311.title: Bianca from the 1st game.

15123111.content:
The seventeen year old Bianca smiles as she travels route 2 on journey. It's been a good day since her two friends Cheren and Touya and herself started their poke'mon journey. Even though she had a bit a rough patch when she told her father but she pushed through and decided to go on this adventure no matter what with her new Pokemon partner Tepig. She already went through her town, oddly enough there were strange people in knightly costumes in Accumula Town but the blonde didn't really pay much attention to it and gather supplies and went on to route 2. In few minutes the blonde was able to get her second Pokemon, Lillipup. Everything is going well on her first day of adventuring.

"Everything is going so well!" Bianca thought with a huge smile. "Looks like I can handle my self," The blonde thought as well thinking about her father telling her to stay home. Even though she loved her dad she couldn't let a chance like this pass up!

"I wonder how Touya and Cheren are doing?" The blonde thought as the last time she saw them was in Accumula town. "Maybe they stayed to see what those people knights in costumes had to say. Well I hope we can meet up again," Bianca then figures they could meet in Striaton City and have some drinks and some snacks.

Her thoughts didn't last long as she saw two of those knight costume people right in front of her. The two knights didn't notice the blonde as they talk to each other.

"So do think these experimental things can really help us Liberate Pokemon?" The female grunt asks as she holds up a small Black and White ball in her hand.

"Of course!" The male grunt replies with a bit of spirit in his voice. "The scientist told us that these will help lord N with his plan." The male grunt then adds. "But unfortunately they have not made many of these so we have to be careful with them,"

"Yes of course. We have to save them when we need them most," The female grunt agrees with her comrade. "We should be going, we need to finish our mission,"

"We need to be quick. Let's get going," The male grunt said as he starts to run towards Striaton City, this causes the female grunt to let a groan as she quickly tries to put the Black and White Ball in one of pockets as she hears a yell from the Male Grunt.

"Hurry up!"

"I-I'm coming!" The female grunt shouts back as she starts to run but unknowingly throws the Black and White ball backwards and it lands near the blonde trainer.

"Oh! She drop her ball. I better go give it back to her," Bianca thought, the blonde didn't really understand what the two knights were talking about but the kind girl knew they would feel bad about losing something of theirs.

The blond picks it up and squeeze it a bit and suddenly the ball pops and some dust gets all over Bianca and her bag. The blonde coughs from inhaling a bit the dust as well, Bianca wonders why they would be carrying something all this. While the poor girl goes through a coughing fit she didn't notice that her own body is changing. The blonde starts to get smaller and smaller, her shrinking stops once she reaches the height of five inches tall clothes and all!

Once Bianca is able to regain her sight she sees that things a bit different now. The glass looks quite tall to her now, but something didn't seem right. The blonde takes a looks sees that it's just normal normal grass but it's as tall as her self. Trees also look like towers to her and now a rock looks a table. It didn't take long for the blonde to figure out things out as she realizes something.

"I-I've become smaller!" Bianca shouts as she looks once more and sees how everything is huge now. The blonde starts to freak out a bit at her new sights but is able to calm herself down.

"I can't be freaking out right now. It's my first day!" The blonde thought but she was still scared being this small. Bianca at lest looks on the bright side as he clothes and bag shrunk with her. She knew what she had to do and that was to find help, but at her size it could be hard.

"Oh that's right! I can get some help from my Pokemon," Bianca thought with a smile on her face as she digs through her green bag and pulls out the poke'ball that is holding Lilipup. "I hope she can help me,"The blonde thought as she threw the ball and Lilipup comes out and the pup......
15123111.title: Bianca become doll size.

choices: A person in knight costume as well.
151231111.content:
Bianca is shock to see that her once small cute puppy now about twice about her five inch form! The blonde starts to think this a bad idea as Lilipug starts to sniff her shrunken trainer. The pup then stops and let's out a happy bark at see it's trainer and Bianca let's a sigh.

"It's a good thing your still normal size and still like me," Bianca said as she pets Lilipug's snot and this causes the pup to wag it's tail. "Now could you let me on you? I need to find someone to help me,"

Lilipug let's out another barks and then sits down, The blonde smiles at seeing that her new Pokemon is willing to help her. Bianca climbs up the pup using it's fur, and soon on Lilipug's back. Once Bianca is set the put gets up and is ready to move.

"I never thought I would ever do this," The blonde thought but she starts to smile. "It's quite exciting to be able to ride a cute Poke'mon," Thought as well and then says.

"Okay girl, go and find someone that can help me,"

Lilipug let's out a bark and soon starts to move as Bianca holds on. The blonde took in the sights as she sees how different the world is at her size. It nice to see the grass sway about and being able to see some Pokemon in the taller grass. The ride is a bit bumpy as Lilipug jumps over some rocks. The blonde is happy that she is able to stay on as Lilipug stops in her tracks. The blonde looks forward and sees that Lilipug stop in front of some one and sees.....
151231111.title: Tiny Bianca and large Lilipug.

choices: "Let's go to Nuvema Town. Maybe Professor Juniper is still in town."
"Let's go to Striation City. Maybe Professor Juniper's friend Fennel can help,"
1512311111.content:
"It's Touya!" Bianca beams at seeing her giant childhood friend. "He can help us girl. Go over to him," The blonde knew that Touya is quite kind but young man is always quite around Cheren and herself.

The Lilipug lets out another bark and runs towards to the young boy.
___________________________________________________

The seventeen year old Touya is walking through route 2, today was quite interesting for the young lad. He had just started his Pokemon adventure along with his two friends Bianca and Cheren. His first Pokemon is a Oshawott which he nicked named the male water type Kenki. Touya is in thought as he thinks about what happen in Accumula Town. Cheren and him learn about this group called Team Plasma that are trying to liberate Pokemon along with a mysteries green hair young man that went by N. Touya is wondering what N meant by hearing Kenki's voice, the brown hair boy didn't have much time to think more as he hears a bark.

Touya looks and sees that the bark is coming from a Lilipug, he then remembers when Bianca, Cheren and himself were on route 1. The blonde told him he should get more team mates on his team, since it would be quite dangerous to push Kenki so much. So Touya decides he should try to catch the pup Pokemon and when he is about bring out the poke'ball that holds his Oshawott he hears a voice.

"Hey Touya!"

The young man stops himself from bringing out Kenki, he knew that voice belong to his childhood friend Bianca. He looks around to see where the blonde is. But he is unable to find Bianca. He then hears her voices once more when Lilipug gets close to his feet.

"Touya! I'm down here!"

Touya looks down and sees that there is a five inch figure on the pup pokemon's back. The young man bends his knees a bit so he could a better look at figure and then is able to see that the five inch figure is Bianca! The brown hair young man is quite shock at seeing the blonde at a small height while Bianca blushes a bit at the young man's stare. After a few minutes of silence, Touya breaks the silence.

"How did this happen and are you alright?"

Touya made it back to Nuvema Town without any problems. With the tiny Bianca safely tucked away in his bag, the walk there was easy, even for the shrunken blonde. Once Touya stepped back into his hometown he made a beeline for Prof. Juniper's lab. He knocked on the door.

"Come in!" A feminine voice called from inside.

Touya opened the door to the lab and walked inside. There he saw Prof. Juniper looking over some things on her desk. When the professor saw that it was Touya who had come in she smiled and got up to talk to him.

"Touya, what brings you back so soon?" She asked. "Having trouble on the road?"

Touya shook his head. He hefted his bag up, gently, to Juniper's desk. "Take a look at this."

Juniper watched with a curious expression as Touya reached into his bag and pulled out what looked like a small child's doll. But on closer inspection she saw that this was no doll, it was Bianca! Touya placed the tiny figure on Juniper's desk, next to his bag.
Juniper looked at it for a little and wondered why, and how, Touya had a doll of Bianca in his bag. When all of a sudden, the tiny figure started to move.

"Hi, Professor!" Bianca squeaked, waving a "hello" to Juniper.

Juniper gasped and covered her mouth with her hand. The doll was not a doll after all, but a tiny Bianca in the flesh! The Pokemon professor could hardly believe it was real, but she was staring right it, a real, living tiny person. Juniper's curiosity got the better of her and she poked the tiny girl in her tiny stomach.

"Ooh! That tickles!" Bianca giggled, recoiling from Juniper's giant finger.

Juniper was amazed.

"I-I... How did this happen?" Juniper asked.

Bianca explained to her how she got so small, seeing team Plasma and picking up the ball, how Touya found and helped her, and everything. Juniper listened intently, and calmed down as the story went on.

"That's almost unbelievable." Juniper said. "I wouldn't believe it if I wasn't looking at you right now. Thank you for taking care of her, Touya."

Touya smiled and nodded.

"So, do you think you can help me, professor?" Bianca asked, hopeful.

"I think there are some tests we need to run first." Juniper said. Bianca looked saddened by the answer. Juniper saw this and tried to cheer her up. "But I'm sure we'll figure something out!"

Bianca smiled.

"Now." Juniper began. "First things first..."

The black and white ball lands harmlessly on the ground. Touya holds his breath waiting to see if something would happen but, much to his relief, it never does. Touya lets out a relieved sigh.

"Touya, you look worried. What's wrong?" Juniper asks.

Touya points at the ball between the professor and Fennel. The girls look down, and Bianca now sees it too.

"That's the same thing that shrunk me!" Bianca shouts.

"What!?" Fennel shouts. She's just now seeing the shrunken Bianca for the first time. Surprised at seeing someone so small, Fennel barely hears the tiny girl's words, but when she puts them together a moment later, she jumps away from the ball out of fright. "That shrunk you!? What's going on?" Fennel asks.

"Calm down, Fennel. "Juniper says. The professor is less frightened by the ball than her colleague, and is instead more interested in it. She gets on down on her knees to examine it more closely.

"Incredible..." Fennel says. "Well, at least you can still use your Pokemon."

"With a little help!" Bianca says with a wink to Touya, making the young trainer blush.
