"You're right, of course. I'd probably never have believed you!" Fennel admits.

"Now, before we continue, I think it's best that we get out of here and go to your place, Fennel. Is that okay with you?" Juniper asks.

"Sure!" Fennel says with a smile.

"Great!" Juniper says. "But before we go, let's take that black and white ball with us. I think it'd be a good idea to examine it more thoroughly later."

"Are you sure you want to do that, professor?" Bianca asks. "It might still shrink you!"

"No, I'm pretty sure if it was going to do that it would've done so already." Juniper says as she walks back over to the ball. She motions to Fennel. "Come on and help me with this, please."

"O-Okay, professor..." Fennel says hesitantly, fearing that she and the professor will end up shrinking.

Fennel hurries after Juniper, and walks behind her. The professor then bends down to pick up the ball and...

Touya wanted to go help them but he knew if he went over to where Juniper and Fennel were he would likely end up shrinking as well. He watches as the dust slowly disappears and sees nothing but empty space, Touya and tiny Bianca quickly look down and see the tiny forms of Juniper and Fennel. Once the brown hair youth sees that the dust is gone he slow moves towards the two newly shrunken humans stops and bends his knees to get a better look at the shrunken forms of Juniper and Fennel.

Juniper and Fennel stop their coughing and their eyes start to focus as the first thing they see is the giant face of Touya and Bianca on his collar bone looking down at the two of them.

"Oh no it popped!" Fennel shouts at seeing every thing so giant.

"I'm so sorry Fennel. It was my idea to bring that ball with us and I got caught in the dust as well," Juniper said feeling terrible about Fennel getting shrunk, if she only went to pick it up herself.

Fennel sees that her old collage friend is sad and wants to reassure her.

"It's okay Juniper it wasn't your fault. Besides it interesting to see the world this way." Kenki and Tepig run towards their trainers and see that two more people have been shrunk as well. "I would be able to a closer look at Pokemon like this Tepig and Oshawott.

"Touya, I'm quite impress with you," Juniper thought happy to see how organize the teen boy is.

Touya then gets up and starts his walk to Fennel's house. Touya is......

Touya nods in agreement will to take on the mission.

"Alright. Let's do our best on this mission!" Bianca beams ready to help and go on a journey.

"Wow! I'm amazed Bianca. I would never do something like that," Amanita notes at the tiny blonde's courage to continue her adventure.

"It's nothing much," Bianca replies to the grade school giantess. "It's just I want to go on this journey," The tiny blonde being quite humble about her reason.

Juniper and Fennel are both proud about Bianca chose to continue on her journey and wonder what they should do.

"Well I still think it's cool," Amanita replies feeling admiration for the tiny blonde. "So Sis what are you and Professor Juniper going to do then?"

"We're going to be going with Touya and Bianca," Juniper replies for the two as the other are surprise about what the two older women want to do.

"Really?" Amanita asks her tiny sister and Pokemon Professor. "Are you sure you want to do this? It's going to be quite dangours since you two are so small," The grand school girl asks once more concern about her big sister's safety along with Juniper's.

"Yes. I want to travel to see what it's like being this small," Fennel replies with a smile.

"Plus we want to help as well as much as we can," Juniper adds as well and continues to talk. "I know we can't do much but can at lest help with your studies,"

"Thank you Professor Juniper," Bianca said happily, the tiny blonde is happy to learn more Pokemon and possible could help in what she wants to do in life.

"Welcome aboard," Touya says as he feels happy as well, both Juniper and Fennel will be great help with his studies.

"We're glad you two like us coming with you," Juniper replies with a happy smile.

"Okay as long as Touya keeps you safe," Amanita said feeling okay with her tiny big sister going with Touya and then adds. "But there's one problem, what about clothes? I mean Bianca has some spear clothes in her bag when she shrunk but you two only have what you have on,"

"That's true...." Juniper said knowing she couldn't wear the same clothes consistently for days on end.

"Oh!" Fennel said figuring something out. "We'll just order some really good costume doll clothes online,"

"Really?" Juniper asks her collage friend. "Someone really makes doll clothes that match real life clothes?"

"Yeah," Fennel replies with a smile. "Heck the person even makes really god br-" Before she could finish Juniper is able to cover her mouth.

Bianca and Amanita blush a bit knowing what Fennel is going to say as Touya blinks a bit wonder what the tiny dark hair woman was going to say.

"Well let's order some then," Juniper said as she removes her hand from Fennel's mouth. "Bianca want to shop as well?"

"Sure! It will be nice to have some extra clothes," Bianca said with a smile.

"Okay, I'll help with the orders then," Amanita said as she could easily use the computer and she turns around to Touya. "Since it's also Lucnh time let's order something from the Cafe and Touya could pick it up,"

"I can pick it up," Touya replies with a nod.

"Alright sounds like a plan," Juniper said with a smile.

"So what does everyone want?" Bianca asks and soon everyone got their orders wrote down and Amanita made the call to the cafe.

"Okay. It's going to take thirty minutes for our food to get done," Amanita said as she gets off the phone. "I did my best for you Sis along with Professor Juniper and Bianca so you guys have the smallest meals that you want,"

"Thank you very much," Fennel said with a smile.

Touya nods as he is about to go down stairs.

"See ya in a bit Touya," Bianca shouts to teen boy as loud as she could.

Touya smiles as he turns around waves back to everyone as he goes down the stairs.

"You can go if you wanted to," Juniper says to Bianca.

"It's fine Professor. Besides I want to pick out my own clothes as well," Bianca adds want to get some extra clothes as well.

"We can also help you with nicknames for your Pokemon," Fennel adds with a smile.

"All that sound good. But let's get your clothes order first alright," Amanita adds feeling they should do one task first. The three tiny girls agree and soon they start their shopping.

_________________________________________________________

Since he had some time, Touya checks the Dream Yard once more. Maybe he could find something that could help with Bianca and the other getting their height back. Sadly he is unable to find anything to help as he exits the building and sees a girl coming towards him.

"Hello," The girl said with a smile. "You're from Nuvema Town right?" Touya nods in a yes manner. "That's neat. That must mean you got a Pokemon right? So what did you pick?"

"Oshawott," Touya replies to the girl with brown hair.

"Oh, would you mind taking a Pansear then?" The girls asks. "I'm giving away some of my Pokemon's litter," The girls explains more to Touya.

Touya looks at the girl and then thinks about Kenki and how nice it would be to have a new team mate and friend. It also makes Touya a bit happy about having another Pokemon as well.

"Yes I can take your Pansear off your hands," Touya answers and the girl smiles as she gives the brown hair boy Pansear's pokeball. With his free hand Touya goes into his hand brings out Kenki's ball and then get the Oshawott out.

Kenki looks at his trainer and sees that Touya extra poke'ball. Touya smiles as he says.

"You want to meet your new friend Masou?"

Kenki makes a happy sound as Touya lets out the fire monkey Pokemon. It doesn't take long for Pansear to warm up to his new trainer and Kenki, Touya is happy to have another team member and friend to join them. Touya tells them that they have to be going and so returns them back to their balls. The brown hair boy looks the girl.

"Thank you very much," Touya thankful for the girl's kindness and waves her goodbye. The girl waves back and hopes to meet more kind trainers like teen.

Touya didn't waste time as he went in and out of the cafe/gym, he would challenge the gym some other time right now his top priority is getting the food back to the girls. He quickly walks back up to the apartment and knocks on the door. Amanita opens the door and is happy to see food.

"Thanks Touya," Amanita said with a smile as she let's him in. "Let's get get the others and have a nice meal,"

Touya nods in agreement.

15123111111111111222211111.content:
After settling down a bit to eat, Touya and the girls, normal and small, started to relax. Touya introduced the gang to his newest Pokemon, Masou the Pansear, who was a big hit. Bianca enjoyed the food, it was huge to her! While Juniper and Fennel discussed more ways to grow back, amongst other things. And Amanita watched her shrunken sister and friends with bewilderment.

The dinner ended and Amanita offered to clean up, Touya then offered to help her. While they were cleaning up, Amanita remembered something.

"Oh! That's right!" She started, shooting up. She looked at Juniper. "When I ordered your clothes, the site said it would take a whole week for them to come!"

"A whole week?" Juniper asked, a little surprised. She hadn't seen the checkout process, so this was news to her. "Did they lose all their Delibirds?"

"I don't know!" Amanita admitted. "That's what they said. It might take longer too..."

"So does that mean..?" Touya started to ask, before Bianca answered him.

"Yep. Looks like we might be stuck in town for a while!" She squeaked, sounding a little excited for some reason.

"Oh." Touya said, looking down.

"What's the matter?" Bianca asked, but then got a clue. "Oh, you're sad because you want to continue on your journey..."

"No, it's okay.." Touya said honestly. "I have to watch over you all, and there's a Gym to challenge here."

With that, Touya picked up the last of the mess and went to throw it away. Amanita and the tiny girls just watched, thinking he wasn't being as honest as even he might have thought. The shrunken ladies especially thought they were holding him back...

The three tiny girls were still on the kitchen table as Amanita is the computer trying to find a way for the package to get her quicker. Touya after cleaning everything up is now sitting on the couch reading a book that is from his bag that is titled "How to make delectable and balance meals for your Pokemon and your self camp out edition".

"Yes. But the question is how," Juniper adds as the professor tries to think of a way to improve his mood.

She notice there was a glint in his eyes as they fought. "I know a way," Bianca said happily as Juniper and Fennel look at the blonde.

Touya continues to read his book, feeling that's he is getting better understanding at making better meals along with balance and making good portions for everyone. He then starts to think about what everyone should have dinner until a voice interrupts his thoughts.

"Hey Touya! I want to have a battle with you!"

Touya turns his head and sees a Munna carrying the three tiny girls on her back. Touya looks confuse for a moment looking at the tiny blonde.

Touya closes his book and then smiles at the tiny girls. He quickly puts the book in his bag and pulls out his two poke'balls, the girls are happy to see that Touya is smiling. "This is bad for Bianca," Juniper notes, ghost attacks are especially strong against psychic types. Fennel nods and also adds.

"Plus it looks like Lick extra effect is kicking in as well,"

Juniper and looks and sees that Penelope is having trouble moving, the Pokemon Professor knew that the Munna is under the effect of paralysis.

"What's wrong Penelope?" Bianca asks as the tiny blonde sees that her Pokemon is having trouble moving. Juniper and Fennel both give each other a look that have to give Bianca a lesson about types after this battle.

"Masou finish this with Incinerate!" Touya shouts as Masou shoots a fire ball from it's mouth at the Munna. Munna could not move and gets hit by the fire ball and gets knocked out.

"Thank you fore your efforts," Biacna said as she returns Penelope back to her ball. The tiny blonde puts the ball back and then pulls out another ball and shouts. "Let's do our best Allie," Bianca throws the ball and the Lillipug comes out.

"This will be an even match," Fennel said seeing that either Pokemon had a direct advantage over the other. Juniper nods in agreement as Touya makes the first move.

"Masou use Lick,"

Masou quickly runs towards to pup Pokemon about to lick it.

"Allie use tackle!" Bianca shouts and the Lillipug rams into the fire monkey, Touya watches as it looks like the attack is also a critical as well! When Masou falls back everyone can see that the fire Monkey is out could.

"We did it Allie!" Bianca shouts happily as the pup Pokemon barks.

"You did well, Masou," Touya kindly says as he returns the fire type back to it's ball. Touya then picks up another ball throws it as he says.

"Let's do our best Kenki,"

The Oshawott smiles as it gets ready to fight. Juniper and Fennel both start to feel excitement as they watch the battle.

"Allie use tackle once more!" Biacna shouts as the pup Pokemon runs towards the sea otter Pokemon.

"Use tackle yourself Kenki," Touya said as the Oshawott runs towards the pup Pokemon as well. The two Pokemon soon clash against each other as they both hit each other.

After a few seconds Allie falls down, the hit from Kenki is too much for the pup Pokemon and she faints.

"Let's have a good battle," Cless adds as well with himself pulling a Poke'ball out as well.

Touya, Bianca and Cheren both nod as well as they get a poke'ball out out as well and soon everyone throws their poke'ball as they say the Pokemon's name or nick name.

"Come on out Masou!" Touya exclaims as the fire monkey comes out of the poke'ball.

"Let's do our best Penelope!" Bianca yells but comes out like a squeak to some of the giants and the psychic pig comes out of her poke'ball.

"Go Purloin!" Cheren shouts a cat Pokemon comes out of his poke'ball

"Time to shine Lillipup!" The gym leaders all yell at once as three pup Pokemon come out of their poke'balls.

At the table, Amania is siting and watch the battle while Professor Juniper and Professor Fennel are on the table watching the battle as they share one giant cookie together from taking a small piece off from the giant cookie.
1512311111111111122221111112121111.title: Meeting the Striaton Gym Learders and triple fight

choices: Touya and the others are able to find a way to beat the monkeys.
The gym leaders beat Touya and the others.
15123111111111111222211111121211111.content:
The battle starts at a quick pace, Bianca is able to tell Touya how she wants Penelope to move and attack and the brown hair youth is able to follow the tiny blonde's orders along with giving out tactic orders to Masou. Cheren is able to do his own thing as he was able to get one of the Lillipups over to him for a one on one fight.

"It quite interesting to see how they battle," Fennel says as she watches the fight as she takes another bite of her cookie.

"Yes," Juniper agrees with her collage friend as she takes another bit of a cookie. "Touya and Bianca are working together quite and Cheren is able to hold his own in the battle,"

"They're doing well.... but it looks like they could be doing better," Amania said as she observes the battle as she takes a sip of her drink.

"Well it's still the early part of the battle so let's see where it goes," Juniper said,feeling confident about her student's potential as Pokemon trainers.

"Masuo use Incinerate and Penelope use Psybeam!" Touya says as the two Pokemon fallow his orders and the two pokemon do their attacks.

The Pansear shoots out some fire balls from it's mouth as Munna shoots out a pink energy beam from it's forehead and both attacks hit the two Lillipugs. Both pup Pokemon let out a cry as they both fall.

"Use Scratch to finish this Purloin," Cheren says as the cat Pokmeon quickly runs up at the Lilipug and scratches the pup Pokemon and the Lilipug falls down as it makes a cry.

Cilan, Chile and Cress smile sadly as they see their Lillipugs get beaten by the challengers and all three brothers take out a poke'ball and return each Lilipug back to it's ball and said thanks to their Poekmon.

"Good job everyone!" Fennel cheers for the group as loud as she could yell. Juniper and Amania are happy as well but it's not over yet as the gym leaders still have their last Pokemon left.

"Alright! Looks like things are heating up!" Chile says as he pulls out his final poke'ball.

"We'll put all our hopes on our last Pokemon," Cress says as he pulls final poke'ball.

"Looks like this is our last chance," Cilan adds as he pulls out his final poke'ball.

Touya with the tiny Binca on his shoulder and Cheren watch the brothers throw the poke'ball and see what kind Pokemon were in the ball. The three see the three Pokemon are Pansear, Panpour, and Pansage.

"So that's their last Pokemon," Cheren says as and he is able to tell his Purloin to attack until Cilan yells.

"Triangle formation!"

Touya, Bianca and Cheren watch as the elemetal for a triangle formation as they put their backs on each other and start to twirler around while keeping their backs on each other.

"This could tricky," Cheren said as he watches the elemental monkeys.

"Use Work Up Pansage," Cilan says and the leaf type monkey starts to have an green energy around him.

"Alright Pansear it's your turn. Use Lick on that Munna!" Chile commands and soon the three together charge the pink psychic Pokemon.

"Oh no! If they hit Penelope with that lick attack she's get badly jut an possible paralyzed," Bianca says as she watches and tries to think up something. Touya being the only one to hear the tiny blonde since she is on his shoulder knew that he had to make sure to help out.

"Masou get in front of Penelope and use Incinerate on those three spinning monkeys," Touya said as his Pansear runs to where Munna is to try to get in front of the psychic Pokemon.

"Don't think it will be that easy," Cress says and then says his command. "Panpour use Water Gun on the challenger's Pansear,"

Just as the three monkeys are nearing Penelope with Mosou running from the left, when Panpour is facing Masou water monkey then shoots out a water attack from it's mouth at the fire monkey. Touya watches as Masou is not fast enough to doge the water attack and gets hit. Along with getting small damage from one the Lilipup and plus this Water gun, the fire Monkey then falls backwards and faints. Cheren watches and knows it would be news if Munna gets it hit so he hopes his plan will work.

"Purloin run over there and use scratch before that Pansear uses it's attack," Cheren says as the cat Pokemon starts to run towards three spining monkeys and the Munna.

"Just like my brother said. W-We're not going to make it that easy," Cilan says and then continues. "Pansage use Vine Whip!"

Cheren figures that one of those monkeys would attack, but with the monkey spinning around Pansage would have a hard time hitting the cat since it's not even facing Purloin he believes that they may have a chance. Unfortunately for Cheren and Purloin they didn't notice the vines coming out of the tree on top of Pansage's head! The vines then quickly reach over to the Purloin and both vines hit the cat Pokemon on both sides of it's face.

"Darn, I shouldn't have underestimated them," Cheren thought as Purloin faints from the hit.

Before Bianca tell Touya what she wanted to do or Touya could say, Pansear uses it's lick attack on Penelope and the poor psychic type gets hit with a critical and soon faints from the attack.

"What a dangerous combination," Amania said after watching what happen.

"The gym leaders are no push overs that's for sure," Fennel adds as Touya, Bianca and Cheren return their fainted Pokemon into their balls.

"Yes, but I know those three will be able to do this," Juniper said still confident in her students.

"I"m sorry Touya," Bianca says as she makes sure that Penelope back into her ball. "It I wasn't so slow on this battle stuff, Masou or Cheren's Purloin wouldn't have gotten hurt and fainted," Bianca looks down on the ground, Touya looks at the tiny blonde on his should and sees the frown on her face.

"It's okay Bianca and plus it's not over yet," Touya says to the tiny blonde as he pulls out his last poke'ball. "Let's go Kenki!" Touya then throws the ball and the water type comes out as well.

"Looks like you and I are on the same page," Cheren says to Touya as the black hair trainer throws his last pokemon out and a Snivy comes out.

"You're right Touya," Bianca thought as she pulls out a poke'ball and throws it and yells. "Fia do your best!" The Tepig comes out of the ball and looks ready to fight.

"I hope they can figure something out," Amania thought as she continues to watch the battle....
15123111111111111222211111121211111.title: Lilipugs lose and onto the second fight.

choices: Skip to when they get the package.
Follow the next six days of the group.
151231111111111112222111111212111111.content:
Things are not looking good for Touya, Cheren and the tiny Bianca against the elemental monkeys. No one has a made a since Touya and the others sent out their starter Pokemon. Cheren tries to think up a plan to beat their triangle formation as Touya is thinking as well but is keeping on eye on The triplets and the elemental monkeys. Bianca is watching as well but soon starts to a little at her stomach at seeing the elemental monkeys spin so much.

"I wish there was a stop them," Bianca said as she looks down and continues to talk. "Maybe we could attack from above... No that would never work,"

Even though the tiny blonde thought she was talking to herself, Touya was able to hear her. The Brow hair youth then smiles as he gets an idea from Bianca's talking to herself.

"You're a genius Bianca," Touya whispers to the tiny blonde on his should. Bianca blushes as she was the only one that could hear Touya say that, she was about to ask how but when she look into his giant eye she sees a spark in it. The tiny blonde figures that Touya must have made a plan after hearing talk to herself.

"I don't about that," Bianca says back and then looks at her opponents. "But If I was able to help I'm glad. Use Tepig to help with your plan,"

Touya nods with a smile as he says. "Fia shoot Ember around them!"

The Tepig follows that young man's command and shoots out fire balls around the elemental monkeys. The monkey Pokemon try to stay in formation as they try to doge the attacks.

Cheren turns his head around and is about to ask Touya what he is thinking until he sees that Touya is looking at him. The black hair trainer sees a spark in brown hair trainer's eye and Cheren smiles as it seems like Touya was able to think of something.

"They have something planed," Cilan thought as he watches the challengers and tries to see if they have something plan but the gym leaders is bit worried about his Pokemon as he takes glances at The elemental monkeys. When the green hair trainer took glances at Touya and Cheren he notice that the brown hair trainer mouth was moving but no sound was not coming out before he went back to watching his Pokemon doge flame and he look at Touya once more and notice he the he blowing a bit and the green hair gym leaders starts to get confuse about what Touya is doing.

"You can doge those!" Chile yells as he is only paying attention to the fight and not the trainers.

"What ever you have plan, there's no way it will work," Cress thought as he closes his eyes feeling confident about their victory.

After a few seconds of Fia continuing shooting out embers the Elemental monkeys, Touya then says. "Fia aim above them and fire!" Fia smiles and the Tepig then aims up and fires a ember above them.

"Wait above!?" Cress says as he opens his eyes surprise to hear Touya's command to the Tepig.

"That's dumb why would you fire above us no at us?" Chile talks to himself about what's going on.

"Why would he do that...." Cilan thought as he looks above the elemental monkeys and sees something that terrifies him. The green hair gym leader sees that a small Leaf Tornado is above them and that's not all, it has water being carry in it as well from the wind.

Cilan did not have to warm his brothers as the ember hits the Leaf Tornado! The Leaves in the Tornado burn to a crisp and the wind stops but unfortunately for the gym leaders the water did not evaporate from the fire! The water the was stuck in the tornado soon pours on the three monkey Pokemon, the monkeys make loud cries as the ember had made the water in the Leaf Tornado boiling hot. The monkeys stop their spinning and seprate from each other to shake off the hot hot water.

Touya, the tiny Bianca and Cheren knew this was their chance and they gladly took it as they use their Pokemon's strongest attacks.

"Kenki! Use Razor Shell on Pansear! Fia use Flame Charge on Pansage!"

"Snivy end this match with a Leaf Tornado on Panpour!"

The Oshawott, Tepig and Snivy follow their trainers orders and go in for the attacks. Kenki pulls his shell of his chest and covers the shell in water and slashes the fire Monkey and in one slash the Pansear let's out a cry as it faints. Fia chargers at Pansage as fire surrounds it's body and the Tepig hits the grass monkey and the Pansage makes a cry as well and faints. Snivy spins his tail and makes a leaf tornado come out of his spin and the leaf Tornado moves fast and hits the Panpour and the water monkey makes a cry as well and faints as well.

"W-We lost," Cilan said surprise to see that him and brother lost and their power triangle formation got beaten.

"I can't believe it," Cress said as he was not handling the lost well.

"How did you beat us!?" Chile asks as the red hair waiter has not figure out how they lost to their opponent.

"I can explain that," Cheren said as the gym leaders return their unconscious and the black hair trainer continues to talk. "While Fia was distracting with her ember attacks, Touya was able to mouth me his plan,"

"So you two were able to read other lips," Cress said quite impress at how well Touya and Cheren could communicate with their mouth flaps.

"So that's what you two were doing then," Cilan adds as the green hair gym leader was able to see some of what Touya and Cheren were doing.

"That's good and all but you have to explain what you did," Chile said, wanting to hear the full explanation of the plan.

"If that's what you want," Cheren said as he takes a small breath and explains. "When we were reading each other lips Touya asked me if Snivy learn Leaf Tornado yet, I told him yes and he asked me to shoot one in the air just above your Pokemon. Luckily for us you three had your attention on Fia and her attack so I was able I was able to indicate to Snivy with a hand single to use Leaf Tornado and place it above your three monkeys. Then Touya was able to form his single to Kenki to shoot a water gun and have it stay in the air by having be in the leaf tornado," Cilian then quickly remembers that Touya was blowing earlier and he just realizes that was his single to his Oshawott to Water Gun."Then to finish it up Fia shot a ember at the leaf tornado with the water in it and cause the tornado to stop and also to heat up the water and then it fell on your three Pokemon," Cheren finishes explaining the plan. "It was thanks to Touya's plan we were able to win this match,"

"It wasn't entirely my idea, Bianca helped out and you helped as well Cheren," Touya said feeling like he shouldn't get all the credit.

"Thanks Touya," Bianca said, even though she only help with the idea she was glad she was able to help.

"Your too kind sometime Touya," Cheren sighs but has a smile on his face.

The gym leaders smile and are happy to have to have such strong trainers as they are about to talk someone opens their mouth first.

"You three did an excellent job, but you should also be paying attention to Your Pokemon as well," squeak like voice said.

Touya along with the tiny Bianca on his should and Cheren turn around and see that Amania walked up to them while carrying the tiny Professor Juniper and Fennel. The three trainers from Nuvema Town look at their starter Pokemon and notice that a white light is surrounding their Pokemon!

"Our Pokemon are evolving!" Bianca exclaims and is happy to see that Fia is getting stronger.

Everyone watches as Oshwott, Tepig and Snivy evolve and turn into their new forms. Kenki is now a Dewott, Fia is now Pignite and Snivy is a Servine. All three Pokemon are silent for a moment and then start to celebrate their new forms.

"You've become so strong Fia!" Bianca shouts as loud as she could to her Pignite, even though Fia could only hear a little bit he could feel his trainer's pride in him.

"You've really prove you self Servine," Cheren said as he walks over to his newly evolve Pokemon pat on it's back. Servine let's out a happy cry.

Kenki looks at his trainer and wonders what Touya is going to say, Touya looks at the Dewott for a moment and closes his eyes and opens again and gives Kenki a a sincerer close smile at the water type Pokemon. Even though his trainer didn't really talk, Kenki could see though the brown hair trainer's smile and eyes that Touya was incredible proud of him.

"Now that you're done explaining and seeing you're Pokemon evolve, let's give you three your badges," Cilan said as his brothers Chile quickly gets three badge cases. "We'll also be giving a case as well to hold your badges,"

"Touya could you hold onto mine. It's to big to fit my bag?" Bianca asks the young man, Touya nods in agreement as Chile gives Cheren on badge plus badge case and gives the other two to Touya.

"That's not all we'll also be giving you this TM," Cress says he holds three CDs in cases as well. "This is TM 83 Work, you read the TM does on little piece of that comes in the case,"

"But how am I going to use it?" Bianca asks as the TM was to big to use on her device.

"Don't worry Bianca, Amania and I will make something that will help you out," Fennel said and Bianca smiles and is happy that she knows people like Fennel and Amania.

The group quickly say their goodbyes to the Gym Leaders and Touya puts the tiny girls in his bag and Cheren, Amania and himself walk out of the gym. Cheren looks at Touya.

"I'm in the boat as you, I have to stay back here as well." Cheren said and continues to talk. "My mom and dad need help with something so I'm staying in Nuvema town for the next days,"

Touya nods as they both stop near the apartments.

"This is our splitting point, see ya some other time Touya, Amania and everyone else," Cheren said with a smile as he starts his walk back to Nuvema.

Touya and Amania wave goodbye to Cheren and both enter the apartment and wait.
151231111111111112222111111212111111.title: Getting the frist gym badge and evolution

1512311111111111122221111112121111112.content:
Touya and Bianca both get their Pokemon heal from Fennel's home made Poke'center and let their Pokemon rest in their balls. The group go their separate ways in the apartment. In the the living room, Touya is siting on the couch reading a book that is title "Don't think, feel TM edition.", Amanita and the tiny girls are in the kitchen enjoying their talk together. Amanita sits on a chair while the tiny girls were on the table.

"So you said you were going to help me with TMs but how are you going to do that?" Bianca asks as the tiny blonde takes a piece of berry that's near her.

"That's easy," Fennel starts to explain after she takes piece of the berry that tiny girls were sharing. "We'll just make a cable that can connect to Touya's device so you can use it,"

"That should work well," Juniper said as she takes a piece of the berry as well. "You should be able to us HMs as well,"

"Oh!" Fennel said as she stands up. "I think I have a HM somewhere, I"ll give it to Touya and the two of you can use it,"

"Thanks Professor Fennel," Bianca says with a smile happy that Touya and herself have another move to teach their Pokemon.

"Oh right I have something to give Touya as well," Amanita said as the grade school girl just remembers since her sister brought up the HM. "I have an extra Pal Pad laying around I'll just give to him, even though he has a Xtransceiver the Pal Pad will help him save space on it,"

"That's very nice of you," Fennel comments on her sister generosity.

"H-Hey! You make sound like I never do anything nice," Amanita talks back to her older sister.

Bianca and Juniper both a giggle at the two sisters interaction with each other.

_______________________

Day 2

It was the second night Touya stayed in Fennel's apartment, last night Amanita explain about that they will connect Touya's device to Baican's device so the tiny blonde could teach her Pokemon TMs and HMs. The grade schooler also gave him a Pal Pad as well, it would come in handy to write down other numbers along save some space on the Xtransceiver along with an HM with the move cut. Touya, Amanita along with the tiny girls chose to eat breakfast at the Cafe today and when they went in, Touya and Amanita saw that the gym leaders along with a few staff were having trouble with the cafe. Cress explain to the two that some some their chiefs came down with a cold and now they were short on staff. Touya volunteers to help out and so does Amanita, the triples are happy they are willing to help and sent them into the kitchen. Touya puts on a apron along with taking off his hat and Amanita join as well with putting a apron on as well and since it was just the two of them and Cilan allowed it the tiny girls are will to work. Touya and Bianca let out their Pokemon and asked them fro help as well and the Pokemon agreed and they would help wait tables.

"It's going to be so much fun," Bianca said as she is wearing a green shirt along with her orange pajama pants.

"It's going to be quite interesting," Juniper adds, the Pokemon Professor wondering if they should even help with them being tiny they might get in the way. Juniper is wearing a plan white shirt with blue pants.

"It's going to be okay Aurea. Plus it's going to be fun cooking at this size," Fennel ready to help cook, the dark blue hair women is wearing a pink shirt with white pants.

"I better keep on eye on her.... Big Sis has strange ways of cooking," Amanita thought and the younger sister tries to remember that last time her sister cooked and it did not turn out good.

Touya took on the majority of the work, by working with the ovens, stoves or anything that requires multiple task done at once. At first Touya had some troubles working a larger kitchen but after a quick lessons from the triplet brother he gets the the hangs of things. While cooking the brown hair youth would take glaces at what Amanita and the tiny girls were doing, Amanita was quite helpful in the kitchen even though she was a much of a beginner as Touya, it came from having to helping her sister stay on the recipe of what ever food they were making. The tinier members of the are working quite hard as all three of them were able to work together using the kitchen utensils to help add the extra ingredients to the dish also did good work on mixing the many drinks the cafe serve as well. After the time to stop severing break stop the part time workers took a break.

Amanita and the tiny girls are having a nice breakfast of pancakes, fruit and some juice, the Pokemon are eating some fresh berries as well. Touya is cooking his breakfast and enjoying a glass of orange juice.

"Hey thanks for the help man," Chile said as his brothers walk over the brown hair trainer. "You saved our buts,"

"Yes we a owe lot to you and the girls," Cilan adds as well.

"You're welcome, it was a good experience in cooking," Touya replies back to the brothers as he flips the pancake in front of him.

"You really look on the bright side things huh," Chile said and then "Well you're welcome for the cooking lessons,"

"All of you can leave after you finish your meals. The morning is the only time when we're really busy," Cress said as he washes his hand.

"I must say though working together with some types of people it's sort of like Pokemon battling," Cilan comments as he looks at the temp workers. "There are many types of people in this world,"

"Yeah some you work together well with and others can be total disasters," Chile chimes in the conversation.

"Yes, but we must not over look that something special might come out if you work with opposite of your ideals," Cress adds as well and continues to talk. "Like us, we all have different personalities,"

"Yes that's true," Cilan said with a smile as the other two brothers nod in agreement. Touya looks at the three brothers and had to agree he was learning a lot from being around Bianca, Cheren, Professor Juniper, Professor Fennel, Amania and the three brothers of course. The brown hair trainer then gets an idea and quckily goes to his bag and pulls out the Pal Pad and walks back to the brothers.

"Oh you want our numbers?" Cress asks as Touta nods up and down as a yes. "Sure I don't mind, besides we have a sort of a bond as well since I picked a water type for my starter as well,"

"It would be fantastic, we could exchange recipes to each other," Cilan said looking at Touya as a friend he could share his love cooking with.

"Yeah! You gotta to tell me how battles go to!" Chile beams wanting to hear more battles.

So the three brothers give Touya their numbers in the Pal Pad and Touya gave them his as well.

Later.....

It was night as everyone is doing their own things, Touya is in the kitchen washing dishes, Amania and tiny big sisters are making inventions that would help the Bianca, Juniper and Fennel herself with their journey with Touya. Bianca and Juniper in the living room are having another lessons on Pokemon and the Pokemon were having their free time. Kenki and Fia are training together in the test room, luckily for the Dewott he was able to have two sea shells as swords thanks to Fennel and Amanita went to the beach earlier that year and brought back some shells. Since Kenki only had sea shell the grade school girl gave the Dewott one of the sea shells she had so Dewott would have two. Touya and Dewott thanks Amania fro the sea shell. Penelope and Allie were with Bianca and Juniper as the like being around their tiny blonde trainer. Last Masou is also in the living room looking at some fashion magazines, he flip through the magazine until stooping at a page with Pansear wearing a scarf that has a flame pattern on it.

Truth be told, Masou didn't mind battling other Pokemon but the Pansear interest was more into fashion. Just as the fire monkey continues to stare at the magazine, he didn't notice that Touya come out of the kitchen, the trainer sees Masou looking at something and walks over to see what the Pansear is looking at. Masou tenses up when he hears footstep and turns his head and sees it's his trainer, the fire monkey starts to feel a little afraid as his first instinct is that Touya would get mad at him for interest in fashion, So Masou runs away and goes into the training room.

"That's weird," Bianca said as she watches the scene with Masou. "I wonder what cause Masou to act that way,"

"That's a good observation Biacna," Juniper said and continues to talk. "What ever it was I think it must have to do with that magazine,"

"Yeah and something to do with Touya as well," Bianca adds as Touya picks up the magazine and looks at the page that Masou was looking at, a few seconds later Touya puts the magazine in his pocket and walks back to the couch and sits down and looks like he is in thought. "I want to ask but it looks like Touya is thinking of something,"

"I think it would be best to leave Masou to Touya then," Juniper adds, though she is a bit worried as well.

____________________

Day 3

Nothing much happen that day, everyone just took it easy. Touya left to get some groceries and came back with the groceries along with an extra bag for some reason. Touya even asked Amanita if they had a sewing machine, unfortunately Fennel and Amania didn't own a sewing machine, but luckily the one of the neighbor own one and let Touya and Amanita borrow one. Later after eveyone went to bed, Touya stays up and starts to mess with the sewing machine.
1512311111111111122221111112121111112.title: Relaxing days in Striaton city Part 1.

choices: The tiny girls and Amanita make a perfect cake.
The tiny girls and Amanita have touble making a cake.
15123111111111111222211111121211111121.content:
Day 4

It was the new morning for everyone and as they are about to have the breakfast the Touya cooked for them, Touya and Bianca get their Pokemon out to let them have their breakfast but Touya stops Masou before he could take a nimble in breakfast, Bianca and Juniper both watch the screen about to happen. Touya is wearing a white shirt with black pants while the Amanita and the tiny girls are wearing pajamas.

"Looks like we're going a conclusion from what happen the other day," Juniper said as she watches.

"Wait what happen?" Fennel asks as she takes a piece of the french toast that Touya made.

"Well Masou was reading some magazine and when Touya went to see what he was reading, Masou run away. Professor Juniper didn't have a chance to see it since Touya took the magazine and put it in his pocket," Bianca explains to the dark hair women.

"I think I might know what magazine that was, I think it was so sort of fashion magazine," Amanita groggily said as she is still a little sleepy. "By the way I didn't notice at first but look at Touya's fingers,"

The tiny girls look and see that Touya's fingers do indeed have bandages on them. The girls were wondering what's going until Touya pulls a scarf from his pocket, it wasn't the most extravagant scarf and it has a simple flame pattern on it as well.

"Sorry, it's the best I could," Touya said as he gives Masou the scarf, the brown hair trainer figured out that Masou must have wanted to have the scarf but looking at the price of it, there was no way he could afford it at the current moment so this is the best he could do right now.

Masou looks at the scarf, it wasn't as good looking as the scarf in the magazine and the flame pattern on it looks quite simple unlike the flames in the magazine. But despite that Masou looks at the scarf with a smile on it's face and quickly puts it around it's neck and makes a happy cry. Touya look at the fire monkey and is happy that Masou is enjoying it. Kenki looks happy as well to his team happy as well.

"Looks like he likes it," Amanita said with a smile.

"Yep! Looks like everything went better then expect," Bianca said with a smile on her face.

"Looks like letting Touya handle this was the right move," Juniper thought with a smile on her face.

"That's sweet," Fennel said with a smile and then adds. "Since Touya knows a bit sewing he'll be able to repair our doll clothes if they ever get rip,"

"That's true," Juniper adds, it would be nice to someone to be able to repair their clothes.

Touya hears this and wonders if he should keep sewing at least be able the tiny girls with repairing the doll clothes and maybe make some doll clothes for them as well but he doesn't really have time to think about as the group eats breakfast.

Later.

While Touya and Amanita were working on fixing tonight's dinner the shrunken girls were having a talk among themselves on the kitchen table.

"Say Bianca could you help me with my research?" Fennel asks the blonde as they wait in for dinner to be ready.

"Sure I would like to help," Bianca answered back and then ask. "What would you like me to do?"

"Well.... I need to get some dream mist from Penelope," Fennel answers back and then explains. "Before this shrinking thing happen I was researching dreams of Pokemon and trainers,"

"Fennel's been doing this research for years as well. Heck I remember right you've doing research even back in collage," Juniper adds with a giggle.

"Wow! You've put a lot of committed to this research," Bianca notes and is impress by the dark blue hair women.

"Yep! I believe that dreams have powers of their own," Fennel said getting a bit exited at talking about her research. "The best way to test this theory is getting dream mist from a Munna or Musharna,"

"Dream mist.... that's what forms after Penelope eats a dream right?" Bianca asks not certain about the answer.

"Yep that's right," Juniper said with a smile, happy to see that Bianca's studies are helping her out.

"Yep. So we're going to need Penelope to someone's dream," Fennel then looks at the with trickster like smile. "I think we should use Touya as a test subject,"

"W-Why would we do that?" Bianca asks, feeling a little bit nervous about but also wanting to know what Touya dreams about.

"I think we should ask him first," Juniper adds, seeing the gears of her collage friend move and guess that Fennel would just say they should do when he asleep.

"You're no fun, Aurea," Fennel puts at her best friend. The tiny girls then share a giggle among them selves. Even though some of their talk sounds like squeaks, Touya and Amanita were able to understand some of it. The grade school girl blushes at her sister plan and then whispers to Touya.

"I'm sorry that big sis, she gets caught up in her research sometimes,"

"It's alright, she's very enthusiastic," Touya whispers back in a whisper.

Amanita sighs at Touya answer and starts to feel a little worry Touya's safety around her sister since he's being to nice.

__________________________________________

Day 5

It was a new morning, but the only ones up are Touya and Amanita. Touya is wearing his normal outfit as he puts on his boot. Amanita watches and asks.

"So where are you going?" Amanita asks as Touya stands up after getting his shoes on.

"Going back to my house to celebrate my birthday with my Mom and Dad. I'll be back in time for dinner," Touya answers the question in a nonchalant and Amanita nods her head.

"Okay, I'll be seeing you later," Amanita says as Touya nods and then leaves the apartment, after a few seconds the grade school girl brain gets hit with the information! "Wait it's Touya's Birthday!"

Amanita quickly runs into her bedroom where the tiny girls are sleeping on her dressing. The grade school girl reaches her dressing and starts to ask the tiny blonde some things.

'Bianca did you now it's Touya's birthday today?"

"Touya's birthday....." Bianca tierly says and then after a seconds the tiny blonde gets up and Amanita could see the tiny blonde's orange pajamas. "OH MY GOSH! I forgot about Touya's birthday!"

What' wrong Bianca?" Juniper asks as she starts to wake up, Juniper is wearing white pajamas as Bianca looks over to the Professor.

"Professor Juniper I forgot Touya's birthday," Bianca answers back and the light hair brunette looks at Bianca for a moment and then takes in the information.

"Today is Touya's birthday!?" Juinper said as she forgot about as well with being shrunk and trying to find a cure for it.

"Oh today is Touya's birthday?" Fennel asks as she gets up, Fennel is wearing pink pajamas with a flora pattern on them and then the dark blue hair women continues to talk. "We have to do something nice for him,"

"Yeah...... We can make a birthday cake!" Bianca suggest as she gets up.

"A birthday cake, yes that could work.... But it will be difficult for us to do," Juniper said as she gets up. "Even with Amanita here to help us, our size makes things a bit difficult,"

"It's going to be fine," Fennel said to the two. "I think he'll like anything we make,"

"True," Amainita thought as Touya is a nice enough guy to accept any type of present.

Bianca and Juniper both knew they were right but they still want to make a fantastic cake for Touya's birthday despite their disadvantage. Bianca and Juniper give each other a look and a nod.

"Let's do our best to make the best cake!" Bianca exclaims as she is ready to make the cake.
15123111111111111222211111121211111121.title: Relaxing days in Striaton city Part 2.

choices: The girls wait and get to top off the cake
Touya returns sooner and the tiny girls don't get the chance
151231111111111112222111111212111111211.content:
Amanita, with the help of the tiny girls, got things set up in the kitchen for making Touya's birthday cake. And so, Amanita and the tiny girls worked together to make their surprise cake for Touya's birthday. Although Amanita was the one who really did all the work, Bianca helped as best as she could at her size, and Juniper was the one giving the shots, while Fennel tried her best, mostly at eating the ingredients and mixture. Soon, a batter had formed in the large bowl they used.

"Watch this!" Bianca yelled. She grabbed the spoon with both of her hands and started to stir. Because of her small size, she had to exert herself to move the spoon even a little though. Amanita and Fennel laughed as they watched their tiny co-worker mix the batter. But Juniper was less amused.

"Be careful, Bianca!" The Pokemon professor warned the other tiny blonde.

"Whoa!" Bianca cried as she slipped and fell into the bowl, disappearing into the thick mixture.

"Bianca!" Juniper and the others all shouted, worried for the girl's safety. They watched for any sign of Bianca in the mix, but there was nothing.

"Hold on!" Amanita said. She reached into the batter Just as she did though, a tiny blonde head popped out. The young girl retreated her hand.

"Ha ha ha!" Bianca was laughing, covered in cake mix. Her head was just barely above the mixture, but she was otherwise fine.

"Bianca! Are you okay?" Juniper asked.

"I'm fine! I taste like cake!" Bianca said happily, licking herself of the batter that covered her body.

"Oh, thank goodness!" Amanita said.

"Oh, that girl... Amanita, get her out of there would you?" Fennel asked.

Amanita nodded and did as she was told. Bianca was sad to leave the tasty mixture behind, but okay with it. Amanita handed her some paper towels to clean herself off with. Bianca used them to do just that, when not eating the rest off herself!

After that incident, the rest of the baking went smoothly. An hour of work later, the cake was ready to go in the oven. Some time later the timer went off, signaling the cake was ready to be taken out of the oven. Amanita pulled the cake out and carried it over to the counter top. The young girl held it with just one hand, and it started to waver in her grip.

"Careful, Amanita!" Fennel warned.

"I got it!" Amanita replied, and quickly held up the cake pan with both hands. "Phew!" She sighed.

Bianca gasped. "That was close!"

"Amanita!" Fennel scolded. Her little hands on her tiny hips.

"Sorry, sis. Watch out!" Amanita warned the tiny girls and slowly lowered the cake pan down next to them.

"Ooh, it's hot!" Bianca said. Although she was far from the desert, by her scale at least, the heat still got to her. She and the other shrunken girls kept their distance from the burning pan.

"Yes. We'll have to wait a little before topping it." Juniper said.

"Yeah, we will. But for now, just look how it turned out!" Fennel said, eyeing the cake hungrily.

"Hmm, Touya's going to love it." Juniper said with a smile.

"It looks perfect!" Bianca cheered.

"It sure does! I can't wait to have some!" Amanita said happily.
151231111111111112222111111212111111211.title: A cake for Touya

choices: Spend some more time on the party.
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.content:
After waiting for a few minutes the cake is finally cool enough for Amanita and the tiny girls to be able to decorate the cake. First Amanita takes the bake good out of the pan, the tiny girls on the counter top can see the vanilla/chocolate cake in front of them.

"I never thought I would see so much cake in my life," Juniper comments as the light hair brunette compares herself with the giant cake and sees that the cake reaches up to her neck. Juniper notice the width of the cake is about twice her own height!

"Well I have in my dreams," Fennel comments and is happy that dream is going to become reality soon.

"So all we have left to do is put the icing, cream, and strawberries on it," Bianca said as she looks at the cake as Amanita puts bowls down near the cake that contain what Bianca mentions along with tools to help them with the decoration.

"Alright all there is left to do is decoration," Amanita said with a smile as she gets a large offset spatula and gets a big glob of icing and puts it on the cake.

"Oh I can help," Bianca said as she walks over to the the smaller offset spatula, it was about her size and the tiny blonde tries to pick up and able to lift up a bit from the ground but barely keep it up as Bainca puts the small offset spatula down. "That's-" the tiny blonde is huffing a bit. "hard to pick up,"

"Bianca I don't think we'll be much help with the icing," Juniper said as the Pokemon Professor figures that Bianca, Fennel and herself will not be able to lift much because of their small size. The light hair brunette sees that Bianca is frowning from not being able to help with the decoration. "We can help with putting strawberries on the cake," trying to cheer up the blonde.

"Yeah, if we work together we can lift one up," Fennel adds wanting to cheer up Bianca as well.

"Alright that sounds good and all but I think I'll handle putting strawberries on the top. Don't want your feet to dirty the cake," Amanita said and the tiny girls agree and soon Amanita and the tiny girls get to work.

While working Amanita wonders why they didn't have Bianca's Pokemon to help them out, but the grade school girl figures that the tiny girls want to help making the cake themselves. Amanita watches as the tiny girls pick a single Strawberry together and move it over to the the corners of the cake and place it near it, the grade school girl smiles and gets back to work on her part.

________________

It was about night when Touya returns to the apartment building, it was quite the day as he and his Pokemon spent time at his home and did enjoy his time with his parents, both giving him Pokédollars, books, and some movies he wanted to watch as well. Touya also meet with Cheren as well, his childhood friend wished him a happy birthday and gave him some Poke'ball and potions along with some berries. When the brown hair trainer got back to Striaton City, he meet the triplet gym brothers and once they found out that it is Touya's birthday they give the recipes for their coffees teas. Touya walks up the stairs and reaches the apartment that Fennel and Amanita both live in and knocks on the door.

"Just a minute," Amanita answers from behind the door. Touya wonders why Amanita wants to him to wait but the young man didn't get much time to think as he hears Amanita's voice once more. "Alright come on in,"

Touya opens the door and when he enters he hears a popping noise and some confetti flying near him. Touya notice that the tiny girls are on Penelope and wearing the clothes they first shrunk in along with Fia, Allie and Amanita with a popper in hand. The Munna moves closer to Touya so the tiny girls could say something to the young man.

"Happy Birthday Touya!" The tiny girls shouts along with Amanita from the back with a smile on their faces.

Touya is quite surprise to see as well a birthday cake that is square shape with white icing, cream and strawberries on the cake as well being all around the cake.

"The cake's the best thing we could do on short notice," Bianca said with a bit of embarrassment.

"I hope you enjoy it," Juniper adds happy to be able to help as well.

"Yeah. It's something special to get bake goods from cute girls such as us," Fennel says with huge smile.

"One also keep on eating during her work time," Amanita comments at the tiny dark hair woman eating some of ingredients during their cooking process.

"Look there's enough to share," Fennel pouts at her younger sister bringing up that up in front of he young man.

"Thank you for you the cake," Touya says with a smile on his face. He really didn't expect Amanita and the tiny girls to bake a cake for him. He sees the tiny girls blush a bit with smiles on their faces while Amanita has a smile on her face along with a light blush.

"Since that's all settled, let's get to eat," Fennel said her mood being better after being thank by Touya.

"Yeah it's time to enjoy that cake!" Bianca chimes with a smile as her stomach rumbles a bit.

"I have to agree with your stomach Bianca," Juniper adds as Bianca blushes a bit from the Pokemon Professor commenting on her stomach rumbling.

Touya then gets out two Poke'ball and lets Kenki and Masou and tells the Dewott and Pansear about the cake and small party and both of the Pokemon both smile and happy to have another chance at cake.

Touya and Amantia take a place at the kitchen table as Penelope sits on the table and the tiny girls get off the physic Pokemon and onto the table. Soon everyone has a piece of cake, the tinier members of the group sharing a piece of the cake. The tiny girls watch as the giant starts to eat his piece of the cake, his piece containing both vanilla and chocolate with a strawberry on top of it as well. Bianca, Juniper and Fennel all watch and see that Touya quite likes the cake as he finishes his first piece and gets another one.

"Looks like Touya really likes our cake," Fennel comments as the tiny girls have a chat among them selves.

"Well he really love sweets," Bianca said as she remembers that the young man eating many sweets over the hears.

"I'm glad were able to give him something for his birthday," Juniper adds as she takes a piece from their cake as well and takes a bite.

Both Bianca and Fennel agree with a nod and then both of them take piece of cake from their giant piece and eat it as well.
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.title: Small birthday party in the apartment.

choices: "It should be coming in any minute,"
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.content:
Touya, Amanita, Pokemon, and the tiny girls enjoy their party that night, after a few hours the group finishes their party clean and head straight to bed.

Touya asleep on the couch starts to feel the beams of the sun through the windows, the young man starts to stir and opens his eyes sits up with a yawn as well. He looks around and sees that Kenki and the other Pokemon are sleeping on pillows on the ground. Touya then recalls that Bianca and himself let their Pokemon stay out their Poke'ball for tonight since it was a special occasion. Touya then gets up quietly so he can start making breakfast for everyone but the young man sees that one Pokemon wakes and sees it's no other then Kenki. The Dewott walks over to his trainer without waking up the other Pokemon, Touya is amazed at how well the Dewott is able to move around, from the way Kenki walked it was like a scene from an old Samurai movie. Kenki looks at his trainer and sees that Touya is wearing a long sleeve shirt that reach his elbows and that the top color is black and on the sleeves while the bottom half is white and black shorts as well. Touya figures that Kenki must want to join him the kitchen and so Touya asks the Dewott and Kenki nods his head in agreement. So the two went into the kitchen and Touya starts to make french toast as Kenki trains by stretching his legs out. While cooking Touya takes glances at his starter Pokemon and sees the Dewott training, Kenki is quite a hard worker at training so hard and the brown hair youth wonders what Kenki wants to with all that strength. Touya didn't have much time to think about it as Amanita came into the kitchen. The grade school girl is wearing purple pajamas and looks at Touya cooking.

"Hey Touya thanks for cooking breakfast again," Amanita said with a smile as Touya answers back.

"It's no problem. Cooking is really fun,"

Amanita is happy to see that Touya is enjoying cooking breakfast, but the school girl happy mood didn't last long since it was the day that the doll clothes would come in and soon Touya, her tiny sister and other two tiny friends will be leaving. The grade school girl was okay about being alone in the apartment since Fennel would go to places while she stayed behind. But this time it's different, Amanita will not know when her sister will get back and possible be back to her normal size. Amanita was able to hold these thoughts back since Fennel was still with her but now it's the day for Touya and the others to leave it's going to be hard to keep these thoughts from bothering her. Amania gets a cup from a cabinet and a carton of orange juice from the fridge and sits at the kitchen table and pours the juice into the cup. As the grade school girl does this Touya puts down a plate in front of her, Amanita looks and sees a freshly cooked french toast with whip cream and strawberries and blue berries on it. The young man also puts a bottle of syrup and a fork and knife next to Amanita on the table as well and goes back to back to cooking more french toast.

"Thanks Touya," Amanita thankful for the breakfast and quickly picks up the bottle of syrup and puts some on the french toast and then cuts it up with the knife and then picks up a piece of the cut french toast with fork and puts it into her mouth. The grade school girl feels the fluffiness of the french toast and the syrup combine making the dish sweet. "Oh I'm going to miss having your cooking Touya. Big Sis always tries the recipe drastically," Amanita takes another another piece of the french toast and eats it and then looks at Touya. "By the way if Big Sis gets distracted by something she's interested in she always loses track of her surroundings.... So you gotta to watch over her," The grade school girl starting to feel some tears forming from her telling Touya about how reckless her sisters can be sometimes. While cooking Touya takes a glance and sees that Amanita is about to cry, even though Amanita is a genuis at her young age she was still grade school girl that is not going to see her sister for awhile. Touya then sets the spatula down and walks over to where Amanita is sitting squats down so they could be eye level. The young man then brings up his right arm and with his right hand being clinch except for his pinky finger extending out.

"I'll protect your sister I pinky promise," Touya says with a warm smile, Amanita looks at the young man and sees that Touya's smile is sincere and the grade school girl giggles.

"I can't believe you can be so cheesy and keep a straight face," Amanita says through giggles as she raises her left arm to Touya's level and then puts her left pinky finger on his pinky as well. Kenki stops training and watches as his trainer and Amanita both do the pinky promise chant, even though he didn't really understand what's going on but he could sees that it really important.

After finishing the chant, Touya and Amanita both smell something burning, the young man looks at the stove and sees that it's the cooking french toast that's burning! Touya quickly stands up straight and swift movement to the stove is able to get the stove and get the french toast out and put on a plate. The french toast somewhat burnt along the edges but still mostly looks good.

"I guess this one is mine," Touya said not wanting any the girls to have the burnt french toast.

"Make sure to cut the burnt parts off. It's not healthy to eat those," Amantia said as she gets from her chair. "I'm going to check if Big Sis and the other woke up yet," Amantia leaves the kitchen to check up on the tiny girls who are in her room. Even though Amanita is still has worries, she knows that things will be okay since Touya is looking after her sister and the others.

After a few minutes everyone is at the kitchen table, The Pokemon eating some fruits and some french toast near the table. Touya and Amanita sitting at the kitchen table enjoying their breakfast and the tiny girls on the kitchen table enjoying their breakfast as well with a corner piece torn off from one of the french toast. The tiny girls are in pajamas, Bianca in orange, Juniper in lime green and Fennel in purple.

"Touya your cooking is as good as ever," Fennel said as she dips a piece of french toast into a bit syrup that was in a small measuring cup that Touya gave the tiny girls so they can get some syrup on their pieces of french toast. "Traveling with you is going to be fun if I get to eat good food like this,"

"Yep!" Bianca said as she eats a piece of her french toast as well with a bit syrup on it as well and then says. "I hope we can have fun on this journey,"

"Yes Bianca I hope as well," Juniper adds, even though the Pokemon professor is glad to see that Bianca and Fennel are both happy about traveling but she hopes that they are able to find a cure for reduce sizes. "Amanita what time will the package with the doll clothes arrive?"

Amanita looks at the tiny light brown hair woman and remembers the last update she remembers she read and then answers....
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.title: Pinky promise and eating breakfast.

choices: Touya leaves town and sees Cheren waiting for him.
Plasma is cuasing some trouble in town!
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.content:
"It should be coming in any minute," Amanita replies to the tiny Pokemon Professor and as on cue the door bell rings. The grade school girl gets out of her chair and quickly goes to the door to answer it. Touya and the other watch as Amanita quickly returns with the package in hand with a big smile on her face and sits on the table next to the tiny girls.

"Our clothes are here!" Bianca beams as the blonde looks at the giant box.

"That's good. I"m glad they arrived early," Fennel said and then looks at Amanita. "Your doll clothes work well enough but in some areas they're kind of of tight,"

Touya has a curious look on his face from what Fennel said and is about to ask until Juniper talks first since the tiny light brunette saw the curious look on his face.

"I Think it's time for us to try some of these clothes on,"

"Okay sounds good and it looks like everyone is done eating," Amanita said and looks at Touya. "Sorry to do this but can you clean up while I take them to try out these clothes?

Touya nods in agreement about cleaning up.

"Oh before we go we should put Fia and the others in their balls," Bianca said as she sees that the Pokemon are done eating as well.

"That's an good idea since we're going to leaving soon," Juniper agreeing with Bianca about putting the Pokemon back into their poke'balls.

Touya and Bianca put their Pokemon back into their balls, Amanita picks up the box along with the tiny girls and the grade school girl walks back into her room. Touya picks up the dirty plates and cups and other utensils and starts to wash the dishes, while washing the dishes Touya wonders what Fennel meant when she talked about tightness. Did the doll clothes make it hard for them walk around in? Touya takes a note that if he ever makes any doll clothes for the tiny girls he would have think about how comfortable the doll clothes will be. Touya is able to finish cleaning everything and the young man decides to change out of his night clothes and does this by picking up his bag and enters the bathroom. After a few minutes Touya comes out of the bathroom with different clothes on, he is wearing his blue jacket unzip showing that he is wearing a white shirt, black cargo shorts, and his red shoes along with black socks. Touya walks back into the living room and sees that Amanita is in the living room in her lab clothes.

"Thanks for washing the dishes," Amanita said as she notice the kitchen is clean and then says. "Also they put on their new clothes,"

Touya looks at the living room table and now sees the tiny girls in their new clothes. Bianca is wearing her green beret with a white strip on it, a bright orange blaze unbutton showing a black and white stripe shit under the blazer, white skit with orange shoes with black laces and long lime green socks. Juniper has her hair down and it looks brushed with how straight her hair looks, white tank top, lime green jeans, and red and white shoes. Fennel is now wearing her hair in pony tail with her bangs looking the same as well, a pink shirt with a purple floral pattern with a white over shirt, black shots along with pink shoes with white laces.

"So how do we look?" Fennel asks the giant as she does a twirler.

"You all look cute," Touya answers back to the tiny girls.

"Thanks Touya," Bianca said with a smile.

"Yes, thank you very much," Juniper adds with a little smile of her own.

"Yep!" Fennel exclaims and the says. "Amanita can you give him the bag of clothes,"

"Sure. I'm also going to give Touya the other things that we made," Amanita said as she goes behind the couch and brings out a small suit case and hands it over to Touya. "This has all of their clothes in this suit case as well little some items that my big sis and myself have made as well. The items included in suit case are miniature version of items such as washing machine, dryer, an small machine that works like poke'center so Bianca can heal her Pokemon and some items for the bathroom."

"So we're all good to go," Bianca says with a smile.

"It looks like we're about to go on our journey now," Juniper says as well with a nod.

"Yep. Take care of yourself Amanita," Fennel said to the giantess.

"I will. Don't cause trouble for Touya and the others," Amanita replies back with a smile.

"Hey don' say something like that about your big sister," Fennel pouts at the grade school girl. Everyone expect for Fennel all share a laugh about what happen.

"I know Bis Sis, Oh by the way Touya before you leave I'll give you my pal code as well," Amanita said with a smile and Touya nods in agreement happy to have another number in his pal pad.

After putting the suite case in and getting Amanita's pal code, Touya puts his right hand on the living room table with his palm open and the tiny girls get on the hand. Touya then lifts his hand up to his chest as the tiny girls take a look at Amanita before they leave.

"Bye Amanita I hope we can meet again!" Bianca shouts as she waves her arms.

"Yes. You're going to be amazing researcher," Juniper said with a warm smile.

"Yep! Don't you worry your big sis will be back to her BIG Sis soon," Fennel jokes with a smile on her face.

"See you all later. Be careful out there," Amanita replies back with a smile letting sister get away with that terrible pun.

"Take care," Touya said with a smile as well and Amanita nods in agreement.

Touya then puts his right hand into his bag and the tiny girls get off his hand and soon Touya removes hand from his bag and soon he leaves the apartment. As climbing down the stairs Touya wonders what today is going to be like when he leaves the apartment building.
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.title: Clothes arriving early and heading out.

choices: "Touya will win for sure," Touya wins the battle.
"I think Cheren can win this one," Cheren wins the battle.
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.content:
Touya walks into the park of Striaton City since it was necessary to walk through to get to the route. It's quite a nice little park and he knew Bianca would have love to see it, Touya made a mental note to himself that Bianca and himself and possible Professor Juniper and Professor Fennel have to come back to see the park. The young man keeps on walking until he walks out of the park and into route 3. Touya looks and sees that in the distance there are two buildings and then the young man notice someone is coming near him, that someone is Cheren. Cheren is in his usual clothes as well.

"It's good to see that you're moving again," Cheren says as he gets closer to the brown hair youth. "So the girls clothes came in?" Touya nods head in agreement and Cheren is happy to see that Touya along with Bianca are continue their journey. "Well since it's been awhile since we battled, let's see which one of us is stronger,"

Touya would happy battle Cheren, but he wonders if the tiny girls in his bag would mind if he had a battle with Cheren. Just then Touya's Xtransceiver rings and the young man answers it and see that Bianca is on the screen.

"It's okay Touya," Bianca says on the call. "We don't mind if you have a battle with Cheren," Touya smiles at the Bianca and is happy to see that the tiny girls don't mind if he had a quick battle with Cheren.

"Thanks everyone," Touya answers back as Bianca nods and the blonde end the call. Touya and Cheren both look at each other with confident smiles as they drew a Poke'ball ready to have a battle.

____________________________________________________________

Bianca is happy that Touya and Cheren are both having fun with their Pokemon, but the blonde is a bit sad since she will not see the battle since she still so small and in Touya's bag. The blond then sits down a book and tries to listen to what's going on with the battle. Fennel and Juniper both join as well and wonder who would win this battle.

"So Touya is having a battle with Cheren fellow right?" Fennel said as she remembers the young man from when the black hair young man join Bianca and Touya in the triple battle in Striaton City Gym. "So who do think will win this battle?"

"That will be tough to call," Juniper said and the Pokemon Professor continues to talk. "Touya and Cheren were always able to get top marks on their test when they were getting their trainer cards," Juniper remember when Touya, Bianca and Cheren were doing test to get their trainer cards. "Bianca you've seen both of them fight, who do you think will win?" The brunette asks the blonde about the two giants having a Pokemon battle.

Bianca looks at Juniper and Fennel and answers............................................
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.title: A battle on route 3 and a talk about who will win.

choices: Bianca wants to help. Touya and Bianca go after the two grunts.
Bianca let's Touya and Cheren take care of the two grunts.
1512311111111111122221111112121111112111.content:
"Touya will win for sure," Bianca answers back and both Professor start to giggle a bit.

"You really have a lot of faith in Touya," Fennel said as Bianca blushes a bit.

"Touya is a great at battling and plus he hasn't lost yet," Bianca replies back.

"That's true, plus Touya has been doing good on answering the questions we ask when we were giving you two lessons at Fennel's apartment," Juniper adds remembering when Fennel and herself were teaching Touya and Bianca. Juniper then remembers the reason why they were talking "I wonder how the battle is going?"

"Oh yeah!" Fennel exclaims as the tiny girls stay quite and try to hear what's going on outside.

___________________________________

"Why do you keep beating me? We have the same number of Gym Badges. We should be equals in strength...." Cheren says as he sees that Touya's Kenki is standing while his Purrloin lies on the ground.

"You did good Kenki," Touya said as the Dewott looks at his trainer and smiles with a nod, happy that Touya is praising him.

Cheren sighs as he returns Purrloin back to it's ball as Touya returns the Dewott back to it's ball. Cheren sent out his Snivy first while Touya sent out a Pansear that he nickname Mousu. Even though Snivy was able to beat Masou, the fire type of monkey was able to do enough damage for the Dewott to be able defeat the grass type and then Kenki was able to beat Purrloin quite easily.

"Thanks for the battle Cheren." Touya said, the young man could see that his friend was upset about losing but Touya could sense the strong conviction of Cheren and his team. Touya knew better then anyone that Cheren wants to the Champion of the Unova and he could see how much Cheren and his Pokemon wanted to become the strongest.

Cheren looks at his Childhood friend, even though feeling frustration from not being able to beat Touya the black hair lad sighs.

"At least I was able to get a better understanding of how you battle," Cheren said trying to look on the bright side of things.

_________________________________________

"Looks like you were right Bianca," Fennel said as the dark blue hair woman could hear what the two giants were saying.

"Yeah....." Bianca replies, the blonde was happy that Touya won but feels bad for Cheren for losing. The blond then gets on idea and pulls out her Xtranscriver and starts to dial.

Juniper and Fennel both hear Touya's Xtransciver and knew that Bianca is calling Touya. The two older women look and see that Bianca is talking to the young man.

"Hey Touya can I hang out with and Cheren?"

On the screen Bianca can see that Touya is nods in agreement. Bianca is happy that Touya is willing to go with her request.

"Thanks Touya," Bianca replies back as both of them end their call.

"Enjoy your time out there Bianca," Fennel said with a smile.

"Yes. But before you leave, can we have your Xtransciver?" Juniper asks the blond trainer and then adds. "We need a way to stay in contact and Fennel and myself didn't have our Xtranscivers when we shrunk,"

"Sure Professor," Bianca replies back as the blond gives the light brown hair woman her Xtransciver. "Just give Touya a call and I'm sure he''ll help you out,"

"We will," Juniper answers as the three girls look up and see some light and a giant hand come down.

__________________________________________________________

"Mun!" Penelope says and obliges, spraying its Dream Mist all over the shrunken Professor.

"B-Be gentle... with... me..." Fennel says as she falls asleep, collapsing onto the table.

With the tiny Professor out cold, Juniper sets up the rest of the Dream Machine and hooks Fennel up to it. Soon, her dreams appear on the screen.

"It's working. There's nothing much yet, but give her a little stimulation and we should be ready to test properly." Juniper tells Touya, who nods and cracks his knuckles to get ready for the massage.

"Okay!" Touya says confidently and begins.

The young man knew that he wouldn't be able to approach this like with his Pokemon, so instead, he used both index fingers to rub Fennel's little shoulders. He stayed cautious though, still not wanting to hurt to tiny lady. But as he watched the Dream Machine's screen, an image started to come in.
